234b5(rgyud 'grel): mgon po snabs sogs rnam dag pa/ /brtson 'grus chen mo yang dag ldan zhing/ /pus mo la gnas mkha' 'gro khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sku yi 'khor lo sa 'og la gnas shing/ /rnam thar brgyad ldan rtsibs brgyad dkar po ste/ /sku yi rigs
234b6(rgyud 'grel): mtshon 'khor lo'i phreng bas mdzes/ /gti mug can 'dul 'khor lo khyod phyag 'tshal/ /'gro ba'i don la thugs rje sprul pa'i gnas/ /mkha' 'gro'i tshogs ldan nyi shu rtsa bzhi ru/ /sku gsung thugs gnas bsgrub la brtser dgongs pa'i/ /'khor lo'i
234b7(rgyud 'grel): lha la rtag par phyag 'tshal lo/ /ma rungs 'dul mdzad rnam rgyal la sogs rnams/ /gdul bya'i dbang gis khro mo'i skur ston cing/ /sgo mtshams dag na ma rungs phyogs bdag 'dul/ /khwa gdong la sogs sbrul pa'i mkha' 'gro gnas/ /
235a1(rgyud 'grel): bya rog gdong can mkha' 'gro 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /zhal gyi nga ros 'brug stong bdud las rgyal/ /gar gyi sbyor ldan gcer bu phyag bzhi ma/ /nag mo 'jigs byed ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shar gyi sgo srungs yi dags gdan la bzhugs//
235a2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' mo spyan gsum phyag rgya lnga yis mdzes/ /kha nas khrag 'dzag a la la zhes sgrogs/ /yang dag las mdza' i dpa' mo khyod phyag 'tshal/ /'ug pa'i gdong can bgegs tshogs bsregs mdzad ma/ /kha nas lce 'dril mche ba rnam par gtsigs/ /
235a3(rgyud 'grel): ha ha rgod cing spyan mig glog ltar 'gyu/ /dgra bgegs tshar gcod ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang gi sgo srungs ljang dmar 'od ldan ma/ /mkha' 'gro mi srung rus pa'i rgyan dang ldan/ /sku mdog dmar ljang gri gug thod pa 'dzin/ /yang dag 'tsho ba'i dpa' mo
235a4(rgyud 'grel): khyod phyag 'tshal/ /khyi yi gdong can thod pa'i rgyan ldan ma/ /sku mdog dmar mo phaT kyi sgra sgrogs shing/ /spyan gsum sdang mig gdus mdza' i me bzhin 'jigs/ /sgrub pa'i don mdzad ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nub kyi sgo srung dpa' mo stobs ldan ma//
235a5(rgyud 'grel): zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum 'byung po zil gyis gnon/ /mkha' 'gro mgo bo'i phreng bas do shal byas/ /yang dag rtsol ba'i ngo bo khyod phyag 'tshal/ /phag gi gdong can gsang ba'i dbang phyug ma/ /bdud 'dul mkha' 'gro phyag rgya gar gyis bskyod/ /
235a6(rgyud 'grel): rna cha mgul rgyan spyi gtsug nor bus brgyan/ /'jigs byed khrag 'thung ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lho yi sgo srungs ser mo 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /zhal nas me 'bar bdud kyi dpung rnams bsreg /Da ma ru khrol kha TwAM g.yon na bsgreng/ /yang dag dran
235a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dpa' mo khyod phyag 'tshal/ /shar lhor dbang sgyur gshin rje brtan ma ni/ /g.yas sngo g.yon ser brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs/ /rgyan rnams kun gyi rab mdzes mkha' 'gro ma/ /dbang phyug gsang ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro
235b1(rgyud 'grel): sems can don brtson pa/ /rus pa'i ska rags khrag gi thig le can/ /dpal ldan mkha' 'gro dur khrod chas kyis brgyan/ /dge chos yang dag bskyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lho nub dri med gshin rje pho nya mo/ /g.yas ser g.yon dmar mkha' 'gro gzugs mdzes ma//
235b2(rgyud 'grel): ha ha'i sgra sgrogs gsod byed mthu rtsal can/ /mkha' 'gro dgos 'dong skong la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thabs dang shes rab mnyam nyid rol pa'i sku/ /bde chen mnyam nyid mkha' 'gro kun gyi gtso/ /kha nas khrag 'dzag gri gug thod pa 'dzin/ /dge chos yang dag bsrung
235b3(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nub byang mkha' 'gro gshin rje mche ba mo/ /g.yas dmar g.yon sngo spyan bgrad 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /gsang ba'i lha mo rdo rje'i glu len ma/ /stobs chen mkha' 'gro ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rus pa'i dum bu khrag gis thig les brgyan/ /
235b4(rgyud 'grel): tshangs skud mgo bo'i phreng bas rab brgyan pas/ /rus pa'i ska rags sil sil sgra dang ldan/ /mi dge yang dag spong la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang shar gsang ba'i gshin rje 'joms byed ma/ /g.yas ljang g.yon sngo 'gying zhing rol pa'i sku/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi
235b5(rgyud 'grel): g.yas brkyang gdan la bzhugs/ /mkha' 'gro dbyings phyug ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyon mongs 'khrug byed 'bar ba'i 'od ldan ma/ /khro gnyer mche gtsigs dgra bgegs zhal du gsol/ /bsnyen sgrub byed la gsang ba'i dngos grub ster/ /mi dge skyes mi byed la
235b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig 'khor lo mi 'am ci sogs 'dul/ /phyogs bzhi gdong can mtshams bzhi byed gzugs ma/ /las kyi rigs mtshon sna tshogs rdo rjes mdzes/ /phrag dog can 'dul 'khor lo khyad phyag 'tshal/ /sku gsum ye shes lnga ldan
235b7(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gsum/ /phyi nang brtan g.yo'i dngos po khyod rang bzhin/ /khyod kyi srid gsum rang bzhin lhan cig skyes/ /khyod 'dab phyogs bzhi yum bzhi mtshams bum thod/ /rim gsum dpa' bo dpa' mo bzhi bcu brgyad/ /sgo mtshams lha mo brgyad
236a1(rgyud 'grel): de drug cu gnyis/ /sgrub la brtser dgongs 'khor lo lngar gnas pa'i/ /lha tshogs la ni gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /he ru ka dpal gsang ba'i grong khyer mchog /dkyil 'khor bde chen sdig pa rab 'joms pa'i/ /nyon mongs zhi
236a2(rgyud 'grel): bas pad nyi zlum por gnas/ /mi shes gcod phyir gri gug phreng bas mdzes/ /lha rnams mchod phyir yon tan kun ldan pa'i/ /bum pa sna tshogs bdud rtsis rab bkang nas/ /'dod yon snam bur lha mo kun ldan zhing/ /pany+tsa rA ga rin chen pha
236a3(rgyud 'grel): gur ldan/ /dra ba dra phyed rin chen nyi zla dang/ /me tog phreng dang gser gyi dril bu dbyangs/ /brtson 'grus rlung bskyod dam pa'i chos sgra sgrogs/ /da ru ka sogs mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan/ /yon tan rgyas phyir gru bzhi sgo bzhis mdzes/ /rin
236a4(rgyud 'grel): chen rta babs chos 'khor gdugs kyis phug /yid 'ong ri dags ba dan bcu drug ldan/ /rin chen ka ba two ra Na bzhis mdzes/ /ba so pad ma bkra shis bum pa dang/ /thod pa'i phreng ba rdo rje ra bas mdzes/ /legs pa'i sgo khyud dpal ldan phyogs
236a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhir gnas/ /mi dge rnams bsrung sna tshogs pad+ma'i phyir/ /rdo rje'i sa gzhir ra ba bla bre gur/ /mda' yi dra ba 'jigs pa'i me dpung 'bar/ /lha klu gnod sbyin srin po gshin rje dang/ /drag po sreg byed tsha tsha kar ltar 'phro/ tshogs brgyad dag
236a6(rgyud 'grel): phyir dur khrod rab 'jigs byed/ /shi ri Sha sogs byang chub shing brgyad la/ /khwa gdong la sogs shing lha sprin dang bcas/ /klu dang gnod sbyin lha chen brgyad por ldan/ /dbang po me dang gshin rje srin po dang/ /chu bdag rlung lha nor bdag 'byung
236a7(rgyud 'grel): por ldan/ /sa yi lha mo nyi zla tshangs pa dang/ /drag po zhing skyong phyogs mtshams kun na gnas/ /mchod rten brag sogs chu dang me brgyad dang/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi mkha' 'gro gnas pa'i sa/ /'byung po 'dus pa ce spyang sgra sgrogs shing/ /sha za ro langs
236b1(rgyud 'grel): 'phra men mo brgyad dang/ /u ma dus mtshan dur khrod bdag mor bcas/ /rgyal chen bzhi sogs 'jig rten dbang phyug ldan/ /grub chen brgyad sogs phyag rgya mchog ldan zhing/ /grub pa'i rnal 'byor spyod pa rnam mdzes pa'i/ /sgrub pa'i rten gyur bde
236b2(rgyud 'grel): gshegs kun gyi gnas/ /snod bcud dag la gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog /yon tan kun ldan thar pa'i grong mchog la/ /bdag ni rab gus dang bas phyag 'tshal lo/ /lhan cig skyes dga' i rang bzhin bde mchog ni/ /'khor lo lnga sogs dur
236b3(rgyud 'grel): khrod bcas bstod pa'i/ /dge ba gang byung des ni 'gro ba ma lus pa/ /bde mchog la gnas myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob shog /dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i bstod pa don thams cad grub pa rnam dag gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba rgyal po mchog gi dngos
236b4(rgyud 'grel): grub thob pa/ slob dpon tA ri ka pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //yul kha tshe'i mkhan po d+harmma badzra dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba rgya brtson 'grus seng ges bsgyur ba'o// //slad kyi rgya gar gyi
236b5(rgyud 'grel): mkhan po thun mong gi dngos grub brnyes pa'i paN+Di ta ku mA ra badzra dang/ /bod kyi lo tsa ba dge slong nyi ma'i rdo rjes rgya gar shar phyogs kyi grong khyer mnga' ldan du bsgyur cing zhus te dag par byas so// //
236b6(rgyud 'grel): *// (//dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dbang gi bya ba mdor bsdus pa bzhugs//) //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI tsakra saM ba ra She ka pra kri ya u pa de sha nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dbang gi bya ba mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba/ /dpal
236b7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'khor lo sum rim rnal 'byor nyid/ /gang gis sems can khams gsum gnas/ /rdo rje can gyi gnas thob pa'i/ /dbang bskur cho ga'i rim pa bshad/ /dbang bskur dkyil 'khor sngon 'gro bar/ /rdo rje 'chang
237a1(rgyud 'grel): gis bshad pa ste/ /'on kyang dkyil 'khor de rang bzhin/ /ci yin de ni 'di ltar bshad/ /ri mor gnas pa'i las dang ni/ /thig las tshon dgye'i rim pas bstan/ /'gro ba 'di nyid rang bzhin gyis/ /grub pa'i dkyil 'khor
237a2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med pa'o/ /bcos ma nyid kyi ngo bo gang/ /de ni gdul bya'i dbang las 'dod/ /mkhas pa'i bsgrub bya de min te/ /yang dag don mthong grol phyir ro/ /'khor lo gsum gyi dkyil 'khor grub/ /dkyil 'khor lha rnams grub pa'o/ /de yis
237a3(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur la sogs rim/ /ci nas ma grub yang grub byed/ /de yis rang bzhin mi shes rnams/ /snod du bya bar bzhed pa ste/ /dbang bskur sogs rim kun rdzob tu/ /mngon sum du ni sgrub pa po/ /slob dpon la sogs dbye ba yis/ /
237a4(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur rnam pa bzhir bshad de/ /chu yi dbang sogs dbye ba yis/ /bzhi po des ni bcu bzhi'o/ /dang por re zhig 'khor lo gsum/ /bdag nyid rdo rje slob dpon rang/ /de nas slob ma bdag 'drar bsam/ /de nas thams cad bsgrub par bya/
237a5(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni bu khyod bdud rtsi ste/ /ma srungs sreg par byed pas dug /bsrungs na dngos grub 'gyur ba ste/ /bdud rtsi lnga yis chus grub pa'o/ /oM pany+tsa a mri ta u da ka Tha hUM/ thod par gnas pa de la sbyin/ /khyod kyis smad par mi bya zhing/ /dam tshig
237a6(rgyud 'grel): dang 'gal mi bya ste/ /dmyal la sogs par 'gro 'gyur ro/ /de nas dbab par bya ba ste/ /de la 'di yi rim pa ni/ /bshang gci sogs pas yang dag spags/ /zla mtshan ldan pa 'doms dkris ras/ /byi la'i brun gyis spags pa yi/ /gu gul dang
237a7(rgyud 'grel): ni bsres te btags /yi dags me ni rab blangs la/ /de yi pad+ma'i snod bzhag byas/ /der ni de dag thams cad de/ /rkang pa g.yon brkyang la gnas pas/ /'khor lo gsum bdag khro bo 'babs/ /'khor lo gsum bdag de mdun du/ /rdo rje ldan
237b1(rgyud 'grel): pas bsreg de nas/ /bdugs de 'bab par the tshom med/ /tiSh+Tha mahA kro d+ha A be sha ya hUM/ sh+rI he ru kA ya padmi he bidyA rA dzA ya/ d+hi ma he swAhA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis dpa' bo bskul bar bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor nye bar bstan par bya ste/ rang bzhin
237b2(rgyud 'grel): gyis ni dag pa'i bdag /lus kyi rang bzhin dri ma med/ /dpa' bo dpa' mo dbang po'i gnas/ /dkyil 'khor la ni bu khyod ltos/ /de nas gnas dang nye gnas sogs/ /bdag nyid dkyil 'khor lus dkyil 'khor/ /la gnas byang chub phyogs kyi chos/ /
237b3(rgyud 'grel): sum cu rtsa bdun rang bzhin te/ /rtsa ni sum cu rtsa bdun po/ /lha yi 'khor lo dkyil 'khor pa'o/ /dpal ni he ru ka yi ni/ /yan lag nying lag nyer bstan bya/ /de nas bdag nyid kun btud de/ /bla ma mgon la gsol ba gdab/ /chos bden bdag
237b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid bsam mi khyab/ /bdag la dbang ni bskur bar mdzod/ /slob mas gsol ba btab ma thag /rnam rgyal sogs pa'i bum pa blang/ /pad+ma'i snod las gnas pa'i chu/ /hUM yig rdo rje las byung pa/ /mi bskyod pa ni rdo rje yi/ /slob dpon gyis rab
237b5(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya/ /ye shes sems dpa' i rang bzhin gyi/ /sa bon 'od zer gyis bskul brtson/ /ye shes de nyid gzhug par bya/ /de bzhin rab mchog chu blang bya/ /de nyid mi bskyod gzugs kyis ni/ /rnam shes phung po'i ngo bo ste/ /brtse chen ston
237b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dpa' bo yi/ /dbang bskur 'di ni spyi bor sbyin/ /oM tsakra bI ra twaM a b+hi Shiny+tsa yi ma zhes pa ste chu'i'o/ /bris pa la sogs dbu rgyan yang/ /'di ltar rin chen 'dzin sa bon/ /a las rdo rje nyi ma zhes/ /bshad par bsgrub cing yang dag mchod//
237b7(rgyud 'grel): de ni snga ma bzhin du'o/ /de nyid dbu rgyan rnam pa ste/ /'di ni tshong ba'i bdag nyid do/ /bsam shing bsgrubs te rdo rje can/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro spyi bor te/ /oM sarba bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye/ badzra war+N+Na ni ye huM hUM phaT swAhA zhes bya ba'i sngags dang/ de bzhin du sngags
238a1(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang brjod do/ /dbu rgyan no/ /dzi phad rdo rje las byung ba/ /'du shes de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ /snang ba mdza' yas rdo rjer bsgrubs/ /yang dag gzungs pas sbyin par bya/ /lag pa g.yas dang snying gar ro/ /a d+hi ba ti dwAM
238a2(rgyud 'grel): a b+hi Shiny+tsa tha twaM bI ra sh+rI he ru ka d+he bi/ e d+ha rud sarba bud+dA twAM grih+Na badzra su bi d+ha ye rdo rje'o/ /khaM yig ral gri yang dag 'byung/ /don yod grub pa'i gzugs can te/ /'du byed ngo bo dril bu ni/ /lag pa g.yon par sbyin par bya/ /'di ni rnal 'byor ma
238a3(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi/ /dril bu'i sgra kun rjes 'gror bshad/ /khyod nyid kyis ni rtag tu bcad/ /byang chub mchog tu rgyas bas bzhed/ /dpa' bo lag tu rdo rje dril/ /gzung ngo 'khor lo gsum gyi bdag /rang bzhin gyis mdzes dga' ba ni/ /phyag rgya chen por byin gyis
238a4(rgyud 'grel): brlab/ bdag po'o/ /slob ma'i spyi bor lag pa sbyin/ /'bruM las rnam snang mdzad kyi gzugs/ /rdo rje can gzugs phung ngo bo/ /ming gi dbang ni bskur bar bya/ /oM sh+rI tsakra a d+hi pa ti sh+rI he ru ka bI ra twaM a b+hi Shiny+tsa yA mi/ khyod ni rdo rje che ge mo zhes
238a5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /ming ngo/ /dbang bskur lnga thob rgyud bas ni/ /sangs rgyas lnga po 'di rnams dag /ma rig pa dang bral ba las/ /ye shes lnga ni thob par byed/ /yi ge nyi shu gnyis sngags kyis/ /sngags kyi dbang bskur de nas sbyin/ /'di de sangs rgyas
238a6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi/ /dpal he ru ka'i phyag na bsnams/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bca?/ /dpal he ru ka'i brtul zhugs brtan/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+ha badzra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e Sha TwaM d+ha rA ya mi oM ha ha ha hI/ rdo rje brtul zhugs so /kha TwAM cang te'u lhung
238a7(rgyud 'grel): bzed dag /dpa' bos byin pa blangs nas ni/ /dpal he ru ka'i phyag rgya 'di/ /phyi dang nang du yang dag pa/ /rdor bcas lag pa g.yon pa yis/ /chos gos grwa nas bzung nas su/ /g.yas pas mi 'jigs sbyin byas la/ /slob ma dbugs 'byung
238b1(rgyud 'grel): sbyin par bya/ /'di ltar nga yis lung bstan te/ /'khor lo gsum gyi bdag nyid khyod/ /rang nyid sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin/ /he ru ka dpal zhes bya ba'i/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yin no/ /sh+rI he ru ka DA ki nI na ma:sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+ha(rgyud 'grel): sa ma
238b2(rgyud 'grel): ya twaM b+hu b+hu ba swa(rgyud 'grel): khams gsum gyi ni rgyal srid che/ /dpal ldan yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas/ /bdud sogs kun las rnam rgyal zhing/ /grong khyer mchog tu zhugs pa yin/ /lung bstan pa'o/ /de nas yang gsol ba gdab phyir bya ste/ phyir mi
238b3(rgyud 'grel): ldog pa'i dbang bskur tshe/ /dpa' bo chen po bdag la stsol/ /'bro ba mtshan ma med byed pa/ /de ni de 'dir mdzad du gsol/ /de nas 'khor lo gsum bdag go/ /ston pa ye shes sems dpa' yi/ /rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyis/ /yang
238b4(rgyud 'grel): dag bskul bar rim gyis ni/ /bkug ste dpa' bo dpa' mo rnams/ /mchod dang bsnyen bkur bzang po yis/ /de bzhin ye shes chus gang ba'i/ /bum gnas de bzhin gshegs de dag /rdo rje 'chang dbang dbang bskur bar/ /dpa' bo rnam
238b5(rgyud 'grel): par bsam par bya/ /dbang bskur rdo rje chen po la/ /khams gsum pa yi phyag byas pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum gyi/ /dpa' bo dag ni rnal 'byor gnas/ /ji ltar 'dod pas mchod par bya/ /gnas las byung ba sbyin
238b6(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /sngags kyang bzlas so/ /de nas mi bskyod pa dbu rgyan du byas te/ dpa' bo dang lha mo rnams de la lhag par gnas par bya'o/ /oM su pra tiSh+Tha badzra swA hA/ zhes bzlas so/ /de nas me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams sna tshogs
238b7(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams kyis kun nas mchod de/ dpa' bo chen po dang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis ji ltar 'dod par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rdo rje can gyi bka' nod par bya ste/ /de nyid rig pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /mi bya ba ni cung zad med/ /de nyid shes nas de nas ni//
239a1(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bos 'dod pa lnga spyod do/ /bdag nyid dpa' bo kun gyi dngos/ /bdag nyid lha mo kun gyi dngos/ /de phyir bdag gis thams cad bya/ /bdag nyid he ru ka mchod bya/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung chos can/ /sems can sgyu ma'i/
239a2(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin no/ /khams gsum de ltar shes nas ni/ /sems can don ni mnyam med byos/ /bya ba byas pa'i slob ma yis/ /de nas gtso la yon phul te/ /skye bo dam pa 'dus pa la/ /bdag nyid kun gyis bstod phyag bya/ /phyir mi ldog pa'o/ /
239a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo mdun du bya ba byas/ /'khor lo'i spyan ni bla ma che/ /dpa' bo de nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas gsang ston don gnyer bya/ /skyo ba med skyob ba skyabs med skyabs/ /dpal ni 'khor lo bde ba'i mchog /rgyu med par ni thugs rje che/ /mgon med
239a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi mgon mdzod cig /bdag nyid che khyod ji lta bar/ /gtso bos bdag kyang de 'drar mdzod/ /'khor ba'i 'dam gyi tshogs su ni/ /bying ba bdag la skyabs mdzod cig /de la 'dir phyag rgya'i rim pa ni sa bon lnga'i rigs kyi rang bzhin dag pa'i phyag rgya las
239a5(rgyud 'grel): dang chos dang chen po dang/ dam tshig rnams thams cad ni bud med du 'dod pa'o/ /'di ltar rdo rje slob dpon dpal snying rje chen po'i stobs kyis/ mtshan mo chen mo la gnas khang dben par gang yang rung ba'i mngon par gsang ba'i lha mo dam tshig
239a6(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya rnyed pa ni/ snyoms par zhugs pa las gang yang rung ba skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin te/ dpa' bo thams cad yang dag 'dus/ /lha mo thams cad mnyam par phrad/ /kun rdzob pa yi byang chub sems/ /gsang ba gang yin de dbang
239a7(rgyud 'grel): bskur/ /'di de'i dpa' bo lha mo rnams/ /dam tshig rmad byung chen po ste/ /khams lnga ldan pa ro rtogs byed/ /bde ba de gang myang bar bya/ /pad+mar gnas te yang dag spyad/ /kye ma bde ba chen po zhes/ /ston pa la ni zhu zhing brjod/ /slob mas kyang ni
239b1(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa bcom/ /ji ltar rdo rje 'chang sogs kyis/ /sngon chad sras ni dbang bskur ba/ /de bzhin du ni byang chub sems/ /bzang pos bu khyod dbang bskur ro/ /gsang ba'o/ /de'i rjes la rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rig pa 'am/ gzhan gyi gzhung ltar gzhan
239b2(rgyud 'grel): yang dang zhes bya ste/ ston pas byin te/ de yis dam pa bsgrub par byed do/ /lha mo 'di ni phyag rgya che mdza' yas bde ba sbyin pa mo/ /rnam pa kun tu phyag rgya long/ /bu yis bla med mchod pa gyis/ /shes rab bo/ /de nas lha mo des/ dpa' bo bla na
239b3(rgyud 'grel): med pa la bka' gsol bar byed de/ dpa' bo byang chub sems bza' bar/ /khyod ni spro ba yin nam ci/ /rigs lnga las ni rab 'byung ba/ /rig ma mchod pa la gus sam/ /dri chen dri chu stobs dang khrag /sogs bza' da lta yid ches sam/ /rjes su mthun
239b4(rgyud 'grel): smra dam tshig bzang/ /ji ltar dga' ba smos shig bu/ /'di ltar gsungs pa'i dam tshig sogs/ /lha mo bdag ni cis mi spros/ /bud med rtag gus cis mi bya/ /pad+ma mchod par cis mi bgyid/ /de nas lha mo de dga' ste/ /skra ni grol zhing gos dang bral//
239b5(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma rgyas par byas nas ni/ /bstan te b+hany+tsa pad+ma ho/ /pad+ma'i dbus na gnas pa'i rtsa/ /bde ba 'bab pa bstan bya ste/ /sor mos so sor bskul ba dang/ /lce yi ro myang la gnas te/ /de nas grub par smra ba ni/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba bya'o/ /nyams su
239b6(rgyud 'grel): myong ba mchog dga' ba/ /'byung sde de yi bde ba myong/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ma de dga' bston cing zab pa bsngags smra ba'o/ /lag pa g.yon pa spyi bor bzhag la/ /rjes su gnang bar lung bstan par bya'o/ /de nas bzung ste bu khyod kyis/ /ji srid
239b7(rgyud 'grel): byang chub snying po'i bar/ /mi 'drar sems can thams cad kyi/ /don ni bdag nyid kun gyis gyis/ /shes rab ye shes so/ /rim pa gsum pa de'i bla ma/ /man ngag gis ni 'dir shes bya/ /'di ni rang nyid mdzes pa ste/ /phyi rol yul ni spangs
240a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ rig 'di bor nas de nas ni/ /gzhan pa'i thabs kyis sangs rgyas med/ /rig ma brtul zhugs spyod cig pu/ /brtul zhugs rnams kyis bla ma'i bla/ /rig ma yi ni brtul zhugs so/ /chu sogs phyir mi ldog pa'i mdza' / /slob
240a2(rgyud 'grel): dpon dbang du bshad pa ste/ /'di dag phyi rol bstan pa gang/ /thams cad nang du gnas pa'o/ /dpa' bo kun spyod rim phye ba/ /man ngag nyid kyis shes par bya/ /dbang bskur bzhi po bstan pa rnams/ /gang tshe brtul zhugs dbang bskur 'gyur/
240a3(rgyud 'grel): bsam med chos ni thob phyir te/ /de tsho de nyid ces bya 'di/ /phyi dang nang du yang dag bshad/ /phyi dang nang gi nang bzhin bshad/ /chos rnams kun gyi ngo bo ste/ /bsam gyis mi khyab ces bshad de/ /snang med rab rdzogs gnas med pa/ /de nyid lnga pa
240a4(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i rim/ /lhan cig skyes pa mi bzad pas/ /bsam gyi mi khyab mdza' yas sogs/ /de ni brtan g.yo 'gro bdag nyid/ /bdag med kyis ni bdag tu gnas/ /dpa' bo bde ba chen po rtogs/ /'di ni de kho na'i man ngag go /dpal 'khor
240a5(rgyud 'grel): lo bde mchog gi dbang bskur bar bya ba'i rim pa mdor bsdus pa/ /slob dpon rdo rje dril bu pa'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //sh+rI pha na phi gu ba'i brgyud pa ma nor ba'i bshad pa'o// //
240a6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta kriSh+Na dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba bande chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o// // */ (/dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i sgrub thabs bzhugs//) //rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI tsakra sraM ba ra sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/
240a7(rgyud 'grel): dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro kun don la rab gzhal pa'i/ /rang rgyud sngags dang rnal 'byor shes/ /phyi rol rnam dag spangs nas ni/ /dam tshig mnyam nyid rnal 'byor che/ /nang par
240b1(rgyud 'grel): sad pa dang mal nas langs te/ rnal 'byor rjes su mthun pa'i gnas su/ stan bde ba la 'dug nas/ bdud rtsi'i ril bu khar bcug la sh+rI he ru ka zhes bya ba'i don dran par byas te/ snying kar zla ba la dpal mchog dang po'i yi ge ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin can
240b2(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer dang bcas pa'o/ /nges sgo gsum gyi dri ma'ang sbyang ngo/ /'od zer 'phro bas dngos grub pa/ /bskul nas phyag btsal rang lus gzhug /rkang pa sum mdo lte snying ga /rlung dang me chu sa yin no/ /sgal tshigs ri rgyal de bzhin te/ /lus ni mnyam
240b3(rgyud 'grel): pa sgo bzhi rlung/ /rgyan rnams rab mdzes he ru ka'i/ /lus ni dkyil 'khor du 'dod de/ /in+d+ra nI la mtshungs pa'i mdog /zhal bzhi re re spyan gsum pa/ /rtsa ba'i lus mdog ljang dang dmar/ /gser gyi 'od ltar gtsigs pa po/ /ral pa'i thor
240b4(rgyud 'grel): tshugs zla bas brgyan/ /thod phreng sna tshogs rdo rje bcas/ /rdo rje dril bus yang dag 'khyud/ /gnyis kyis glang po'i pags pa bsnams/ /g.yas kyi lag na Da ma ru/ /dgra sta gri gug rtse gsum pa/ /g.yon na kha TwAM ga thod pa/ /zhags pa tshangs
240b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mgo bo bsnams/ /g.yas brkyang pa yi gar gyis ni/ /'jigs byed dus mtshan mnyam par mnan/ /stag lpags bsnams dkris mgo phreng can/ /nyams dgu rgyan drug gis btab pa'o/ /paM las 'khyud pa'i bcom ldan yum/ /zhal
240b6(rgyud 'grel): gcig spyan gsum dmar 'bar ba/ /skra grol dum bu'i rgyan gyis brgyan/ /byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khyud/ /g.yon pa 'khyud cing thod pa dag /gdug pa bdud kyi khrag gis gang/ /g.yas pa rtag tu sdigs mdzub dang/ /ma rungs pa
240b7(rgyud 'grel): yi gri gug bsnams/ /bde chen thugs rje'i rang bzhin can/ /kha sbyor phyi nyid legs shes pas/ /thugs su a ba d+hU tI hUM/ ma bcos nang gi bdag nyid do/ /mkha' 'gro lA ma dum skyes ma/ /gzugs can ma ste bzhi rnams kyang/ /zhal mdog
241a1(rgyud 'grel): dang mtshungs kha TwAM snod/ /gri dang phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan/ /mchod pa bzhi yi rang bzhin rtsa/ /phyogs bral bde chen 'khor lo ste/ /maM laM paM taM hUM brgyad kyang/ /dam tshig cig car bshad pa yin/ /pudz+nyA o a/ go rA de mA kA/
241a2(rgyud 'grel): oM/ tri/ ke/ ka la/ kA/ hi/ preM gri/ sau/ su/ na/ si ma ku/ 'di dag gnas su rnal 'byor ma/ /rtsa yin dpa' bo nyi shu bzhi/ /lus kyi khams su brtag par bya/ /de dag kyang gang zhe na/ go rim ji lta bar/ spyi bor khaN+Da ? pA li dang rab tu gtum mo/ /
241a3(rgyud 'grel): spyi gtsug tu mahA kaM ka la dang gtum pa'i mig can ma'o/ /rna ba g.yas par kangka la dang/ 'od ldan ma'o/ /ltag par mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang/ rna chen ma ste gnas so/ /rna ba g.yon par sung bai ri dang/ brtan pa'i blo can ma'o/ /smin ma'i mtshams
241a4(rgyud 'grel): su a mi tA b+ha dang mi thung ma'o/ /mig tu rdo rje'i 'od dang lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'o/ /phrag par rdo rje'i sku dang/ shing grib ni nye ba'i gnas te/ thugs kyi 'khor lo nam mkha' la sbyor pa mdog sngon po'o/ /mchan khung du myu gu can dang sa srungs ma'o/ /
241a5(rgyud 'grel): nu mar rdo rje ral pa can dang/ 'jigs byed chen mo ste zhing ngo/ /lte bar dpa' bo chen po dang rlung gis shugs can ma'o/ /sna rtser badzra hUM ka ra dang/ chang 'thung ma ste nye ba'i zhing ngo/ /khar rab tu bzang po dang sh+yA me de ba'i/ /mgrin par rdo rje bzang po dang/
241a6(rgyud 'grel): shin tu bzang mo ste tshando ha'o/ /snying gar 'jigs byed chen po dang rta rna ma'o/ /'dom par mig mi bgrang dang/ bya gdong ma ste nye ba'i mtshan do ha ste gsung gi 'khor lo sa la spyod pa mdog dmar po'o/ /mtshan ma la stobs po che dang/ tsakra be ge'o//
241a7(rgyud 'grel): bshang lam du rin chen rdo rje dang khaN+Da ro ha ste 'dus pa can no/ /brlar rta mgrin dang/ shauN+Di ni'o/ /byin par nam mkha' i snying po dang/ tsakra warmi Ni ste nye ba'i 'dus pa can no/ /sor mo rnams la sh+rI he ru ka dang shin tu dpal mo'o/ /bol gong du pad+ma gar
241b1(rgyud 'grel): gyi dbang phyug dang stobs chen ma ste/ dur khrod do/ /mthe bong la rnam par snang byed dang tsakra warti ni'o/ /pus mo gnyis la rdo rje sems dpa' dang/ brtson 'grus chen mo ni nye ba'i dur khrod do/ /sku yi 'khor lo sa 'og na spyod pa ste/ mngon dkar po'o/ /
241b2(rgyud 'grel): khaN+Da ka pa la la sogs pa'i dpa' bo rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam pa ji lta ba bzhin te/ 'on kyang zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'o/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams ni rdo rje phag mo'i rnam pa ji lta ba bzhin te/ sa bcu yongs su dag pa rnams so/ /khwa da dang/
241b3(rgyud 'grel): 'ug pa dang/ khyi dang phag gi gdong pa can rnams dang/ gshin rje brtan ma dang/ pho nya mo dang/ mche ba can dang 'joms ma ste/ 'di dag kyang phyogs dang mtshams su mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin te/ mtshams kyi lha mo rnams ni 'on kyang
241b4(rgyud 'grel): gzugs gnyis ma'o/ /byang chub phyogs kyi rang bzhin can/ /me long gzugs brnyan bzhin gsal blta/ /de nas go cha gnyis shes nas/ /ye shes 'khor lo rnam par bsgom/ /snying ga mgo bo spyi gtsug dang/ /phrag pa mig dang yan lag la/ /
241b5(rgyud 'grel): rdor sems snang mdzad gar dbang phyug /khrag 'thung nyi ma rta mchog bsam/ /lte ba snying ga kha sbyi bo/ /spyi gtsug yan lag thams cad la/ /phag mo gshin rje rmongs byed ma/ /sbyin byed skrag byed gtum ma'o/ /oM hA na ma hi(rgyud 'grel): swAhA hu bau Sha Ta he hUM hUM
241b6(rgyud 'grel): ho phaT haM/ oM bi/ hUM/ oM h+riM/ moM/ h+riM/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ sngags dang phyag rgya sbyor ba yis/ /sbyin drangs mchod nas rang lus gzhug /de bzhin rgyun ni dbang bskur nas/ /cod pan dang ni lhag pa'i lha/ /dza:hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka sa
241b7(rgyud 'grel): ma ya sh+rI ye hUM/ oM sh+rI badzra he he ru ru kaM hUM hUM phaT phaT DA ki ni dzA la saM b+har swAhA/ oM h+rI:ha ha huM hUM phaT/ snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM badzra bai ro tsa nI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM sarbba bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye badzra war+N+Na nI ye huM hUM phaT/ bcom ldan 'das ma'i
242a1(rgyud 'grel): snying po dang/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /rab tu 'bar nas mchod nas ni/ /dung chen phreng ba blang bya ste/ /ji srid skyo bar ma gyur pa/ /de srid du ni rab tu bzlas/ /bsam gtan mi nus rnal 'byor pas/ /go cha che la sogs bsrungs
242a2(rgyud 'grel): te/ rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bas/ /sems can kun las rab brtag bya/ /rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags bzlas shing/ /tshangs par spyad pa rtag tu bsam/ /zas kyi rdo rje sems sogs dang/ /snying ga'i dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg bya/ /zhi ba'i btung ba bzhi
242a3(rgyud 'grel): myangs pas/ /rtag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /dam tshig legs so legs gnas pas/ /mtshan phyed gyur nas gtor ma sbyin/ /oM a ral+li ho:dza:hUM baM ho:badzra DA ki ni sa ma ya stwaM dri sh+ya ho:aoM A:hUM/ oM kha kha khA hi khA hi sarba yak+Sha rAk+Sha
242a4(rgyud 'grel): sa b+hA ta pre ta pi shA tsonmA da a pa smA ra/ badzra DA ka DA kin+yA da ya i maM ba ling grih+NaM tu sa ma ya rak+Shan+tu ma ma sarbba sid+d+himme pra yats+tshan tu/ ya thai baM ya theSh+TaM? b+huny+dza tha/ dzi gra tha pi ba tha mA ti kra ma tha ma ma sarba karta ya sat+ma khaM bi shud+d+ha ye sa ha yi ka b+ha ban+tu huM
242a5(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ rtag tu snying la gnas pa yi/ /thig le gcig la 'gyur med do/ /de sgom byed pa'i skye bo la/ /nges par ye shes skye bar 'gyur/ /kha TwAM ga ni lha yi sku/ /shes rab Da ma ru yi sgra/ /nyin mo bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /rnal 'byor ma ni
242a6(rgyud 'grel): mtshan mo bshad/ /gnyis med ye shes sems lngan? la/ /mi bya ba ni ci yang med/ /'jigs pa thams cad rnam spangs te/ /dpa' bo seng ge bzhin du spyod/ /mya ngan 'das byung dpa' bo rnams/ /sdug pa yid kyi sprul pa ste/ /dag pa chos kyi sprul
242a7(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ /phag mo'i gzugs su bstan pa yin/ /sems la rnam gnas rnal 'byor pa/ /mya ngan 'das pa mi ston to/ /gal te 'pho 'gyur rnal 'byor pa/ /mkhas spyod pa yi gnas su khrid/ /de lta'i dpa' bo chen po dang/ /rnal 'byor ma ni sa steng dkon//
242b1(rgyud 'grel): cho ga sna tshogs nyams dga' ba/ /bsam pa sna tshogs gzung ba'i phyir/ /rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs pa'i phyir/ /de nyid med na 'ching 'gyur la/ /gang zhig de nyid yod gyur na/ /de dag thams cad dgrol ba'i rgyu/ /dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs
242b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi man ngag /phyag rgya chen po grub pa/ dpal dril bu zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta pradz+nya b+ha dra dang/ lo tsa ba mal gyo blo gros grags kyis bsgyur ba'o/ /*/ /rgya gar skad du/
242b3(rgyud 'grel): sh+rI tsakra saM ba ra pany+tsa kra ma/ bod skad du/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i rim pa lnga pa/ pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bla ma'i byin brlabs tsam gyis ni/ /skad cig nyid la 'byung gang nyid/ /'khor lo sgom par spas pa yi/ /byin rlabs
242b4(rgyud 'grel): rim par bshad par bya/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs kun gyi/ /snying po sdom pa bla ma nyid/ /bgrang phreng bzlas pa 'dir med de/ /bsam gtan lha mchod yod ma yin/ /tshes grangs med cing nges par med/ /sbyin sreg yang dag gnas pa med/ /klog dang
242b5(rgyud 'grel): 'don pa yong? ma yin/ /rnam par rtag med 'jigs bral ba'i/ /slob ma gus pa kun mkhyen gyi/ /sbyong yul ye shes gang zhig ni/ /skyes pa tsam gyi mchog tu ni/ /dag pa dang ni ldan gyur zhing/ /mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan/ /de nyid sa bcu nyid
242b6(rgyud 'grel): dang ni/ /mkha' la 'gro dang rdzu 'phrul dang/ /mi snang khyad par du thob cing/ /skye ba dran dang khams gsum pa'i/ /gnas kyi sems rang rig pa yis/ /'das dang ma 'ongs pa dang ni/ /da ltar byung ba shes pa'o/ /'gal me bskyod pa'i rnam pa can/ /sems
242b7(rgyud 'grel): ni yul la rab tu rgyug /de ni de la rnam bzlog nas/ /mtshon du med par mtshon par byed/ /sgra dang thig le ldan pa'i sems/ /snying gar bzhag bya de nas 'di'i/ /rmongs pa'i rab rib 'joms mdzad ni/ /mnga' bdag bcom ldan 'byung 'gyur te/ /drag po
243a1(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs /he ru kar grags cher 'byung nyid/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i dur khrod na/ /rol cing bdud rnams thams cad 'joms/ /bde ba rnams kyi rnam pa ni/ /skad cig de la gsol mdzad pa'o/ /byin brlabs
243a2(rgyud 'grel): pa yi skad cig la/ /slob ma la yang gang 'pho ba/ /sa bon med 'di skad cig ma/ /gcig la mngon byang chub par mdzod /ces bya ba ni 'khor lo sdom par bla ma rnal 'byor ma'i spas pa las ji ltar rnyed pa'i byin gyis rlob pa nges par bstan pa'o/ /
243a3(rgyud 'grel): byin rlabs kyi rim pa'o// //slar yang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa gnyis pa brjod do/ /rtag tu snying la gnas pa yi/ /thig le gcig la 'gyur med de/ /de sgom byed pa'i skye bo la/ /nges par ye shes skye bar 'gyur/ /'di'i don
243a4(rgyud 'grel): brjod par bya ste/ mig dang rna ba dang pags pa'i phyogs la gnas pa'i shes pa rnams kyis kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyi sems la rnam par shes pa lnga po de dag yang dag par gzhag cing mi g.yo bar byas te/ yid snying gar gzhag nas
243a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i thig le'i gzugs su 'gyur ro/ /de mthong ba las ye shes te/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes skye bar 'gyur te/ rim gyis sangs rgyad nyid du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /da ni sa bon med pa'i rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa brjod par bya'o/ /nyi ma
243a6(rgyud 'grel): zla ba'i bdag nyid can gyi lam/ stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin nam mkha' stong pa'i ngo bo gang nas kyang bar chad med par rlung 'jug pa dang/ 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i lam der rlung dang lhan cig sbyar te/ gcig tu byas pa'i sems gzung bar bya'o/ /sems
243a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi bzhon par gyur pa'i rlung des kyang blo'i gzhi rang khyim du bgyer ro/ /shes rab blo thabs sems dang gcig tu 'gyur te/ gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin nyid du son ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skyed byed kyi rang bzhin rdo rje 'chang nyid sgrub byed pa
243b1(rgyud 'grel): yin no/ /'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i don shes shing/ 'khor ba'i thog ma dang tha ma mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin gyi lha'i mig gis mthong ba dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams mdza' yas mu med pa rnams su sems can rnams kyi sgra
243b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams thos shing/ dri rnams snom/ ro rnams myong/ reg bya rnams la longs spyod par byed la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa chen po la rol par yang byed do/ /rang byin gyis brlab pa'o// //
243b3(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs rdo rje'i gzhir gnas pa'i rdo rje dang/ rdo rje rtse mo dang po mchog gi sbyir gnas pa/ zla ba lta bur dri med lus ldan thig le ni/ /bsgom par byed de bdag nyid rdo rje dbang bskur nyid/ /sa bon dang bcas sna tshogs rdo rje'i rim pa'o/ /de nas mig
243b4(rgyud 'grel): la bkod cing sems brtan par gyur pas ni 'jig rten gsum mthong ba'o/ /de bzhin du rna ba dag la gzhag pa'i sems brtan par gyur pas ni 'jig rten gsum na gnas pa'i sgra thos shing/ /'gro ba drug na gnas pa'i skang kyang shes so/ /de bzhin
243b5(rgyud 'grel): du sna la gzhag pa'i sems brtan par gyur pas 'jig rten gsum na gnas pa'i dri snom mo/ /de bzhin du lce la bzhag pa'i sems brtan par gyur pas ni/ 'jig rten gsum na gnas pa'i ro myong bar byed do/ /de bzhin du pags pa la sems brtan
243b6(rgyud 'grel): par byas pas ni/ 'jig rten gsum na gnas pa'i reg bya la longs spyod do/ /de bzhin du snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo la sems brtan par byas pas ni mngon par shes pa drug 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /spyi bo bde ba chen po la sems gzhag pas ni/ lha yi
243b7(rgyud 'grel): tshogs mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du mgrin pa longs spyod kyi 'khor lor sems gzhag pas ni/ bstan bcos thams cad shes so/ /sgrub pa'i 'khor lor sems gzhag pa la brtan par gyur pas ni lha'i mchog las skyes pa'i bu mo la long spyod
244a1(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i rim pa'o/ /da ni sa bon med pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i rim pa brjod par bya ste/ mdzod spur 'god pa'i sems ni nyi ma'i gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i steng du zla ba'i
244a2(rgyud 'grel): gzugs bkod pa la/ de'i steng du skar ma'i zugs bkod ba ste/ de ltar sems dmigs pa med pa la brtan par gyur pas ni sangs rgyas nyid 'grub par byed do/ /da ni nor bu 'gengs pa'i rim pas brjod par bya ste/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang
244a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba'i tshogs rdo rje nor bu'i rtse mor byang chub kyi sems son ba bde ba ci 'dra ba zhig skye ba de yang dag par nye bar brtags shing/ brtan byas nas de'i bdag nyid du gyur pa la ni tshe 'di nyid la rdo rje 'chang nyid spyad pa med par nges pa nyid du skye bar 'gyur ro/
244a4(rgyud 'grel): rim pa gnyis pa yang lag pa zhes bya ba phyag rgya'i sgo nas snga ma nye bar brtags te brtan par gyur pa kun rdzob pa'i rang bzhin gyi byang chub kyi sems don dam pa'i rang bzhin gyi byang chub kyi sems don dam pa'i rang bzhin rnam par mi rtog pa'i ngo bo
244a5(rgyud 'grel): nyid du gyur pas na rdo rje 'chang nyid du 'grub par byed do/ /rim pa gsum pa sngon nyams su myong ba dran pa bskyed pa/ chos kyi phyag rgya yid las byung ba'i phyag rgya las rab tu byung bar yang dag par brtan pas rdo rje 'chang ba nyid bskyed par byed pa'o/ /nor
244a6(rgyud 'grel): bu 'gengs ? nas? bya ba'i rim pa bzhi pa yang brjod pa/ thams cad du son zhing rten dang bral ba brtan pa dang/ g.yo ba mdza' dag gi ngo bo nyid du gyur pa'i sems khams gsum pa khyab pa'i stong pa nyid/ phyag rgya chen po dang 'khyud pas bsam
244a7(rgyud 'grel): gyis mi khyab pa'i rang bzhin can bla ma'i bka' drin las skyes pa'i brtan par byas pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid sgrub par byed cing/ phyag rgya chen po dang 'khyud pa'i bde ba chen po dang thams cad bskyed par byed pa'o/ /da ni dzE lan+tu ra'i rim pa brjod
244b1(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /lte ba chu so'i mtshams su ni/ /mdog lnga ldan pa'i thig le ni/ /sangs rgyas lnga rnams kyis mtshon pa/ /'khor lo gru gsum dka' dmar ni/ /srog 'gog lhan cig bsgom byas nas/ /skad cig de las 'bar gyur pas/ /'jig rten khams su
244b2(rgyud 'grel): mchod byad/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa dngos su 'gyur/ /bu ga gzhan nas 'byung 'gyur zhing/ /mkha' gzhan nas ni myur du 'jug /gang tshe bsgom pa brtan gyur pa/ /snang ba dngos su thob par 'gyur/ /'bar ba brtan par gyur pa ni/ /lce rtsa nas ni rnam par
244b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ /ji srid 'dod pa de srid du/ /lce ni 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang/ /dbung pa'i rtsa bar son pa'i rlung/ /kun tu 'gro bas lus bskyod cing/ /khams gsum pa ni thams cad du/ /rnam par lta ba la sogs byed/ /ces bya ba ni dzA land+ha
244b4(rgyud 'grel): ra'i rim pa'o// //rim pa lnga pa brjod par bya ste/ gzugs rnams kyi grangs 'gyur te/ /ngo bo nyid kyis gang g.yo ba'i/ /sems ni snying gar brtan byas nas/ /blo dang lhan cig dbang du bya/ /gzung 'dzin dang ni bral bas na/ /
244b5(rgyud 'grel): dmigs pa kun dang bral ba'i sems/ /bsam du med pa'i rang bzhin phyir/ /ci yang bsam par mi bya'o/ /sems ni stong nyid la gzhug cing/ /stong pa sems su rnam gzhug bya/ /stong dang snyong min la sogs pa/ /kun rtog rab spangs
244b6(rgyud 'grel): mkha' mnyam 'gyur/ /rten dang brten pa yod min dang/ /dpe med bzhi ni yod ma yin/ /de nyid lnga pa rdzogs rim ni/ /zad med lhan cig skyes pa ni/ /shing dang tsher ma lcug ma sogs/ /khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyur bcas/ /de bzhin
244b7(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi de nyid dang/ /rjes su mthun pa mdor bsgom bya/ /ngo bo nyid kyi bsgom byed kyang/ /de rtogs par ni byed ma yin/ /gal te de ni kun rtogs na/ /'gro ba'i spyod pa 'jigs par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor gnyid dang ldan pa yi/ /rdzogs
245a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sangs rgyas 'di rtogs mdzad/ /des na rang 'byung rang nyid ni/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes brjod pa yin/ /mdza' bzhi las ni grol ba yin/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas rang bzhin nyid/ /sgom pa de ni ring po nyid/ /
245a2(rgyud 'grel): mi thogs rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur/ /dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i rim pa lnga pa/ slob dpon chen po mkhas pa rdo rje dril bu pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta kriSh+Na pa dang/ dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas
245a3(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur/ phyis bla ma su ma ti kIrti dang/ dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis bcos pa'o/ /dpal paM mthing pa'i rgyud pa ma nor ba'i bshad pa'o// // */ (/dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i rim lnga'i 'brel ba bzhugs//) //
245a4(rgyud 'grel): bla ma dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan 'khor lo sdom pa yi/ /rnal 'byor lus kyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /sems can rang bzhin yongs shes shing/ /rdzogs pa'i las la 'jug rnams la'o/ /dang po tshogs pa kun ldan pas/ /bla med don
245a5(rgyud 'grel): 'byung dga' bas nyal/ /bzhi yis nyer bskul zhal bzhi pa/ /bdud 'dul dpa' bo chen po bzhengs/ /khrus byas bde ba'i stan la gnas/ /ri lu khar bcug snying ka hUM/ /sngon po'i 'od kyis rang lus sbyang/ /ba sprul spros kha dog lngas/ /
245a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro kun lus sbyang sgo gsum dag /sprin 'dra'i 'od kyis rang 'dun? du/ /mkha' la bla ma'i 'khor lo dang/ /phyogs dbang mig gi lha rnams ni/ /gsal gdab rten dang brten par byas/ /phyag dang mchod sogs byas nas ni/ /mdzod
245a7(rgyud 'grel): spu'i gnas nas rang lus bzhug /lus la rten dang brten pa yi/ /'khor lo gsal gdab nye bar dmigs/ /rtog dang spros pa dga' 'gyur na/ /chos kyi 'khor lor 'dab ma bzhi/ /mdog gsal hUM las lte ba ru/ /thabs dang shes
245b1(rgyud 'grel): rab bdag nyid bsam/ /phyogs 'dab rigs kyi sa bon las/ /snying po'i rnal 'byor ma bzhi bskyed/ /steng 'og lus kyi cha shas la/ /pu dzA la sogs nyi shu bzhis/ /'khor lo gsum gyi bdag nyid dran/ /chos 'khor phyi yi 'dab brgyad la/ /ring po'i hUM las
245b2(rgyud 'grel): khro mo brgyad/ /de ltar lha rnams thams cad ni/ /me long nang gi gzugs brnyan bzhin/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor lta bur dmigs/ /mi gsal rtsa yig thams cad la/ /dag pa'i lha nyid mos shing dran/ /phyag rgya sngags kyi don ldan pas/ /ye shes
245b3(rgyud 'grel): spyan drang legs mtshad nas/ /yi ge bzhi yis rang gnas 'jug /gnas gsum byin brlabs go cha bcing/ /sangs rgyas dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma/ /thams cad nam mkhar nyer dmigs te/ /dbang bskur yid kyis gsol ba gdab/ /bdud rtsis dbang bskur
245b4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la/ /rdo rje mtshan ma 'dzin pa'o/ /gtso bo ma zhi khro mo dang/ /sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo la/ /mi bskyod rin chen don yod dang/ /rtag pa gar dbang thugs rdo rjes/ /rim pa bzhin du spyi bor mtshan/ /bsdus lam bsdus pa'i dbu rgyan nyid//
245b5(rgyud 'grel): de nas sngags rnams rim gyis mchod/ /bdud rtsis nye bar tshim byas nas/ /dgyes pa sngags kyi sgra byung bsam/ /bdud rtsi myangs la bstod chen bya/ /lha rnams rang gnas thim byas te/ /bsam gtan chen po las kyi lam/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa legs
245b6(rgyud 'grel): gnas bya/ /de nas gtor ma'i las rim dang/ /smon lam btab ste ldang bar bya/ /slob dpon chen po rdo rje dril bu pa'i man ngag lus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi mngon par rtogs pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI tsakra saM bar pany+tsa kra ma brit+ti
245b7(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i rim pa lnga pa'i 'grel pa/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /snying ga'i hUM las 'od zer spros la/ a ba d+hU tI nas gre bar byung nas sna bug g.yas pa nas byung ste sa la babs pa tsam gyis hUM du gyur ta/ hUM
246a1(rgyud 'grel): zhu ba las sna tshogs rdo rje dbus dang/ shar dang/ byang dang/ nub dang/ lho sgo rim bzhin du mthing ga dang sngon po dang/ ljang gu dang/ dmar po dang/ ser po'i rdo rje rtse mo lnga ru gyur par bsgom mo/ /de las 'od zer phyogs
246a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhir byung bar bsams nas/ shar dang byang dang nub dang/ lhor rim pa bzhin du rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa sngon po dang/ ljang gu dang/ dmar po dang/ ser po'i thams pas rlung yang mi thar bar gyur par bsam mo/ /rdo rje de dag gi rtse mo las 'od 'phros
246a3(rgyud 'grel): pas shar phyogs dang/ byang phyogs dang/ nub phyogs dang/ lho phyogs kyi steng gi cha rdo rje rtse lnga pa sngon po dang/ ljang gu dang/ dmar po dang ser po'i thams pas mig mangs rigs su gnas pas rlung yang mi thar bar gyur par bsams te/ de ni rdo
246a4(rgyud 'grel): rje'i gur ro/ /sna tshogs rdo rje'i dbus kyi lte bar hUM de zhu ba las sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad par bsam/ de'i lte bar shar dang byang dang nub dang/ lhor shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gi dus su nyams su myong ba bde ba tsam dang bcas pa'i byang chub
246a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi sems kyi thig le dkar ba/ 'tshor ba/ gsal ba/ gzi mdangs dang ldan pa mthing ka dang/ sngon po dang/ ljang gu dang/ dmar po dang/ ser po rnams chu las nya 'phar ba bzhin du sran ma sbom po'i tshad tsam pa lnga bsams la/ de zhu ba
246a6(rgyud 'grel): las he ru gzhal gcig phyag gnyis pa g.yas rdo rje g.yon dril bu mchan khud na kha TwAM ga bsnams/ zhabs g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa/ g.yon bskum pa/ dbu skra ser po gyen du brdzes pa/ zla ba phyed pas dbu la brgyan pa/ spyan
246a7(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa/ smin mkham pa/ phyag rgya drug dang ldan par bdag nyid gyur par bsam mo/ /thig le sngon po dang/ ljang gu dang/ dmar po dang ser po zhu ba las rim pa bzhin badzra DA ki nI dang/ lA ma dang/ khaN+Da ro ha dang/ rU pi Ni rnams sngon po dang
246b1(rgyud 'grel): ljang gu dang/ dmar po dang/ ser po rnams lha mo bzhir gyur par bsam/ lha mo rnams kyang zhal gcig pa/ spyan gsum pa/ dbu skra ser po gyen du brdzes pa/ zla ba phyed pas dbu brgyan pa/ gcer bu g.yon brkyang bas bzhugs pa/ phyag rgya lnga dang
246b2(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa/ g.yas na gri gug /g.yon na thod pa bsnams pa/ lha lnga kar yang ro'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ mtshams kyi 'dab ma bzhi la rin po che'i bum pa bzhi'o/ /steng du rang bzhin gyi bdud rtsi rnam lngas bkang ba'i ka pA la bzhi bzhag pa skad cig
246b3(rgyud 'grel): gis bsgom ste/ de ni gnas dang lus dang/ longs spyod phun sum tshogs pas bsdus pas bskyed pa'i rim pa'o/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa gang bsgom yang rung/ thog mar bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom par bya ste/ de'i rjes la rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom
246b4(rgyud 'grel): pa la gsum ste/ hUM la dmigs pa dang/ thig le la dmigs pa dang/ nA da skra ris phra mo sor gcig la dmigs pa'o/ /de la hUM la dmigs pa bsgom pa ni/ snying khong stong gi nang du/ 'og tu nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil
246b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bsam mo/ /nyi ma dang zla ba'i bar du thig le'i rgyal po yi ge hUM rgyun 'bru'i sa bon gyi tshad tsam mam/ sran ma 'am/ yungs kar sbom po'i tshad tsam shes rab kyi dbang gi dus su nyams su myong ba'i bde ba de nyid dran par bya zhing/ 'og gi rlung yang
246b6(rgyud 'grel): bskum pa dang/ rgyu zhabs kyi nang na yar drangs pa dang/ lce yang rkan la sbyar ba'i sbyor ba yang bya ste/ thig le'i rgyal po yi ge hUM snga ma'i tshad tsam du byas la/ dkar la 'tshor ba bde ba dang bcas pa gzi mdangs dang ldan pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi bu
246b7(rgyud 'grel): gur rgun 'bru'i sa bon gyi tshad tsam mam/ yungs kar sbom po'i tshad tsam du dmigs par bya'o/ /de nas hUM las 'od zer 'phros pas ma dag pa'i snod dang bcud la reg pa tsam gyis lan tshwa la chus pog pa bzhin du 'od kyi gong bur bzhu ste dag pa'i snod
247a1(rgyud 'grel): bcud la bstim/ dag pa'i snod bcung kyang bdag la bsdu/ bdag nyid kyang zhu ste/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bstim/ zla ba dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor yang zhu ste/ hUM la bstim/ hUM yig kyang zhabs kyu la bstim/ zhabs kyu
247a2(rgyud 'grel): ha la bstim/ ha zla tshes la bstim/ zla tshes thig le la/ thig le nA da skra ris tsam phra mo la thim pa'o/ /nA da skra ris phra mo yang nam mkha' la thim mo/ /thim pa de nyid la sems bstad nas/ de nas chu la nya 'phar ba bzhin duAm/ nam mkha' 
247a3(rgyud 'grel): la glog 'byung ba ltar/ skad cig tsam gyis snga ma ltar dran te/ snad la rang bzhin med pa'i lha'i skur bsams te/ mig dang/ rna ba dang/ sna dang lce dang/ lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid dang/ dzi ma dze ka dang/ badzra d+h+raM ka dang/ ratna d+h+rika dang/
247a4(rgyud 'grel): pradz+nyA d+h+ri ka dang/ badzra satwa dang/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjer mos pa bya ste/ mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i spyod pas gnas par bya'o/ /thig le la gnas pa ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i gnas dang/ lus dang/ longs spyod phun sum tshogs
247a5(rgyud 'grel): pas bsdus pa bsgom pa snga ma dang 'dra'o/ /nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi bar du byang chub kyi sems kyi bde ba'i thig le dkar la 'tsher ba gzi mdangs dang ldan pa/ shes rab ye shes kyi dus su myong ba'i bde ba de nyid dran par bya ste/
247a6(rgyud 'grel): 'og gi rlung bskum mo/ /'og gi rlung bskum pa dang/ rgyu zhabs kyi sha yar drangs pa dang/ lce yang rkan la sbyar ba'i sbyor ba byas nas/ zla ba'i bu gu rgun 'bru'i sa bon tsam mam/ sran ma tsam mam yungs kar tsam nas snga ma'i thig le
247a7(rgyud 'grel): rgu 'bru'i thig le tsam mam/ sran ma 'am yungs kar tsam la rnam par shes pa'i tshogs snga char bkug la/ kun gzhi rnam par shes pa las bsdus te bstad par bya'o/ /thig le la sems zin cing gzhan du mi 'phro ba'i don dus su
247b1(rgyud 'grel): rlung 'gags shing bde ba'i ye shes kyang chos nyid kho nas skye bar 'gyur ro/ /nA da skra ris phra mo la dmigs pa ni gnas dang longs spyod dang lus phun sum tshogs pas bsdus pa'i bskyed pa'i rig pa snga ma dang 'dra'o/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni snying khong
247b2(rgyud 'grel): stong 'od gsal ba'i gnas nA da skra ris phra mo sor gcig pa la spom phra skra'i nyag ma tsam la byang chub kyi sems dkar la 'tsher ba gzi mdangs dang ldan pa bde ba dang bcas pa 'og gi rlung bskum pa dang/ rgyu zhabs kyi sha yar drangs pa dang/ lce
247b3(rgyud 'grel): rkan la sbyar bas sbyor zhing shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gi dus su myong ba'i bde ba de nyid dran par byas la nA da skra ris phra mo la dmigs par bya'o/ /nA da skra ris phra mo la rtsa gnyis zug ste/ gnas pa las sna bug gang nas dbugs 'byung ba brtags te/
247b4(rgyud 'grel): gang nas dbugs rgyu ba zhig nas nA da skra ris la rlung dang sems 'dres pa'i bde ba dang bcas pa dkar la 'tshor ba/ /gzi mdangs dang ldan pa phyir byung ba la dmigs so/ /de nyid nang du 'jug pa la dmig te/ 'byung ba dang 'jug pa yun bsdu zhing
247b5(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa la yun ring du sems bstang cing gnas par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la nA da skra ris phra mo dang bcas pa'i chos thams cad cir yang ma grub par bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas skad cig tsam gyi sgyu ma lta bu'i skur bsams la/ dbang po drug dang
247b6(rgyud 'grel): lus ngag yid gsum sangs rgyas drug dang sku gsung thugs su bsam zhing shes par bya ste/ mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i spyod pas gnas par bya'o/ /de tsam gyis ni bdag byin gyis brlabs pa'i rim pa'i man ngag bstan zin to// //
247b7(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs rdo rje dri med kyi rim pa la gnyis te/ /'jig rten pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa'i rim pa dang/ /'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub bsgom pa'i rim pa'o/ /dang po 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa'i rim pa la gnyis te/ bskyed pa'i rim
248a1(rgyud 'grel): dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pa la gnyis te/ rten rdo rje'i gur dang pad+ma bsgom pa dang/ rten pa la bsgom pa'o/ /rten bsgom pa snga ma dang mthun no/ /brten pa lha bsgom pa ni pad+ma'i dbus su
248a2(rgyud 'grel): hUM bsam mo/ /hUM zhu ba las rdo rje bsam mo/ /rdo rje zhu ba las he ru ka zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa dbu skra ser po gyen du brdzes pa/ smin ma kham pa/ thod pa lnga yis dbu brgyan pa/ zla ba phyed pas dbu la mdzes pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa la
248a3(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa dang ldan pa/ sku mdog sngon po dang dmar po gang yang rung ba'o/ /dbu la dang po'i sangs rgyas kyis brgyan pa/ g.yas brkyang ba/ g.yon bskum la phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa/ mi mgo rlon pa'i do shal can nyi ma phyed pa'i 'od dang
248a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa'i rdo rje dbang phyug gi skur bsgom par bya'o/ /de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom pa ni/ mig stong pa nyid du bsgom pa dang/ mig gi nang du byang chub kyi sems kyi bde ba'i thig le sran ma tsam dkar la 'tsher pa
248a5(rgyud 'grel): gzi mdangs dang ldan pa bde ba dang bcas pa la sems bstad par bya'o/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang lus rnams stong pa nyid du bsgoms la/ rna ba la sogs pa rnams su byang chub kyi sems kyi bde ba'i thig le dkar la 'tsher
248a6(rgyud 'grel): ba snum la 'dril ba gzi mdangs dang ldan pa bde ba dang bcas pa re re nas yul rnams la sems bstad par bya'o/ /snying gar byang chub kyi sems kyi bde ba'i thig le sran ma tsam dkar la 'tsher ba gzi mdangs dang ldan pa bde ba dang bcas
248a7(rgyud 'grel): pa sran ma sbom po'i tshad tsam la sems bstad par bya'o/ /mgo bo bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le gong ma dang 'dra ba la sems bstang par bya'o/ /mgrin pa longs spyod kyi 'khor lor byang chub kyi sems kyi thig
248b1(rgyud 'grel): le snga ma dang 'dri ba la sems bstad par bya'o/ /lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lor byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le snga ma dang 'dra ba la sems bstad par bya'o/ /'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i rim pa la gnyis te/ bskyed pa'i rim pa
248b2(rgyud 'grel): dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa la snga ma dang 'dra'o/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom pa'i mdzod spur bde ba'i thig le dkar po 'tshor ba bde ba dang ldan pa sran ma sbom po'i tshad tsam la sems bstad par bya'o/ /de la sems
248b3(rgyud 'grel): brtan pa thob pa dang/ dmar ting pa'i rtags 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de byung ba dang dpral ba'i nang du bde ba'i thig le dkar la 'tsher ba gzi mdangs dang ldan pa sran ma sbom po'i tshad tsam la bstad par bya'o/ /de la sems brtan pa thob pa'i mtshan ma ni dkar ting
248b4(rgyud 'grel): pa 'byung ngo/ /de'i rjes la ma tshogs ma'i gnas su bde ba'i thig le gnag la 'tsher ba gzi mdangs dang ldan pa bde ba dang bcas pa sran ma sbom po'i tshad tsam pa la sems bstad par bya'o/ /de la sems brtan pa thob pa'i mtshan ma ni nag ting pa 'byung ngo//
248b5(rgyud 'grel): de'i rjes la rtog pa dang bral ba'i bde ba chen po rang rig gnyis su med pa'i ye shes dang gis skyes pa ni yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma ste/ de la sras sangs rgyas 'khrungs par de ni sna tshogs rdo rje dri med kyi rim pa ste gnyis pa'o// //
248b6(rgyud 'grel): nor bu dgang ba'i rim pa la bzhi ste/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya la brten pa dang/ las kyi phyag rgya la brten pa dang/ chos kyi phyag rgya la brten pa dang/ phyag rgya chen po la brten pa'o/ /de la dam tshig gi phyag rgya la brten pa ni legs par brlabs pa'i mi'i yo
248b7(rgyud 'grel): shi d+ha'i rigs dang/ spyod pas nye ba dang/ ma sring ltar snying brtse bas dga' bas gnas pa dang/ sngags dang phyag rgya 'dzin pa'i nus pa dang ldan pa dang/ lo bcu gnyis nas nyi Dshu'i bar smin pa'i lam gyis smin par byas pas dbang bskur dang ldan pa
249a1(rgyud 'grel): nyer bsngogs byas te/ gnas yid du 'ong bar me tog dmar pos gcal du bkram pa'i bar du lus kyi dri nga ba mi tshor ba tsam du gos mdzes pa gon zhing stan 'jam pa la gnas te/ bza' ba'i dam tshig zhag bdun gyi bar du 'o ma dang/
249a2(rgyud 'grel): ka ra gnyis sbyar ba'i btung ba dang/ lug gzhon nu ma'i sha sar pa mi drag pa tsam du gtang bar byas te/ chags pa'i mig gi phan tshun du blta zhing gnas par bya'o/ /de nas mnyam par sbyor pa'i dus su bdag dang shes rab he ru ka dang bdag
249a3(rgyud 'grel): med mar nga rgyal bskyed la/ shes rab kyi mgo bo dang/ lkog ma dang/ snying ka dang/ lte ba dang/ gsang ba dang/ brla rnams su yi ge dgod do/ /oM A:hUM ho haM k+Sha swAhA/ zhes pa rnams bkod la/ rdo rje dang pad+ma byin gyis brlabs te/ rol rtsed mchu
249a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhib pa dang/ tsum+ba bya ba dang/ rtsa rme ba dang/ gnas dgung sen mo gdab pa la sogs pa de ltar byas la/ de'i rjes su phan tshun 'khyud cing chags pa'i nga rgyal bya'o/ /de nas gol che ba'i lag pas a ba d+hU tI brud cing gsal bar bya'o/ /a ba
249a5(rgyud 'grel): d+hU tI dang gol che ba'i lag pa phrang ba'i dus su bzhin 'gyur ba dang/ shes skad 'byin pa dang/ snying 'dar ba la sogs pa'i rtags blo la bzhag ste/ rdo rje dang pad+ma mnyam par sbyor ba'i dus su sngar gyi rtags lta bur 'byung ba'i dus su rdo rje
249a6(rgyud 'grel): de nyid sbyar te/ gcer bu kha sbyor gyi sbyor ba 'khor lo lta bu bsrub cing bsrub par bya'o/ /thabs dang shes rab kyi thur sel gyi rlung dang/ srog dang rtsol ba'i rlung sdom zhing 'khrul 'khor gyi sbyor ba yang bya'o/ /rgyu zhabs nas yang sbyar/ lce yang
249a7(rgyud 'grel): rkan la sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang bya'o/ /tang ku li'i sbyor ba yang bya'o/ /de ni 'khrul 'khor gyi sbyor ba'o/ /sman gyi sbyor ba ni tsi tra ka dang/ arga dkar po'i rtsa ba dang/ rdo rje'i 'o mas 'jub mnyam du bsres pa'i ri lu sran ma'i tshad tsam dang mid la/
249b1(rgyud 'grel): sems 'byung 'dod pa'i dus su sman gyi ri lu de gsum las mnyam pa gcig kyang med par bya'o/ /rdo rje 'o ma dang ba'i 'o ma gnyis sbyar bas rkang mthil gnyis kyang bslu bar bya'o/ /bi nu kan ta'i rtsa ba dang pad+ma dkar pho nang na dkar po nar nar po gnyis bskur
249b2(rgyud 'grel): par bya ste/ rked pa bcing bar bya'o/ /de ni d+ha ra a sho ka zhes bya ba sems 'dzin pa'i sman no/ /mnyam par sbyor ba gzung ba'i dus su 'bron bug 'gron bu lhugs pa'i nang du dngul chus bkang pa'i ser ka'i phyogs spra tshil gyis bkag ste/ lce rtsar bzhag
249b3(rgyud 'grel): la sems 'byung 'dod pa'i dus su lkugs pa'i lce rtsar sbyar bar bya'o/ /de ni nor bu rin po che lkugs pas sems gzung ba'i thabs so/ /shes rab kyi 'phongs su glod gzhug ste/ rang gi rdo rje'i tshad pas sor gcig pas ring ba'i phyir ba'i dra ba byas la bra tshil
249b4(rgyud 'grel): gyis gtum par bya'o/ /shes rab kyi rked pa dar gyis bcing zhing gsang ba'i pad+ma'i nang rdo rje'i gzugs sor gcig tsam bcug la rked pa yar gyi cung zhig bsdam mo/ /sor gnyis tsam zhugs pa dang/ cung zad kyang bsdam mo/ /de bzhin du rdo rje cung zhig
249b5(rgyud 'grel): bcug cing rked pa bsdam par bya'o/ /sor gcig lus lus kyi bar du bcug cing de yang shin tu bsdam mo/ /sor gcig po shes rab nyid kyis gyen du bcug pas pad+ma phyir log ste/ a ba d+hU tI sor gcig pas phyir byung bas rdo rje'i bug par bcug cing
249b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo lta bu'i sbyor thabs kyis gcub cing gtsug par bya'o/ /man ngag de rnams kyis stobs kyis dpe'i lhan cig skyes pa'i me tog lta bu'i bde ba chen po'i rang rig gnyis su med pa'i ye shes nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i rjes la 'khor lo 'am/
249b7(rgyud 'grel): thig le 'am kha sbyor ram ma ning gi bzlas pa 'am/ man ngag de bzhi las gang yang rung ba cig la sems bstang cing sngar gyi bde ba dran zhing don gyi lhan cig skyes pa'i me tog gi dril bu'i bde ba chen po'i rang gi gnyis su med pa'i ye shes la bslab par
250a1(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i skabs su yang bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pa'i skabs su rang gi sems kyi mtshan nyid bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du ci mthong ba thams cad la mos par bya ste/ nga ma mthong ba 'gro ma
250a2(rgyud 'grel): mthong/ /sa gsum po yang nga las skyes/ /bde ba ser po bde ba dkar/ /bde ba dmar mo bde ba ljang/ /de bzhin kun tu ru skyes bde/ /zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis bslab par bya'i/ /yon tan dang ldan pa'i shes rab dgug par 'dod na 'bras
250a3(rgyud 'grel): bu gsum dang/ bil ba dang/ bal po'i si'u dang/ stag ka dang/ po so 'cha' dang/ da trig dang/ ba li ka dang/ shu kra rnams gnyis te/ sman sna bcu gcig po cha mnyam par bsres pa'i lde gus bskus pa'i me tog bsnol du
250a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhug go /khyi'i rus pa dang/ mi'i rus pa dang/ bya rgod kyi rtug pa gsum sbyar te bdag nyid kyi dpral bar bsku'o/ /gzhan gyi sems mi bsgyur ba'i thabs ni pa wang tshes bzhi'i rgongs ka btags la de'i ril ma btags pas bdag nyid
250a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje'i rtse mo la bskus nas snyoms 'jug byas na gzhan gyis sems bsgyur bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'khor ba mi spel ba'i man ngag ni lag pa'i mthil dag par bkrus pa'i steng du dngul chu srin lag dag pa la bskus la 'bru
250a6(rgyud 'grel): mar mi che ba bsdus te blangs la lag pa chang gi nang du bcug ste/ bskams tsam na dpral ba la bskus te/ yo shi ti ldan du bzhag go /yang na mtshal smug po zho gnyis zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma snga dro'i dus su chang zhim po dang sbyar la blud do//
250a7(rgyud 'grel): lcags kyi lbu ga la spu pi ka'i rtsa bas dkris pa thogs su gzhug go /yang spu pi ka'i rtsa bas rked pa bkri bar bya'o/ /lcags kyi khu bas srod kyi dus su pad+ma bkru bar bya'o/ /bu ram dang til mar dang/ lan tshwa dang rgya shug gi 'bras bu dang/
250b1(rgyud 'grel): 'bras dang/ nas rnams 'o ma dang bskol te/ til mar nyi che lus pa btsags pa'i nang du srin lag bcug ste/ pad+ma'i nang du bcug la yun ring du bkrugs par bya'o/ /ro rtsa'i bya ba ni da ru ra'i rtsa ba dang/ ga bur dang/ sbyar ba rdo rje la bsku bar bya'o/ /sha khar
250b2(rgyud 'grel): dang ba'i mar srang phyed sbyar ba zas zos pa'i 'og tu bza' o/ /mchil pa'i sha zhag cig lon pa mtshams kyi dus su zos la 'o ma bskol ba tshad du btung bar bya'o/ /til mar dang mon sran gre'u'i phye ma 'o ma dang bsres pa bza' bar bya'o/ /go cha dang ba'i
250b3(rgyud 'grel): 'o ma dang shing mngar rnams mar dang sbyar ba btung bar bya'o/ /ba 'am ra'i 'o ma'i nang du dbang po lag pa'i phye ma dang ka ra'i phye ma zhib tu btags pa btab ste btung bar bya'o/ /dam tshig mi nyams pa'i man ngag ni dge slong gi so sor thar pa'i sdom pa'i tshul
250b4(rgyud 'grel): khrims ni byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i dus su byang chub sems dpa' i tshul khrims su gyur te gnas so/ /spyir gsang sngags kyi dam tshig nyams na sdom pa gsum 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' i sdom pa dang/ gsang sngags kyi dam
250b5(rgyud 'grel): tshig gi lugs kyi kha na ma tho ba gnyis te/ rang bzhin gyi kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i kho na ma tho ba gnyis so/ /de la yang rang bzhin gyi kha na ma tho ba ni srog gcod pa dang/ ma byin par len pa dang/ 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang/ brdzun
250b6(rgyud 'grel): du smra ba dang/ de bzhi las dang po gnyis dang/ tha ma ni rig pa 'dzin pa'i sde snod la nyams su blang bar bya ste/ 'di ru ma bshad do/ /'dod pas log par g.yem pa ni rang bzhin gyi kha na ma tho bar rtogs pas nyams su blang bar 'di ru ma bshad do/ /
250b7(rgyud 'grel): mi tshangs par spyod pa ni bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba yin pas de ni de bzhin nyid kyi bdag nyid can gyis shes par spyod cig /don chen po yod pas gdams ngag yod na mi 'gal bar rtsa ba'i rgyud rnams su bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad do/ /'dod
251a1(rgyud 'grel): pas log par g.yem pa ni rang bzhin gyi kha na ma tho ba yin pa'i phyir dang/ gzhan gyi lus bsrungs pa yod pa'i phyir nyams su blangs bar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ru ma bshad do/ /mi tshangs par spyod pa ni nyams su blang
251a2(rgyud 'grel): bar gsungs te/ de yang lo bcu gnyis pa 'am bcu drug pa 'am/ lo nyi shu tshun chad kyi gzhon nu ma zhes gsungs pas ni ma 'gal lo/ /de yang gzhan gyi dbang ma byas pa dang mnyam par sbyor ba snang ngo/ /'dir yang don chen po yod pas dus
251a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa bzhir nyams su blang bar bya'o/ /dus bzhi ni byang chub kyi sems kyi bde ba mchod pa'i dus dang/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha sgrub pa'i dus dang/ slob ma la gsang dbang bskur ba'i dus dang/ shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'i dus so/ /
251a4(rgyud 'grel): mchod pas ni lha mnyes pas dngos grub rnam pa gnyis thob pa'i don chen po yod pa'i phyir dang/ dkyil 'khor bsgrub pas ni sku gsung thugs dang/ ye shes kyis 'gro ba'i don chen po mdzad pas chos kyi thob pa'i 'gro ba'i don chen po yod
251a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir dang/ gsang ba'i dbang bskur bas ni slob ma theg pa chen po'i snod du rung ba'i phyir mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i don chen po yod pa'i phyir ro/ /shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur bas ni/ rang gi sems kyi mtshan nyid bde ba chen
251a6(rgyud 'grel): po rang rig pa'i ye shes gnyis su med pa'i ye shes spros pa thams cad kyi mdza' dang bral bar nyams su myong ba'i phyir don chen po yod pas 'dir dam tshig las mi 'gal bar bstan to/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mdzad pa'i 'grel
251a7(rgyud 'grel): par shes par bya'o/ /mkhas pa nga rgyal dang ldan pas byas pa la ni ma yin no/ /de ni spros pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pa dang/ /spros pa med pa'i spyod pa'o/ /shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pa la ni dngos po la reg pa med pas nyes par mi
251b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhag go /ma dad pa spang ba'i man ngag ni/ ga bur gla rtsi gur gum/ tsan dan/ ma he shukra? bsres pa'i lde gus dpral bar bsku bar bya'o/ /de ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya la brten pa'i nor bu dgang ba'i rim pa'o/ /las kyi phyag rgya la brten pa'i nor
251b2(rgyud 'grel): bu dgang ba'i rim pa ni gnas kyi dam tshig dang/ bza' ba'i dam tshig dang/ spyod lam gyi man ngag ni snga ma dang 'dra'o/ /rnal 'byor pa gan rkyal du gnas te/ rkang pa'i mthe bong nyis nam mkha' la bsgrengs te/ gnas pas sor mo lhag ma thur du
251b3(rgyud 'grel): bskums la gzhag go /hang ku la'i sbyor ba yang bya ste/ 'og gi rlung bskum pa dang/ rgyu zhabs kyi sha yar la drang ba dang/ lce rkan la sbyar ba'i sbyor ba yang byas te/ lag pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i sbyor ba'i bye brag gis brud pa'i sbyor ba byas la bde ba
251b4(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa med pa'i ye shes nyams su myong bar bya'o/ /chos kyi phyag rgya la brten pa'i nor bu dgang ba'i rim pa ni sems kyi snang ba'i lha mo bsams te/ snga ma'i man ngag gis shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gi dus kyi bde ba dran par byas la/ 'khor lo 'am/
251b5(rgyud 'grel): thig le 'am/ kha sbyor ram/ ma ning gi bzlas pa'i man ngag la sems gtad par bya'o/ /phyag rgya chen po la brten pa'i nor bu dgang ba'i rim pa ni sngar skyes pa'i bde ba de nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du bsgom pa'o/ /de ni nor bu dgang ba'i rim
251b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /dzA land+ha ra'i rim pa la gnyis te/ bskyed pa'i rim pa dang/ rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa ni sngar dang 'dra'o/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom pa ni rang gi lte ba'i 'og chu so'i gong du chos 'byung gi phyag rgya/ gru gsum dkar la
251b7(rgyud 'grel): dmar chags pa bsams la de'i nang du 'khor lo dkar la dmar chags pa/ rtsibs bzhi pa dbus kyi lte ba la bsams te/ dbus su bde ba'i thig le dkar po dang phyogs bzhir ston po dang dmar po dang/ ser po dang/ ljang gu dang/ sran ma'i
252a1(rgyud 'grel): tshad tsam bsams la/ da nyid sangs rgyas lngar mos pa bya ste/ 'og sgo dang steng sgo'i rlung bkag pas thig le lnga'i 'od zer 'phros te sna'i bu ga'i nam mkha' nas byung nas dbugs gang nas rgyu ba'i sna bug na sor bcu gnyis kyi bar
252a2(rgyud 'grel): du 'byung ste/ slar nang du bcug ste/ thig le lnga la thim/ sgom pa'i dus phyir 'byung ba dang/ nang du 'jug pa'i dus na yang je thung je thung la grangs kyang je nyung je nyung du bya zhing/ nang na gnas pa la yun yang rje ring je ring du sems brtan par bya'o//
252a3(rgyud 'grel): mig gis mthong ba pas thig le lnga gsal bar mthong ba de srid du bsgoms la de nas lce dang dpung pa dang mig dang rna ba dang/ sna dang lce la snga ma'i thig le de nyid bsams na 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub ji ltar 'dod pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /bsam
252a4(rgyud 'grel): gyis mi khyab pa'i rim pa la gnyis te/ bskyed pa'i rim pa dang/ rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa ni snga ma dang 'dra'o/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni sems yul rnams la bzlog ste/ chos thams cad sems tsam du bsgoms te/
252a5(rgyud 'grel): sems de nyid bde ba rtogs pa med par mos par bya ste/ shes pa de nyid kyang stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya'o/ /mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i spyod pa ni snga ma dang 'dra'o/ /slob dpon chen po rdo rje dril bu pas mdzad pa/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i
252a6(rgyud 'grel): rim pa lnga pa'i 'grel pa paN+Di ta su ma ti kIrti dang/ lo tsa ba mar pa bande chos kyi dbang phyug gis bsgyur ba'o/ /rdzogs so// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ sa ha dza saM ba ra sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ bde mchog lhan cig skyes pa'i
252a7(rgyud 'grel): sgrub thabs/ 'khor lo sdom pa la phyag 'tshal/ /shes bya rnal 'byor cho ga gsum/ /byin gyis rlob dang rab tu rtog /bsam bral gzugs brnyan yongs su rdzogs/ /sangs rgyas kyis gsungs rnal 'byor du/ /sems can rdzus te skyes pa bzhin/ /
252b1(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig skad cig sbyor ba yis/ /sa bon med par rnam par bsgom/ /rang nyid rdo rje mkha' 'gror gyur/ /zla ba phyed pa spyi bor 'dzin/ /dpral bar thod pa'i phreng ba bsnams/ /phyag rgya drug ldan mgo bo'i phreng/ /spyan gsum sna tshogs rdo rje can/ /sna tshogs
252b2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma nyi mar gnas/ /'jigs byed dus mtshan bcas par dgod/ /g.yas brkyang ba yis zhabs kyis gcibs/ /rdo rje dril bu ral par ldan/ /gnag cing mi bskyod spyi bo'i gtsug /stag gi lpags pas yang dag bcings/ /dpa' bo rdo rje phag mo ni/ /
252b3(rgyud 'grel): spyan gsum dmar zhing mgo phreng ldan/ /rdo rje thod pa khrag gis bkang/ /rked brgyan dum bus mtshan pa 'dzin/ /phyogs kyi gos la phyag rgya lnga/ /dbu skra grol zhing sangs rgyas gtsug /'di ltar skad cig gis rdzogs pa'i/ /bdag nyid lus ni sgom
252b4(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin gzugs/ /sangs rgyas 'od zer rnam par spro/ /spyod yul gcig gis sems kyis su/ /'di nyid kho na yun rings sam/ /go 'phang 'di la sems can dgod/ /chos dbyings rgyal mtshan yang dag sbyor/ /gnyis
252b5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis sbyor ba bde las byung/ /dga' ba zag pa'i phun tshogs kyis/ /rang rig dga' bas yongs su khengs/ /zag pas skyed par byed pa gang/ /des ni rgya chen yid la byed/ /'dus byas spros pa'i rgyun 'di ni/ /'di ltar rtag tu sgom pa pos/ /
252b6(rgyud 'grel): 'od gsal rjes su dran par bya/ /sna tshogs pad+ma nyi ma dang/ /'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan mo/ /sdug ma bdag mo mkha' nor bu/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lnga yi 'og /sku dang yan lag mchog dang ni/ /zla ba thig le nA da rnams/ /'di rnams rim
252b7(rgyud 'grel): gyis mi snang gzhug /ji ltar me long dbus kyi rlung/ /thams cad thim par gyur pa ltar/ /yang dag mdza' ru yang nas yang/ /de bzhin rnal 'byor rab tu gzhug /grub thob rdo rje dril bu pas mdzad pa'i bde mchog lhan skyes kyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //
253a1(rgyud 'grel): paN+Di ta rdo rje gdan pa nis ka laM ka'i zhal snga nas/ dpyal lo tsa ba dpal chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// (//dpal 'khor lo bde mchog sgrub pa'i nor bu bzhugs//) //*/ /rgya gar skad du/
253a2(rgyud 'grel): sh+rI b+ha ga bAn tsakra saM ba ra sA d+ha na ratna tsind+ha ma Ni nA ma/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das dpal 'khor lo bde mchog sgrub pa'i thabs rin po che yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sh+rI chu rgya
253a3(rgyud 'grel): mtsho tha dang me bzhin he 'dus ma byas nam mkha' bzhin/ /ru lha'i rnga ltar gtso 'khor longs spyod ka/ ni yid nor ltar dgod 'dod skor/ /rnam par thar zhing dus gsum bdud bzhi rten 'brel bcu gnyis bden gnyis sogs/ /de bzhin ye shes
253a4(rgyud 'grel): lnga yi bdag nyid b+ha gar zhugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /blo nor ldan pas gsol btab pas/ /'khor lo bde mchog sgrub pa'i thabs/ /ji skad gsungs pa'i don bzhin du/ /bdag gis legs par bshad par bya/ /ri bo tshang tshing sman ljongs dang/ /chu
253a5(rgyud 'grel): po chen po'i dogs dag dang/ /gdod nas grub pa'i dur khrod du/ /der ni dkyil 'khor brtsam par bya/ /rnal 'byor pa nyid bsod nams mchog /dag byed sdig pa 'jig byed pa/ /gsang sngags zlos pa'i bzlas brjod dang/ /bsam gtan
253a6(rgyud 'grel): gyis kyang 'grub par 'gyur/ /mchod bzhi dpa' bo chen po ni/ /yid la 'dod pa byed pa ste/ /rgyud 'di ru ni dbang bskur na/ /thams cad kyis ni sgrub por gsungs/ /bltas dang rgod dang lag 'dzin dang/ /'khyud dang gnyis sprod la sogs la//
253a7(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur bar ni gyur ba yin/ /rgyud rnams kun gyi dam pa yin/ /nang par sngar langs sems bdag nyid/ /lus gnas brjod cing lus dag bya/ /rang gi sa bon 'od zer gyis/ /bla ma dang ni dkyil 'khor lha/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems
253b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs kun/ /nam mkha' kun gang mdun nas blta/ /lus sna tshogs kyis phyag btsal zhing/ /de dag 'gro ba'i don du dbul/ /hUM gi 'od zer las byung ba'i/ /gzugs ma sgra ma dri ro ma/ /reg ma chos ma zhi ba ma/ /dkar sngo ser dmar ljang dkar mo//
253b2(rgyud 'grel): zhal gcig phyag bzhi g.yon thod TwAM/ /g.yas rnams me long pi wang dang/ /dri mchog ro mchog na bza' dang/ /chos 'byung dang ni Da ma ru/ /oM A:badzra A darshe hUM/ oM A:badzra bI Ne hUM/ oM A:badzra g+haN+Te hUM/ oM A:badzra rA se hUM/ oM
253b3(rgyud 'grel): A:badzra sparshe hUM/ oM A:badzra d+harme hUM/ 'og nas 'chang ba'i lha mo yis/ /bdud rtsi lnga yis lha yid gang/ /snyoms 'jug lhan cig skyes dga' yin/ /lha mo rnams dang mchod pas dgyes/ /sdig pa bshags bsdams rjes yi rang/ /
253b4(rgyud 'grel): dge ba yongs bsngo skyabs 'gro bya/ /chos 'khor bskor bskul bzhugs gsol gdab/ /byang chub smon 'jug sems bskyed gshegs/ /khyad 'phags bde sbyor byams pa ste/ /sdug bsngal rgyu bral snying rje che/ /bde ba mi 'bral 'dod dga' 
253b5(rgyud 'grel): ba/ nyon mongs nye bral btang snyoms so/ /chos sku ngo bo nyid med pa/ /kun rtog sgyu ma lta bur shes/ /oM swa b+ha ba shud+d+ha:sarba d+harma:swa b+hA ba shud+d+honyrahaM/ sa bon 'od kyis brtan g.yo sbyangs/ /thig le sngags kyis dmigs pa med/ /oM shU n+ya tA
253b6(rgyud 'grel): dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ chos kun rab tu gnas med pa/ /'od gsal nam mkha' dri ma med/ /yi ge e las chos 'byung ste/ /hUM gyur bde chen phyag gnyis pa/ /shar sogs lugs dang mi mthun dang/ /lugs mthun g.yon
253b7(rgyud 'grel): mdzub se gol gtog /oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM hUM phaT/ oM grih+Na grih+Na hUM hUM phaT/ oM grih+NA pa ya grih+NA pa ya hUM hUM phaT/ oM A na ya ho:b+ha ga ban badzra hUM hUM phaT/ khwa gdong ma sogs phyag gnyis ma/ /dmar mo g.yon brkyang nyi ma'i
254a1(rgyud 'grel): gdan/ /rang 'dra stong phur g.yon pa na/ /g.yas pa tho ba thogs pa'o/ /rdo rje ra ba sa gzhi gur/ /bla re mda' yi dra ba bya/ /oM badzra prA ka ra hUM paM hUM/ oM med ni badzri b+ha ba badzra band+ha hUM/ oM badzra pany+tsa ra hUM baM hUM/
254a2(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra bi dA na hUM khaM hUM/ oM badzra sa ra dzA la traM saM traM hUM gyur dod po brgyad nang du/ /bgegs rnams bcug la phur bu gzugs/ /oM g+ha:g+ha:g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya sarbba duSh+TAn hUM hUM phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya sarbba pA paM hUM hUM phaT/ hUM hUM
254a3(rgyud 'grel): hUM badzra kI la ya badzra b+ha ra Adz+nyA pa ya ti kA ya bAk+tsit+ta badzra kI la ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra mung+ga ra badzra kI la ya A ko Ta hUM phaT/ tho bas brdungs te phur pas btab/ /bgegs rnams rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'gyur/ /lha mo 'od gyur lus
254a4(rgyud 'grel): 'phros las/ /rdo rje pad+ma 'khor lo me/ /oM badzra prA kA ra hUM/ oM pad+ma prA kA ra hUM/ oM tsakra prA kA ra hUM/ oM badzra dzwa la a na larka hUM hUM hUM/ ba lang gnas dang lteng lding dang/ /lhag ma skam po rtsa de nas/ /dud chen po yi rang
254a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin bya/ /yang na dus sbal dag gi'o/ /ri rab kyi steng sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte bar hUM yongs su gyur pa las/ rin po che sna tshogs pa las grub pa'i khang pa brtsegs ma gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ rta babs bzhi yis rnam par brgyan/ /
254a6(rgyud 'grel): ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes/ /pi wang sogs lha stegs bur 'khod/ /rgyan phreng sogs pa bdun gyis brgyan/ /ba dan bcu gnyis rlung bskyod sgra/ /gnas phyogs shing zhing rlung sprin dang/ /mchod rnal dur khrod brgyad kyis bkod//
254a7(rgyud 'grel): khang nang sna tshogs pad 'dab brgyad/ /mdza' ma gri gug phreng 'khor gsum/ /pad steng 'jigs byed dus mtshan brtsegs/ /snying gar nyin mo'i dbang phyug gdan/ /phyogs 'dab srog song snying ri bong/ /mtshams steng zla bum
254b1(rgyud 'grel): thod bdud rtsi/ /ri steng sna tshogs pad+ma yi/ /lte bar A li kA li skyes/ /dkar mo bdag po rnam gnon cing/ /rdo rje dril bus sku la 'khyud/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhis phyed ldan pa'i/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma tshogs can/ /sh+rI he ru ka rgyal po chen po'i//
254b2(rgyud 'grel): go 'phang mchog ni bsgom par bya/ /bcom ldan 'das 'khor lo bde mchog ni/ /sku mdog sngon po zhal bzhi pa/ /drug gnyis phyag gis rnam par brgyan/ /g.yas brkyang pa yis gom pas bzhugs/ /rtsa ba'i zhal ni mthing nag 'bar/ /g.yon
254b3(rgyud 'grel): pa pad+mar ga'i mdog /g.yas pa gser du 'bar ba ste/ /steng zhal ma ra ka tar 'bar/ /dmar zlum spyan gsum mche ba gtsigs/ /ral pa thor tshugs dar dpyangs can/ /thod pa lnga yis dbu la brgyan/ /zla phyed sna tshogs rdo rje mdzes//
254b4(rgyud 'grel): dus min 'chi ba las rgyal ba/ /yan lag kha TwAM ga dang sbyar/ /thod pa'i mchod yon snod du ni/ /zhal du mtshon cha nges par sbyar/ /lang tsho gzhon pa 'gying bag can/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang zhing/ /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus
254b5(rgyud 'grel): brgyan/ /sgeg pa la sogs nyams dgu ldan/ /stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can/ /phyag rgya drug gis rab tu mdzes/ /mgo phreng do shal chen po can/ /steng nas gdugs dkar legs par 'dzin/ /de mdun gnas pa'i lha mo ni/ /
254b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje phag mo rab 'jigs ma/ /he ru ke dpal phyogs byas nas/ /spyan gsum drag mo'i gzugs can ma/ /ka pA la ni an+t+ras bkang/ /kha nas ru ti ra 'dzag cing/ /lha dang lha min mir bcas pa/ /phyogs kun du ni sdigs mdzub byed//
254b7(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog dmar mo cher 'bar ma/ /zhal gcig ma la phyag gnyis ma/ /phyag g.yon thod khrag thabs la 'khyud/ /g.yas pa rdo rje gri gug 'dzin/ /skra grol rnam mdzes rgyan lnga ldan/ /sgeg cing nu ma 'bur la mkhreng/ /g.yon brkyang gom
255a1(rgyud 'grel): pa thabs dang sbyar/ /g.yas pa yab kyi brla steng 'khyud/ /thugs kar shes rab rab 'gyur nyid/ /sna tshogs pad+ma nyid rdor hUM/ /sku gsung thugs rdo rjer byin brlab/ /gsum gsum de ni yi ge gsum/ /gang dag rab
255a2(rgyud 'grel): sgrub byed pa'i sngags/ /de yi dbye ba rim bzhin bshad/ /phan tshun brgyus pa'i gsang sngags ni/ /yul nyid kyis ni phye ba'o/ /kha sbyar sbyar bar gyur pa dang/ /rdo rje lu gu rgyud bcings pa'o/ /ya sde brgyad pa'i sa bon dang/ /de bzhin gug
255a3(rgyud 'grel): sgeg? bcu gnyis kyi/ /yi ge bar ma dor byas la/ /yan lag drug he ru kar brjod/ /yi ge re res yang dag gnas/ /oM na ma swA hA bo ShaT/ hUM hUM phaT dang yang dag ldan/ /phaT hUM h+rIM h+rIM hiM oM rnams/ /yi ge baM dang yoM dang ni/ /yi ge mo dang
255a4(rgyud 'grel): h+riM nyid dang/ /hUM dang phaT ces sbyar ba ni/ /rnal 'byor ma ni drug tu bshad/ /thabs dang shes rab go cha yin/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni re re yang/ /bye ba grangs med pa yis bskor/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang/ /dum skyes ma dang gzugs
255a5(rgyud 'grel): can ma/ /dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub ma/ /pad+ma'i phyogs kyi gnas la dgod/ /sngon mo ljang gu dmar mo ser/ /zhal gcig skra grol phyag bzhi ma/ /g.yon pa thod pa kha TwAM ga /g.yas pa gri gug Da ma ru/ /spyan gsum lang tsho gzhon
255a6(rgyud 'grel): nu rgyas/ /khro mo ral pa mche ba gtsigs/ /de nas gzhan yang lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mkha' 'gro ma/ tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa lA ma/ chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dum skyes ma/ sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gzugs
255a7(rgyud 'grel): can ma/ yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dpal he ru ka rdo rje'o/ /snying ga'i hUM gi 'od zer gyis/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor dbang bskur lha/ /phyi gsang mchod pa'i lha ma rnams/ /spyan drang bgegs bskrad mchod yon dbul/ /oM arg+haM pra tIts+tsha
255b1(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ dza:hUM baM ho:zhes bya bas/ dgug dang gzhug dang bcing dang mnyes/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bdag la dbang bskur du gsol zhes gsol ba gdab pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rin po che'i bum pa bdud rtsi lnga'i khu
255b2(rgyud 'grel): bas gang bas/ oM sarbba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka sa ma ya sh+rI ye hUM zhes dbang bskur ba dang/ dkyil 'khor gtso la rdo rje sems dpa' i rgya/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la mi bskyod pa/ /mkha' 'gro lA ma dum skyes gzugs can ma/ /rtag pa don grub
255b3(rgyud 'grel): dpag med rin chen 'byung/ /lha mo drug dang bzhi rnams kyis/ /phyi dang gsang bas yang dag mchod/ /dkyil 'khor lha rnams legs bstod nas/ /rang rang gnas su yid kyis gshegs/ /de nas phyag rgya'i mchod chen dang/ /sngags kyi dgod par
255b4(rgyud 'grel): rab tu grags/ /myur du dngos grub byed par ni/ /phyag rgya'i mchod 'di the tshom med/ mtshan ma gnyis la sngags sbyor te/ /mkha' 'gro dpa' mo gnyis med pa/ /snying po sngags kyis de bzhin du/ /sngags pas mkha' 'gro ma la sbyor/ /oM
255b5(rgyud 'grel): sh+rI mahA su kha badzra he he ru ru kaM A:hUM hUM phaT/ lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba yis/ /dkyil 'khor bar bcas mnyes par bya/ /phyi rol shin tu dga' bya la'ang/ /pad rdor byin rlabs 'di dag byung/ /mdun du yi ge yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor
255b6(rgyud 'grel): gzhung snang sngon po mdza' gnyis ba dan ldan/ de stengs yi ge raM las me dkyil 'khor/ /zur gsum nyid las dmar po 'bar bas mtshan/ /de steng a las pad+ma'i snod/ /dum bu gcig pa nang dmar po/ /hUM oM khAM hUM/ oM khAM aM traM/
255b7(rgyud 'grel): dri chu dri chen sha chen po/ /byang chub sems rang 'byung me tog /lAM mAM pAM tAM/ ba lang khyi dang glang po che/ /rta sgron kun la sa bon ldan/ /rlung gis me sbar bdud rtsi dmar por zhu/ /hUM dkar kha TwAM dkar la bsil/ /a li kA li thog mdza' ldan
256a1(rgyud 'grel): brjod pas/ /kha dog sna tshogs bdud rtsi'i steng du 'khod/ /yongs gyur oM A:hUM gsum po gong nas gong/ /'od zer tshogs 'phros nam mkha' i mthas klas pa'i/ /bde gshegs thugs kyi ye shes bdud rtsi bkug /yig
256a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum la thim gsum thim des byin brlab/ /bcom ldan 'das dang rnal 'byor ma rnams lce/ /yi ge hUM byung rdo rje rtse gsum pa/ /dkar po nas 'bru tsam bkod spu gus drangs/ /bdud rtsi gsol bas lha tshogs tshim par lta/ /rig sngags
256a3(rgyud 'grel): bzlas brjod bya ste rdo rje'i bzlas pa dang/ /bzlas brjod bya ba'i sngags kyis yi ge gang dag yin pa rnams/ /rang gi thugs ka'i sa bon las/ /'og nas 'byung ba rang gi rdo rje'i rtse mo las phyag rgya'i b+ha gar bton nas/ yang lha mo'i zhal
256a4(rgyud 'grel): nas rang gi zhal du zhugs pa rang gi sa bon la zhugs par blta zhing/ zhal thams cad dang rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyis kyang zlos par bsgom par bya ste/ khro bo'i bzlas pa yang bya'o/ /rim pa 'dis bzlas brjod kyi nyes pa dang bral bas
256a5(rgyud 'grel): sems mnyam par gzhag pa ji srid skyo bar ma gyur gyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o/ /bzlas brjod kyi gsang sngags ni 'di dag yin te/ oM badzra he he ru ru kaM huM hUM phaT DA ki nI dzA la saM ba ra swAhA/ oM h+rI:hA hA huM hUM phaT lha'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying
256a6(rgyud 'grel): po'o/ /oM sarbba bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye badzra war+Na nI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra bai ro tsa nI ye huM hUM phaT swAhA/ lha mo'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM DA ki nI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM lA me huM hUM phaT/ oM khaN+Da ro he huM hUM phaT/ oM rU bi NI ye huM hUM phaT/ dpa' 
256a7(rgyud 'grel): mo rnams kyi sngags/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te wI re shA ya huM hUM phaT/ oM mahA kal pAgni san+ni b+hA ya huM hUM phaT/ oM dza Ta ma ku Totka TA ya huM hUM phaT/ oM daSh+TrAM ka rA lo gra b+hi Sha Na mu khA ya huM hUM phaT/ oM sa ha sra b+hu dzA b+hA su rA ya huM hUM phaT/
256b1(rgyud 'grel): oM ba ra shu pA shodyAta shU la kha TwAM ga d+hA ra Ni huM hUM phaT/ oM byAg+h+ra dzi nI bar d+ha rA ya huM hUM phaT/ oM mahA d+hu m+brAnd+ha ka ra wa pu ShA ya huM hUM phaT/ mchod pa'i sngags so/ /ka ra ka ra ku ru ku ru band+ha band+ha/ trA sa ya trA sa ya/ k+Sho b+ha ya k+Sho b+ha ya/ hauM hauM h+ra:h+ra:pheM
256b2(rgyud 'grel): pheM/ phaT phaT/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha pa sa ru d+hi rAn+t+ra mA lA ba laM bi ni/ grih+Na grih+Na swa b+ha pA tA la ga ta b+hu dzaM ga sarba m+bA tardza ya tardza ya/ A kaDDhya A kaDDhya/ h+riM h+riM/ dz+nyauM dz+nyauM/ k+Sh+mAM k+Sh+mAM/ hAM hAM/ hIM hIM/ hUM hUM/ ki li ki li/ si li
