256b3(rgyud 'grel): si li/ hi li hi li/ d+hi li d+hi li/ huM hUM phaT/ rtsa ba'i sngags so/ /gang tshe bzlas pas skyo bar gyur pa na/ /sa bon 'od kyis shes rab bdag po dang/ /'khor lo pa dang khang pa brtsegs ma rnams/ /snang bar byas te 'od gyur rim bzhin bsdu/
256b4(rgyud 'grel): hUM de yongs su gyur pa las bdag nyid ni/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis g.yas brkyang gom pas gnas/ /lang tsho gzhon pa 'gyid bag mtshan dang ldan/ /phyag rgya drug ldan dril bu 'chang/ /de nas yongs su bsngo ba dang smon lam gdab pa dang/ yi
256b5(rgyud 'grel): ge brgya pa brjod pa yang byas la lha'i nga rgyal gyis gnas par bya'o/ /gung dang phyi dro'i thun mtshams su/ /bsam gtan khang par stan bder 'dug /bdag nyid 'od zer du gyur pa/ /hUM du gyur te yongs gyur las/ /bcom ldan 'khor lo bde mchog
256b6(rgyud 'grel): gi/ dkyil 'khor 'khor lo lha lnga yi/ /khang rtsegs rin chen tshogs las grub/ /dur khrod brgyad bskor gsal dmigs nas/ /dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i cho ga thams cad bya'o/ /thun tha mal ni sngar bstan pa'i cho ga thams cad spyad la/
256b7(rgyud 'grel): bzlas brjod kyi rjes la hUM gi 'od zer gyis thams cad 'od du gyur pa dkyil 'khor bdag po la bsdus la/ dkyil 'khor gtso bo dang bcas pa phyag rgya dang bcas pa yang 'od du gyur pa snying ga'i shes rab rab gyur yab yum la/ de yang snying ga'i
257a1(rgyud 'grel): nyi bcas hUM/ /nyi ma u ha mgo zla tshes/ /thig le nA da'i bar bsdus la/ /der yang dmigs med gnyid la 'jug /nang par gyis dus su rdo rje rnal 'byor ma yis glus bskul bas sad par mos par byas la/ cho
257a2(rgyud 'grel): ga thams cad nyi ma snga ma bzhin du bya'o/ /de ltar gus pa dang bcas pas rgyun mi 'chad par bsgom pas sems brtan par gyur pa dang/ rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bya'o/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams 'pho tshe dpal/ /khrag
257a3(rgyud 'grel): mthung sogs pa rnal 'byor pa/ /me tog sna tshogs lag na thogs/ /rgyal mtshan ba dan sna tshogs dang/ /rol mo'i sgra ni sna tshogs dang/ /glu yi mchod pa sna tshogs kyis/ /mkha' spyod gnas su khrid par byed/ /'chi ba zhes 'di rnam rtog
257a4(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /dam tshig ldan zhing bla ma la gus dang/ /bsgom bsgrub brtson la dngos grub thams cad 'byung/ /tshe dang longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang/ /dpal dang gzi brjid dbang phyug las rnams 'grub/ /bstan bcos thams cad la
257a5(rgyud 'grel): mkhas rtsod pa chen por 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid myur du thob par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'khor lo bde mchog gi /sgrub thabs tshul bzhin byas pa las/ /dge ba thob pa gang yin des/ /'gro kun rdor 'dzin rgyal gyur cig /bcom
257a6(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das 'khor lo bde mchog gi sgrub thabs rin po che yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba slob dpon mkhas pa chen po rdo rje dril bu pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //'gro kun sangs rgyas thob par shog/ //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ma ti
257a7(rgyud 'grel): kIrti dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba mkhas pa mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug gis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI dri b+hu dza sa ha dza saM ba ra sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ dpal bde mchog phyag gnyis
257b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i sgrub thabs/ dpal bde mchog lhan cig skyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag gi dge bas khams gsum srid mdza' i sdug bsngal ma lus pa/ /bsal nas bde ba mdza' dag la ni dgod par bya ba'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas
257b2(rgyud 'grel): thob par bgyi'o zhes kyang smon pa bskyed nas su/ /gzhan dag 'jug pa'i rang bzhin yang ni yongs su spel bar bya/ /rnal 'byor rnam gsum shes bya ste/ /byin gyis brlab dang rab brtags dang/ /bsam gyi mi khyab gzugs rdzogs pa'i/ /
257b3(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags/ /gang yang skad cig sbyor ba yis/ /rang nyid rdo rje mkha' 'gro gyur/ /rdzus te skyes pa'i sems can bzhin/ /sa bon med par bsgom bya ste/ /dpral bar gnas pa'i thod phreng can/ /zla ba phyed
257b4(rgyud 'grel): pa spyi bor 'chang/ /phyag rgya drug dang mgo phreng can/ /spyan gsum sna tshogs rdo rje can/ /g.yas brkyang gom stabs bkod pa yis/ /sna tshogs chu skyes nyi ma la/ /gnas pa'i 'jigs byed dus mtshan bcas/ /mnan cing stag gis
257b5(rgyud 'grel): pags pa 'chang/ /nag po mi bskyod cod pan can/ /rdo rje dril bu ral par ldan/ /dpa' bo rdo rje phag mo ni/ /rdo rje thod pa khrag bkang bsnams/ /dmar po ske rags dum bus mtshan/ /spyan gsum mgo bo'i phreng ba can/ /phyag
257b6(rgyud 'grel): rgya lnga ma sgra grol ma/ /phyogs gos sangs rgyas dbu brgyan ma/ /de ltar skad cig gis rdzogs par/ /bdag gis lus ni bsgom par bya/ /ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin gsal/ /sangs rgyas 'od zer rnam par 'phro/ /sems kyi spyod
257b7(rgyud 'grel): yul gcig tu ni/ /de dag kho na yun ring bsam/ /sems can gnas der bzhag nas su/ /de nas sangs rgyas dga' ba brtsam/ /chos dbyings rgyal mtshan kun chags las/ /dman min 'jig pa phun tshogs rnams/ /yang dag
258a1(rgyud 'grel): rig pa dga' ba'i tshogs/ /'dzag pa can ma 'char ba gang/ /de ni rgya chen yid byed pa/ /'phro ba 'dus byas rgyun rnams la/ /rtag tu bsgom zhing 'di bzhin du/ /'od gsal rjes su dran par bya/ /sna tshogs mtsho skyes nyi ma dang
258a2(rgyud 'grel): ni 'jigs byed dus mtshan mo/ /mdzes ma bdag po nam mkha' i nor bu de bzhin gshegs pa lnga yi 'og /lus dang yan lag mchog dang 'od dkar thig le nA da ste/ /'di rnams sgrib pa med pa'i gnas su rims kyis gzhug par bya/ /ji ltar dbugs
258a3(rgyud 'grel): rlung me long la/ /kun nas yal bar 'gyur ba ni/ /de bzhin rnal 'byor yang dag mthar/ /yang dang yang du gzhug par bya/ /thams cad khyab pa snang ba med/ /snying rje ro gcig yid kyis ni/ /bdag po yin bzhin stong pa nyid/ /skad cig kho nar
258a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khyud par 'gyur/ /rnam bcas rnam pa med pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab de yis 'khyud pa po/ /skye 'jig spangs pa mi 'gyur bde ba rgod pa la sogs bde ba spangs pa po/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni skyed byed sku gsum ldan pa khams
258a5(rgyud 'grel): gsum yang dag rig pa po/ /thams cad mkhyen pa mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan de nyid la phyag 'tshal/ /mi 'gyur bde ba ye shes dus/ /thabs dang thugs rje'i bdag nyid de/ /shes bya'i rnam par 'gro 'khor lo/ /shes
258a6(rgyud 'grel): rab stong nyid bdag nyid do/ /kaM de bde ba rgyu med blo/ /snying rje ye shes mi 'gyur ba/ /stong nyid pri ti se na bzhin/ /dngos po thams cad mthong ba'o/ /kun nas phyag dang zhabs ldan pa/ /kun nas spyan dang dbu dang zhal/ /kun nas dran
258a7(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'jig rten du/ /thams cad kun tu g.yogs nas bzhugs/ /'di ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku/ /stong nyid snying rje gnyis med pa/ /ma ning zhes byar grags pa ste/ /'ga' zhig tu ni zung 'jug ces/ /sgrib pa med pa'i chos kyis ni/ /phung
258b1(rgyud 'grel): po la sogs 'di na gnas/ /rten dang brten pa'i mtshan nyid 'di/ /thams cad dkyil 'khor nyid yin no// //dpal bde mchog phyag gnyis pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i? sgrub thabs/ dngos grub brnyes pa'i paN+Di ta chen po dpal rdo rje dril bu pa'i
258b2(rgyud 'grel): zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po lnga rig paN chen grub pa brnyes pa rje btsun ratna rak+Shi ta li zhal snga nas dang/ chag lo tsa ba shAkya'i dge slong chos rje dpal gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //
258b3(rgyud 'grel): kun gyis sangs rgyas myur thob shog/ //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ ga Na tsa kra bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nam mkha' i mdog can dri med rnal 'byor ma la rol/ /khyung rnams
258b4(rgyud 'grel): sprul pa bkye nas bdud bzhi zil gyis gnon mdzad de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs yin te/ /tshogs la dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur/ /de phyir de yi cho ga ni/ /brgyad dang bcu bzhi bco lnga dang/ /tshes bcu la ni de rab mchod//
258b5(rgyud 'grel): dur khrod dam ni shing gcig mchog /skyed mos tshal dang kun dga' dang/ /de bzhin rang gi khyim dang ni/ /gzhan yang dben pa'i khyim du bya/ /dang po tshogs kyi yo byad bsags te/ de nas bdud rtsis chos 'byung bris la/ de'i steng du bdud rtsi
258b6(rgyud 'grel): lnga dang thod par sbyar ba bzhag /de nas yon bdag gis phyag byas/ me tog tshogs kyi slob dpon dang/ /rnal 'byor yo la phul nas gsol ba gdab/ /de nas tshogs kyi slob dpon gyis/ /oM mahA ra shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA hA ra shud+d+honyrahaM/ zhes pa'i sngags
258b7(rgyud 'grel): mang bar bzlas/ de'i rjes la slob dpon gyis rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pas yum la 'khyud par snyoms par zhugs par bsam/ de nas bdud rtsi spyad bar byas/ ye shes bdud rtsi phab la/ oM a mri ta hUM ci nus bzlas/ rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas/ de
259a1(rgyud 'grel): nas phyogs bcur sdigs mdzub kyis gdor bas byang sems dpal gyi bgegs bskrad/ bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bya/ de nas oM A:hUM gis rdzas skyon med par bde bar brlab/ de nas bskyed rims bsgom ste/ bdun rnam
259a2(rgyud 'grel): dag gi skabs su mchod pa lnga dang bdud rtsi lngas mchod/ ye shes 'khor lo la/ gcig de nas dbang bskur yan chad rdzogs pa'i rjes la/ rnal 'byor pa lnga'i 'khor lo 'dzin pa gcig mchod/ bdud rtsi dang zhal bsil gyi rjes la dbul/
259a3(rgyud 'grel): de nas lha bsdus la tshogs pas sbyang bar byas/ rnal 'byor pa rnams la me tog gi phreng ba dang/ dri bzang po dbul/ de nas nam mkha' khengs pa'i lha mo yis kyang/ bkra shis brjod par bsam/ bkra shis brjod par bya/ de nas skyes pa'i
259a4(rgyud 'grel): dum bu gcig pa'i thod pa chad gis bkang la tshig 'di brjod la drang bar bya/ ltos shig dam pa'i chos bya ba/ /'di la rnam rtog yin ma yin/ /bram ze khyi dang gdol pa gsum/ /rang bzhin gcig pas lhan cig bza' / /bde gshegs
259a5(rgyud 'grel): chos ni sdig med cing/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs/ /'dod chags la sogs skyon dang bral/ /de bzhin nyid la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /der ni bza' rnams gsol byas te/ /lhag ma snod du bzhag par bya/ /zhes 'byung bas/ chogs
259a6(rgyud 'grel): rol nas gcig gis mas yar lhag ma dang/ de ci'i me tog bsdus la gtor mar bsam de'i rim pa ni 'di yin te/ khru gang ba yi tshad du ni/ /dri ni bzang pos byug par bya/ /de phyir dkar po gru gsum yin/ /nya dang sha sogs gtor
259a7(rgyud 'grel): mar bzhag /me tog la sogs gtor mar bzhag /de mi dmigs par byas la/ mos pas chos 'byung gru gsum bsams la/ rtse mo thur na mo las oM las rnam snang/ g.yon pa A:las snang ba mdza' yas/ g.yas pa hUM las
259b1(rgyud 'grel): mi bskyod pa/ /nang du paM ljang gu las sna tshogs pad+ma/ de'i steng du sems can rnams yab yum dang/ khro bo dang khyud du bsams la gtor ma btang/ dza:hUM baM ho:sa mgron rang rgyud pa spyan drangs la bstim/ kA ya bAk gis bstab/ bstod nas
259b2(rgyud 'grel): bkra shis bya/ de nas yang dag par mchod pa'i cho ga ma tshang ba dang lhag pa rnams/ rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yi ge brgya pa gdon/ mchog dang thun mong gi dngos grub la 'dod pa'i gsol ba gdab/ de nas thal mo sbyar la smon lam gdab/
259b3(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad sdig med cing/ /sems can thams cad bde gyur cig /sangs rgyas nyid dang phrad gyur pa'i/ /lam de nyid du zhugs nas kyang/ /ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral ba dang/ /ma grol ba rnams grol bar shog /rnal 'byor
259b4(rgyud 'grel): gtsug la dam tshig la/ /da lta nyid du gnas par shog /se gol lan gsum brdab byas la/ /phyi rol lha rnams gshegs su gsol/ /bdag gis tshogs 'khor 'di byas pas/ /dge ba dri med gang thob des/ /tshogs gnyis tshogs ni
259b5(rgyud 'grel): bsags nas kyang/ /'gro kun rdo rje 'dzin rgyal shog/ //tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga slob dpon rdo rje dril bu pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI tsakra saM pa ra sto tra/ bod skad du/ dpal 'khor lo sdom
259b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bstod pa/ dpal bde mchog 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhe sdang tshul gyis zhe sdang 'joms mdzad cing/ /chos dbyings rnam dag ye shes ngo bo nyid/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang mnyam par sbyar/ /zhe sdang rdo rje khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /hUM gi rdo rje las
259b7(rgyud 'grel): byung char sprin mdog /dga' ba rnam dag drag po'i zhal bzhir snang/ /gar gyi nyams dgus gdul dka' 'dul mdzad pa/ /hUM mdzad rdo rje khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rten 'brel bcu gnyis dag pas sa rnams rdzogs/ /bcu gnyis phyag gis phyag
260a1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan sna tshogs 'dzin/ /yul dang yul min rnam rtog 'joms mdzad pa'i/ /ngo mtshar mtshon cha bsnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /hUM gi nga ros srid gsum skrag mdzad cing/ /rngam pa'i rkan sgra phaT kyi sgra sgrogs pas//
260a2(rgyud 'grel): bdud dang bgegs tshogs gdul dka' ma lus 'dul/ /rnam rtog bgegs bdud 'joms la phyag 'tshal lo/ /spros bral bde mchog pad+ma rA ga'i mdog /stong nyid 'od gsal dus gsum bde gshegs blo/ /rnam rtog dra ba ma lus 'joms
260a3(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa'i/ /dus gsum rgyal ba'i yum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sa chu me rlung 'byung ba rnam par dag /dag pa'i zhal bzhi rigs kyi yum du snang/ /dran pa nyer gzhag bzhi yi ngo bo nyid/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs yum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems
260a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi rnam rtog sa bla'i srid pa sbyong/ /zhe sdang rnam dag thugs kyi 'khor lor snang/ /thod pa'i dum bu rab gtum ma la sogs/ /gnas dang nye gnas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gsung gi nga ros sa stengs srid pa sbyong/ /'dod chags rnam dag
260a5(rgyud 'grel): gsung gi 'khor lor snang/ /myu gu can dang sa srungs ma la sogs/ /zhing dang nye zhing rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sku yi rol pas sa 'og srid pa sbyong/ /gti mug rnam dag sku yi 'khor lor snang/ /stobs po che dang 'khor lo'i shugs can
260a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs/ /'dus sogs gnas la bzhugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag las mdza' 'tsho ba rtsol dang dran/ /bde chen dga' ba mos dang gtso la phyogs/ /gdug pa'i tshogs rnams ma lus bsrung mdzad pa/ /sgo bzhi ma mor snang la phyag
260a7(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /brtson 'grus rnam dag yang dag spang ba bzhi/ /gshin rje brtan ma la sogs ma mor snang/ /phyogs gnyis 'dzin pas sku mdog phyed gzugs sam/ /rgyal ba'i yum du bstan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde gshegs brgyad kyis bstan
260b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i snying por bstan/ /bdag med dkyil 'khor dur khrod brgyad du gnas/ /byang chub rkyen du shing brgyad mngon du byung/ /'jig rten chos brgyad bsregs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i bstod pa/ rgyal po chen po in+t+ra b+hA tis mdzad pa
260b2(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ maN+Da la de ba sto tra ratna mA yA dA na nA ma/ bod skad du/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha la bstod pa rin po che sgyu 'phrul sbyin pa zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la phyag
260b3(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin dkyil 'khor phyag 'tshal te/ /gus pas bstod la byin rlabs myur 'byung bdag gis brjod/ /hUM phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing kun bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor na/ /bcom ldan dpal chen khro rgyal 'khor lo
260b4(rgyud 'grel): bde mchog ni/ /ye shes rnam par dag pa thams cad tshogs pa'i sku/ /'jigs byed 'jigs par byed pa mthing nag rin chen 'od/ /zhal bzhi sngo dang dmar dang ser dang ljang ba'i dbu/ /ral pa'i thor tshugs zla phyed sna tshogs rdo rjes mdzes/ /dmar
260b5(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs brtson gzigs rab bgrang sdang mig glog ltar 'gyu/ /gtum rngam mche ba gtsigs shing 'jigs pa'i nga ro sgrogs/ /rol pa chen po'i smin mtshams khro gnyer rlabs chen 'khrugs/ /ljags 'dril mchog las 'od 'phro hUM phaT 'brug
260b6(rgyud 'grel): sgra che/ /lang tsho gzhon pa gar dgu'i nyams ldan 'gying bag can/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang dpe byad brgyad cus brgyan/ /rten 'brel bcu gnyis 'gags pa'i phyag bsnams rab tu snang/ /dang po gnyis kyi rdo rje dril bu yum mchog 'dzin/ /
260b7(rgyud 'grel): thabs dang shes rab zhal sbyar bde chen mi rtog bzhugs/ /mdza' gnyis glang chen ko rlon mi lpags na bza' rgyangs/ /g.yon pa'i gnyis pa kha TwAM gsum pas thod khrag bkang/ /bzhi pa rdo rje zhags pa lnga pa tshangs mgo bsnams/ /g.yas
261a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gnyis pas cang te'u gsum pas mdung rtse gsum/ /bzhi pas rdo rje dgra sta lnga pa gri gug bsnams/ /rab tu brjid pa'i mgon po stag lpags sham thabs can/ /spyi btsug 'khor lo nor bu snyan cha gdub kor
261a2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ mgur chu phyas rgya sku regs thal pas rab tu brgyan /lha yi gdugs dkar mdzes pa steng na 'dzin pa'i dpal/ /brgya phyed khrag 'dzag mi mgo'i phreng ba'i do shal can/ /'jigs byed dus mtshan ma rungs skrag cing gtsigs pa'i
261a3(rgyud 'grel): zhal/ /nyin mo'i dbang phyug gdan la zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /sna tshogs thabs kyis 'gro ba ma lus bde la sgyur/ /khro bo'i rgyal po thams cad gus pas khyed la 'dud/ /tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang po lha chen tshogs bdag
261a4(rgyud 'grel): sogs/ /'gro ba'i gtso bo thams cad 'jigs dang gus mchod pa'i/ /rgyal chen he ru ka dpal khyed la phyag 'tshal bstod// //hUM dbus phyogs rnam dag rdo rje'i zhing gi dkyil 'khor na/ /bcom ldan 'das ma mkha' 'gro tshogs kyi gtso
261a5(rgyud 'grel): bo ni/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes yem par dag pa'i sku/ /byi ru'i 'od 'bar rdo rje phag mo bde gshegs thams cad bskyed pa'i yum/ /'dod pa'i dbang phyug skal ldan mkha' 'gro kun gyi rje/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi khro rgyal phyag rgya chen po'i sku/ /he ru ka
261a6(rgyud 'grel): dpal yang dag sbyor ba btsun mo'i rgyal/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum dmar ser me stag 'phro/ /khro 'dzum zhal gyi mche ba gcigs shing rol pa mo/ /dbu skra legs grol skra sor sab? pa'i lha mo che/ /thod pa skam pos dbu
261a7(rgyud 'grel): brgyan 'gro ba'i zhe sdang 'joms/ phyag g.yas rdo rje gri gug sdigs mdzub gdug pa 'dul/ /g.yon pa thod pa sdang ba'i khrag gis bkang ba bsnams/ /dbu yi nor bu snyan cha gdub kor mgur chu dang/ /phyag gdub sku rags phyag rgya lnga
261b1(rgyud 'grel): yi sa rab tu brgyan/ /yi dags phra mo me shel nor bu'i gdan steng na/ /gcer mo rig pa'i rgyal mo zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /rdo rje lha mo khro mo'i gzugs can drag snyems ma/ /'byung po'i 'jigs pa ma lus rdo rje chen pos
261b2(rgyud 'grel): 'joms/ /'jig rten gsum phyogs gzhan gyis bsngo bas mi tshugs shing/ /bdud kyi 'jigs pa ma lus skem zhing pham mdzad ma/ /rdo rje gdan bzhugs tshangs sogs dbang byed las rgyal zhing/ /dngos grub kun 'byung rje btsun ma
261b3(rgyud 'grel): khyod phyag 'tshal bstod/ /shar phyogs rnam dag sangs rgyas zhing gi dkyil 'khor na/ /bcom ldan 'das ma sangs rgyas rigs kyi gtso mo ni/ /me long lta bu'i ye shes rnam par dag pa'i sku/ /rin chen baiDUrya yi 'od 'bar mkha' 'gro ma/
261b4(rgyud 'grel): zhal gcig phyag bzhi spyan gsum sgra grol mche bzhi gtsigs/ /thod pa kha TwAM gri gug cang te'u phyag na bsnams/ /'khor lo snyan cha mgur chu phyag gdub mchod phyir thogs/ /phyag rgya lngas brgyan lang tsho rol pa sgeg pa'i sku/ /gced mo
261b5(rgyud 'grel): g.yon brkyang sreg song zla ba'i shar na la bzhugs/ /chos dbyings las bzhengs 'khor ba grol ba'i khra mo'i rgyal/ /ma mo nam mkha' khyab 'gro 'gro ba'i gti mug 'joms/ /sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs sems can don la khyab par 'jug /ye shes
261b6(rgyud 'grel): chen mo rnal 'byor skal ldan 'char ba mo/ /bdud dang mu stegs mi mthun phyogs rnams rdul dru rlog /lam log 'gro ba bde la thabs kyis sbyor mdzad cing/ /dngos grub kun ster lha mo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /byang phyogs rnam dag las mchog
261b7(rgyud 'grel): zhing gi dkyil 'khor nas/ /bcom ldan 'das ma las kyi rigs kyi gtse mo ni/ /bya ba grub pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa'i sku/ /rin chen mar ka ta'i 'od 'bar lA ma ni/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi spyan gsum skra grol mche bzhi gtsigs/ /thod pa
262a1(rgyud 'grel): kha TwAM gri gug cang te'u phyag na bsnams/ /'khor lo snyan cha mgu chu phyag gdub mchod phyir thogs/ /phyag rgya lngas brgyan lang tsho bzhon pa sgeg pa'i sku/ /gcer mo g.yon brkyang srog song zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs/ /chos
262a2(rgyud 'grel): dbyings las bzhengs 'khor ba sgrol ba'i khro mo'i rgyal/ /ma mo nam mkha' khyab 'gro 'gro ba'i phrag dog 'joms/ /sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs sems can don la khyab par 'jug /ye shes chen po rnal 'byor skal ldan 'char ba mo/ /bdud dang mu stegs

262a4(rgyud 'grel): mo ni/ /so sor rtog pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa'i sku/ /rin chen pad+ma rA ga 'od 'bar dum skyes ma/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi spyan gsum skra grol mche bzhi gtsigs/ /thod pa kha TwAM gri gug cang te'u phyag na bsnams/ /'khor lo snyan cha
262a5(rgyud 'grel): mgur chu phyag gdub mchod phyir thogs/ /phyag rgya lngas brgyan lang tsho gzhon pa sgeg pa'i sku/ /gcer mo g.yon brgyad srog song zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs/ /chos dbyings las bzhengs 'khor ba sgrol ba'i khro mo'i rgyal/ /ma mo nam mkha'

262a7(rgyud 'grel): thabs kyis sbyor mdzad cing/ /dngos grub kun ster lha mo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /lho phyogs rnam dag rin chen zhing gi dkyil 'khor na/ /bcom ldan 'das ma rin chen rigs kyi gtso mo ni/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rnam par dag pa'i sku//
262b1(rgyud 'grel): rin chen gtso mo gser 'od 'bar ba gzugs can ma/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi spyan gsum skra grol mche bzhi gtsigs/ /thod pa kha TwAM gri gug cang te'u phyag na bsnams/ /'khor lo snyan cha mgur chu phyag gdub mchod phyir thogs/ /phyag rgya lngas brgyan

262b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis rab dad pas/ /dngos grub chen po 'byung ba'i rgyu/ /dkyil 'khor lha la gus bstod pas/ /dung dang kun da ltar dkar ba'i/ /dge des 'gro kun rdo rje 'dzin thob shog/ //dkyil 'khor gyi lha la bstod pa rin po che sgyu 'phrul sbyin pa zhes
262b5(rgyud 'grel): bya ba/ slob dpon rdo rje dril bu pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //mahA paN+Di ta su ma ti kIrti dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug gis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// (//dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i bstod pa bzhugs so// //)
262b6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI badzra DA ka sya sta pa daN+Da ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i bstod pa rgyun chags zhes bya ba/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /utpal mdog sngon char sprin phreng ba dri med nam mkha' sngon po'i sku mdog rlung chen
262b7(rgyud 'grel): me chu sa yi dkyil 'khor steng du gnas pa'i gser gyi ri bo'i steng na pad+ma rgyas pa'i gdan gnas dbang phyug mnan cing dkar mo'i nu ma gnyis po mnyam brdzis zil gyis dbang po nye dbang nyi ma zla ba la sogs lha rnams gdangs? mdzad lha min du ma skrag
263a1(rgyud 'grel): par mdzad cing 'jig rten srung mdzad dogs pa kun 'phrog stag lpags na bza' dka' mdzad ngan bsgral brtan zhing zab pa'i yi ge hUM dang pheM gyi rnam pa hA hA nga ros nam mkha' kun gar sna tshogs rdo rje zla phyed kyis mtshan
263a2(rgyud 'grel): gtsug tor dam pa gti mug mun bcom legs par sgrol ba dung chen phreng ba 'bar ba'i rdo rje sgrar bcas dril bu rab gsil dam pa'i phyag zung nye bar 'khyud pa gnyis med ye shes chags pa'i yan lag rang bzhin btsun mo'i grogs dang
263a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa phyag gnyis glang chen myos pa chen po'i pags pa'i na bza' bsnams pas brel zhing rnam par 'phro ba'i dgra sta mdud rno gri gug 'bar ba'i rdo rje kha TwAM ga dang zhags pa 'phro ba changs pa'i mgo dang cang te'u dang ni thod pa 'phro ba'i phyag rnam/
263a4(rgyud 'grel): kyis mdzes sha dang tshil bu chen po gsol ba bsam gtan ldan pa cod pan ldan pa ye shes ldan pa blo nor ldan pa bcu drug phyed phyed zhal dang ldan pa spyan gsum dag par mdzad pa mgo bo'i phreng bas brgyan pa 'jigs su rung ba drag po mi bzang 'khor
263a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dgon pa yang dag sgrol ba bdud rnams 'joms pa rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal /de yi rjes su phyogs kyi pad+ma'i 'dab ma bzhir bzhugs mkha' 'gro chen mo lA ma dum skyes gzugs can ma ni yid 'phrog byed ma rnams dang ldan zhing
263a6(rgyud 'grel): mtshams su kun gnas thod pas bskor cing de nas sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lor bzhugs shing sa 'og sa steng mtho ris spyong pa de nyid gsum las 'phros pa'i dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang phyug 'khor lo dam pa'i 'khor lo can ni phyogs dang
263a7(rgyud 'grel): phyogs ? dag na gnas pa'i khwa gdong la sogs lha mo brgyad kyis mngon par mchod cing rang gi lha mos mnyam par sbyor pa'i sgeg pa dang ldan bdud kyi sde rnams sdangs par mjad pa rnam par 'phro ba sems can la ni yang dag chags can
263b1(rgyud 'grel): sdang la rnam sdang khro la kun khro nyon mongs rnams 'joms 'chi bdag bdud sogs khrag dron btung bas tshim pa'i thugs bde 'jig rten gsum na mdzad pa gcig bzhugs sangs rgyas mdzad brtson rdo rje lha mo'i bde ba reg pa las skyes pa spu langs
263b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshogs kyis khyab pa'i sku can spyan gyi rdzi ma g.yo zhing mgur gyi sbubs nas srid kyi sgrar bcas bzhad cing yid 'ong phyag gi zhags pas mgul 'khyud na ma gnyis rgyas mkhrad rten las byung rdul gyi thogs pa'i tshogs kyis mchod cing nyi ma bye ba'i
263b3(rgyud 'grel): 'od kyi snang bas phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs khyab cing mdza' yas khyab cing snyan chas brgyan pa zla ba gzhon nu phyed pa'i mche ba'i myu gu lham me dpal mdzad blo mdzad tshim pa ster zhing rgyas pa ster ba rgyal srid ster zhing dngos grub ster ba phun
263b4(rgyud 'grel): sum tshogs pa thams cad rab ster 'dren pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro la ni rtag tu 'dud/ /dpe med thugs rje'i nyams kyis 'jug pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkod pa ma lus rnam par 'phro bas 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho mi bzad nang song nyon mongs rba rlabs 'phro
263b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phreng ba rnam par 'joms mdzad me 'bar stod pas lhag pa'i 'od 'bar glog 'phro'o 'od gsal ye shes phung po'i 'od zer khyab par yang dag bstan cing mdza' yas dngos po'i rang bzhin dngos bral dngos dang dngos med ngo bo yang dag las byung ngo bo
263b6(rgyud 'grel): khams gsum rang bzhin gzugs bzang gzugs bral ma lus gzugs bcom tshangs pa'i gnas bzhis nges par gnas pa mtshan gyis brgyan pa dpe byad rnams kyis legs par spras pa chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa sprul pa'i sku gsum po
263b7(rgyud 'grel): yis khyab pa'i sems can don gyi 'phrin las de nyid gsum pa tshags la chags chan ma rungs pa la zhe sdang chen po rmongs la rmongs chen 'dod la 'dod chen brtse ba stong nyid tha dad med pa sngon dang phyi ma'i mdza' ni spangs shing 'jig rten gsum
264a1(rgyud 'grel): po skad cig gis khyab rnam par shes par mngon du gyur pa dga' ba chen po'i tshogs kyi mchog mdzes sbyin dang tshul khrims la sogs yongs dag phyi nang mun pa mi bzad brgral zhing 'gro ba'i mdzad pa byed pa
264a2(rgyud 'grel): 'phrog byed 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa yang dag sgrol mdzad nyon mongs nyon mongs kun 'phrog gzugs dang ldan zhing gzugs kun sdud mdzad gdug pa kun nas skrag par mdzad cing phra mo'i sku can spom po'i lus chen khyab bdag khyab pa rtag
264a3(rgyud 'grel): pa skad cig gnas pa brtan pa g.yo? ba? gsal ba dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang phyug 'jig rten dbang phyug la ni dngos po kun gyis 'dud/ /ro brgyas spras shing rmad byung 'jigs rung du ma'i gzugs can ro bsregs ma dregs mi go rab gtum dus
264a4(rgyud 'grel): pa dum bu'i tshogs dang skra sogs kyis brgyan bsreg bzhin pa yi yan lag mchog gis klad pa lug cing rkar mar zhag 'thor 'dam ni 'dred pa skra chad pa dang rgyu ma'i phreng ba lang lor nar ba mkha' 'gro ma dang 'byung po ro langs ha ha'i nga ro
264a5(rgyud 'grel): mthon por sgrogs shing sgrub pa po ni dum hUM yig gis bsdigs rgyu zhing ce spyang phaT kyi rnam pa'i ku co 'don cing lag bteg gar byed keng rus phreng ba 'khrigs pa dpa' bo'i btung ba'i spro ba las byung dga' ba dang bcas glu snyan len cing
264a6(rgyud 'grel): gar byed g.yo zhing rol pa rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma yi dbang phyug tshogs pa bya rgod mchu yis bsnun cing bcad pa'i lus kyi khrag gi rgyun 'dzag mun nag can ni lce sbyang gdong las byung ba'i bar ba drag po me 'bar tshogs can bdud sde'i tshogs

264b1(rgyud 'grel): lus spangs nas mnyam med bsod nams phung po bsags las rab skyes dri med ye shes tshogs ni mngon gyur rang rig yang dag gsal ba dam pa'i 'od kyis gsal byas sna tshogs du ma'i gti mug mun nag mdza' yas kun nas bsal ba'i skad
264b2(rgyud 'grel): cig la ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi sku bzhin kun nas rtag tu gyur/ /dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i bstod pa rgyun chags zhes bya ba rtog ge pa'i tshogs kyi gtsug gi nor bu slob dpon chen po dpal ldan chos kyi grags pa'i zhabs

264b4(rgyud 'grel): 'di'i gzhung tshad ni bla ma'i phyag dpe la tshig rkang pa bzhi'i re re zhing yi ge sum cu rtsa drug tu gnas shing rkang pa bzhi ka bsdoms pas yi ge stong sum brgya bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi bzhugs so// bod kyi dpe la ni tshig rkang re re la tshegs bar nyi sa brgya
264b5(rgyud 'grel): dgu bcu rtsa lnga yod cing/ bsdom pas tshegs par stong brgya brgyad cu yod do// // */ (/dpal 'khor lo bde mchog gi sgrub thabs rin po che gtsug gi nor bu grub chen la babs mdzad pa bzhugs//) // */ /rgya gar skad du/
264b6(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga bA na sh+rI tsakra saM par sya sAd+ha ni ratna tsU Da ma Ni nA ma/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das dpal 'khor lo bde mchog gi sgrub thabs rin po che gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yi dags
264b7(rgyud 'grel): gdan la gar gyis bzhugs shing zhal bzhi bai DUrya pad gser margad spyan gsum byu ru bcag 'dra'i zhal gcig phyag gnyis thod khrag cang te'u bsnams pa'i rdo rje rnal 'byor ma/ zhabs gnyis mnyam 'khril zhal sbyar sku la rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis dril
265a1(rgyud 'grel): bu rdo rje la sogs 'khyud cing tha ma gnyis kyis glang chen thal kar ko rlon mi lpags khrag gis klong 'khril brgyangs pa mnabs/ /lhag ma g.yon pa'i phyag rnams kyis ni rim pa bzhin du mdzes pa'i 'khar gsil thod pa khrag
265a2(rgyud 'grel): bkar rdo rje zhag pa tshangs pa chen po mgo bsnams 'od zer rab tu 'bar ba legs par bsnams/ /de bzhin g.yas rnams 'khor lo rtsibs bcu mdung rtse gsum pa lcags kyu cang te bsnams pa rgyal chen sh+rI he ru ka bde mchog 'khor lo bcom
265a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan brlabs kyis 'gro kun rtag tu rgyal gyur cig /dpal ldan bla ma rje btsun dang ni dar rjes bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma dang/ /chu zla sogs mtshungs rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la'ang gus pas phyag 'tshal te/ /bla ma chen po slob ma mkhas pa'i gus pa drin
265a4(rgyud 'grel): gsol gdab pa yis/ /de yi sgrub thabs myur du dga' ba rgyas byed gsal bar bshad par bya/ /de la dang po rnal 'byor pa dang pa dang thos pa la sogs pas chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang nam mkha' lta bur yongs su shes pa/ snying rje dang ldan
265a5(rgyud 'grel): ba/ sbyin pa dang byams pa la sogs goms par byas la/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis ma gos pa/ bla ma rje btsun yang dag par mnyes par bya ba sngon du song bas/ dpal bde mchog gis rgyud las gsungs pa'i cho ga bzhin du dkyil
265a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor du zhugs pa rim pa bzhin du dbang bskur zhing rjes su gnang ba dang dam tshig thob pa/ bla ma dang 'dod pa'i lha la tha mi dad par 'dzin pa'i blo can/ spyod pa dang brtul zhugs dang ldan pa/ dur khrod la sogs pa yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i
265a7(rgyud 'grel): gnas su/ sna tshogs rdo rje'i stan la legs par 'dug pas bdud rtsi'i ri lu la yi ge gsum bzlas pas kha dag pa la sogs pa byas nas sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir bdag dpal rdo rje he ru ka nyid du gyur par bya'o snyoms
265b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bsam pa brtan pas/ rang gi snying gar raM las byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rang gi lha'i sa bon 'od zer kha dog rnam pa lnga pa/ kun nas rab tu 'phro ba bsag par bya'o/ /de'i 'od zer gyi snang bas rang gi lus kyi nang nas ba spu'i rtse mo'i
265b2(rgyud 'grel): bar khyab par byas pas bdag nyid 'dod pa'i lha'i ngo bor gyur par nga rgyal bya zhing/ de las 'od zer gyi tshogs ba spu'i bu gnas 'phros pas/ dpal bde mchog 'khor lo rigs drug gang 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo lha bcu bzhi pa'i bdag nyid spro ba
265b3(rgyud 'grel): dang bsdu ba'i sku/ rin po che sna tshogs pa las grub pa'i khang pa rtseg ma dang bcas pa dur khrod brgyad kyis bskor ba/ shar phyogs kyi dur khrod dbang po'i mdun na bla ma seng ge'i khri rin po che sna tshogs pas spras pa'i steng na gser gyi pad+ma kha bye ba la rdo rje sems
265b4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' ltar 'gying bag du rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas bzhugs pa snang bar gyur pa gsal bar bltas la/ de nas rang gi lus du ma sna tshogs par sprul la/ bdag bla ma rdo rje 'chang chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag bcom ldan 'das dpal 'khor lo
265b5(rgyud 'grel): bde mchog gi lha tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can thams cad rdzogs pa'i byang chub myur du thob par bya ba'i phyir lus 'di dag dbul bar bgyi'o zhes bya'o/ /de nas de dag
265b6(rgyud 'grel): la rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las byung ba'i pi wang ma la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i lha mo bcu drug dang/ ma tang gI la sogs pa bzhi'i tshogs kyis phyi dang gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod par bya ste/ pi wang gling bu rdza rnga rnga chen ma//
265b7(rgyud 'grel): sngon mo ser mo dmar mo ljang gu rnams/ /dang po'i phyag gnyis rang rtags phyag mtshan can/ /de dag mdza' gnyis rdo rje dril bu 'dzin/ /bzhad ma sgeg mo glu ma gar ma rnams/ /dmar skya sngon mo ser mo ljang gu ste/ /dang po'i phyag gnyis rang rang
266a1(rgyud 'grel): rtags mtshan ldan/ /g.yon mdza' thod pa kha TwAM cang te'u g.yas/ /me tog bdug pa snang gsal dri chab ma/ /dkar mo mthing dmar dmar ser dkar mo rnams/ /g.yon gnyis thod pa kha TwAM g.yas dang po /rang ming
266a2(rgyud 'grel): rjes mthun gnyis pa cang te'u 'dzin/ /gzugs ma ro ma reg ma tshes ma rnams/ /dkar mo dmar mo ljang gu dmar mo ste/ /g.yon g.yas mdza' 'di rnams ni gong dang mtshungs/ /g.yas kyi dang po rang min mthun rtags can/ /kun
266a3(rgyud 'grel): kyang zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma la sgeg /lang tsho gzhon pa rol cing 'gying bag can/ /rin chen rgyan ldan dar gyis rab tu mdzes/ /dpag med rang sngags brjod cing mgon sogs rje/ /oM A:badzra bI Ne hUM/ oM A:badzra baM se hUM/
266a4(rgyud 'grel): oM A:badzra mu ra dze hUM/ oM A:badzra mu kuN+De hUM/ oM A:badzra hA sye hUM/ oM A:badzra la sye hUM/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): badzra gI te hUM/ oM A:badzra nirte te hUM/ oM A:badzra puShpe hUM/ oM A:badzra b+hU be hUM/ oM A:badzra
266a5(rgyud 'grel): dI paM hUM/ oM A:badzra gand+he hUM/ oM A:badzra pU be hUM/ oM A:badzra A darshe hUM/ oM A:badzra rA sye hUM/ oM A:badzra sbarshe hUM/ oM A:badzra d+harme hUM zhes bya'o/ /ma tad Dom pi ra dza puk+ka si/ /'og nas 'chad
266a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin rang rang zhal sogs ldan/ /dus pa'i rgyan can thod pa bdud rtsis bkang/ /brjod pa med par dren pa 'khor bcas mchod/ /rje btsun nyid phyag rgya dang snyoms par zhugs pas mchog tu dga' ba dam pa'i bde ba chen pos dgyes pa
266a7(rgyud 'grel): de kho na nyid kyi mchod pa yang bya'o/ /de nas de dag gis spyan sngar sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa 'di ltar bya ste/ bdag gi sdig pa thams cad bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyan sngar so sor bshags
266b1(rgyud 'grel): shing slan chad kyang sdom par bgyid lags so/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang 'phags pa so so'i skye bo'i dge ba thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo/ /bdag gi dge ba thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo bar
266b2(rgyud 'grel): bgyi'o/ /bdag byang chub kyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdus pa'i ngo bo dpal 'khor lo bde mchog sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o/ /des bstan pa'i gsang sngag dang phyag rgya la sog pa'i ngo bo chos la skyabs su mchi'o/ /de'i
266b3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/ /sems can tham cad kyi sgrib pa thams cad bsal ba'i phyir/ nam mkha' i mthas gtugs pa'i sangs rgyas tham cad kyis chos kyi 'khor lo
266b4(rgyud 'grel): bskor bar bskul lo/ /rgyal ba mya ngan las 'da' bar bzhed pa rnams 'gro ba kun la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du bzhugs par gsol ba 'debs so/ /sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba dang mchog tu mthar phyin
266b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la dgod pa'i slang du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o/ /bdag bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi bar du rdo rje'i theg pa la brten par bgyi'o/ /zhes bya ba
266b6(rgyud 'grel): ste/ de rnams kyis byin gyis rlabs par bsam zhing/ oM badzra satwa sa ma ya ma nu pA la ya/ badzra satwa dwe no pa tiSh+Thi dri Dho me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo mai b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+hiM me pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma su tsaM me
266b7(rgyud 'grel): tsit+taM sh+re ya(rgyud 'grel): ku ru hUM ha ha ha ha ho:/ b+ha ga ban sarba ta thA ga ta badzra mA me muny+tsa badzra b+ha ba mahA sa ma ya satwa a(rgyud 'grel): /zhes brjod do/ /mi snang bar gyur pa dang/ mchod par bya ba dang/ mchod pa byed pa dang/ mchod pa po dbyer med par bsam
267a1(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o/ /de nas sems can thams cad lha'i bde ba la nye bar sbyar ba'i rnam par byams pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang sdug bsngal gyi rgyu dang bral bar bya ba'i rnam pa snying rje dang/ lha'i bde ba dang 'khor ba ji srid bar mi
267a2(rgyud 'grel): 'bral bar bya ba'i rnam par dga' ba dang/ nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po lam la nye bar sbyar ba bya ba'i rnam pa btang snyoms bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa yang dag pa ma yin pa'i
267a3(rgyud 'grel): kun tu rtog pa tsam sgyu ma lta bu'o zhes nges par byas la/ oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha:sarba d+harmA:swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho haM/ zhes brjod do/ /sa bon gyi ni brtan g.yo sbyangs/ /thig le sngags kyi dmigs pa med/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko
267a4(rgyud 'grel): haM/ chos thams cad ni rab tu gnas pa med pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bston ka'i nyi ma gung gi nam mkha' dri ma med pa lta bur snang ba med pa'o/ /de nas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin las der yi ge e yongs su gyur pa las chos 'byung gi
267a5(rgyud 'grel): gzugs ston ka'i ri bong can ltar dkar ba/ rdo rje chang chen po'i ngo bo/ sna tshogs pa'i ngo mtshar chen po'i 'od zer gyi cho gas mngon par 'byung ba/ 'od 'phro ba steng yangs pa zur gsum/ nang stong pa/ de'i dbus su yi ge hUM gi bdag
267a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'i he ru ka'i gzugs su mngon par sprul la/ shar phyogs phugs dang mi mthun dang/ /lugs mthun g.yon mdzub se gol gtogs /oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha huM hUM phaT/ oM grih+na grih+na huM hUM phaT/ oM grih+na
267a7(rgyud 'grel): pa ya grih+na pa ya huM hUM phaT/ oM A na ya ho b+ha ga bAn badzra huM hUM/ ces sngags rkang pa re re brjod pa'i tshe/ sngags de dang de kha dog dmar po 'bar ba yig 'bru che ba phyogs dang de dang der kha nas 'bros pas/ sngags de dang de

267b2(rgyud 'grel): man chad zur gsum stod ni rab 'dra thogs/ /g.yas pa tho ba can rnams rang rang phyogs su spro bar bya/ /de dag gis ni bgegs rnams shin tu thag ring bskrad par bsam/ /de nas sngags de dag las grub pa'i rdo rje'i ra ba gru bzhi pa rab

269a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi yi ge bcu drug nyis 'gyur las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor me lta bu'i ye shes kyi ngo bo/ de'i steng du ka la sogs pa'i gsal byed sum cu rtsa bzhi Da Dha da d+ha ya la bsnan pa bzhi bcu gnyis 'gyur yongs su gyur pa las nyi

270a6(rgyud 'grel): dur khrod pa dang phyag dar khrod/ /phying ba pa dang gzhi ji bzhin/ /sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis te/ /de rnams rnal 'byor ma rnams dag /mdo yi sde dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad/ /lung du bstan dang tshigs su bcad/ /ched du brjod dang
270a7(rgyud 'grel): gleng gzhi dang/ /rtogs pa brjod dang da ltar 'byung/ /skyes pa rabs dang shin tu rgyas/ /rmad du byung dang gtan la phab/ /gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis kyang/ /rnal 'byor ma yi ngo bo nyid/ /de nas hUM gi 'od zer gyis/ /dam tshig
270b1(rgyud 'grel): gi 'khor lo dang 'dra ba'i ye shes sems dpa' dang/ dbang bskur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ phyi dang gsang ba'i mchod pa byed pa'i lha mo rnams spyan drangs te/ de dag dang lhan cig tu 'ongs pa'i bgegs zhal rnams kyis hUM zhes
270b2(rgyud 'grel): brjod pas bskrad nas/ snying ka'i sa bon gyi 'od zer las byung ba'i mchod yon oM arg+haM pra tIts+tsha swAhA/ zhes bya bas phul la/ dza:hUM baM ho:zhes bya ba dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang/ bcing ba dang mnyes par byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs
270b3(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad bdag la dbang bskur du gsol zhes gsol ba btab pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rin po che'i bum pa bdud rtsi lnga'i khu bas gang bas oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka sa ma ya sh+ri ye hUM zhes gsung zhing dbang bskur ba dang
270b4(rgyud 'grel): chu'i lhag ma las dbul rigs kyi bdag pos rgyas gdab par bya ste/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu la rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la mi bskyod pa'o/ /ma tang gi la sogs pa bzhi la rim pa bzhin du/ rtag pa don grub 'od dpag med dang
270b5(rgyud 'grel): rin chen 'byung/ /ba d+he kI la sogs pa la ni rtag pa dang/ rin chen dbang dang 'od dpag med dang don yod grub/ he ru ka b+ha la sogs pa la yang ma tang gi la sogs pa la rtag pa la sogs pa yin no/ /de nas pi wang ma la sogs pa dang/
270b6(rgyud 'grel): ma tang gi la sogs pa dang/ ma tang gi la sogs pa shin tu mdzes shing yid 'phrog pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod par bya'o/ /de nas lha mo de dag gis legs par bstod pa byas nas/ lha mo de rnams rang rang gi gnas su yud kyis gshegs
270b7(rgyud 'grel): par bsam mo/ /de'i rjes la yi ge hUM las gsang ba'i rdo rje dkar po byA las nor bu dmar po byA ser pos bu ga bkag pa/ yi ge A las phyag rgya'i pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma gsum pa byA las ze 'bru dkar po dyA ser pos bu ga bkag par bsams
271a1(rgyud 'grel): la/ lte ba la sogs pa la snying po la sogs pa yang bkod nas/ oM sh+rI mahA su kha badzra he he ru ru kaM A:hUM hUM phaT swAhA zhes bya bas dga' ba tsam zhig lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba dam pa'i bde bas bdag dang dkyil
271a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bar bcas pa rjes su mnyes par bya'o/ /phyi rol shin tu dga' ba'i bya ba la'ang/ pad+ma rdo rje byin rlabs 'di dag bya/ /mdun du yi ge yaM las rlung dkyil 'khor/ /gzhur snad sngon po mdza' gnyis ba dan ldan/ /de steng yi ge raM las me'i
271a3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor/ /zur gsum nyid la dmar po 'bar bas mtshan/ /de steng a las pad+ma'i snod/ /dum bu gcig pa nang dmar po/ /de'i nang du shar nas brtsams te dbus kyi bar du oM khaM AM trAM hUM/ dkar po dang ljang gu dang dmar po dang ser po
271a4(rgyud 'grel): dang mthing ka rnams las byung ba'i bsam pa'i sman dang sha chen po dang/ byang chub kyi sems dang rang byung gi me tog dang/ rdo rje'i chu rnams la slar yi ge de dag nyid kyis mtshan pa dang/ me dang bden bral rlung dang dbang ldan gyis phyogs su lAM
271a5(rgyud 'grel): mAM pAM tAM dkar dang sngo dang dmar dang ljang/ ba lang khyi dang glang po che dang/ rta'i sgron ma dang/ sa bon de dag nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /de nas rlung gis me sbar bas/ /de dag thams cad khu bar gyur pa/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar
271a6(rgyud 'grel): dmar por 'bar ba snang ba de'i steng du yi ge hUM dkar po yongs su gyur pa las kha TwAM ga dkar po mgo thur du bstan pa byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin der lhung bas/ bdud rtsi de shin tu mdog dkar po bsil ba'i rnam par gyur par blta'o/ /de
271a7(rgyud 'grel): nas A li dang kA li thog mar oM dang mdza' mar hUM hUM phaT dang bcas pa brjod pas/ yi ge de dag nyid kha dog sna tshogs pa bdud rtsi'i steng du gnas par bltas la/ slar yang yi ge de dag nyid oM A:hUM zhes pa'i yi ge gsum dkar po
271b1(rgyud 'grel): dang dmar po dang mthing ka'i kha dog can gong nas gong du gnas par gyur bar bltas te/ de dag las 'od zer gyi tshogs dpag tu med pa 'phros pas phyogs bcu'i nam mkha' i mthas gtugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs
271b2(rgyud 'grel): ka'i sa bon gyi cha las/ ye shes kyi bdud rtsi bkug ste yi ge gsum la bsdus pa dang/ yi ge gsum yang rim pa bzhin du bdud rtsir lhung bas/ de dag ro gcig tu gyur pa'i bdud rtsi'i mchog tu bltas nas/ yi ge gsum gyis lan
271b3(rgyud 'grel): gsum byin gyis brlabs la/ bcom ldan 'das dang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi lce la yi ge hUM las byung rdo rje rtse gsum pa/ /dkar po nas 'bru tsam bkod de/ /de yi 'od kyi spu gus drangs/ /bdud rtsi gsol bas mchog tshim blta/ /rig sngags
271b4(rgyud 'grel): bzlas brjod pas 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /zhes gsungs pa'i phyir bzlas brjod bya ste/ de ni rdo rje'i bzlas pa dang/ bzlas brjod bya ba'i gsang sngags kyi yi ge gang dag yin pa rnams/ rang gi thugs ka'i sa bon las 'og nas byung ba rang
271b5(rgyud 'grel): gi rdo rje'i rtse mo nas phyag rgya'i b+ha gar bton nas/ yang lha mo'i zhal nas rang gi zhal du zhugs pa rang gi sa bon la zhugs par blta zhing/ zhal thams cad dang rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyis kyang sngags zlos par bsgom par bya ste/ khro bo'i bzlas
271b6(rgyud 'grel): pa yang bya'o/ /rim pa 'dis bzlas brjod kyi nyes pa dang bral bar sems mnyam par bzhag pas ji srid skyo bar ma gyur gyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de la bzlas brjod kyi sngags ni 'di dag yin te/ oM sh+rI badzra he he ru ru ke huM hUM phaT DA nI dzA la
271b7(rgyud 'grel): sam+ba raM swAhA/ oM h+ri:ha ha huM hUM phaT/ lha'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM sarba bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye badzra bar+N+Na nI ye huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra bai ro tsa nI ye huM hUM phaT swAhA/ lha mo'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM mA taM gi huM hUM phaT/ oM Dom+bi
272a1(rgyud 'grel): nI huM hUM phaT/ oM rA dza kI huM hUM phaT/ oM puk+ka sI huM hUM phaT/ oM ba d+ha kI huM hUM phaT/ oM sa ha tsa rI huM hUM phaT/ oM pu d+hi tsa rI huM hUM phaT/ oM sha ba rI huM hUM phaT/ oM he ru ka b+ha huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra tsaN+Da lI huM hUM phaT/
272a2(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra rAk+Sha sI huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra b+hai ra bI huM hUM phaT/ dpa' bo'i sngags so/ /oM na mo b+ha ga wa te wa re sha ya/ mahA kalpA gni saM ni b+hA ya/ dza TA ma ku Tatko TA ya/ daMSh+TA ka rA lo gra b+hI Sha Na mu khA ya/ sa ha sra d+hu dza b+hA su rA ya/ pa ra shu pA sho dya ta shU
272a3(rgyud 'grel): la kha TwAM ga d+hA ri Ne/ byA g+h+ra tri nam+ba ra d+ha rA ya/ mahA d+humprA nd+ha ka ra wa pu nA ya/ ka ra ka ra ku ru ku ru/ band+ha band+ha/ tra sa ya tra sa ya/ k+Sho b+ha ya k+Sho b+ha ya/ hoM hoM/ h+ra:h+ra:pheM pheM/ phaT phaT/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha/ ba sa ru d+hi rAn+t+ra mA lA
272a4(rgyud 'grel): ba laM baM ne/ grih+na grih+na/ sapta pA tA la ga ta b+hu dzaM gaM sarba bA tardza ya tardza ya/ A kaDDhya A kaDDhya h+riM h+riM/ dz+nyauM dz+nyauM/ k+Sh+nAM k+Sh+nAM/ hAM hAM/ hIM hIM/ hUM hUM/ ki li ki li/ si li si li/ hi li hi li/ d+hi li d+hi li/ hUM hUM phaT/ phreng ba'i sngags so/ /oM sh+rI tsit+ta DA
272a5(rgyud 'grel): ko b+h+ra ka a khaM huM hUM phaT/ DA ki nI dzA la sam+ba raM swAhA/ oM sh+rI bA ka DA ka A ro li ka DA ki nI dzA la saM ba raM huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM sh+rI kA ya DA ki nI dzA la saM pa raM ru lu b+h+ruM huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM sh+rI ratna DA kA ya DA kA oM A:hUM DA ki nI dzA la saM pa raM huM hUM
272a6(rgyud 'grel): phaT swAhA/ oM sh+rI karma DA ka a khaM hUM Da ki nI dzA la saM pa raM huM hUM phaT swAhA/ gtso bo lnga'i sngags so/ /gang tshe bzlas pas skyo bar gyur pa na/ /sa bon 'od kyis shes rab bdag po dang/ /'khor lo pa dang khang pa brtsegs ma rnams/ /snang bar byas te
272a7(rgyud 'grel): 'od gyur rim bzhin bsdu/ /hUM de yongs su gyur las bdag nyid ni/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis g.yas brkyang gom pas gnas/ /lang tsho gzhon pa 'gying bag mtshan dang ldan/ /phyag rgya drug ldan dril bu rdo rje 'chang/ /de nas yongs su bsngo ba dang smon
272b1(rgyud 'grel): lam gdab pa dang/ yi ge brgya pa brjod pa yang/ byas la lha'i nga rgyal gyis gnas par bya'o/ /gung dang phyi dro'i thun mtshams su/ /bsam gtan khang par snyan bder 'dug /bdag nyid 'od zer du gyur pa/ /hUM du byas te yongs gyur las/ /bcom ldan
272b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo bde mchog gi /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo lha bcu bzhi/ /khang rtsegs rin chen tshogs las grub/ /dur khrod brgyad bskor gsal dmigs nas/ /dbang bskur ba la sogs pa cho ga thams cad bya'o/ /thun tha mal ni sngar bstan pa'i cho ga
272b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad spyad la/ bzlas brjod kyi rjes la hUM gi 'od zer gyis thams cad 'od du gyur pa bdag la bsdus la/ bdag dang phag mo yang 'od du gyur snying ga'i shes rab rab gyur yab yum la/ de yang snying ga'i nyi ma dang bcas pa'i hUM la bsdu zhing/ 
272b4(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma dang a'u dang ha dang zla tshes dang/ thig le dang nA da'i bar du bsdus la nA da yang dmigs pa med par byas la nyal lo/ /nang par gyi dus su rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i glus bskul bas sad par mos par byas la/ cho ga thams cad nyi ma snga ma bzhin du
272b5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /hUM sngon rdo rje las byung ba/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo bde mchog ni/ /dbang bskur bdag po mi bskyod rgya/ /gzhan ma rnams ni sngar bzhin du/ /oM dmar pad+ma las byung ba/ /gsung gi 'khor lo bde mchog ni/ /dmar po g.yon sngo pad+ma bsnams/ /
272b6(rgyud 'grel): dbang bdag 'od rgya gzhan sngar bzhin/ /khaM ljang sna tshogs rdo rje las byung ba/ /'phrin las 'khor lo bde mchog ni/ /ljang gu steng sngo sna tshogs bsnams/ /dbang bdag don brgya gzhan sngar bzhin/ /de ltar gus pa dang bcas pas rgyun mi 'chad par
272b7(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms pas sems brtan par gyur pa dang/ rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bya'o/ /rnal 'byor chen po ngal bso ba/ /A li kA li mdun bsams nas/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor las rdzogs pa/ /lte ba'i dbus su gnas pa bsgom/ 
273a1(rgyud 'grel): de'i dbus su gnas pa yi/ /yi ge dam pa'i gnas bsgom bya/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /lha yi gzugs su bsgom par bya/ /de ni gzugs las 'das gyur pa/ /sems nyid du yang bsgom mi bya/ /bsam bya
273a2(rgyud 'grel): min par bsam de yang/ /sems nyid du ni mtshon pa min/ /de yang bsam bya min bsam bya/ /de las gzugs ni thob par 'gyur/ /dang po ri dags sred bzhin snang ba ste/ /mtshan ma gnyis pa dud ka'i rnam pa can/ /gsum pa srin
273a3(rgyud 'grel): bu me khyer dang 'dra ba/ /bzhi pa sgron me 'bar ba lta bu gsal/ /mtshan ma lnga pa rnam par ma brtags par/ /sprin bral nam mkha' lta bur snang ba yin/ /de lta bu yi mtshan ma thob nas ni/ /phyag rgya chen po thob par gyur pa yin/ /sh+rI ni gnyis
273a4(rgyud 'grel): med ye shes la/ /he ni rgya sogs stong pa nyid/ /ru ni rtog pa dang bral ba/ /ka ni gang na'ang mi gnas pa'o/ /sems ni ngal bso rnal 'byor pa/ /mya ngan 'das pa bstan ma min/ /rnal 'byor ba rnams 'pho tshe dpal/ /khrag 'thung dpal
273a5(rgyud 'grel): sogs rnal 'byor ma/ /me tog sna tshogs lag na thogs/ /rgyal mtshan ba dan sna tshogs dang/ /rol mo'i sgra ni sna tshogs dang/ /glu yi mchod pa sna tshogs kyis/ /mkha' spyod gnas su khrid par byed/ /'chi ba zhes 'di rnam rtog yin/ /de
273a6(rgyud 'grel): ltar rje btsun he ru ka'i/ /sgrub thabs gsal bar byas pa las/ /dge ba thob pa gang yin des/ /'gro kun rdo rje 'dzin gyur cig /bcom ldan 'das dpal 'khor lo bde mchog gi sgrub thabs/ rin po che gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba/
273a7(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon chen po la pa ba'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta chen po su ma ti kIrti dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba mkhas pa chen po mang ba chos kyi dbang phyug gis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan
273b1(rgyud 'grel): la phab pa/ //*/ (/dpal bde mchog gi dkyil 'khor bzhugs//) //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI tsakra sam+ba ra maN+Da lo bi ka ra tan+t+ra dI pe dyo ta nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal 'khor lo bde mchog gi dkyil 'khor gyi cho
273b2(rgyud 'grel): ga rin po che rab tu gsal po'i sgron ma zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sdang dang bdud rnams tshar bcad chags can rjes gzung phyir/ /ma rungs 'jigs pa'i sku dang phyag rgya la 'khyud pa/ /thugs rje chen
273b3(rgyud 'grel): po'i rol pas gzhal gyi don 'jug pa/ /bcom ldan 'khor lo bde mchog khyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'khor lo sdom pa'i dkyil 'khor cho ga ni/ /gsungs shing mkhas pa'i mdzad pa yod mod kyi/ /slob ma gus pas mang du gsol btab pas/
273b4(rgyud 'grel): tshul bzhin de nyid gsal bar bshad par bya/ /slob dpon bstan bcos kun shes shing/ /tshul khrims ldan zhing snying rje'i bdag /drang zhing bzod la gtsang sgra can/ /dad dang dran ldan snying stobs can/ /smra mkhas mi 'jigs sran thub pa/ /smu
273b5(rgyud 'grel): rtsal dag la mkhas shing gsal/ /mdzes dang ldan pa de bzhin du/ /gus ldan dul la khong bzo ba/ /rtag tu dam pa'i chos la dga' / /theg pa che la mos pa can/ /gsang sngags spyod pa la bslabs shing/ /dkyil 'khor dag gi bye brag shes/
273b6(rgyud 'grel): slob ma dag gi tshul shes shing/ /de bzhin sngags dang rgyud kyang 'dzin/ /rjes su gnang zhing dbang bskur la/ /cho ga shes bzlas brjod lhur len pa/ /slob dpon rig la bsnyen bkur byas/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad khong du chud/ /gsang sngags
273b7(rgyud 'grel): kun dang bla ma dang/ /de bzhin glo bur mgron mchod byed/ /phyag rgya la sogs bcing ba dang/ /dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las rnams dang/ /gsang sngags mchod pa'i spyod pa la/ /slob dpon gyis ni mkhas par bya/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i ji skad
274a1(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ bdag nyid dngos grub kyi phyed du 'am/ 'jam zhing snyan par smra ba dang/ /snying rje la sogs phan sems ldan/ /thos dang klog la sogs la brtson/ /gsang ba'i
274a2(rgyud 'grel): chos la lhag par dang/ /rtag par rgyun tu bla ma gus/ /slob mas me tog yongs su bzung/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa gzhan gyis lan gsum du gsol ba 'debs pa de rjes su bzung ba'i phyir yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas gang
274a3(rgyud 'grel): yang rung bar dpal 'khor lo bde mchog gi rnal 'byor dang ldan pa/ 'khor lo'i bdag po'i 'bum bzlas shing/ /dkyil 'khor ba yi de bzhin khri/ /zhes ji skad gsungs pa bzhin du bzlas brjod byas pas/ lha'i mtshan ma thob pa 'am/ rang gi
274a4(rgyud 'grel): sems dag cing brtan par gyur par bya ste/ sngon du bsnyen pa'o/ /de nas sgrub par bya ste/ de yang sa'i phyogs kyi mtshan nyid ni/ sa gzhi ci 'dra bzang ba dang/ /mi bzad ba dag bsgrags pa ni/ /rab tu brtags te spang dang blang/ /mtho dman can
274a5(rgyud 'grel): dang tshe ram can/ /gyo mo'i dum bu can dag dang/ /dam grog rus pa sdong dum khung/ /grog mkhar thal ba tshwa sgo can/ /gseg ma rdo dang rdul dang skra/ /srin bu grog spur la sogs mang/ /de lta bu yi sa gzhi ni/ /mkhas pas las rnams kun la
274a6(rgyud 'grel): spangs/ /mtho dma' snyoms shing gtsang la snum/ /zug rngu'i nyes pa rnam par spangs/ /shar dang byang du gzhol ba yi/ /sa gzhi las rnams kun la shis/ /dkyil 'khor sa ni gang dag gis/ /nye 'khor dag tu chu mod pa/ /des ni shis shing dngos
274a7(rgyud 'grel): grub thob/ /chu dkon pas ni mkhas pas smad/ /ljon shing bzang pos brgyan pa dang/ /bdag gi mig yid mgul ba dang/ /'tshe med zug rngu spangs pa ni/ /dkyil 'khor gnas su shes pa ste/ /mi yis dngos grub kun 'thob byed/ /de bas sgrub po
274b1(rgyud 'grel): der gnas bya/ /bcom ldan 'khor lo bde mchog la/ /mchod phyir sna tshogs rin chen 'dzin/ /lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur/ /phyis 'dir dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /dang po pus nub tsam brkos nas/ /sa de nyid kyis dgang bar bya/ /gal te lhag
274b2(rgyud 'grel): par gyur pa ni/ /dngos grub dag ni yod par bshad/ /de las bzlog par gyur na ni/ /sgrub pa po yis las mi brtsam/ /brtsams na sdug bsngal myor 'gyur zhing/ /legs pa dag kyang mi 'thob bo/ /zug rngu'i nyes pa thams cad ni/ /gal te
274b3(rgyud 'grel): dbyung bar mi nus na/ /der ni gsang sngags kho na yis/ /sbyar ba legs par byas par 'gyur/ /drang srong gnas dang ba lang lhas/ /phag dang ri yi rtse mo dang/ /sa gzhi gang na 'thas pa dang/ /thog steng dang ni rdo leb dang/ /mchod rten drung dang 'bab
274b4(rgyud 'grel): chu'i gling/ /mtsho rnams kyi ni 'gram ngag tu/ /sa gzhi sbyang zhing brtags pa dang/ /nan tan du ni bya mi dgos/ /'thas par bcags kyang der mi dgos/ /mtho dma' la sogs skyon rnams kyang/ /der ni dogs pa skye mi dgos/ /rang bzhin yon tan
274b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa'i phyir/ /rang bzhin gnas pa'i sa gzhi la/ /byi dor legs par byas nas su/ /lag pas reg cing gsang sngags bzlas/ /de yi sbyang ba de yin no/ /snang bar gyur pa'i las rnams dang/ /gdon rnams tshar gcod la sogs dang/ /drag shul
274b6(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa dag la ni/ /sa ni brtag par bya mi dgos/ /stegs bu ni khru gang nas bcu drug gi bar du ste/ /shar dang byang du gzhol ba ni/ /sngags pa rnams kyi dngos grub 'grub/ /dbus su mtho ba rgyal srid dam/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i sa dag thob/ /byang
274b7(rgyud 'grel): mtho 'chi 'am nor 'joms 'gyur/ /shar mtho myur du rigs rnams mdzad/ /dbus dma' sgrub po 'jigs par byed/ /de bas dam tshig rab ldan bya/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa yid dang mthun cing nyams dga' ba'i gnas/ /dkyil 'khor gyis legs
275a1(rgyud 'grel): par 'dus byas la/ mchod pa'i yo byad sna tshogs pa dang grogs dang bcas par bdag nyid khrus byas shing dri zhim pos byugs pa rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pas gtor ma byin nas/ 'dod pa lha'i rnal 'byor gyis
275a2(rgyud 'grel): oM b+hu khaM zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis sa gzhi nam mkha' i rang bzhin du byas la/ hUM laM hUM zhes bya bas rdo rje'i bdag nyid kyi nor 'dzin byin gyis rlab par bya'o/ /de nas dri zhim pas byugs la me tog chal par bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du
275a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dug ste/ rgyal ba rnams la gsol ba 'debs pa/ ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yi/ /mgon pos bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /rdo rje 'chang chen che ge mo/ /bdag ni dkyil 'khor 'dri bar byed/ /bdag gi bsgrub bya grub bya'i phyir/ /dkyil
275a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ /zhes brjod do/ /bdag nyid ngo bo nyid dag pa'i dkyil 'khor bde mchog gi gzugs rdo rje dang dril bus lag pa brel cing 'gying ba la/ rnal 'byor ma lo bcu gnyis lon pa'i na tshod bzhi phyogs kyi lha mo
275a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhi rang rgyal byas la/ rnal 'byor gyi bya ba ci la goms pa'i lha mo de rnams kyis tshigs su bcad par re res gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhib/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /chos kun bdag med pa yi
275a6(rgyud 'grel): mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bstan du gsol/ /mtshan nyid dam pa yongs su rdzogs/ /mtshan min thams cad yongs su spangs/ /kun tu bzang po sku yi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bstan du gsol/ /zhi pa'i chos mchog las byung ba//
275a7(rgyud 'grel): ye shes spyod pa rnam par mdzad/ /kun tu bzang po gsung gi mchog /ye shes dam pa bstan du gsol/ /sems can kun gyi sems chen po/ /rang bzhin dag cing dri ma med/ /kun tu bzang po thugs kyi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bstan
275b1(rgyud 'grel): du gsol/ /de rnams kyis gsol ba 'debs par rig nas/ de nas rdo rje dang bcas pa'i sor mo sa la bsnun pas/ sa'i lha mo mdog ser brgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ lus kyi phyed phyung ba/ g.yas pa dam 'cha' ba khab len pa lta bu'i lag
275b2(rgyud 'grel): pa g.yon pa bum pa 'dzin pa de spyan drangs la/ me tog dri zhim po sna tshogs pas mchod nas lhag par gnas pa bya ste/ skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par ni/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ /lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur//
275b3(rgyud 'grel): skyob pa shAkya seng+ge yis/ /ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa/ /de bzhin bdag gis bdud las ni/ /rgyal bar bya phyir dkyil 'khor bri/ /de nas de nyid du thim par bsam mo/ /de dag ni sa lhag par gnas pa'o/ /de'i rjes la sems can gyi khams ma
275b4(rgyud 'grel): lus pa 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pas rnam par khrugs par bltas la/ nyon mongs pa rnams la khros te/ yi ge ma las mig g.yon par zla ba/ Ta las mig g.yas par nyi ma ste/ phyogs thams cad las 'bar bar byed cing
275b5(rgyud 'grel): khams gsum la blta ba'i rnal 'byor pas rkang pa'i 'og tu rdo rje 'bar ba bsgom zhing/ rdo rje gsor bar brtson pa dril bu dkrol zhing 'gying bas/ hUM zhes mgrin pa'i sgra sgrog cing bgegs kyi tshogs dang lha la sogs pa'i sdang ba ma lus pa bskrad
275b6(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM lus ngag sems la gnas pa yi/ /bgegs kyi tshogs kun da la nyon/ /da ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang/ /bsrung ba'i 'khor lo rab sbyor byed/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i lus kyis ni/ /lus gsum las skyes dgas par bya/ /gal te
275b7(rgyud 'grel): nga las 'gal 'das na/ /de dag shigs bya gzhan du smin/ /rdo rje'i gnas su 'khor lo dang rin po che dang pad+ma dang ral gri la sogs pa bcug la brjod par bya'o/ /rdo rje'i gom pas gar byed cing 'khor lo yongs su bskor ro/ /bskal pa'i me lta bu'i 'od
276a1(rgyud 'grel): zer rkang pa nas khyud? nas gdug pa rnams bsregs te phan tshun bros par bsam mo/ /mthun pa'i stang stabs g.yas g.yon brkyang/ /zlum bu sa ga gyen du 'degs/ /thur du skyod dang thang logs bskyod/ /gom brgyad
276a2(rgyud 'grel): g.yas g.yon skor gang bya'o/ /de ma thab tu bgegs med par bya ba'i phyir phur bus gdab par bya'o/ /de yang shar sogs lugs dang mi mthun dang/ lugs mthun g.yon mdzub se gol gtogs/ /oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha huM huM phaT/ oM grih+Na
276a3(rgyud 'grel): grih+Na huM huM phaT/ oM grih+NA pa ya grih+NA pa huM huM phaT/ oM A na ya ho b+ha ga bAn badzra rA dza huM huM phaT/ ces rkang pa re re brjod pa'i tshe/ sngags de dang de kha dog dmar po 'bar ba yig 'bru che ba phyogs de dang me kha nas 'phros pa/ sngags de dang 'phros
276a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lha mo khwa gdong ma la sogs pa zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ kha dog dmar mo cher 'bar zhing zhabs 'og gis gzhi la bzhag /tshangs pa'i gnas la dbu thug pa rab tu che zhing gzugs rags pa/ phyag g.yon lte ba man chad zur gsum
276a5(rgyud 'grel): stod ni rang 'dra thogs/ g.yas pa tho ba can rnams rang rang phyogs su spro ba bya/ de dag gis ni bgegs rnams shin tu thag ring bar bskrad par bsam de nas sngags de dag las grub pa'i rdo rje'i ra ba gru bzhi pa rab tu 'bar brgyar sgrub pa po ji tsam
276a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa bsam la/ oM badzra prA kA ra hUM baM hUM/ zhes pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab po/ /de nas rdo rje'i ra ba de las/ 'od zer rab tu 'bar ba'i tshogs/ /'phos pas dbus su yi ge hUM/ /las sgrub sna tshogs rdo rje bsam/ /de las rdo rje'i
276a7(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin gyis/ /'od zer 'bar ba 'phros pas 'og du sa 'og gi gzhi la thug par sna tshogs rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyis sar byas la/ oM me di ni badzri b+ha ba band+ha hUM zhes byin gyis brlab bo/ /de bzhin du sa dang ra ba las 'phros pas gur ro/ /gur
276b1(rgyud 'grel): las bla bre'o/ /bla bre las mda'i dra ba zhes bya ba phyi rol du stang dang logs kun tu khyab par bsam zhing/ de dag tu oM badzra prA kA ra hUM baM hUM/ oM badzra bi dA na hUM khaM hUM/ oM badzra sa ra dzA la trAM saM trAM zhes bya bas byin gyis brlab bo/ /khwa gdong ma la song
276b2(rgyud 'grel): pa brgyad ni phyi rol du/ /ba bltas 'khos pa rnams kyi mdun du hUM/ ring po brgyad bltas de yongs su gyur pa las/ dang po kha khyer phan tshun sprad brgyad bsam/ de nas khwa gdong ma la sogs pa 'od zer rab tu 'bar ba'i tshogs rnams kyi bgegs
276b3(rgyud 'grel): bos pa rnams dong du chud cing/ de dag gi pha rol nas bgegs bros pa rnams 'od zer 'bar ba lcags kyu'i rnam pas drangs shir dong? du bcug pa dang/ khwa gdong ma la sogs pa dong gi drung na 'khod pa rnams la bdag nyid khro bo'i lta ba dang bcas
276b4(rgyud 'grel): pas/ oM g+ha:g+ha:g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya sarbba duSh+TAM hUM hUM phaT kI la kI la ya sarbba pA paM huM hUM phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badzra kI la ya badzra d+ha rod Adz+nyA pa ya ti kA ya wAk+tsit+ta badzra kI la ya hUM phaT/ zhes bya ba brjod de phur bu tshugs shig par bka' bsgo bas bgegs
276b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi spyi bor phur pa btsugs pa dang/ oM badzra mung+ga ra badzra kI la ya A ko Ta ya hUM phaT/ zhes brjod pas de dag gi rdo rje tho bas phur pa brdungs te/ bgegs rnams la phur ba btab pas bgegs rnams rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par byas
276b6(rgyud 'grel): nas khwa gdong ma la sogs pa rnams 'od 'bar ba'i tshogs su gyur de/ mda'i dra ba la thim ma thag du chu la brdabs pa'i tshul du slar phyir 'phros pas rdo rje'i ra ba zlum por gyur par bsam la/ oM badzra prA kA ra hUM/ zhes bya bas byin gyis brlab bo/ /
276b7(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du de las 'od zer 'phros pas pad+ma'i dra ba/ de las 'khor lo'i ra ba/ de las rdo rje me 'bar ba steng dang logs kun tu khyab pa/ g.yon bskor du 'khyil zhing 'bar bar bsams te/ de bzhin du oM pad+ma prA kA ra hUM phaT oM tsakra prA kA ra hUM/
277a1(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra dzwa la a na lArga hUM hUM hUM/ zhes so so'i sngags kyi byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de dag ni sa yongs su bzung ba'o/ /de nas yid dang mthun cing gyi dor la sogs pa legs par byas pa'i sa'i chad bum pa rnams lhag
277a2(rgyud 'grel): par gnas par bya ste/ de yang gser la sogs pa las grub pa'am/ sa'i rang bzhin nag po dang/ rtsa ba med pa mchu 'phyang ba/ mgrin pa mtho ba lto che ba rnams/ legs par bkrus shing rdo rgyus byugs/ gu gul la sogs pas
277a3(rgyud 'grel): bdags nas/ rnam rgyal bum par sna tshogs pa/ /lte bar bdag po'i mtshan rtags bri/ /dkyil 'khor gzhan gyi bum pa rnams/ /rang rang mtshan mas mtshon par bya/ /'on kyang las thams cad bum pa las kyi lha'i mtshan mas
277a4(rgyud 'grel): mtshon pa/ mgrin pa ras zung gis dkris pa/ gser dang dngul dang mu men dang mu rig dang byu ru dang/ nas dang gro dang til dang 'bras dang so ba dang mon sran rde'u dang/ bri ha ti dang kanTa ka ri dang/ a pa rA dzi ta dkar po dang/ daN+Dotpal
277a5(rgyud 'grel): dkar po dang/ ha sa de ba rnams dang ldan pa/ chu gtsang srog chags med pa legs par blangs la/ bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pas ngan par bkad ba/ shing ha sa ka ra la sogs pa 'bras bu dang bcas shing 'dab ma dang ldan pas kha brgyan pa/
277a6(rgyud 'grel): de dag las 'dren pa'i bum pa ni dbus su ste/ gzhan go rim ji bzhin du bzhag la/ de dang de'i steng du mchod yon gyi snod dri zhim po'i chu me tog dkar po dang bcas pa bzhag ste/ de'i steng du me tog gi phreng ba bcings pa'i rdo rje bzhag la/ de
277a7(rgyud 'grel): nas snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drangs la/ mchod yon la sogs pa phul nas/ dam tshig gi 'khor lo dang gcig tu byas te mchod pa byas la/ de dang de'i sngags rnams kyis brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par/
277b1(rgyud 'grel): sngags pa byas la/ me tog dkar po dang bcas pa'i mchod yon bum par phul bas/ dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po 'dod chags chen pos de'i nang du zhu bar bsam/ 'khor lo'i de dag de nyid du ye shes kyi chu'i rnam par gyur par blta'o/ /de nas mi bskyod
277b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje ye shes che/ /rdo rje dbyings ni mkhas chen po/ /rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rnam par snang mdzad dag pa che/ /rdo rje zhi ba dgyes ba che/ /rang bzhin 'od gsal mchog gi mchog /'khor lo mkha' 
277b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rin chen rgyal por rab tu bzang/ /rdo rje nam mkha' dri ma med/ /rang bzhin dag pa gos pa med/ /rin chen mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rdo rje dpag med rgyal po che/ /mi rtog nam mkha' rdo rje 'dzin/ /'dod chags pha rol phyin ma
277b4(rgyud 'grel): brnyes/ /pad+ma mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal bstod/ /don yod rdo rje rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa/ /dag pa'i ngo bo nyid las byung/ /sna tshogs mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal bstod/ /ces bstod pa bya zhing dril bu dkrol bar bya'o/ /de dag
277b5(rgyud 'grel): ni bum ba lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa'i sgor rigs dang gzugs dang lang tsho dang dad pa dang thos pa dang/ gtong ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa/ sngags kyi tshul gyi skal pa can/ nga rgyal la sogs pa'i skyon mdza' dag
277b6(rgyud 'grel): dang bral ba/ don du gnyer ba'i slob ma rnams dang/ gzhan yang yon tan med pa rnams kyang dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song ba/ byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa/ khrus byas de yon phul ba/ maN+Dal byas shing me tog thogs pa/ phyag
277b7(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal nas pus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs pa/ thal mo sbyar nas gsol ba btab pa/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la brten pa rnams la/ chos bshad pas spro ba bskyed par bya ste/ rang gis bslab dang ldan pa'i 'khor/ /gzhi pa rjes su snang ba dang/ /
278a1(rgyud 'grel): theg chen blo la yang dag pa'i/ /cho ga de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/ /gsang sngags dngos grub don gnyer gang/ /bsod nams 'dod pa de bzhin gzhan/ /'jig rten pha rol la gzhol ba/ /kha cig dkyil 'khor 'dir
278a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jug byed/ /'jig rten ba zhan don 'dod pa yi/ /blo bzang dad pa cher byas 'jug /'jig rten 'di pa'i 'bras spangs nas/ /'jig rten gzhan don la dmigs na/ /'bad pa med par 'di 'bras 'grub/ /'di las 'jig rten gzhan gyi min/ /
278a3(rgyud 'grel): de phyir 'jig rten gzhan dag gi /dngos grub don du yid rten gyis/ /zhes de dag bsgrags nas/ de rnams kyang blos rang gi lus la bcug ste/ rdo rje dang pad+ma dag par byas nas/ he ru ka zhal gcig phyag gnyis bar dmigs te/ gsol ba gdab
278a4(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o/ /rnal 'byor ma dang zhal sbyor bzhugs/ /dga' chen khyod dag ston pa'i rgyal/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de nyid bdag la rtsol/ /byang chub sems kyang bdag la rtsol/ /sangs rgyas chos
278a5(rgyud 'grel): dang dge 'dun te/ /skyabs gsum pa ni bdag la stsol/ /thar chen mchog gi pho brang du/ /mgon po bdag ni gzhug tu gsol/ /zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di brjod nas/ gus pa dang ldan pa'i slob ma rnams las gcig gtso bor byas la/
278a6(rgyud 'grel): bu tshur theg pa chen po yi/ /tshul chen snod ni khyod yin pas/ /gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga ni/ /khyod la yang dag bstan par bya/ /sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje can/ /sangs rgyas dus gsum 'byung ba rnams/ /rdo rje gsang sngags rab bsgoms
278a7(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /ye shes mnyam med yang dag brnyes/ /shAkya seng ge sogs mchog gis/ /gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med pas/ /drag po chen po bdud kyi sde/ /stobs chen dag kyang de yis bcom/ /'jig rten rjes 'jug mkhyen nas ni/ /'khor lo
278b1(rgyud 'grel): bskor nas mya ngan 'das/ /de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir/ /bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig /ces brjod de bstan par bya'o/ /yang slob mas dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi/ /sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags/ /'gro ba'i bsod nams
278b2(rgyud 'grel): rjes yi rang/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yid la bzhag /ces brjod pas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnams dran par bya'o/ /de dag ni dbang bskur ba lnga 'dod pa la sogs pa'i slob ma'i thun mong gi sdom pa'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyi sdom pa 'dzin pa 'dod
278b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i slob mas slob dpon gyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas thal mo khong steng du sbyar bas/ 'khor lo mi ldog dbang bskur mchog /stsal nas mgon po bdag la ni/ /'khor lo lha yi de nyid dang/ /slob dpon gyi ni las rnams dang/ /sangs rgyas
278b4(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi dam tshig gi /sdom pa gsang ba bla med pa/ /rtag tu sems can kun don phyir/ /slob dpon du 'gyur bdag la gsungs zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /de nas gsol ba btab pa'i bla mas rigs thams cad la
278b5(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ che ge mo zhes bya ba 'di/ /byang chub sems ni yongs 'dzin cing/ /dam tshig sdom dang gsang ba yi/ /'khor lo 'dir yang bzhugs par 'tshal/ /zhes so/ /de nas slob dpon gyis brjod par bya ba ni/ dus gsum
278b6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /gsang ba chen po'i rigs dag pa'i/ /gsang ba yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ /bdag nyid chen po khyod 'dod dam/ /nges kyang bdag ni rab tu de 'tshal lo/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas bla mas brjod par bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas
278b7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rin po che/ /pad+ma las kyi rigs mchog gi /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du so sor bzung/ /rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi yang/ /phas pham pa bzhi dang mi dge bcu/ /rnam par 'khrul par 'chad ltung ba/ /de dag kun tu spang
279a1(rgyud 'grel): bar gyi/ /sems can don min bya min spong/ /dam pa nyer bstan rnal 'byor bskur?/ /theg pa dman la 'dod mi byed/ /sems can don la rgyab phyogs min/ /'khor ba mi spang 'das ma chags/ /lha sogs brnyas min
279a2(rgyud 'grel): rgya mi 'gong/ /'di dag dam tshig ces su bstan/ /sdom brtson khyod kyis bsrung bar gyis/ /de nas slob mas brjod par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i sku/ /slob dpon 'dir ni bdag la gson/ /khyab bdag ji ltar bka' stsal
279a3(rgyud 'grel): pa/ de ltar bdag ni bgyid par 'tshal/ /de nas bla ma'i dag gis 'di/ /sdom pa legs par blang bar bya/ /ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub des mdzad pa'i/ /byang chub sems ni bla na med/ /dam pa bdag gis
279a4(rgyud 'grel): bskyed par bgyi/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa dang/ /dge pa'i chos ni sdud pa dang/ /sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/ /bdag gis brtan por bzung bar bgyi/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /bla na med pa'i dkon  
279a5(rgyud 'grel): mchog gsum/ /deng nas brtsams te bzung bar bgyi/ /nam du yang ni mi spang ngo/ /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang/ /yang dag nyid du bzung bar bgyi/ /slob dpon dag kyang bzung bar bgyi/ /rigs tshan rigs
279a6(rgyud 'grel): mchog chen po ste/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba'i/ /pad+ma rigs chen dag pa la/ /phyi dang gsang ba theg pa yi/ /dam pa'i chos ni bzung
279a7(rgyud 'grel): bar bgyi/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po yi/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan pa ni/ /yang dag nyid du bzung bar bgyi/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/ /bcu bzhi yi ni rab dbye bas/ /rtsa ba'i ltung ba spang bar bgyi/ /gzhan yang yan
279b1(rgyud 'grel): lag ltung ba rnams/ /bdag gis rab tu spang bar bgyi/ /srog chags gsang par mi bgyi zhing/ /ma byin pa yang mi blad do/ /'dod la sogs par mi spyod cing/ /brdzun du smra bar mi bgyi'o/ /lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang/ /dag gi rnam
279b2(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhi dang ni/ /yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag gi /dge ba dag ni bskyang bar bgyi/ /don min kun gyi rtsa ba yi/ /chang 'thung rnam khrul sems dpa' spong/ /sems can gdul don ma gtogs par/ /bya min thams cad spang bar bgyi/ /skyes bu thams cad
279b3(rgyud 'grel): brten bgyi zhing/ /rnal 'byor ba rnams bsnyen bkur bgyi/ /theg pa dman la 'dod pa yang/ /'bad pa yis ni spang bar bgyi/ /ma bsgral ba rnams bdag gi bsgral/ /ma grol ba rnams dgrol bar bgyi/ /dbugs ma byung ba dbugs dbyung zhing//
279b4(rgyud 'grel): sems can mya ngan 'das la dgong/ /'khor ba spang bar mi bgyi zhing/ /mya ngan 'das la chags mi bgyi/ /lha dang lha min gsang ba po/ /gtso bo bdag gis brnyas mi bgyi/ /phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha dang/ /mtshan ma 'goms par mi bgyi'o/
279b5(rgyud 'grel): dus 'di nas ni bzung nas ni/ /byang chub snying por mchis kyi bar/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ /dam pa dag ni bskyed par bgyi/ /sdom pa dag kyang ma lus gzung/ /de dag ni slob dpon gyi sdom pa bzung ba'i
279b6(rgyud 'grel): cho ga'o/ /de nas zhal bzhi ba'i sngags kyis de dag la shin tu bsrungs la/ de rnams kyi snying gar yi ge hUM las rdo rje/ mgrin par yi ge A:las pad+ma/ mgo bor yi ge oM las 'khor lo/ mtshan ma de rnams kyi lte ba'i dbus su sa bon de
279b7(rgyud 'grel): rnams bsam par bya'o/ /de nas langs te dri zhim po'i chos rdo rje khu tshur gyis hUM A:aoM zhes brjod cing/ snying ga dang mgrin pa dang mgo bor byug par bya'o/ /de nas de dag gi spyi bor me tog/ mdun du spos dang mar me/ snying gar dri/ lag
280a1(rgyud 'grel): par zas mchog sbyin par bya ste/ thams cad la las thams cad pa'i sngags bzlas la sbyin no/ /de nas rdo rje phag mo'i snying po'i sngags kyis mngon par bsngags pa'i a shwdtha la sogs pa'i so shing mi 'khyog  
280a2(rgyud 'grel): pa srin bu med pa ma gas pa rma med pa/ sor bcu gnyis pa mthe'u chung rtse mo me tog mdzes pa can/ dri zhim po'i chus bkrus pa slob ma rnams kha byang du bltas pa'i thal mor sbyin no/ /de rnams shar phyogs su kha bltas nas gnas
280a3(rgyud 'grel): pa la 'char bcug la/ zur bzhi pa la gru bzhi tsam du ba lang gi lci bas byugs pa'i sa la bltos pa med par dor bar bya'o/ /de nas so shing ltung ba'i rjes su 'brangs nas de rnams kyi zhi ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub 'byung ba bstan par
280a4(rgyud 'grel): bya ste/ shar dang lho dang nub dang byang du kha bltas nas lhung na/ rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du zhi ba dang drag shul spyod pa dbang dang/ rgyas pa rnams so/ /mtshams rnams su bltas na 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub 'thob po/ /steng du kha bltas
280a5(rgyud 'grel): te lhung na rigs 'dzin gyi dngos grub 'thob bo/ /'og tu kha bltas te lhung na sa 'og gi dngos grub 'thob po/ /dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du lhung na dngos grub med pa yin no/ /de nas yi ge hUM las byung ba'i de nyid gsum bzlas pa'i chu
280a6(rgyud 'grel): 'thor 'thung bya ba'i phyir/ oM h+rI:bi shud+d+ha sarbba pA paM ni tsa sya bi shud+d+ha ya sarbba pi kal pAM a pa na ya hUM zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod cing skyor ba gsum 'thung du gzhug go /de nas tshang legs pa'i skud pa gsum sgril mdud pa gsum dang
280a7(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa/ /rang bzhin gyi lha'i sngags bzlas pa byas pa bdag nyid kyis de rnams kyi dpung pa g.yas pa la bcings pas kun nas bsrung bar bya'o/ /de nas yi ge hUM las skyed pa'i ku sha gsar pa ma nyams pa las las kyi lha mo'i
280b1(rgyud 'grel): sngags bzlas pa bstan pa dang sngas su sbyin par bya'o/ /de nas chos bstan pas spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'jig rten du/ /u duM bA ra'i me tog bzhin/ /brgya lam na yang res 'ga' bzhin/ /'byung 'gyur yang na mi 'byung ngo//
280b2(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'byung ba/ /de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste/ /gang gis mnyam med sems can don/ /mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus/ /bskal pa bye ba du mar ni/ /sngon chad sdig pa byas pa gang/ /dkyil 'khor 'di 'dra mthong ma thab//
280b3(rgyud 'grel): de dag thams cad zad 'gyur na/ /grags pa mdza' yas sngags spyod pa'i/ /tshul la gnas na smos ci dgos/ /skyob pa'i gsang sngags bzlas na ni/ /go 'phang bla na med par 'gro/ /gang dag spyod pa'i mchog 'di la/ /blo gros shin tu mi g.yo
280b4(rgyud 'grel): ba/ de dag gis ni ngan 'gro'i rgyu/ /sdug bsngal kun 'byung bcad pa yin/ /bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis/ /rnyed pa mnyam med de ring rnyed/ /gang phyir rgyal ba sras dang bcas/ /bdag nyid chen po thams cad kyis/ /bstan pa 'di
280b5(rgyud 'grel): la khyed rnams kun/ /yongs su bzung nas skye bzhin pa/ /de phyir khyed rnams theg chen la/ /legs par skye bar 'gyur ba yin/ /theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i/ /lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan/ /gang phyir khyed rnams dong byed pa/ /de bzhin gshegs
280b6(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams su 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba bstan pa thos par byas nas/ de rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bsrungs te/ nang par rmi lam nga la smros shig ces brjod la/ dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa'i mthar seng ge'i nyal stabs kyis dge ba'i
280b7(rgyud 'grel): sems kyis nyal du gzhug go /slob dpon yang dkyil 'khor gyi khang par zhugs nas bsrung ba'i don du bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i gsang sngags bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyis nang par sngar gtor ma btang nas dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa
281a1(rgyud 'grel): nas byung ste/ slob ma rnams bos te rmi lam dris te/ ri las lhung ba la sogs pa mtshan ma'i mi dge ba'i rmi lam ngan pa rnams byung na zhal bzhi'i sngags kyis slob ma'i bgegs bzlog par bya'o/ /de dag rig pa'i dbang bskur ba
281a2(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i sdom pa sngon du 'gro ba'i slob ma lhag pa'i gnas pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas de la dris nye bar byugs nas me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa chal bar bkram nas lha'i gnas rnams su bdud rtsi lnga yi thig le byas la/ ded snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer
281a3(rgyud 'grel): gyis 'khor lo spyan drangs te bzhugs su gsol lo/ /oM A:badzra puShpe hUM/ oM A:badzra b+hU pe hUM/ oM A:badzra dI pe hUM/ oM A:badzra gand+he hUM/ oM A:badzra nai bidye hUM/ zhes bya bas me tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ mar me dang/
281a4(rgyud 'grel): dri dang/ zhal zas rnams kyis yang dag par mchod nas/ hUM mche ba gtsigs shing 'jigs chen po/ /sgyu ma'i me tog phreng bas brgyan/ /sha chen rab tu gsol mdzad pa/ /khrag 'thung dpal la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 
281a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lor sgyur/ /ye shes lnga dang sku gsum nyid/ /'gro ba skyob pa la phyag 'tshal/ /ji snyed rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /kun tu rtog pa 'chid bcad cing/ /'jig rten bya ba la 'jug ma/ /de snyed rnams la bdag phyag
281a6(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal/ /zhes bstod pa byas nas/ /de nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te lag pa g.yas pa'i spos snod thogs la 'khor lo'i dbang bdag dang sems can rnams la gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ bcom ldan khrag 'thung rdo rje
281a7(rgyud 'grel): mchog /dam pa rig rgyal khyod phyag 'tshal/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid dkyil 'khor ni/ /mgon po bdag ni dri bar 'tshal/ /slob ma rnams la brtse phyir dang/ /khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /bcom ldan bdag ni gus pa la/ /de bas
281b1(rgyud 'grel): bka' drin mdzad par rigs/ /'gro ba'i tshogs kyi don mdzad pa'i/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams dgongs su gsol/ /'bras gnas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /gang gzhan sngags kyi lha nyid dang/ /'jig rten skyong ba'i lha nyid dang/ /'byung po rdzogs
281b2(rgyud 'grel): byang nyer gnas dang/ /bstan la mngon dga' i sems can ni/ /gang zhig rdo rje'i mig can rnams/ /rdo rje can chen che ge bdag /dpal ldan khrag 'thung dkyil 'khor ni/ /ci ltar 'byor pa'i yo byad kyis/ /'bro ba'i don phyir bri lags pas/ /bde bdag
281b3(rgyud 'grel): slob mar bcas pa la/ /thugs brtse bar ru dgongs nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor bcas pa thams cad kyi/ /byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol/ /de skad byas nas 'khor lo de nam mkha' la 'degs par bya'o/ /de dag ni lha lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o//
281b4(rgyud 'grel): de nas nang par nyi ma 'char kar dris nye bar byugs la/ /de'i rjes la thig skud dkyil 'khor gyi nyis 'gyur du ring ba sboms su sgo'i nyi shu cha bdud rtsi lngas brlan pa dri zhim po lngas bsgos pa kha dog lnga byugs pa rtag pa la sogs pa sa bon oM baM aM traM hUM
281b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams las grub pa de'i kha dog can snod du bzhag la/ rnal 'byor pa'i yi ge dza las grub pa'i nyi ma dang zla ba'i mig can gyis rtag pa la sogs pa'i thugs kar gnas pa de dag gi kha dog can gyi 'od zer gyi thig skud bltas la/ oM dI pa ta dri ShI
281b6(rgyud 'grel): aM ku shi dza:zhes bya ba 'di dang/ oM A pra yats+tsha/ shA shwa ta su tra sA tsakrA sU tra NA ya hUM zhes rtag pa'i gnas su rin chen 'byung pa la sogs pa yang sbyar te gsol pa btab pa dang/ de rnams kyis btang ba rab tu g.yo zhing 'bar ba'i mig gi rdzi mas 'drin
281b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'bar ba'i blta bas bkug la/ ye shes kyi thig tu byas te/ oM a n+yo n+ya a nu ga tA sarbba d+ha mA a nu pra biSh+Ta sarbba d+harmA hUM zhes brjod cing lnga po gcig tu bsgyil bar bya'o/ /de nas slob ma rang gi 'dod pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa thig skud/
282a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa dang lhan cig tu bla ma rdo rje dril bu 'chang bas ye shes kyi thig skud g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis bzung ste/ dza zhes bya ba gsum gyis slob ma la btang la/ slob mas kyang dza dza dza zhes brjod cing 'gro bas song ste/ lte
