282a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i steng du thig skud bzung ste/ nub du gnas pa shar du mngon par phyogs pa dang/ shar du gnas pa nub du mngon par phyogs pas gnam thig gdab bo/ /de bzhin du 'og gi thig kyang gdab bo/ /oM A:badzra sa ma ya sU tra ma ti kra ma
282a3(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ khyed rnams kyis sems can gyi don gyi dus lags te de bas 'dir gshegs su gsol lo/ /zhes thig skud kyi sgras nam mkha' la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bskul la/ shar dang nub tu tshangs pa'i thig gdab par bya'o/ /
282a4(rgyud 'grel): shar du mngon par phyogs pa dang/ lhor mngon par phyogs pa dang/ thabs gcig tu lho dang byang gi thig gdab par bya'o/ /mer gnas pa'i gnod sbyin du bltas pa dang/ dbang ldan du gnas pa yi dags su bltas pas ni shar gyi rtsa ba'i thig go /
282a5(rgyud 'grel): rlung gi phyogs su gnas pa yi dags su bltas pa dang/ bden bral du gnas pa gnod sbyin du bltas pas ni nub phyogs kyi rtsa ba'i thig gdab po/ /mer gnas pa klu'i phyogs su bltas pa dang/ bden bral du gnas pa dang/ dbang po'i phyogs su gnas
282a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lho phyogs kyi rtsa ba'i thig gdab bo/ /rlung gi phyogs su gnas pa dang/ dbang por bltas pa dang dbang ldan du gnas pa klur bltas pa ni byang phyogs kyi rtsa ba'i thig go /cho ga 'di nyid kyis tshangs thig dag gis ngos gnyis su thig gsum gsum
282a7(rgyud 'grel): gdab po/ /rtsa ba'i thig rnams kyi phyi rol du cha chen bzhi bzhi gdab po/ /me'i phyogs dang bden bral du gnas nas mtshams kyi thig gnyis kyang gdab po/ /cha chen dang po tshangs ngos dor/ /de nas cha chung gnyis gdab bya/ /cha chen gnyis
282b1(rgyud 'grel): pa cha bzhir gdab/ /cha chen lnga pa ngos gnyis nas/ /cha chung re re gdab par bya/ /cha chen drug gi tha ma yi/ /ngos nas cha chung gnyis gnyis gdab/ /cha chen bdun pa dang brgyad pa/ /cha chung bzhi bzhir gdab par bya/ /gnyis pa sgo khyud bzhi pa sogs//
282b2(rgyud 'grel): bcu pa ngos dang bcu gnyis 'gram/ /bcu bzhi pa yi ya phug te/ /de dag kun la thams cad du/ /cha lnga mnyam par gzhag pas gdab/ /chos kyi 'khor lo la sogs pa/ /ji ltar mdzes par brtag par bya/ /dkyil 'khor du phur bu btsugs
282b3(rgyud 'grel): la dbang ldan gyi mtshams nas rdo rje'i ra ba dang 'bar ba'i ra ba cha chung re res bskor ro/ /de bzhin du lha snam gyi nang du zlum por bskor bar bya'o/ /'dir mtshan ma ngan pa mthong ba las ni dngos grub med do/ /thig skud chad na bla ma 'chi/ /lhag chad
282b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi nyes pa las ni nad do/ /phyogs las 'khrul na slob ma rmongs so/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi yis mdzes pa ste/ /do shal do shal phyed pas spras/ /dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan/ /stegs bu la brten gzungs kyi tshogs/ /
282b5(rgyud 'grel): chos pa rnams kyis 'brel ba ste/ /grwa yi cha ni thams cad dang/ /sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis brgyan/ /sgo ni dkyil 'khor brgyad cha ru/ /bdag nyid chen pos shes par bya/ /stegs bu chen po dor byas la/ /tshad
282b6(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan shing shin tu mdzes/ /sgo khyud sgo 'dar shes par bya/ /de bzhin lha'i snam bu ste/ /rdo rje lha mo yang dag ldan/ /glu dang rol mo la sogs gar/ /stegs bu sgo yi phyed yin te/ /'gram dang logs zhes bya ba'ang yin/ /zla ba me tog
282b7(rgyud 'grel): 'phreng ba nyid/ /rtsa ba thig sa'i phyi rol du/ /tshon rtsi'i sa ni de yi phyed/ /rin chen ka ba sogs snam bu/ /rdul tshon sa dang snam bu'i sa/ /rta babs sgo yi bzhi 'gyur ste/ /ba dan dril bu ldan pa rnams/ /dril bur bcas pa rlung bskyod pa'i/ /
283a1(rgyud 'grel): ba dan phye yi gru rnams su'o/ /gzhan rnams 'khor lo'i rjes mthun par/ /ji ltar mdzes pa rab tu brtag /de ltar rim pa 'dis legs par thig btab la/ de las rin po che las byung ba 'am/ lcags lnga las
283a2(rgyud 'grel): byung ba 'am/ khams las byung ba 'am/ 'bras sA lu las byung ba la sogs pa'i rdul tshon lnga snod lngar bzhag la brtag pa la sogs pa'i sa bon bkod de/ ye shes kyi rdul tshon bkug nas/ gzi brjid bskyed nas/ oM badzra tsi tra sa
283a3(rgyud 'grel): ma ye hUM/ zhes bya ba 'dis bla mas mngon par bsngags te/ dkyil 'khor gyi ye shes kyi thig oM badzra be ga mA ti kra ma hUM zhes brjod pas yid kyis nam mkha' la bteg nas/ 'khor lo'i nang du 'dug la kha shar du bltas te/ chos dbyings
283a4(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni rnam par dag /sems can khams ni rnam grol ba/ /'khor lo bde mchog rgya chen gyi/ /dkyil 'khor snying po bri bar bya/ /zhes brjod de dbang ldan gyi grwa nas g.yas bskor gyi rim pas g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur gyis so so so sor dpal
283a5(rgyud 'grel): ldan khrag 'thung gi nga rgyal dang ldan pas rdul tshon bsgye bar bya'o/ /phyi nas sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gis bya'o/ /pha dang ma dang rgyal po dang/ /rgyal rigs gnyis dang brtag pa'i chus/ /thod pa bzang po rab tu bkang/ /legs byas slob ma
283a6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs yin/ /nag po dkar po ljang gu dang/ /dmar po dang ni ser po sogs/ /mnyam zhing g.yas bskor lo min dang/ /ma chad bar ni ri mo gyi/ /sbom por gyur na nad du 'gyur/ /phra mo yis ni nor 'joms byed/ /yon pos rnam sdang
283a7(rgyud 'grel): chad pa yis/ /bla ma dang ni slob ma 'chi/ /shar phyogs su ni dkar po che/ /byang phyogs ljang gu yang dag ldan/ /nub kyi cha ni dmar po ste/ /lho phyogs ser ba rab tu gnas/ /dbus kyi sa gzhi'i cha de ni/ /in+d+ra nI la mtshungs par 'dod//
283b1(rgyud 'grel): 'di dag rdul tshon rim pa ste/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /bdag po la sogs dang gnas su/ /phyag rgya chen po lha gzugs rdzogs/ /yang na rtag mtshan la sogs pa/ /gang 'dod ji ltar rigs par bri/ /rdul tshon bri ba zin nas rdul
283b2(rgyud 'grel): tshon gyi lhag ma'i lha rnams/ oM A:hUM badzra muM(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas gshegs su gsol la gnas ni dben par gzhag go /de ni rdul tshon dgye ba'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi gnas legs par brgyan/ dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol tu ba'i lci bas
283b3(rgyud 'grel): byugs te/ byi dor byas shing dri zhim po'i chu sa chag chag btab bar bsang btor la sogs pa mchod pa'i yo byad rnams dang/ bum pa yang gnas gnas su legs par bzhag te/ de ltar dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bltas la bdag nyid dkyil 'khor
283b4(rgyud 'grel): gyi lho phyogs su 'dug pas/ khang pa brtsegs ma'i dbus su sgrub thabs las 'byung ba rang bzhin dkyil 'khor bskyed la/ nam mkha' i khams khyab par spros nas gnas ji lta bar rang rang gi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i ras rang rang gi lha'i sku ji lta bar
283b5(rgyud 'grel): yongs su rdzogs par bltas la/ 'dren pa la ni sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa dang lha mo rnams la ni ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa dran par bya'o/ /de nas ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs mchod yon la sogs pa phul la/
283b6(rgyud 'grel): yi ge bzhis dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang bskur ba byas la/ dbang bskur ba dang mchod pa dang bstod pa dang bdud rtsi myang ba byas te/ sgo kun nas ni lag pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor bdag po nas brtsams nas/ /rang rang sngags
283b7(rgyud 'grel): bzlas byin gyis brlab/ /kun kyang brgya rtsa brgyad par bzlas/ /de nas me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod nas/ oM badzra baShtre hUM zhes bya bas ras grung? du sbyar ba lha rnams la phul la/ mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che zhes bya ba la sogs
284a1(rgyud 'grel): par legs par bstod de yi ge brgya bas brtan par byas la/ sgrub pa'i grogs mchog dkyil 'khor du bzhag ste/ /bdag nyid phyir byung nas/ rgya chen pos gtor ma btang bar bya'o/ /de nas bdag nyid kyi
284a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor la skor ba byas la phyag bya'o/ /de dag ni dkyil 'khor sgrub pa po'o/ /de nas slob dpon bdag nyid slob ma 'jug pa'i cho gas dkyil 'khor du zhugs te/ dbang bskur ba thams cad rdzogs par bya ba dang/ rjes su gnang?
284a3(rgyud 'grel): ba la sogs pa thob par bya ba dang/ 'dod chags chen po las byung ba'i de kho na nyid bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin dang/ dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo yang gzugs brnyan ltar chos nyid kyis shes par byas nas/ tshigs su bcad pa gdon
284a4(rgyud 'grel): te/ nam mkha' las byung mtshan ldan phyin/ /thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog /sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin/ /bde mchog 'khor lo bdag grub mdzod/ /kun mchog yon tan chen po ste/ /dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lta/ /rdo rje
284a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal/ /mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag grub mdzod/ /nyes pa mi mnga' rtag pa ste/ /'dod chags kun gyi rjes chags pa/ /'dod chags chen po dga' ba che/ /bcom ldan de nyid bdag grub mdzod/ /shin tu dag pa
284a6(rgyud 'grel): sku'i mchog /bzod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /byang chub sems dpar bdag grub mdzod/ /kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste/ /dbang phyug chen po phyag rgya mchog /grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod
284a7(rgyud 'grel): pa/ rdo rje snyems bdag bdag grub mdzod/ /sems can kun gyi yid khyab pa/ /sems can kun gyi yid la gnas/ /sems can kun gyi yab nyid de/ /'dod chags mchog gi dam tshig mchog /ces so/ /da ni tshigs su bcad
284b1(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams kyis bden pa'i byin brlabs ste/ shes rab thabs bdag dkyil 'khor gyi/ /bden pa gang gi ye shes mchog /bden pa de yis mgon khyod kyis/ /bdag gi 'dod pa yongs rdzogs mdzod/ /chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta
284b2(rgyud 'grel): bu ste/ /dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med/ /gzung du med cing brjod du med/ /rgyu dang las la kun tu 'byung/ /de bzhin de kho nyid las 'byung/ /bden pa 'di yis dkyil 'khor du/ /gzugs brnyan gsal bar slob ma ni/ /kun gyi dri med
284b3(rgyud 'grel): mthong bar shog ces so/ /de nas yol ba'i phyi rol du khrus byas shing dri zhim po la sogs pas gtsang bar gyur pa/ dbang bskur ba'i snod du rung ba'i slob mas yon phul te/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku/ /rdo rje 'chang chen ngo bo nyid/ /
284b4(rgyud 'grel): dmigs med bde chen ston pa po/ /slob dpon chen po la phyag 'tshal/ /zhes phyag byas la/ don dam rnal 'byor smra ba'i seng ge ces bya ba/ /nyon mongs gcod pa'i don la shin tu mkhas gyur pa/ /srid pa'i nyes brgya bskyed pa'i nyon mongs bcom
284b5(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa/ /rnal 'byor don dam rgyal po de nyid grub par mdzod/ /ces bya bas gsol ba gdab pa dang/ de dpal bde mchog zhal gcig rphyag gnyis pa'i gzugs su bltas la/ A khaM pI ra hUM/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis me tog gi phreng
284b6(rgyud 'grel): ba bzung la/ zhal bzhi'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i dar ser po 'am dmar pos gdong g.yogs bya ba ste/ slob ma tha ma 'bring ni mi mthong bar/ /mchog ni cung zad mthong bar bcing bar bya/ /de nas las thams cad pa'i chus bsang
284b7(rgyud 'grel): te/ dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i phyir/ kye dga' ba sdug gu khyod su yin zhes dri bar bya'o/ /des kyang kye bde ba chen po kho bo ni skal pa bzang po lags so/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /yang bu ci bya/ des kyang/ sangs rgyas mchog gi dam tshig ?
285a1(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal/ zhes so/ /de nas de'i mgo bor lag pa bzhag la/ oM sarbba yo ga tsit+totwA da ya mi zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis byang chub kyi sems bskyed la/ me tog dang bcas pa'i rdo rje snying gar bzhag ste/ oM su ra te
285a2(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya stwaM/ ho sind+ha badzra ya thA su khaM zhes bya ba 'dis so/ /de nas de skad brjod par byas te/ deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog du gsang
285a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di/ khyod kyis dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa rnams la smra bar ma byed cig /ma dad par yang mi bya'o/ /de nas shar phyogs kyi sgo skyong ma'i sngags kyis slob ma bkug ste/ sngar bstan pa'i yi ge lnga yis yol ba'i
285a4(rgyud 'grel): nang du bcug la/ shar phyogs su bzhag ste lag pa nas gzung la 'di skad brjod par bya'o/ /deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis/ de bas na ngas khyod la rdo rje ye shes bskyed par bya yis/ ye shes gang
285a5(rgyud 'grel): gis khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dngos grub kyang thob par gyur na/ dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos khyod kyis 'di dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams kyi mdun du brjod par mi bya'o/ /oM sh+rI he ru ka deng khyod kyi /
285a6(rgyud 'grel): snying la de ring yang dag zhugs/ /gal te tshul 'di smas na ni/ /de ma thag tu bral te gshegs/ /zhes bya ba 'dis mna' bsgags nas/ pad+ma'i snod na gnas pa'i bdud rtsi lnga dang/ tsan dan dang gur gum la sogs pa bsres
285a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i chu yi yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs la/ 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed/ /dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub 'grub/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'thung shig /oM badzra pany+tsa a mri tod ka tha tha tha
285b1(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes brjod cing 'thung du gzhug go /de nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ deng nas brtsams te khyod kyi dpal he ru ka nga yin gyi/ ngas gang 'di gyis zhes smras pa de bu khyod kyis bya dgos so/ /khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig /brnyas pa
285b2(rgyud 'grel): byas na khyod yang ba ma spangs par 'chi ba'i dus byas nas sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar gyur ta re zhes so/ /de dag ni dam tshig gi nu chu sbyin pa'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ rdo rje sems
285b3(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bdag la dbab tu gsol zhes brjod du bcug la/ de'i mgo bor yi ge baM las byung ba'i chu'i dkyil 'khor zlum po bum pas mtshan pa de la ha/ snying kar laM las byung ba'i dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa ser po rdo rje rtse gsum pas
285b4(rgyud 'grel): gru rnams su mtshan pa de la hUM/ lte bar raM las grub pa'i me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa dmar po rno zhing 'bar ba de la a/ rkang pa'i 'og tu yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor sngon po g.yo ba gzhur snang ba ba dan gyis zung mtshan pa de la dzhai(rgyud 'grel): drag cing bzod
285b5(rgyud 'grel): par dka' ba 'bar ba'i lus kyi rlung gis ji srid du me'i dkyil 'khor dang phrad pa'i bar du 'bud zhing 'bar bar bsams la der yang des 'bar te der shin tu tshabs cher 'bar bas dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor yang 'bar ba na/ de nas chu'i dkyil 'khor
285b6(rgyud 'grel): la bdud rtsi 'dzag pa'i tshogs kyis ngoms shing tshim bzhin pa/ rlung gis kyang slob ma bteg bzhin pa la/ bdag nyid kyang dregs pa dang bcas pa'i khro bo chen po rdo rje khrag 'thung drag po'i lus/ g.yas pas rdo rje gsor zhing g.yon pas dril bu
285b7(rgyud 'grel): dkrol bas/ 'bebs pa'i sngags kyis bdug spos byin dbab par bya'o/ /de la sngags ni 'di yin te/ oM sh+rI he he ru ru kaM huM hUM phaT DA ki nI dzA la saM ba ra swAhA/ oM bi ShA ya sto b+ha ya ra ra ra ra tsA la ya hUM ha a dzhai:hUM phaT zhes bya ba ste 'dis
286a1(rgyud 'grel): myur du phebs par 'gyur ro/ /slob ma la 'babs par rig nas de pad+ma'i rigs kyis lha mo'i gzugs su yud tsam gyis dmigs la/ tiSh+Tha badzra zhes bya ba 'dis babs pa brtan par bya ste/ de'i lce la yi ge a dmar po
286a2(rgyud 'grel): bsams nas pru hi badzra zhes brjod na dge ba dang mi dge ba smra bar byed do/ /oM mgon po chen po rdo rje chos/ /'od dpag med pa bde ba che/ /'dod chags chen po'i chos gsungs zhing/ /dge dang mi dge gang yin 'bri/ /zhes bya bas 'dis bri
286a3(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o/ /babs pa de yang gang la babs pa las dge mi dge smra bar bya'o/ /sems la babs pa las 'jig rten gsum na gnas pa shes so/ /lus la babs na nam mkha' la 'phag go /gal te ring du 'phags na de'i tshe de'i mgo'i steng
286a4(rgyud 'grel): du laM las byung ba'i dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs rdo rje mnan par bsgom na mi g.yo bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag ni dbab pa'o/ /de nas yang lho phyogs kyi sgor mngon par lang la/ oM na ma ste hUM/ na mA mi hUM/ na mo na ma hUM swAhA/ /zhes bya
286a5(rgyud 'grel): bas lus ngag yid kyi sgo nas lan gsum phyag bya ba sngon du 'gro bas/ oM sarba bI ra yo gi n+yai pU dza u pas+thA nA yAt+ma nAM niryA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta bI ra yo gi n+yA twA mu kaM/ a d+hi tiSh+Tha swA ma/ zhes bya bas lus thams cad kyis phyag
286a6(rgyud 'grel): byed du gzhug go /de na g.yon phyogs su thal mo 'di nyid snying gar sbyor du bcug la shar phyogs kyi sgo nas/ oM sarbba bI ra yo gi n+yai pU dza a b+hi She ka ya At+ma nAM/ nIrya ta yA mi sarbbA ta thA ga ta bI ra yo gi ni At+ma a mu kaM a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu
286a7(rgyud 'grel): maM/ de nas byang phyogs kyi sgor thal mo de nyid dpral bar bzhag la phyag byang du gzhug go /oM sarbba bI ra yo gi n+yai pu dza pra barta nA At+ma nA nIrya ta yA mi sarbba ta thA ga ta bI ra yo gi ni At+ma a mu kaM pra bartA ya maM/ de nas nub phyogs kyi sgor
286b1(rgyud 'grel): thal mo sbyor ba de nyid mgor gzhag la phyag byed du gzhug ste/ oM sarbba bI ra yo gi n+yai bU dza karma NI At+mA naM/ nIrya ta yA mi sarbba ta thA ga ta bI ra yo gi ni At+ma na a mu kaM Arya karmA ku ru maM/ de dag ni phyag go /de nas oM de bzhin gshegs pa kun
286b2(rgyud 'grel): gyi gnas/ /lha mo rnams kyi chos 'byung nyid/ /rin chen sna tshogs khang rtsegs ma/ /he ru ka dpal pho brang mchog /snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di nyid du/ /bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bgyi/ /lha yi rigs kyi rim pa dag /bsod nams ji
286b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin de bzhin shog /'di yis dngos grub gang 'grub dang/ /rigs ni gang gi snod du 'gyur/ /'di yis bsod nams ci yo de las/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni de bzhin shog /ces bya bas bden pa'i byin brlabs byas la/ mig lam du snang ba'i
286b4(rgyud 'grel): 'od kyi bye brag dri'o/ /des kyang smra bar bya ste/ de la dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang sngon po'i dbye bas zhi ba dang/ rgyas pa dang dbang dang drag shul spyod pa rnams kyi snod du go rim bzhin bstan la/ de nas sngar yi ge lngas bzung ba'i me tog
286b5(rgyud 'grel): gi phreng ba traM gis byin gyis brlabs la hUM gis dkyil 'khor du dor bar bya ste/ pra tIts+tsha badzra ho zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de la gal te sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdzod spu 'am gtsug tor ram dbu la lhung na phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub po/ /spyan nam
286b6(rgyud 'grel): zhal la lhung na sngags kyi dngos grub thob po/ /sku'i stong du lhung na dngos grub rab lo/ /bar la ni dngos grub 'bring ngo/ /smad kyi cha la ni dngos grub tha ma'o/ /gzugs brnyan dang shin tu rings na ni/ /shin tu ring bas/ nye na ni dngos grub myur ro/ /
286b7(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams kyi rang gi gnas ni mig la sogs pa bcad pa las shes par bya'o/ /gal te lha gnyis kyi bar du lhung na/ me tog gang la nye ba de'i rigs kyi lha yin no/ /dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol tu lhung na dngos grub med do/ /gal te dkyil 'khor gyi
287a1(rgyud 'grel): phyi rol lhung na der slar dor bar bya ste/ lan gsum byas nas gal te de nyid du lhung na/ de'i tshe gzung bar mi bya'o/ /de dag ni me tog dor ba'o/ /de'i rjes la slob ma'i mig gnyis la yi ge oM gnyis bsam la/ /he
287a2(rgyud 'grel): ru ka dpal der khyod kyi/ /mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad/ /mig ni thams cad 'byed mdzad de/ /rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med/ /oM dz+nyA na tsak+Shu badzra hUM/ zhes brjod cing gdong g.yog bsal nas/ oM dkyil 'khor bzang po 'di la ltos//
287a3(rgyud 'grel): nga ni dad pa rab tu bskyed/ /khyod ni rnal 'byor ma zas skye/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs/ /'gro ba phun sum tshogs kun dang/ /dngos grub phun tshogs khyod mngon gyur/ /dam tshig thams cad brkyang ba dang/ /gsang sngags
287a4(rgyud 'grel): pa yang brtson par bgyis/ /zhes brjod nas 'phangs pa'i me tog gi phreng ba de blangs la/ de'i spyi bor pra ti grih+na swa i maM satwa mahA ba la zhes brjod cing bcing bar bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha so so'i ming bstan pa sngon du 'gro
287a5(rgyud 'grel): bas shar phyogs kyi sgo skyong ma nas brtsams nas/ bdag po'i mthar thug par bstan par bya'o/ /de dag ni slob ma dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas dbang bskur ba'i don du bla ma la 'byor pa ji lta bas yon phul te/ yan lag
287a6(rgyud 'grel): lngas phyag byas nas pus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs la thal mo khong stong du sbyar nas/ ji ltar sangs rgyas mkhas rnams kyis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dbang bskur ltar/ /bdag kyang mgon pos dbang bskur zhing/ /mchog kyang bdag la
287a7(rgyud 'grel): stsal du gsol/ /zhes brjod cing slob mas gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyis dbang bskur ba'i don du rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor las phyi rol du khrud yongs su dor ba'i phyi rol gyi sgo la mngon par phyogs par snying po'i dkyil 'khor
287b1(rgyud 'grel): gyi phyed kyi tshang gru bzhi pa rtsegs ma'i dkyil 'khor sgo bzhi pa dbus su pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar dang bcas pa snam bu shar du 'khor lo/ lhor rin po che/ nub du pad+ma/ byang du ral gri bris par de'i dbus su slob ma bzhag la/ hUM bzlas pa'i
287b2(rgyud 'grel): yungs kar g.yas pa dang/ g.yon pa'i chad pas gzung ste/ lo re zhing lan gnyis su g.yas bskor dang g.yon bskor du bskor zhing lag pa gnyis slob ma la nye bar reg par bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor dbang phyug gi sngags kyi dris byug cing
287b3(rgyud 'grel): mar dang bcas pa'i sa rdzar rdza'i snod spos hUM bzlas pas 'jug par bya'o/ /de dag ni mi gtsang ba bsal ba'i cho ga'o/ /de ma thag tu snying ga'i sa bon las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs rnams kyis mdza' yas pa'i phyogs na bzhugs pa'i
287b4(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang/ rig pa'i lha mo rnams slob ma dbang bskur ba'i don du bskul nas byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa til gyi gang bu ltar nam mkha' gang ba rnams/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang gos la sogs
287b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i yo byad rnams dang ldan zhing sangs rgyas spyan la sogs pa'i rig sngags pad+ma'i rtsa ba ltar dkar ba'i ye shes kyi chu yis gang ba'i bum pa lag na thogs pa dang/ lhan cig pa rnams kyis/ phun sum tshogs pa mnga' ba gser gyi ri bo 'dra/ /'jig
287b6(rgyud 'grel): rten gsum gyi mgon po dril gsum spangs pa/ /sangs rgyas pad+ma rgyas pa'i 'dab 'dra'i spyan mnga' ba/ /bkra shis des ni deng 'dir bde legs shog /de yis nye bar bstan pa'i mchog rab mi g.yo ba/ /'jig rten gsum na grags shing lha
287b7(rgyud 'grel): dang mis mchod pa'i/ /chos kyi dam pa skye dgu rnams pa zhi byed pa'i/ /bkra shis des ni deng nas khyed la bde legs shog /dge 'dun dam pa'i chos ldan thos dang bkra shis phyug /lha dang mi dang lha min dag gis mchod pa'i gnas/ /tshogs
288a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi mchog rab ngo tsha shes dang dpal gyi zhing/ /bkra shis des ni deng nas khyed la bde legs shog /ces bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum dang/ gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyi glu len bzhin pa dang/ rdo
288a2(rgyud 'grel): rje can gyis 'gro skyab phyir/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur ba/ /yon tan 'byung nas stsal ji ltar/ /de bzhin 'di la'ang stsal du gsol/ /zhes pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'dis gsol ba btab la/ hUM dang rdo rje las byung ba'i thugs kyi 'khor
288a3(rgyud 'grel): lo bde mchog gi gzugs can gyis slob ma la dbang bskur ba bzhin du/ dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ni/ /khams gsum pa yi phyag byas pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum gyi/ /gnas las byung ba sbyin par bya/ /zhes bya ba dang/ ji ltar
288a4(rgyud 'grel): bltams pa tsam gyi ni/ /de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ba/ /lha yi chu ni dag pa yis/ /de bzhin bdag gis khrus bya'o/ /zhes bya ba brjod cing chus sdud pa'i rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa rdo rje dang bcas pa lag pas blangs pa'i bum pa'i
288a5(rgyud 'grel): chus mi bskyod pa'i ngo bo yis/ oM sarbba ta thA ga ta badzra a b+hi She ka sa ma ya sh+ri ye hUM/ zhes brjod cing slob ma 'khor lo sgyur ba bzhin du dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis mi bskyod pa yis bdag pos
288a6(rgyud 'grel): byas pa he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor slob ma'i lus la gzhug par bya'o/ /rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pas/ legs par dbang bskur la chu yongs su gyur pa las spyi gtsug tu mi bskyod pa bltas la/ me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de de ni
288a7(rgyud 'grel): chu'i dbang bskur ba ste rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i gnas gyur nas chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ye shes so/ /de nas rin chen can gyi 'gro ba bskyab phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pas gsol ba btab pa'i
288b1(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon gyis slob ma trAM las rin po che las byung ba'i yon tan 'khor lo bde mchog gi gzugs can la/ sngar bstan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ rigs pa'i lha mo'i bya ba dang ldan par rnam par bsgoms la/ dbang bskur rdo rje che
288b2(rgyud 'grel): po ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang/ yon tan dpag med 'byung ba'i gnas/ /yid bzhin rin chen sna tshogs rgyal/ /ngo mtshar gzi brjid chen po'i mchog /cod pan gyi ni dbang bskur ro zhes/ brjod la de'i mgo la gser dang gos la sogs pa las byas
288b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rin chen 'byung gi ngo bor de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang rin chen 'byung gi gzugs su rdzogs par byin gyis brlabs pa'i cod pan bcing zhing bum pa'i chu ldugs shing/ oM sarbba ta thA ga ta ratna a b+hi She ka sa ma ye sh+ri ye hUM/ zhes
288b4(rgyud 'grel): brjod par bya'o/ /de nas rin chen 'byung gis bdag po byas pa'i sh+rI he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo slob ma'i ba spu'i bu ga nas zhugs nas lus la thim par bsam ste/ chu las rna ltag g.yas par rin chen 'byung ngo/ /de dag ni cod pan gyi dbang
288b5(rgyud 'grel): yin te nyon mongs pa can gyi yid kyi dri ma gsal bas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so/ /de nas pad+ma can gyi 'gro bskyab phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod de/ slob ma oM dang pad+ma yongs su gyur pa las gsung gi 'khor lo bde mchog gi ngo bo rnam
288b6(rgyud 'grel): par bzhag nas rdo rje 'od dpag med kyi bdag nyid kyis blangs la/ dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa yang brjod la/ yang sangs rgyas rdo rje dbang bskur bas/ /de nyid khyod ni dbang bskur bya/ /'di ni sangs rgyas
288b7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad nyid/ /rab tu grub phyir rdo rje long zhes brjod cing/ slob ma'i snying ga dang mgrin pa dang/ spyi bor rdo rje reg nas de nyid lag pa g.yas par sbyin par bya ste/ bum par chu ldugs shing/ oM sarbba ta thA ga ta pad+ma a b+hi She ka sa ma ye 
289a1(rgyud 'grel): sh+ri ye hUM/ zhes brjod pa dang/ de nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis 'od dpag med kyis bdag po byas pa'i he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor slob ma'i lus la gzhug par bya ste/ chu yongs su gyur pa las lhag pa'i steng
289a2(rgyud 'grel): du 'od dpag med bsgom par bya'o/ /de dag ni rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba ste/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so/ /de nas sna tshogs can gyi 'gro bskyab phyir/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod de/ slob ma kham dang sna
289a3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs rdo rje yongs su gyur pa las/ phrin las 'khor lo bde mchog gi gzugs su dmigs la/ dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas/ oM dril bu rdo rje rab ldan pas/ /shin tu dpa' bo nyid dbang
289a4(rgyud 'grel): bskur/ /rdo rje dam tshig gnas pa khyod/ /bdag po'i dbang bskur rgyal mnos shig ces brjod cing dril bu don yod grub pa'i ngo bo de'i lag pa g.yon par byin la/ rdo rje dang dril bur ldan pa'i lag pa dag gis 'khyud pa'i tshul du byed du
289a5(rgyud 'grel): bcug la chu sbyin zhing/ oM sarbba ta thA ga ta karma a b+hi She ka sa ma ya sh+ri ye hUM zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas don yod grub pas bdag po byas pa'i sh+rI he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor slob ma'i ba spu'i bu ga nas zhugs nas lus la thim par bsam mo//
289a6(rgyud 'grel): chu las rna lhag g.yon par don yod grub pa bsam par bya'o/ /de dag ni dril bu'i dbang bskur ba ste/ sgo lnga'i rnam par shes pa gnas gyur nas bya ba nan tan grub pa'i ye shes so/ /de nas 'khor lo can gyi 'gro bskyab phyir/ zhes bya ba
289a7(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pas gsol ba btab pas rnal 'byor pas/ oM dang 'khor lo yongs su gyur pa las sku'i 'khor lo bde mchog tu gnas pa las/ dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ni zhes bya ba dang/ oM sh+rI he ru ka a d+hi bi ti stwaM a
289b1(rgyud 'grel): b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ oM sh+rI he ru ka nA ma a b+hi She ka te zhes bod cing de'i mgo bor lag pa dag gis rdo rje dang dril bu mnyam par bzung zhing/ bum pa'i chus oM sarbba ta thA ga ta bud+d+ha a b+hi She ka sa ma ya sh+rI ye hUM/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis rnam par
289b2(rgyud 'grel): snang mdzad kyi bdag nyid ming gi dbang bskur bar bya ste/ 'di'i me tog babs pa'i rjes su 'brangs pas rigs kyi rim par rtogs nas/ ming kye dpal zhe sdang rdo rje zhes bya ba'am/ kye dpal gti mug rdo rje/ kye dpal nga rgyal rdo rje/ kye dpal
289b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dod chags rdo rje/ kye dpal phrag dog rdo rje/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa slob dpon gyis bya'o/ /de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyis bdag pos byas pa'i he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor slob ma'i ba spu'i bu ga nas zhugs nas lus la thim par bsam par bya'o//
289b4(rgyud 'grel): chu las tshogs kar rnam par snang mdzad bsam par bya'o/ /de dag ni ming gi dbang bskur ba ste/ kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa gnas gyur nas me long lta bu'i ye shes so/ /dbang bskur ba lnga po 'di rnams kyis dbang bskur ba'i slob ma ni/ sngags
289b5(rgyud 'grel): dang rgyud nyan pa dang bshad pa dang/ gsang sngags sgrub pa la dbang du byas pa yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i ngo bo dbang bskur ba lnga po de dag la ni rig pa'i dbang bskur ba'i sgras kyang brjod par bya ba yin te/ ma rig pa lnga yongs su gyur pa'i
289b6(rgyud 'grel): ngo bo/ /rig pa'i ye shes lnga po rnams sgrub par byed pa'i phyir dang thams cad du sangs rgyas spyan la sogs pa rig pa'i lha mo dbang bskur bar byed pa'i phyir ro/ /de dag ni dbang bskur ba lnga'i rim pa'o/ /de ltar rig pa'i dbang bskur ba lnga po tsam
289b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dod na ni sngar bstan pa'i slob dpon gyi sdom pa mi bzung bar dbang bskur ba lnga byas pa'i de ma thag du rjes su gnang ba dang/ /brtul zhugs sbyin pa dang/ lung bstan pa dang/ dbugs dbyung ba bzhi sbyin par bya'o/ /gal te slob dpon gyi dbang
290a1(rgyud 'grel): bskur par 'dod pa de'i tshe lhag par gnas pa'i skabs su gsungs pa'i slob dpon gyi sdom pa nod pa'i tshogs sdom pa legs par bzung ba 'am/ rig pa'i dbang bskur ba nod pa'i rjes la skabs 'dir cho ga de nyid kyis
290a2(rgyud 'grel): sdom pa bzung ba'i slob ma pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la gtsugs nas thal mo khod stong du sbyar te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'dis bla ma la slob dpon gyi dbang gi don du gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /kye ho snying rje'i gter bdag la/ /khyod kyis
290a3(rgyud 'grel): bka' drin gang gi bdag /bdag dang gzhan don nus 'gyur ba'i/ /rdo rje slob dpon dbang bskur gsol zhes brjod la/ slob dpon gyis kyang rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol tu sngar bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor du slob ma bzhag pa la sa bon
290a4(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa rdzogs pa rdo rje 'chang gi gzugs su rnam par bsgoms la/ rang gi sa bon gyi 'od zer rnams kyis bkug pa mdza' yas pa'i phyogs na bzhugs pa sangs rgyas spyan la sogs pa'i rig pa dang lhan cig pa'i de bzhin gshegs
290a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i me tog dang bdug spos la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa'i yo byang dang ldan pa ye shes kyi chus gang ba'i bum pa thogs pa rnams kyis dbang bskur zhing gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa rnams kyis sngar bstan pa'i bkra shis
290a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi tshigs su bcad pa glu len bzhin par rnam par bsam te/ bde gshegs kun gyi 'gro ba bskyab phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod pas/ dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod pa dang/ oM su pra tiSh+Tha badzra swAhA/ zhes
290a7(rgyud 'grel): bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags kyang brjod par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag dang lha mo de rnams kyis de nyid du ye shes sems dpa' i gzugs kyis zhugs te/ de nas rdo rje sems dpa' cod pan du bsam mo/ /de nas dam tshigs su ma
290b1(rgyud 'grel): gzung bar bya'o/ /de la dam tshig gsum ni 'di yin no/ /yi ge hUM las rdo rje bsgoms la/ thog mdza' med pa sems dpa' mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po thams cad bdag /rdo rje snying po bdag po gtso/ /
290b2(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das dam pa dang po'i skyes bu'o/ /oM mahA badzra hUM zhes kyang brjod de de kho na nyid kyi rdo rje 'dzin du gzhug go /de dag ni rdo rje'i dam tshig go /de nas yi ge a las byung ba'i dril bu/ 'di ni rnal 'byor ma kun gyi/ /shes rab dbyangs
290b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi rjes 'gror bshad/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bzung/ /byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed/ /ces bya ba 'dis 'dzin du gzhug par bya'o/ /srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis bdag /rang bzhin gyis ni dngos med byas/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i sems
290b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan pas/ /srid pa dam pa mchog tu byed/ /ces bya ba 'dis slob mas kyang de dkrol bar bya ste/ oM badzra g+haN+Da a zhes brjod do/ /de dag ni dril bu'i dam tshig go /de'i rjes la/ rdo rje dril bu yang dag 'khyud/ /g.yon snyems
290b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang mchu 'dzin pa/ /gnyis med gnyis 'dzin rnal 'byor bdag /phyag rgya chen por byin gyis brlab/ /de'i 'og tu yid kyi lus ni bstan pa'i phyir/ /phyag rgya dam tshig ces bshad de/ /gang gis lus kun brtan byed pa/ /des na
290b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya rab tu bsgrags/ /zhes bya ba 'dis rang gi 'dod pa'i lha'i lus rdo rje 'chang gi ngo bo can kha sbyor gyi rim pas byin gyis brlabs nas 'khyud pa'i tshul du gzhug go /de dag ni phyag rgya chen po'i dam tshig go /de nas sna tshogs
290b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mchod pa'i khyad par gyis yang dag par mchod nas/ mi bskyod rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis yang dag par bstod do/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na dang/ lha'i de kho na dang/ slob dpon gyi las dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa dang/ slob dpon
291a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jug pa'i bya ba brtan par bya'o/ /de dag ni slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba ste/ ming gzhan phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur ba'o/ /dbang bskur ba drug po 'di rnams ni thams cad du spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams
291a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi bum pa byed du 'jug pas na bum pa'i dbang bskur ba ces brjod do/ /de skad du yang/ bum pa'i dbang ni dang po de zhes gsungs so/ /de nas thung ma mig sman la sogs pa'i cho ga thams cad bya'o/ /'dir rim pa 'di yin te/ slob
291a3(rgyud 'grel): dpon gyis gser gyi thur ma blangs te/ slob ma'i mdun du/ ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis/ /'jig rten rab rib bsal ba ltar/ /bu khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i/ /rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal/ /oM badzra Ni twA ya a pa ha ra phaT
291a4(rgyud 'grel): laM hI(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba 'dis slob ma'i mig tu yi ge braM bsams nas mig sman bskul bar bya'o/ /deng nas brtsams te rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sras dang bcas rnams rnam rol cing/ /rdo rje bsnyems pa'i rab sbyor bas/ /dga' ston bde
291a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i mchod pa gyis/ /sgeg dang bcas pas phreng ba 'phang/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya/ /des ni bcom ldan 'bral mi 'gyur/ /phreng ba de'i rgyan yin no/ /lus can kun la dam chos kyi/ /glu ni khyod kyis blang bar bya//
291a6(rgyud 'grel): de yis bde gshegs dngos grub ni/ /bde ba myur du myong bar 'gyur/ /de nyid thal mo gar gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byos/ /sangs rgyas 'dul ba'i phrin las kyis/ /gar mkhan tshul du bsgyur bar gyis/ /sangs
291a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyas rnams la me tog gtor/ /byang chub yan lag tshogs 'gyur bas/ /mtshan dang dpe byad ldan pa yi/ /bde gshegs sku ni thob par gyis/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas la spos phul bas/ /brtul zhugs bzang pos legs tshim gyis
291b1(rgyud 'grel): lus can bde gshegs cha lugs su/ /ye shes kyis ni tshim par gyis/ /chos kyi me ni legs 'bar bas/ /rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /sems can ma rig ljongs pa la/ /ye shes sgron mas snang bar mdzod/ /rgyal ba rnams la dri phul la/ /
291b2(rgyud 'grel): tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab dang/ /rnam grol ye shes mthong ba yi/ /byang chub lus can rnams la bsgos/ /de nas me long ltar bcug la/ /chos kyi mtshan nyid brjod byas te/ /chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bur ni/ /gsal zhing
291b3(rgyud 'grel): dangs la rnyog pa med/ /gzung du med cing brjod du med/ /rgyu dang las la kun tu byung/ /rang bzhin med cing bdag med pa/ /de ltar chos rnams shes gyis la/ /sems can don ni mnyam med byos/ /'on kyang rnal 'byor ma sras skyes/ /de nas
291b4(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs yig tha mas bskyed pa'i dril bu dkrol ba sngon du 'gro bas byin la/ thams cad nam mkha' i mtshan nyid de/ /nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med/ /nam mkha' dang ni mnyam sbyor bas/ /kun mchog mnyam pa nyid du gsal/ /zhes bya bas dkrol
291b5(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o/ /yi ge ho las byung ba'i mda' gzhu gtad la/ chos nyid gzhu yis ye shes mda'/ /phyogs mtshams steng 'og kun tu 'phongs/ /bdud sogs bcom pas de bzhin gshegs/ /thams cad rjes su mnyam par gyis/ /ces brjod de phyogs
291b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi dang steng 'og tu mnga' re 'phang ba ltar bya'o/ /de nas oM badzra he tu bam zhes bya ba 'dis 'khor lo rkang pa'i bar du bzhag la/ deng nas brtsams te sems bskyed la/ /bdag dang lhan cig pa tsam gyis/ /bya ba spyod tshul gsang ba yi/ /chos kyi
291b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo bskor bar bgyi/ /zhes so/ /de nas oM badzra b+hA Sha raM zhes bya bas lag pa g.yas su dung byin la/ khyed kyis te tshom dogs med par/ /yid gnyis med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /chos kyi dung ni bla med pa/ /dri med kun tu dag par gyis zhes so//
292a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas dbyangs yig dang po las byung ba'i thod par g.yon par byin la/ gsang sngags theg pa'i tshul dang lugs/ /'jig rten rnams la rtag tu ston/ /de nas sangs rgyas drin shes shing/ /phan par byed pa yin
292a2(rgyud 'grel): par gsungs/ /des ni rdo rje 'dzin kun gyis/ /khyod la rtag tu bsrung bar mdzad/ /ces brjod do/ /de nas rim pa bzhin du ni/ /rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i gzugs su slob ma dmigs nas 'di skad brjod par bya ste/ sems can kun
292a3(rgyud 'grel): la phan bya'i phyir/ /bdag gis 'jig rten thams cad du/ /ji ltar gdul bya sna tshogs pas/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyis/ /chos kyi gnas su rdo rje dang/ /rin po che dang pad+ma dang/ /las kyi sgra rnams bcug la rim gyis tshigs su
292a4(rgyud 'grel): bcad pa lngas rjes su gnang ba sbyin par bya'o/ /de dag ni chos kyi de kho na nyid do/ /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang dgug /sdang bar byed dang rengs sogs dang/ /gsang dang bskrad pa thams cad de/ /las de rnams ni sgrub par gyis/ /ral gri mig
292a5(rgyud 'grel): sman sa 'og dang/ /mchil lhag de bzhin dril bu ste/ /rnal 'byor ma yi dngos grub ni/ /de dag ci dga' bsgrub par gyis/ /slob mas kyang de bzhin du bla ma'i zhabs kyi chu skyes gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas/ gtso bos ji skad bka' stsal pa//
292a6(rgyud 'grel): de ltar bdag ni bgyid par 'tshal zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de dag ni rjes su gnang ba sbyin pa'o/ /de'i rjes la rdo rje sems dpa' i gzugs su dmigs la/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i phyag na bsnams/ /khyod kyis
292a7(rgyud 'grel): kyang ni rtag tu bzung/ /phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan/ /slob mas kyang oM sarbba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badzra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e Sha twAM d+ha ra ya mi badzra satwa hI hi hi hi hi hUM zhes brjod cing rdo rje bzung bar bya'o/ /rdo rje'i brtul zhugs so/ /kha TwAM ga ni
292b1(rgyud 'grel): lha'i sku/ /byang chub sems kyi ngo bo nyid/ /rdo rje kha TwAM rdo rjer bcas/ /thabs chen po ni blang bar gyis/ /shes rab Da ma ru yi sgra/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rang bzhin/ /bde gshegs 'gro don la bskul ba/ /bu khyod kyis ni rtag tu bzung/ /mchod
292b2(rgyud 'grel): phyir thogs dang rnal 'byor snod/ /snying rje chen po bdud rtsi che/ /'gro ba thams cad skyong byed pa/ /dpa' po chen pos blang bar gyis/ /de nas bdag nyid langs te sangs rgyas kyis gzugs su bsam nas/ snying gar g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis chos
292b3(rgyud 'grel): gos 'dzin pa'i tshul dang/ g.yas pa mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgyar byas la/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /ngas ni khyod la lung bstan bya/ /srid pa'i ngan 'gro las gton ste/ /mchog tu srid pa sgrub phyir ro/ /kye che ge mo zhes bya
292b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi sa ma ya stwaM b+hurb+hu ba swA:zhes bya ba 'dis ming dang rjes su mthun pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gang yang rung ba'i gzugs su slob ma dmigs la lung bstan nas/ gang la mtho ba'i phyag rgyas lung bstan par byed pa de 'khor gyi
292b5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par mdzad de/ mtho ba'i phyag rgya 'di nyid kyi mthu dang/ sngags 'di'i stobs yin no snyam du
292b6(rgyud 'grel): dad par bya'o/ /zhes slob ma la brjod par bya'o/ /de dag ni lung bstan pa'o/ /de nas gsang ba brjod par bya ste/ 'dod chags bral ba lta bu'i sdig /khams gsum na ni gzhan med de/ /de bas 'dod chags la bral ba/ /khyod ni nam yang
292b7(rgyud 'grel): mi bya'o/ /ma hA sa ma ya ha na hUM phaT ces brjod pa'o/ /de'i rjes la lha thams cad kyi snying po'i sngags kyis slob ma'i snying gar mngon par sngags te/ lag pa g.yas par bsrung ba'i gdu bu bcings la/ mgo bor las kyi rdo rjes gdugs
293a1(rgyud 'grel): bzung zhing/ skor ba yang byed du bcug nas/ thal mo sbyar ba'i slob ma dkyil 'khor shar sgor gdugs dang bcas par phyag byed du bcug ste/ rgyud ni 'dzin par gyur pa yis/ /slob ma 'di ni phul ba lags/ /
293a2(rgyud 'grel): zhes dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug la gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /de nas slob ma'i yid du 'ong ba brjod par bya ste/ da ni dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyur/ /sngags dang rgyud ni 'dzin pa khyod/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /
293a3(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams kyis kyang bzhed pa yi/ /sems can rnams la brtse don du/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin du bris/ /khyod kyis nan tan bskyed nas su/ /sgrub pa po rnams sngags la sbyor/ /de nas slar yang gzengs bstod par bya ste/ gsang
293a4(rgyud 'grel): chen mchog gi dkyil 'khor ni/ /dam pa mthong dang zhugs pa yi/ /sdig pa kun las rnam grol bar/ /khyod ni de ring nges par gnas/ /bde chen theg pa 'di las ni/ /slar khyod 'chi ba yod ma yin/ /srid pa shin tu dag pa'i phyir//
293a5(rgyud 'grel): srid pa'i sdug bsngal las khyod 'das/ /deng khyod skye ba 'bras bur bcas/ /gang zhig 'dir ni legs gnas par/ /dam tshig lha rnams dang mnyam par/ /'gyur bar 'di la the tshom med/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas pa/ /kun
293a6(rgyud 'grel): gyi che ldan ding dbang bskur/ /khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid che/ /bdag po nyid du nges pa yin/ /de ring bdud rnams las rgyal nas/ /pho brang dam par zhugs pa yin/ /de nyid sangs rgyas nyid thob par/ /'di ni khyod la the
293a7(rgyud 'grel): tshom med/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad kyis/ /gang la mi 'jigs dga' ba gyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung bzhin du/ /khyod la sdig med ma 'jigs shig /de dag ni dbugs phyung ba'o/ /'dir dbang bskur ba'i
293b1(rgyud 'grel): slob ma ni/ /lag pas bzung ste gzi ces bya/ /gnyis med ye shes bla med pa/ /ma lus don ni kun brjod bya/ /nang par sngar langs sems bdag nyid/ /ma lus khrus ni byas nas su/ /bsrung dang bza' ba la sogs pa'i/ /sdom pa'i bdag
293b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid can bsrung ngo/ /lus dang srog la bltos med pas/ /dam tshig dang ni sdom pa bsrung/ /nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du/ /nyin re bzhin du bzlas par bya/ /gang tshe nyams na rnal 'byor pa/ /kha na ma tho sbom por 'gyur/ /dgun zla
293b3(rgyud 'grel): 'bring po nas brtsams te/ /zla ba re re bsrung bar bya/ /gnyis med gnyis med 'khor lo gnas/ /tshes bcu la ni de dag mchod/ /chang dang sha sogs ci yang rung/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs/ /thams cad gnyis med la gnas
293b4(rgyud 'grel): par/ /sh+rI he ru ka rab tu mchod/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma kun la/ /khyod kyis brnyas par mi bya ste/ /dam tshig rab bsrungs bsod nams kyis/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /bud med mthong ba thams cad la/ /g.yon nas lan gsum
293b5(rgyud 'grel): bskor bya zhing/ /spyi bor phyag ni byas nas ni/ /lan gsum bar du gsol ba gdab/ /bdag gi ma khyod bu yin te/ /ji srid byang chub 'byung bar du/ /byang chub yan lag nu ma las/ /'byung ba'i rang gi 'o mas skyongs/ /gnyis med ye shes
293b6(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa'i tshul/ /sngon du bslab pa blangs nas ni/ /nA da la sogs sngon 'gro ba'i/ /tshangs par spyod pa shin tu bsrung/ /dam tshig de la rtag gnas te/ /de sngon 'gro ba sbas pa yid/ /spyod dang grol ba'i gnas 'dod pa'i/ /yid la 'dod pa
293b7(rgyud 'grel): kun grub 'gyur/ /gnyis med ye shes sems ldan la/ /mi bya ba ni ci yang med/ /tshangs par spyod pa rtag mo nas la/ /'dod pa lnga ni spyod par gyis/ /gnyis med la gnas zas la ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs brnga/ /gnyis
294a1(rgyud 'grel): med pa dang thogs med pa/ /dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod pa bya/ /mi mo dbang phyug legs spyad pa'i/ /tshangs spyod bsam gtan de bzhin ni/ /khro ba med par rgyun gcod pa/ /rtag tu sgrub po yongs su bsrung/ /yul kun la
294a2(rgyud 'grel): ni rnam rol cing/ /gnyis med grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma/ /srog ni ji srid gnas pa'i bar/ /bu khyod kyis ni bsgrub par gyis/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni/ /ci dga' bar ni brten par gyis/ /he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor che/ /bsam nas
294a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rab tu brtag /bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ /rnal 'byor ma ni kun gyi gnas/ /de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /he ru ka dpal bdag mchod do/ /dam pa'i chos ni smad mi bya/ /nam yang spang bar mi bya'o/ /mi shes pa
294a4(rgyud 'grel): 'am gti mug gis/ /de ni bstan par mi bya'o/ /rang gi bdag nyid mi spangs te/ /dka' thub kyis kyang gdung mi byed/ /ji ltar bde bas bde bar bzung/ /'di ni ma 'ongs rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa/ /de ltar bdag
294a5(rgyud 'grel): gis bgyid par 'tshal/ /dam tshig dang sdom pa bskyang ba'o/ /bstan par mi bya'o/ /de nas yol ba la sogs pas/ /dben par byas pa'i sa phyogs su/ /rang gi yid du 'ong zhing mdzes/ /gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs/ /yon dang ldan pa/
294a6(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig dang sdom pa can/ rnal 'byor la mkhas pa/ shin tu dad pa can/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ de bzhin nyid du gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i don du bla ma la phul la pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs shing thal mo
294a7(rgyud 'grel): sbyar la/ rdo rje sems dpa' dngos ltar slob dpon la bltas te/ skyob pa med pa'i skyob pa skyabs/ /'khor lo sdom pa bdag la skyobs/ /rgyu med par ni thugs rje che/ /mgon med mgon bdag bka' drin gsol/ /bdag nyid che khyod
294b1(rgyud 'grel): ji bzhin du/ /khyab bdag bdag kyang mdzad du gsol/ /'khor ba'i 'dam gyi tshogs dag tu/ /bdag bying 'di las bdag la skyobs/ /zhes bya ba 'dis gsol ba gdab la/ de nas bla mas kyang rnal 'byor ji lta ba bzhin kun nas mngon du byed cing de
294b2(rgyud 'grel): ma thag du tha mal pa'i bud med kyi gzugs bsal nas lha mo'i gzugs su bskyed do/ /rdo rje dang pad+ma 'du bya ba mngon du 'gro bas rdo rje 'chang gi nga rgyal dang ldan pas/ oM sarbba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ka Na badzra swa b+ha ba at+ma ko haM/ zhes bya ba'i sngags
294b3(rgyud 'grel): brjod nas/ de bzhin nyid kyis pad+ma'i nang rol du rdo rje bsgrub par bya zhing/ snying ga'i sa bon kyi 'od zer rnams kyis gnas sna tshogs na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bdag nyid la bcug nas/ rim gyis dga' ba bzhi rtogs par
294b4(rgyud 'grel): byas la/ rdo rje'i nor bu nga yang lhan cig skyes pa so so'i rang gis rig pa'i ngo bo bstan par bya ste/ mthe bo dang srin lag dag gis bsdams la rdo rje dang pad+ma nas bton la dkyil 'khor ba'i sngags rnams kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag
294b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid rtogs pas de'i mig dang lag pa'i spyod yul min la/ slob ma'i kha'i chu skyes kyi nam mkhar/ 'di ni btung ba rin chen mchog /lus ni rdo rjer rab bsgrub phyir/ /yid kyi chu ni btung bar gyis/ /bu khyod kun tu ye shes 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba 'dis
294b6(rgyud 'grel): me tog gis gzhug go /des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rnam pa'i bdag nyid du rig pas a ho su kha zhes brjod pas kha yi drangs pas/ rang gi longs spyod kyi spugs su gzhug go /de bzhin nyid kyang langs nas rang gi chu skyes
294b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi nang gi lhag ma sbrang rtsi'i thigs pa/ deng nas brtsams te bu khyod kyis/ /brtul zhugs bzang pos 'gro don gyis/ /bram ze rgyal rigs rje rigs dang/ /dmangs rigs mthar skyes bu mo rnams/ /b+ha kha pad+ma tsum pa na/ /bdud rtsi rnams ni
295a1(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub par gyis/ /zhes brjod de/ kha'i pad+ma nam mkhar gos pa med par gzhug par bya'o/ /de dag ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'o/ /de ma thag tu de bzhin nyid gcig par 'dod pa 'am/ de bzhin nyid tha dad par 'dod par
295a2(rgyud 'grel): de mgon pos yang dag par rig par byas nas/ de bzhin gcig tu 'dod pas ni de bzhin nyid de de nyid la'o/ /tha dad pa la yang gzhan te dam tshig dang sdom pa la gnas pa/ sihla dang ga bur dang yang dag par ldan pa/ lo nyi shu rtsa lnga ma
295a3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rang rig pa tsam gyis ye shes mngon du bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la/ /mchod chen ji ltar gsal ba ltar/ /bdag la'ang bskyab pa'i don gyi phyir/ /nam mkha' i rdo rje deng bdag stsol/ /zhes bya bas gsol ba btab pa'i
295a4(rgyud 'grel): slob ma la/ /de'i lag pa de'i lag par gtad nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad dbang por byas te spyi bor rdo rje bzhag ste snying ga'i sa bon las spros pa'i mdza' yas pa'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa rnams kyis ji skad du gsungs pa'i bya ba sngon
295a5(rgyud 'grel): du 'gro bas/ khyod kyi gzung ma nyams dga' 'di/ /brten byar sangs rgyas rnams kyis rtags/ /rdo rje pad+ma rab sbyor bas/ /bde ba dam pa yang dag myong/ /thabs gzhan gyis ni sangs mi rgya/ /'gro ba gsum na 'di dag pa/ /de bas
295a6(rgyud 'grel): 'di dang bral bar ni/ /khyod ni nam yang ma byed cig /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rig pa'i brtul zhugs bla na med/ /rmongs pa gang zhig 'da' byed na/ /mchog gi dngos grub de la med/ /zhes brjod la gtad par bya'o/ /de
295a7(rgyud 'grel): yang tsan dan dang gur gum la sogs pas rnam par byugs shing/ shin tu dri zhim pa'i me tog gis phreng bas nye bar brgyan pas/ gos med par chu skyes kha phye bar mngon par gsal bar ston cing 'di skad smra bar bya'o/ /bshang gci
295b1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs zab dang/ /khrag dang khu ba de bzhin sha/ /rtag par bu med mchog gus pas/ /b+ha ga'i pad+mar 'o byed par/ /bu khyod spro bar byed dam ci/ /bu khyod ji ltar bde bar smros zhes so/ /des kyang bshang gci la sogs lta ba dang/ /bud med
295b2(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu gus par bgyi/ /b+ha ga nyid la 'o bgyid par/ /lha mo ci phyir bdag mi spro/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /nges kyang dga' ba dang byams pa dang bcas pas de skal pa bzang po sdug par blta zhing/ tsog tsog pus chu skyes rab tu bstan nas 'di
295b3(rgyud 'grel): skad smra bar bya'o/ /e ma'o bdag gis pad+ma 'di/ /bde ba kun dang yang dag ldan/ /gang zhig cho ga bsten byed pa/ /de yi mdun na bdag ni gnas/ /rdzogs sangs mnyes par bya la sogs/ /bya ba ci yin pa dmar gyis/ /bde chen rgyal po rang nyid ni//
295b4(rgyud 'grel): 'di nyid na ni rtag tu zhugs/ /b+ha dza mo k+Sha ho zhes pa'o/ /des kyang rang nyid lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas shes rab lha mo'i gzugs su skyed la/ /yi ge hUM las rang gi gsang ba'i rdo rje dkar po/ byA las nor bu dmar po byA ser pos bu ga bkag pa/ yi
295b5(rgyud 'grel): ge a las phyag rgya 'di pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma gsum pa/ dyA las ze'u 'bru dkar po dbyA ser pos bu ga bkag par bsam la g.yon gyi chu skyes kyi g.yon ngos nas gnas pa'i rtsa rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma/ lce yi sbyor bas bskyod cing/
295b6(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga Na badzra swa b+hA wa at+ma kohaM/ zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas pa sngon du 'gro bas/ bla ma'i man ngag las dga' ba la sogs pa'i dbye ba rtogs shing/ rang gi snying ka'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyi tshogs rnams kyis bkug
295b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i lus can/ bla mas kyang de'i sems la spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams bcug pa dang ldan pas dga' bar brtsams par bya'o/ /de nas bla mas yol ba'i phag tu A li kA li'i
296a1(rgyud 'grel): sgo nas slob ma'i rigs brtags la/ rigs nges pa'i phyag rgya rgyud nas gsungs pa bstan par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje pad+mar rab bzhag nas/ /byang chub sems ni btang mi bya/ /bskyod par byas nas dga' ba de/ /
296a2(rgyud 'grel): sems bskor nas ni bsgom par bya/ /rnal 'byor pa'i byang chub sems/ /ji srid gtong bar ma byed pa/ /de srid kun dga' las byung ba'i/ /dga' skyes bde ba ci yang 'thob/ /dngos grub kun gyi gter gyur pa'i/ /byang chub sems ni lhung
296a3(rgyud 'grel): gyur na/ /phung po rnam shes brgyal ba las/ /ma smas dngos grub ga la yod/ /mkha' dbyings rdo rje legs sbyor dang/ /reg las ngo mtshar chen po yi/ /bde ba 'byung ba gang yin de/ /mchog tu dga' bral dbus dag tu/ /mtshon cha
296a4(rgyud 'grel): brtags ste brtan par bya/ /pad mkhar rdo rje'i lte ba yis/ /gnon gnas rdo rje skyil krung las/ /nor bu'i nang chud sems lta zhing/ /ye shes skyes gang de'i ngo bo mchog /'dod chags ma yin chags bral min/ /dbu mar yang ni
296a5(rgyud 'grel): dmigs su med/ /gsum po spangs pa nyid las ni/ /lhan skyes yang dag byang chub brjod/ /gang tshe rnal 'byor pa shes lha/ /mi 'gyur ba yi bde bar gnas/ /thun nam yang na nyin gcig gam/ /zla phyed zla gcig khyud kar la/ /
296a6(rgyud 'grel): bskal pa bskal pa stong dag tu/ /ye shes mngon par brtson par gnas/ /de ltar brtags la nus pa ji lta ba bzhin du legs par gzung la pags kyis phyung la/ chu skyes nas ma gton par byang chub kyi sems dam tshig gi ngo bo de lte
296a7(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi de kho na mthong bas blang bar bya'o/ /yang gsungs pa/ slob mas brtags nas legs bzung ste/ /pad+ma'i nang du phyung nas ni/ /de nas sems ni lce yis su/ /blang bya byang chub sngon 'gro bas/ /zhes bya ste/ de dag ni shes rab ye
296b1(rgyud 'grel): shes kyi dbang bskur ba'o/ /de'i rjes la sbyin par bya ba dbang bskur ba bzhi pa bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya ba ni/ 'di skad du/ de nyid 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don du phun sum tshogs par byed pa/ rtog pa'i rnyog pa dang bral ba nyid kyis bla na med pa yang
296b2(rgyud 'grel): dag par rig pa dang tha mi dad pa/ thub pa'i tshogs dpag tu med pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi bdag nyid yid bzhin nor bu lta bu bstan pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshig gis sbyin par bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa ste/ de yang ji skad du
296b3(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa'i tshogs dbang bskur byin nas ni/ slob ma'i lhag par mos par sems kyis brtags la/ rgya che zab pa'i tshul la shin tu mos pa na/ tshig nyid kyis ni dbang bskur rin chen sbyin par bya/ zhes pa yin no/ /rgya che ba la mos
296b4(rgyud 'grel): sam mi mos pa 'di ji ltar rtogs par bya zhe na/ mtshan ma'i khyad par las te/ de yang gsungs pa du ba las ni mer shes shing/ /chu skyar las ni chur shes bya/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyis/ /rigs ni mtshan ma dag las shes//
296b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gyi pad+ma rab dang zhing/ /dga' bas ba sbu langs pa ni/ /mthong nas mkhas pa de nyid kyis/ /slob ma dam pa rjes su 'dzin zhes pas so/ /zhes bya ba ni bzhi pa'i dbang bskur ba te/ 'di ni yang sbyin pa zhes bya ba yin no/ /de nas sbyin sreg
296b6(rgyud 'grel): gis zhi bar bya ste/ dgang blugs gcig gam gsum mam bdun phul la yon brjod du gzhug go /de dag gis kyang mgu ba'i yid kyis 'byor ba ji lta ba bzhin/ sa gzhi 'am/ glang po 'am/ rta'am/ gser ram/ rgyan nam/
296b7(rgyud 'grel): bu 'am/ chur mra la sogs pa 'am/ bdag nyid grogs nyid du dngos grub bam dge ba la sogs pa yon tan nye bar bsags pa'i phyir/ 'bul lo/ /sangs rgyas zhing sogs dag bya'i phyir/ /khyad par du ni sbyin la spyod/ /dmangs 
297a1(rgyud 'grel): rigs stong phrag gnyis dang ni/ /bram ze gtsang ma gcig dang 'dra/ /bram ze stong phrag gnyis dag kyang/ /dge slong gcig dang rab tu sbyar/ /dge slong stong phrag gnyis dang ni/ /rdul med pa ni gcig dang mnyam/ /
297a2(rgyud 'grel): rdul med stong phrag gnyis dang ni/ /ye shes ldan pa gcig dang sbyar/ /ye shes ldan pa stong phrag gnyis/ /slob dpon gcig dang mnyam par mchod/ /de ltar sbyin pa'i zhing shes nas/ /blo dang ldan pas rtag tu sbyin/ /rnal 'byor rtsa ba'i
297a3(rgyud 'grel): chos la ni/ /zhing bzang po las sa bon gdab/ /de nas yon phul ba de blangs la/ zas dang gnas la sogs pa thams cad kyis rang gzhan dag tshogs kyi 'khor los mchod par bya ste/ skal ba dang ldan pa'i slob ma rnams kyis bzung la/
297a4(rgyud 'grel): che mchog sna tshogs pas tshim par byas la/ srid pa gsum 'bar sku ni rjes chags dul bar ldan/ /'od zer rnon po stong ldan nyis brgya stong ldan/ /rnam mang sku dang cha lugs rjes chags sems dang ldan/ /he ru ka dpal sngags pa lhan
297a5(rgyud 'grel): cig gar byed do/ /hA hA hU hU hUM/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rdo rje'i glu blang ngo/ /de nas mchod pa dang bstod pa la sogs pa gdab ste/ oM khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad/ /rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol/ /slar yang byon par
297a6(rgyud 'grel): mdzad slad du/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs su gsol/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM badzra muM:zhes brjod de ye shes pa'i 'khor lo gshegs su gsol nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor bdag la bsdus te/ lha'i nga rgyal brtan pas chos thams cad ni ma skyes
297a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'o/ /zhes brjod cing rdo rje rtse mo'i shar phyogs kyi sgo nas brtsams te/ 'khor lo dbyi bar bya'o/ /de nas don du gnyer bdag la rdul tshon cung zad byin la/ chu bo chen po thams cad la dor bar bya'o/ /
297b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshams med pa dang sdig ngan yang/ /chon rtsi mthong bas grol bar 'gyur/ /'dir dbang bskur ba tsam gyis ni/ /gtsang ma'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur/ /khung bu dgang dang rab gnas dang/ /sbyin sreg 'khor lo'i nar gang yin/ /de kun slob dpon
297b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid yin zhes/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa mchog gis gsungs/ /bde mchog dkyil 'khor chog ni/ /mkhas rnams mngon par 'dod pa bzhin/ /bdag gis 'dir ni bkod pa la/ /bsod nams rgya che gang thob pa/ /de yi bdag dang 'gro ba kun/ /
297b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'chang chen nyid gyur cig /bcom ldan 'das dpal bde mchog gi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rin po che rab tu gsal ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba/ slob dpon dpal la ba pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
297b4(rgyud 'grel): */ (/dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i sgrub thabs bzhugs/) /*/ /rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI tsakra saM pa raM sA d+ha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
297b5(rgyud 'grel): yi dags gdan la bzhugs shing zhal rnams kun la spyan gsum dang ni phag mo dmar mo'i lus/ /rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis 'khyud gzhan gnyis kyis ni myur du glang chen gtso bo'i pags pa brgyangs/ /lhag ma g.yon pa'i phyag bzhis kha TwAM
297b6(rgyud 'grel): ga dang zhags pa mi thod tshangs pa'i mgo bo 'phyang/ /g.yas pas gri gug rtse gsum dgra sta rnge chung 'chang ba'i he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde mchog 'khor lo gsang ba'i don/ /sgrub pa'i gsang sngags kun bsdus nas/ /brda yi skad kyis sbas
297b7(rgyud 'grel): pas te/ /sgrub pa'i thabs de bdag gis bshad/ /snying ga'i sa bon 'od tshogs kyis/ /mdun du bde gshegs spyan drangs nas/ /mchod pa kun gyis legs mchod de/ /dkon mchog gsum la sogs pa brjod/ /thams cad stong par rnam
298a1(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms nas/ /sna tshogs pad nyi hUM rdo rje/ /hUM byung mkha' 'gro'i tshogs spros te/ /blo dang ldan pas phung sogs bya/ /blo dang ldan pas mkha' dbyings su/ /'byung ba thams cad 'dus pa las/ /ji ltar sna tshogs gzhir gyur pa'i
298a2(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba bzhi yi rnam par bsgom/ /de yi rim pa 'di yin te/ /ba lang gnas kyi lci skam dang/ /lhag ma mgo skam de nas su/ /dung chen po yi ngo bo dang/ /mi phyed rus sbal dag 'gyur bas/ /phyag bzhi pa dang zhabs bzhi pa/ /de bzhin phyag
298a3(rgyud 'grel): 'bum par du ste/ /sku mdog dkar po khro bo rje/ /rdo rje dril bu lus la 'khyud/ /dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba can/ /sku la thal bas nye bar byugs/ /zhal gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs/ /yi dags chen po gdan du byas/ /rgyal ba'i 'od zer sprin chen
298a4(rgyud 'grel): po/ de las kun tu rnam par 'phro/ /phyag rgya drug gis lus la brgyan/ /ral ba yi ni thor tshugs can/ /g.yas kyi zhal ni gnag pa ste/ /g.yon pa dmar ba 'jigs pa can/ /rtsa ba'i zhal ni shin tu dkar/ /rgyab ni gser du snang ba'o/ /
298a5(rgyud 'grel): dus min 'chi las rnam rgyal zhing/ /yan lag kha TwAM ga dang sbyar/ /thod pa arg+ha snod kyis ni/ /zhal dang mtshon char nges sbyar ba'o/ /de yi shes rab 'jigs pa mo/ /thod pa'i dum bu'i ska rags can/ /thod pa shin tu gang ba dang/ /de
298a6(rgyud 'grel): yi kha dog lag tshar 'dzin/ /ri bo tshang tshing sman ljongs dang/ /rgya mtsho chen po'i ngos dag la/ /gdong nas grub pa'i dur khrod du/ /der ni dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /ji ltar chos kyi skur gyur pa'o/ /de ltar sprul dang bsrung bar bya/ /kha sbyor kha sbyor
298a7(rgyud 'grel): du gyur pa/ /rdo rje lu gu rgyud du brjod/ /rdo rje 'byed byed pad+ma la/ /de tshe bung ba lta bur 'khor/ /brud pa rdo rje nyid du bshad/ /de nas rim bzhin spros byas nas/ /lcags kyu nyid kyis 'khyud bya ste/ /gtun shing gis ni bskyod par bya/ /dbyig pa'i
298b1(rgyud 'grel): mda'i mnyam sbyor te/ /de nas rig ma khu bar gyur/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yi/ /myur ba nyid du bdag la bskul/ /oM mahA he ru ka badzra swAhA dza:hUM raM ho(rgyud 'grel): su ra tastwaM dri sh+ya ho/ /zhes bya ba'i yongs su bskul ba tsam gyis ni/ /'jig rten
298b2(rgyud 'grel): khams kyi bde ba'i bdag /ji ltar bskyed pa'i rims pa bzhin/ /gnyug ma'i sngags las byung gyur te/ /khu ba'i gzugs la rdo rje can/ /de nas A:hUM gnyis las bzhengs/ /kha dog sngon po 'jigs pa po/ /dmar po 'od kyis dkyil
298b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor 'bar/ /zhal bzhi pa ste 'jigs pa can/ /drug gnyis phyag gis rnam par brgyan/ /u ma u ma'i bdag po mnan/ /nyin byed dbang phyug gdan du bting/ /rtsa ba'i zhal ni shin tu gnag /g.yas pa kun da lta bu ste/ /g.yon pa dmar
298b4(rgyud 'grel): po 'jigs pa po/ /nub ni gser du 'bar ba'o/ /sngar gyi lag char yang dag ldan/ /spyan gsum gyis kyang yang dag mdzes/ /cung zad khro zhing bzhad pa'i zhal/ /g.yon brkyang ba yi gar gyis bzhugs/ /de yi shes rab phag mo ni/ /dmur
298b5(rgyud 'grel): mo kha dog cher 'bar ba/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis rnam par mdzes/ /rdo rje dang ni mi thod 'phyang/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal bzhi byin gyis brlab pa ni/ /oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha huM huM phaT/ oM grih+Na grih+Na huM huM phaT/ oM grih+Na ya ya grih+Na pa ya hu
298b6(rgyud 'grel): huM phaT/ oM A:na ya ho b+ha ga pA na bidya rA dza huM huM phaT/ de ni lugs las bzlog pa'o/ /oM d+harmA d+ha tu swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ zhes bya ba ni bsnyen pa'o/ /oM hi snying gar rdo rje sems dpa' o/ /oM na ma hi spyi bor rnam par snang mdzad do/ /oM
298b7(rgyud 'grel): swA hu hu spyi gtsug? tu pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug go /oM bau Sha Ta te mtshan khung gnyis su dpal he ru ka ro/ /oM hUM hUM ho mig gnyis su rdo rje nyi ma'o/ /oM phaT haM rta mgrin te/ yan lag thams cad la mtshon cha'o/ /oM baM lte bar rdo rje phag mo'o/ /
299a1(rgyud 'grel): oM hoM yoM snying gar gshin rje ma'o/ /oM h+rI moM khar rmongs byed ma'o/ /oM h+reM h+raiM spyi bor bskyod byed ma'o/ /oM hUM hUM spyi gtsug tu skrag byed ma'o/ /oM phaT phaT lha mo'i gnas thams cad la/ /nye ba'i sgrub pa'o/ /snying
299a2(rgyud 'grel): ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i yi ge hUM ni thugs rdo rje'o/ /oM h+rI:ha ha huM hUM phaT klog mar gsung rdo rje'o/ /oM sh+rI badzra he he ru ru kaM hUM hUM phaT DA ki nI dzA la saM ba ra swAhA ni dpral bar sku rdo rje'o/ /oM sarbba bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye badzra war+Na nI ye
299a3(rgyud 'grel): huM hUM phaT swAhA zhes bya ba ni lha mo'i snying gar ro/ /oM tsa haM hUM phaT lkog mar ro/ /oM badzra bai ro tsa ni hUM phaT dpral bar ro/ /spyi bor yi ge oM mo/ /snying gar yi ge hUM ngo/ /ze 'bru la yi ge a'o/ /rked par ni yi ge swa'o/ /brlar ni yi ge ha'o zhes
299a4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni sgrub pa'o/ /ye shes dam tshig mnyam gyur pas/ /de phyir 'di ni rdo rjer brjod/ /dbang gi don ni bsgoms byas nas/ /phyis ni mchod pas mnyes par bya/ /ling ga gnyis la sngags bkod la/ /sna rtse ra a yig rnam par dgod/ /de
299a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin ling ga'i lte ba la/ /yi ge baM ni rnam par bsam/ /blo ldan rnal 'byor ma la bsrub/ /dag pa'i lus ni dri ma med/ /ces bya ba 'di ni dang po'i rnal 'byor ro/ /oM sarbba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga Na At+ma kohaM/ snying ga'i sa bon 'od zer gyis/
299a6(rgyud 'grel): bde bar gshegs pa spyan drangs te/ /a ba d+hU tI gnas de bzhin/ /smin ma'i bar du nges par gzhug /dang por dbyangs dang yang dag ldan/ /de ni skad cig gis bsal bsgom/ /mgal me'i 'khor lo ltar gnas pa/ /rnal 'byor ma ni de
299a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin no/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba du ma ni/ /'khor lo thams cad kyi ni sgo/ /zhal bzhi dpa' bo rnams kyis so/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor mas yongs bskor/ /rtsa ba'i lam ni thams cad du/ /sngags pa ji ltar dbye 'dod na/ /de nyid dbye ba tha
299b1(rgyud 'grel): dad nyid/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni zhes sbyor byed/ /chags pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /dgos pa'i phyir ni rab sgrub byed/ /dam pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams kun/ /yul dang yul la nges par sbyar/ /de nas mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni/ /gnas la rnam
299b2(rgyud 'grel): par gnas pa te/ /shar nas mkha' 'gro ma sngo skya'i 'od can no/ /byang nas lA ma ljang ser ma'o/ /nub nas dum skyes ma dmar ser ro/ /lho nas gzugs can ma dkar ser gyi mdog can te/ 'di thams cad ni ro'i steng na thod pa dang gri khug
299b3(rgyud 'grel): lag na thogs pa/ skra gyen du mdzes pa/ rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa zhal gcig pa/ dbu la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan gyis mtshan pa yang dag par ldan pa gar stabs kyis bzhugs pa'o/ /thod pa rnams su glang po che dang ce spyang dang mi
299b4(rgyud 'grel): dang ba lang rnams rim pa ji lta ba'o/ /mtshams bzhir yang sngar gcig gis ma tshang ba'i snod do/ /mgo bo pul+lI ra ma la ya nas khaN+Ta ka pA li dang rab tu gtum ma ste/ so dang sen mo 'bab pa'o/ /spyi gzugs 'bar ba 'dzin pa nas
299b5(rgyud 'grel): ma hA kaM kra la dang gtum pa'i mig can ma ste/ spu dang skra 'bab pa'o/ /rna ba g.yas pa o Da ya na nas kaM ka la dang 'od ldan ma ste/ pags pa dang dri ma 'bab pa'o/ /ltag pa na arbu da nas mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang/ sna chen ma ste
299b6(rgyud 'grel): sha 'bab pa'o/ /de dag ni shar phyogs la sogs pa rnams lugs dang mthun pa'o/ /rna ba g.yon pa'i mchod sbyin nas dpa' bo bzang po dang/ dpa' bo'i bla ma ste/ thams cad du chu rgyun 'bab pa'o/ /smin dbus dga' ba'i dbang phyug nas
299b7(rgyud 'grel): 'od dpag tu med pa dang/ mi'u thung ma ste/ rus pa dang dri ma 'bab pa'o/ /mig gnyis lha mo'i mkhar nas rdo rje 'od dang lang ka'i dbang phyug ma ste/ de ni rtag tu mchi ma 'bab pa'o/ /dpung pa mA la be nas rdo rje'i lus dang/ shing grib ma
300a1(rgyud 'grel): ste snying ga'i chu 'bab pa'o/ /de dag ni dbang ldan sa la sogs pa'i mtshams nas/ thugs kyi 'khor lo mkha' spyod ma rnams snyoms par zhugs pas zhugs so/ /de bzhin du mtshan khung 'dod pa'i gzugs
300a2(rgyud 'grel): nas aM gu ri dang/ i ra ba ti ste/ de rtag tu mig 'bab pa'o/ /nu ma gnyis po o dre nas/ rdo rje ral pa can dang/ 'jigs byed chen mo ste/ mkhris pa 'bab pa'o/ /lte ba tri sha ku ni nas dpa' bo chen po dang/ /rlung gi
300a3(rgyud 'grel): shugs can ma ste/ glo ba 'bab pa'o/ /sna'i rtse mo kos la nas/ badzra dU ka ra dang/ chang 'thung ma ste/ rgyu ma'i phreng ba 'bab pa'o/ /de dag ni shar la sogs pa gnas so/ /kha ka ling ka nas su b+ha dra dang/ ljang lha mo ste/ log gis rtsa 'bab
300a4(rgyud 'grel): par bshad pa'o/ /mgrin pa lampa ka nas rdo rje bzang po dang/ shin tu bzang mo ste/ lte bar 'bab pa'o/ /snying kany+tsi nas 'jigs byang chen mo dang/ rta rnam ste/ bi sna ma 'bab pa'o/ /'doms par hi mA la nas mig bzang dang/ kha ga
300a5(rgyud 'grel): na ste/ mtshogs ma'i srubs 'bab pa ste/ /mtshams su sngar bzhin te/ gsung gi 'khor lo sa spyod ma ste/ de rnam ni snyoms par zhugs pas rnam par gnas so/ /ling ga yi dags lhag par gnas so/ /stobs po che dang 'khor lo'i
300a6(rgyud 'grel): shugs can te/ bad kan 'bab pa'o/ /bshang ba'i lam khyim gyi gnas nas rin chen rdo rje dang/ dum skyes ma ste dri ni rtag tu 'bab pa'o/ /brla sau rASh+Ta nas/ rta mgrin dang chang 'chong? ma ste/ khrag 'bab pa rab tu grags pa'o/ /byin pa
300a7(rgyud 'grel): gser gling nas/ nam mkha' i snying po dang/ 'khor lo'i go cha ma ste/ rngul 'bab par gyur pa'o/ /de dag ni shar la sogs pa'i phyogs/ /sor mo nag ra nas ni dpal he ru ka dang/ shin tu dpa' mo ste/ tshil 'bab pa'o/ /rkang pa'i rgyab
300b1(rgyud 'grel): sind+hu nas ni pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang stobs chen mo ste/ 'di? ni rtag tu mchi ma 'bab pa'o/ /mthe bo ma ru nas?/ rnam par snang mdzad dang 'khor lo sgyur ma ste/ mchil ma 'bab pa'o/ /bus mo ku lu tA nas/ rdo rje sems dpa' dang brtson
300b2(rgyud 'grel): 'grus chen mo ste/ byis pa'i snabs 'bab pa'o sngon bzhin mchi pas? rnams su ste/ sku'i 'khor lo sa 'og nas spyod pa rnams snyoms pa bzhugs pas bzhugs so/ /shar gyi sgo nas khwa gdong ma'o/ /byang na 'ug gdong ma'o/ /nub nas khyi gdong
300b3(rgyud 'grel): ma'o/ /lho phyogs nas phag gdong can te/ /mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams kyi kha dog dang mtshan ma dang ldan pa/ rol zhon cing? de? la 'od zer 'bar bas/ bzhin kun tu rnam par 'gyur zhing/ sna tshogs su rnam par bsgyur pa ste/ lugs dang
300b4(rgyud 'grel): mthun pa'o/ /pho nya mo rnams ni lugs dang mi mthun pas yang dag par rnam par bzhag ste/ me'i mtshams nas gshin rje'i pho nya ma'o/ /srin po'i mtshams nas gshin rje brtan ma'o/ /rlung mtshams nas/ /gshin rje mche ba gtsigs ma'o/
300b5(rgyud 'grel): dbang ldan gyi mtshams nas gshin rje 'joms ma ste/ 'di dag kyang kha dog gnyis gnyis ma'o/ /yid du 'ong ma snga ma lta bur ro la zhon pa'o/ /dpal he ru ka la sogs pa dpa' bo rnams ni rdo rje dang dril bus 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya can no/ /lha
300b6(rgyud 'grel): mo thams cad kyi phyag na gri gug dang thod pa thogs pa/ sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa/ spyan gsum ma mche ba gtsigs pa/ thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan pa/ 'od zer du ma spro zhing 'bar ba/ khro gnyer yon pos mig gis blta
300b7(rgyud 'grel): ba/ ro mnan cing de las 'od zer 'bar ba nyi ma la gar gyis bzhugs pa'o/ /khwa'i gdong can ma la sogs pa bshad pa ni/ stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can/ thor tshugs kyi nor bu dang/ rna cha dang mgul rgyan dang/ gdu bu dang rdo rje'i
301a1(rgyud 'grel): sked? ba dang/ thod pa'i phreng bas mgul pa brgyan pa de bzhin du rkang pa gnyis la dril bu g.yer kas brgyan pa/ shin tu g.yon brkyang bas bzhugs pa'o/ /gong gi dpa' bo nyi shu bzhi?/ /he ru ka dpal rigs byung
301a2(rgyud 'grel): ba/ mkha' 'gro ma ni nyi shu bzhi/ /phag mo'i rigs las byung ba'o/ /ye shes dam tshig mnyam gyur pas/ /de phyir rdo rje zhes su brjod/ /dbang gi don ni bsgom byas nas/ /phyi nas mchod pas mnyes byas te/ /thams cad snga ma lta bu'o/ /
301a3(rgyud 'grel): da ni byang chub phyogs kyi sum cu rtsa bdun gyi lha'i sbyor bas rnam par bzhag ste/ lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni/ mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya ba nas/ mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams ma bskyed pa ni gshin rje brtan ma'o zhes bya ba'i bar/
301a4(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs te/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi lha'i rnam par dag pa'o/ /snying gi nang song pad+mar ni/ /'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar bcas/ /de'i nang du son pa'i rtsa/ /mar me lta
301a5(rgyud 'grel): bu'i rang bzhin te/ /chu shing gi ni me tog bzhin/ /'phyang zhing kha ni 'og tu'o/ /de yi ngan song dpa' bo ni/ /yungs kar spom phra'i tshad tsam ste/ /gzhon med hUM des sa bon ni/ /ba mo lta bu 'dzag pa nyid/ /lus can rnams kyi snying
301a6(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba/ /de phyir zhes bya rnam par bshad/ /me ni chen po'i gzugs kyis ni/ /phag mo'i thig le ru ni brjod/ /las kyi rlung gis bskul ba yis/ /lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du ni 'bar/ /dpyid thob pas ni mnyes gyur nas/ /snyoms
301a7(rgyud 'grel): par 'jug pa rnam par dag /'di ni he ru ka dpal dpal/ /dpyid kyi thig ler brjod pa'o/ /stong pa nyid kyi tshul 'dzin ma/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu yang dag gnas/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis/ /sgo ni rnam pa gsum 'byung bar/ /
301b1(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba 'di ni 'jug pa ste/ /'di dag thams cad lus la gnas/ /lte ba'i a yi tshul gyis ni/ /thung du ru ni yongs su grags/ /snying la hUM gi yi ge ni/ /ring po tshang gnyis dag tu gnas/ /mgrin par oM sti? gzugs kyi ni/ /shin tu ring po tshang
301b2(rgyud 'grel): gsum pas/ /dpral ba'i haM zhes bya ba ni/ /mi shigs pa'i thig le'o/ /'khor lo bzhi yi dbye ba yis/ /sa sogs 'byung ba bzhi dag dang/ /thun bzhis byin gyis brlabs pa yis/ /skad cig bzhi ni 'byung ba dang/ /dga' ba bzhi yi rang
301b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gyis/ /sbyor ba bzhi yi sngon du'o/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i mtshan nyid kyis/ /bya dang byed pa'i dngos po min/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i tshul gyis ni/ /'dir ni ji ltar bde bar rol/ /pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi po yang/ /phyogs bzhir rnam par gnas
301b4(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ /'byung ba bzhi yi rtsa yin te/ /mar me lta bu'i rang bzhin no/ /mtshams su rnam par gnas pa'i tshe/ /de yi nang song bzhi po yang/ /de nas bdud rtsi lnga 'bab pa/ /de nyid rang bzhin med tshul gyis/ /'dir ni mchod pa'i tshul gnas bas/ /
301b5(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa bzhin du yang dag bshad/ /lus kyi snying gi nang na ni/ /rtsa rnams brgyad ni rnam par gnas/ /gzhan yang sku gsung thugs dbye bas/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi yang dag bshad/ /gnas sogs dbye ba la brten te/ /gnas dang gnas la rnam par
301b6(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ /ltung byed la sogs rnam dag pa/ /khwa gdong la sogs sngar ji bzhin/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can gyis rgyas btab pa'i phyir gsungs so/ /rdzas bcu las ni sngar bsam pa/ /yi ge a las byung ba'i snod/ /rlung gi me yi dkyil
301b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor la/ /sbar bas 'khor bar gyur pa dang/ /dbyangs yig dang po yang dag ldan/ /skad cig de las 'bar zhing blta/ /bzlog pa'i ye ge mnyam sbyor ba/ /rgyud kyi sngags ni bsgom par bya/ /yi ge oM gyis kun gsal bas/ /de nyid
302a1(rgyud 'grel): gsum la yang dag brjod/ /de ltar bsgom gyur na lha mo/ /rdzas kyi dngos grub bzang po byed/ /'di yi rnal 'byor dngos grub ni/ /byin gyis brlab par yang dag 'gyur/ /oM a ra lI dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya stwaM/ oM badzra
302a2(rgyud 'grel): DA ki ni/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ i maM pa liM b+huny+dza tha pi ba tha ma ma karma sA d+ha ya tha oM A:hUM pheM pheM swAhA/ oM na mo b+ha ga wa he pI re shA ya/ mahA kalpAgni saM ni b+hA ya/ dza TA ma ku Totka TA ya/ daMSh+TA ka rA lo gra b+hA Shi na mu khA ya/ sa ha sra
302a3(rgyud 'grel): b+ha su rA ya/ pa ra shu pA sho dyA ta shu la kha TwAM ga d+hA ri Ne/ byag+h+ra dzi nam+ba ra dyA rA ya/ mahA d+hU nbrAnd+ha ka ra wa pu ShA ya/ oM ka ra ka ra ku ru ku ru/ band+ha band+ha/ trA sa ya trA sa ya/ k+Sho b+ha ya k+Sho b+ha ya/ h+rauM h+rauM/ h+ra(rgyud 'grel): h+ra(rgyud 'grel): pheM pheM/ phaT phaT/
302a4(rgyud 'grel): da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha/ ba sa ru d+hi rAn+t+ra mA lA ba laM bi ne/ grih+na grih+na sapta pA hA la ga ta b+hu dzaM gaM sarbaM ShA/ hardza ya hardza ya/ A kaDDhya A kaDDhya/ h+riM h+riM dz+nyauM dz+nyauM/ k+Sh+maM k+Sh+maM haM haM/ hiM hiM/ hUM hUM/ ki li ki li/ si li si li/ hi li hi li/
302a5(rgyud 'grel): d+hi li d+hi li/ huM hUM phaT phaT/ sngags thams cad kyi mdza' ru hUM dang phaT ces bya ba'i yi ge sbyar ro/ /rab tu gtum mo la sogs pa'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni/ rang gi ming gi sngags nye bar brjod do/ /dang por oM gyi yi ge dang/
302a6(rgyud 'grel): mthar hUM gi yi ge rab tu sbyar ro/ /oM sh+rI badzra he he ru ru kaM huM hUM phaT/ DA ki ni dza la saM ba raM swAhA/ oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): ha ha huM hUM phaT/ oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha huM hUM phaT/ oM grih+na grih+na huM huM phaT/ oM grih+na pa ya/ grih+na pa ya huM huM phaT/ oM A na ya
302a7(rgyud 'grel): ho b+ha ga bAM badzra rA dza huM huM phaT/ snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM sarba bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye/ badzra war+N+Na nI ya huM hUM phaT swAhA/ snying po'o/ /oM bai ro tsa nI ye huM hUM phaT swAhA/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM tsau rI hUM hUM phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /rje
302b1(rgyud 'grel): btsun ma'i rkang pa'i sngags so/ /oM ha na ma hi/ swAhA hu/ bau? Sha Ta he hUM hUM ho/ phaT haM/ dpa' bo'i go cha drug go /oM bi haM yoM h+rIM moM h+reM h+rEM hUM hUM phaT phaT/ yi ge oM ni thams cad du ste/ rnal 'byor ma drug gi go cha'o/ /dpal 'khor lo sdom
302b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //*/ (/bde mchog 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bzhugs so// //)
302b3(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ga wA na sh+rI tsa kra saM ba ra maN+Dal bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das dpal bde mchog 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan
302b4(rgyud 'grel): khrag 'thung 'gro ba'i mgon/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi gnyis med la/ /phyag 'tshal dkyil 'khor spyod pa dang/ /brtul zhugs rim pa bsnyen pa bshad/ /lugs su byung? dang bzlog pa dang/ /tha dad phyi ni spas pa dag /shes nas gang yang cho ga 'di/
302b5(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi thams cad bshad par bya/ /sgra dang sgra nyams brda dang ni/ /sdeb sbyor mtshan nyid spangs pa yi/ /'khor lo mchod pa'i cho ga gsal/ /de ni bdag nyid dran phyir dang/ /gar gyi gnas dang mtshungs 'dra ba'i/ /phyi rol bstan
302b6(rgyud 'grel): bcos sun 'byin pa/ /don la rtog pa de nyid can/ /spyod dang thar pa'ang rang dga' yin/ /legs par brtags pa'i slob ma la/ /slob dpon gyis ni dkyil 'khor bri/ /'jam zhing snyan par smra ba dang/ /snying rje la sogs
302b7(rgyud 'grel): phan sems ldan/ /thos dang klog la mngon par brtson/ /gsang ba'i cho ga lhag par dang/ /rtag par rgyun du bla ma gus/ /slob ma de ni yongs su gzung/ /de ni dngos grub ma lus pa/ /sgrub byed ye shes bshad bya ste/ /lha ni mnyes
303a1(rgyud 'grel): par ma byas na/ /bdag nyid rnam par sun 'byin yin/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung 'khor lo yis/ /sngags rnams mnyes par rab dad cing/ /dpa' bo'i snying po'i gsang sngags ni/ /khri drug gsum du bzlas brjod
303a2(rgyud 'grel): bya/ rnal 'byor ma yis 'khor lo yi/ /khri phrag gnyis ni bsnyen par bya/ /kA ka'i gdong sogs rnam pa brgyad/ /snying po rnal 'byor ma bzhi yi/ /stong phrag lnga dang lnga brgya ni/ /sngon du bsnyen pa bya ba ste/ /bdag gam yang na dkyil 'khor ni//
303a3(rgyud 'grel): sngon du bsnyen pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /gang 'dir rjes gnang dbang bskur ba'i/ /bla ma'i gtso bo bri bya zhing/ /'khor lo'i yo byad phun tshogs pa'i/ /slob mas de la gsol ba gdab/ /'khor lo mchod pa'i rim ji bzhin/ /khyod kyis
303a4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad 'byor gyur tam/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma dga' bar/ /gus pa yis ni byed nus sam/ /gal te dpa' bo thams cad du/ /gzi brjid can byed nus smra ba/ /de nas dpa' bo chen pos 'dir/ /shes rab yan lag
303a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med lus/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung rnal 'byor che/ /'khor lo kun la rnam par bzhugs/ /dang po gnas ni khyad par du/ /de las 'bad pas btsal bar bya/ /sems can don bya'i rgyu ru ni/ /bdag gis byang chub de la bdag /da ni
303a6(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub thams cad kyi/ /yon tan gnas ni bshad bya ste/ /shin tu bgrod par dka' ba yi/ /dur khrod chen po'i gnas dag tu/ /ro langs dang ni srin po rnams/ /mi bzad 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs pa/ /yi ge pheM gi sgras khyab pa
303a7(rgyud 'grel): 'am/ /sgrub pa po dang mtshams phyogs su/ /'jigs bral yongs su dag pa'i blos/ /ma lus rnam rtog bral ba yis/ /byams dang snying rje'i rgyan gyis ni/ /'dres med rnal 'byor pa der gnas/ /sems can gcig tu gdug cing
303b1(rgyud 'grel): gsum?/ /sdug bsngal dang ni las kyis gzir/ /stong dang snying rje'i snying po yis/ /byang chub la bzhag yid la bya/ /kye ma sems can sdug bsngal zhing/ /kun rtog la ni mngon par zhe na/ /de yi rtog pa gzhom phyir bdag /dpal ldan he ru ka rang bya/ /sngon
303b2(rgyud 'grel): du bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o/ /gnas las langs pa nyid dang ni/ /'jug dang rdzogs pa nyid dag dang/ /byin gyis brlabs dang dbang bskur dang/ /ting 'dzin mchod pa nye bar bsdu/ /yang dag ye shes rgyud shes shing/ /he ru ka dpal gsang sngags shis//
303b3(rgyud 'grel): khro ba med cing gtsang la mkhas/ /sbyor shes ye shes pha rol 'gro/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung sogs cha lugs/ /bdag nyid sngon du byed bdag ni/ /skye ba bye ba stong phrag tu/ /gsang ba'i ye shes rnam par spangs/ /dman la mos pa'i sems can rnams//
303b4(rgyud 'grel): mthong nas slob dpon tshul la gnas/ /sems can gdon par bya'o zhes/ /snying rjes non pa'i sems dang ldan/ /de bas he ru ka rnal 'byor/ /bde mchog mgon po bdag ston no/ /dam tshig skyong zhing brten byed pa/ /bu khyod cig spro gyur tam/ /he ru
303b5(rgyud 'grel): ka dpal tshul 'di la/ /bza' dang bsrung la brten ba dang/ /skye bo mang po'i sdig pa ni/ /bsags pas rnam par 'jigs byed pa/ /dpa' bo 'khor lo sdom pa yi/ /sdom pa so sor bsrung bar bgyi/ /slob mas gsol ba'o/ /de nas 'dir ni dpa' 
303b6(rgyud 'grel): po ches/ /sngon du spyod pa byas nas ni/ /da ni sems can bsgral bya zhing/ /dga' ba'i sems ni sngon du bya/ /'khor lo bde mchog dpal rnal 'byor/ /rgyud kyi cho gas lha rnams ni/ /mnyes byas dkyil 'khor bri bya zhing/ /sa yang yongs su
303b7(rgyud 'grel): brtag par bya/ /ri dang nags dang sman ljongs dang/ /rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram dang ni/ /sngon nas grub pa'i dur khrod dang/ /yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs dang/ /gang yang sems ni 'dug pa dang/ /mdzes shing yid ni dga' ba ru/ /chu dang ba
304a1(rgyud 'grel): lang lci bas byugs/ /me tog sna tshogs rnam par dgram/ /dbugs dbyung mchog dang bar me dang/ /dri ni chu dang bcas par byugs/ /de la sogs pa mnye ba dang/ /kun tu rgya cher brdung ba dang/ /shar dang byang du
304a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhol bas ni/ /sngags pa rnams ni dngos grub 'grub/ /dbus su mtho bas rgyal srid dam/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i gnas dag thob/ /byang du mtho bas 'chi 'gyur zhing/ /nor rnams rab tu 'jig par byed/ /ji skad bshad pas shar
304a3(rgyud 'grel): mtho bas/ /rigs rnams rab tu bzang bar byed/ /dbus su dma' ba' i rang bzhin gang/ /sgrub pa po ni 'dzams dang ldan/ /de ltar mtshan nyid bcas pa yis/ /dpa' bo'i dbang po sogs pas mtshan/ /sa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o//
304a4(rgyud 'grel): de ltar sbyangs pa byas mdzes pa'i/ /sa yi dbus su 'dug nas su/ /mdzes dkar ma mo zhes bya ni/ /bskul bas 'di yis gsol ba gdab/ /dang por sgra la sogs sngon gyis/ /rnal 'byor dmigs pa thams cad du/ /dpal ldan khrag
304a5(rgyud 'grel): 'thung rnal 'byor che/ /gnyis med ye shes la legs gnas/ /sa la reg pa'i phyag rgya dang/ /mi shigs thig ler byas pa yis/ /sor mos lan gsum bsnun pa ni/ /bkug gnas mdun du 'dug par bsam/ /yan lag
304a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyan rnams thams cad dang/ /kha dog ser po legs par mdzes/ /lag na bum pa thogs nas ni/ /bdag gis ci bgyi bka' stsol smra/ /mchod yon rkang pa dkrug sogs byin la/ /gzi brjid can de 'di ltar bya/ /skyob pa sangs
304a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyas thams cad kyis/ /spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyi/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ /lha mo khyod ni dpang du gyur/ /shAkya seng ges skyob pa yis/ /ji ltar bdud ni sde bcom pa/ /de bzhin bdag gis bdud sde las/ /rgyal bar
304b1(rgyud 'grel): byas nas dkyil 'khor bri/ /de skad lan gsum brjod nas ni/ /der ni thim par rnam par bsam/ /sa bslad pa'o/ /mgul rgyan gdu gu rna rgyan dang/ /spyi bor nor bus rnam par brgyan/ /mchod phyir thogs rgya thal ba yi/ /rgya yis yan lag kun
