304b2(rgyud 'grel): nas brgyan/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung rnal 'byor che/ /sgom nas bgegs rnams bsal bar bya/ /de nas rkang pa gnyis su yi ge hUM las 'bar ba'i rdo rje bsam la/ mig gnis su ma dang Ta las zla ba dang/ nyi ma bsam te/ rdo rje lta bas thams
304b3(rgyud 'grel): cad du bltas la/ lag pa g.yon pas dril bu bzung zhing/ g.yas kyis rdo rje gsor ba la 'bad de/ kha TwAM ga la legs par khyud nas de ni gnas pa 'dis bskrad par bya'o/ /sa phyogs 'dir sems can gyi don rtsom gyi lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod
304b4(rgyud 'grel): sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ 'byung po dang/ yi dags dang/ srin po dang/ srin mo la sogs pa gang dag gnas pa'i sa'i bdag po myur du song shig /'di ltar dpal he ru ka'i bka' nos la myur ba nyid du sod shig /gang dag mi 'gro ba re la pa'i
304b5(rgyud 'grel): ye shes kyi rdo rje dang/ kha TwAM 'dis spyi bo nas rnam pa brgyar dgra par bya'o zhes lan gsum brjod par bya'o/ /dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te g.yas nas lan gsum du bskor bar bya'o/ /bskal pa'i me lta bu'i 'od zer rkang pa'i 'og
304b6(rgyud 'grel): nas byung nas gdug pa rnams bsregs par gyur nas phan tshun byer bar gyur par bsam mo/ /g.yas dang g.yon du bskor ba dang/ /'khyud dang ku tsa pa yi dang/ /ba ri ti dang swa ti ka /bring de ke shig kya la sogs/ /chags bcas tshul gyis
304b7(rgyud 'grel): sbyor bas ni/ /rol pa rab tu bya ba dang/ /rol pa'i goms stabs bcas pa 'am/ /gom pa brgyad par gar bya'o/ /rkang pa bskyod dang lag pa bskyod/ /smin ma 'degs dang rab dags 'brang/ /cung zad ngo tsha'i mag zur dang/ /brla rgyas
305a1(rgyud 'grel): lta na sdug pa dang/ /mig yangs gang ni byed 'gyur zhing/ /kha yi pad+ma 'dzum dang bcas/ /cung zad dman pa'i mche ba 'chang/ /kunda ltar dkar so yi khreng/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung rnal 'byor che/ /sems can
305a2(rgyud 'grel): sgrol la rmad du byung/ /de la sogs pa gar gyis ni/ /bgegs la sogs pa bskrad par bya/ /zhal bzhi la sogs sngags kyis ni/ /phur bu ra ba dra ba bya/ /tha ma pa dbyangs yig las byung ba yi/ /sna tshogs rdo rje'i rang bzhin
305a3(rgyud 'grel): las/ /yi ge bdun gyis sngags kyis ni/ /rdo rje'i lta bas ltas nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni sa yi cha/ /nyes dang ldan yang dag par 'gyur/ /bgegs bsal ba'o// //nA da sogs pa'i gzugs las byung/ /ri la sogs
305a4(rgyud 'grel): pa ji bzhin bsam/ /in+d+ra nI la'i sa gzhi la/ /'khor lo gsum gyi bdag nyid bsam/ /sna tshogs pad+ma 'jam pa la/ /ji bzhin gnas su rnam par bsam/ /A li kA li la sogs las/ /dkyil 'khor du ni rnam par brtag /
305a5(rgyud 'grel): de la gtso bo'i gnas su ni/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung shes rab kyi/ /phaiM brang mchog dpa' rnal 'byor ma/ /yan lag gnyis med 'dus gyur pa/ /gnyis su med par ji bzhin bsam/ /rang bzhin mi gnas ye shes 'khor lo ni/ /
305a6(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig 'khor lo 'di yi gzhug par bya/ /rkang pa gnon cing gyen du bltas nas ni/ /pheM zhes bya ba'i sgra ni bsgrag par bya/ /phyogs bcur gnas pa'i dpa' bo dang/ /rnal 'byor ma ni dgug pa ste/ /dang por go cha ji bzhin pas//
305a7(rgyud 'grel): legs pa nyid du bsrung bar bya/ /mdzub gnyis mdud cing gung mo gnyis/ /sbyar te mthe bo rdo rje ni/ /brtan par sbyar la dpral pa yi/ /dbus su legs par bzhag par bya/ /phyag rgya ma mo'i chogs bskul nas/ /bskor zhing
305b1(rgyud 'grel): bskor zhing nges gzhug par/ /dam tshig 'khor lo bsam par bya/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang gnas bdag ni/ /yid kyi mkha' bsam yid gzhug bsam/ /sa yi 'jig rten dag phyogs gzhug /sa 'og lus ni kun la sbyar/ /rang mdog phyag tshogs
305b2(rgyud 'grel): yan lag 'khyud pa dang/ /thams cad mchod cing phyogs su ma mo rnams/ /mtshams su brgyad po rnams dang sa yi ni/ /bdag po rnams kyang legs par bsam par bya/ /ye shes 'khor lo spyan drangs pa'o// //rang gi ming brjod gsang sngags
305b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal/ /dang por oM dang hUM gnyis ldan/ /phaT dang yang dag sbyar ba ni/ /lha rnams ma lus pa yi yin/ /bar mar bugs phyung mchog dri chu/ /mchod par rtag tu brtson pa dang/ /cho ga'i rjes mthun thams cad mchod/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung
305b4(rgyud 'grel): sogs bsam pa/ /rang gnas dbus kyi phyogs su ni/ /yongs su bskor cing bshad pa yi/ /gsang sngags ji bzhin rim dang po/ /g.yon nas bskor zhing rang bdag dang/ /tha dad phyi yi me tog sogs/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung rjes mthun
305b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gro/ /ma lus lhag par gnas bya zhing/ /gsang sngags rgyal po sngon 'gro bas/ /phyogs kun ma lus khyab pa dang/ /ku tsa gnyis ni 'khyud pa yis/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung sogs sum bcu/ /rtsa bdun rnam bsams tshogs mchod
305b6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med ye shes las byung ba/ /khyab bdag dngos kun bdag nyid can/ /ston pa'i gtso bo khrag 'thung dpal/ /phag mo lhan cig yang dag ldan/ /gang du phyogs bcu'i dpa' bo dang/ /rig pa'i lha mo rdzu 'phrul can/ /byang chub
305b7(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' la sogs kun/ /ma lus bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /dri zhim me tog 'phreng ba dang/ /thod pa der mi lnga pa ste/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung sogs kun la/ /bdug spos legs par 'bul bar bya/ /de 'og rang gi
306a1(rgyud 'grel): dbugs dbyung bsam/ /tshogs brtul zhugs can zhugs par bya/ /lha la gsol pa gdab pa'o// //slob ma'i gtso bo la sogs pa/ /lhag par gnas bya mchod par bya/ khu tshur theg pa
306a2(rgyud 'grel): chen po la/ /khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te/ /gsang sngags spyod pa'i cho ga 'di/ /khyod la yang dag bshad par bya/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'das dang/ /de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang/ /da ltar byung ba rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /
306a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro la phan phyir bzhugs pa kun/ /de dag kun gyi gsang sngags kyi/ /cho ga bzang po 'di mkhyen nas/ /dpa' bo byang chub shing drung du/ /thams cad mkhyen pa mtshan med brnyes/ /gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med de/ /skyob pa
306a4(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan he ru kas/ /bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pas/ /dpung chen dag kyang de'i bcom/ /de bas kun mkhyen thob pa'i phyir/ /bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig/ /dpa' bo yan lag las byung ba'i/ /sdom pa la sogs slob ma la/ /
306a5(rgyud 'grel): byang chub thob pa'i don gyi phyir/ /cho ga thams cad sbyin par bya/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /rtag par bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /rnal 'byor gsang sogs mkha' 'gro ma/ /'khor lo gsum gyi bdag nyid can/ /kun la/
306a6(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu skyabs su mchi/ /dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang lha mo/ /byang chub sems dpa' i bdag nyid che/ /khyad par du yang slob dpon la/ /rtag par bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /dpal chen khrag 'thung sogs pa'o/ /rnal 'byor ma dang snang mdzad
306a7(rgyud 'grel): sogs/ /byang chub sems dpa' dpag med la/ /thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /cho ga dus 'di nas gzung ste/ /ji srid gnyis med la gnas par/ /de yi tshangs spyod gnyis med pa/ /nyi shu rtsa gnyis legs par
306b1(rgyud 'grel): bsrung/ /rang gi srog ta ni yi rgyun/ /yi ge bdun gyi mngon bsngags pas/ /slob ma la ni bsrung pa'i phyir/ /thigs pa kun tu dag par bya/ /'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyis ni/ /kha nas thams cad dbang bskur ro/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni sa yi cha/ /gnyis
306b2(rgyud 'grel): med ye shes las byung mchog /dpal chen kun gyi rang lha mo/ /mchod pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad/ /phyi nang bdag nyid can gyis kyang/ /dpal chen khrag 'thung 'khor lo mchod/ /slob ma lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o/ /shes rab can gyis nang par sngar
306b3(rgyud 'grel): thig gdab gnyis med ye shes las/ /byung ba'i dkyil 'khor kun bri'o/ /slob dpon mtshan nyid bzang dang ldan/ /yang dag ye shes de nyid shes/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung gsang sngags shes/ /khro med gtsang la mkhas pa dang/ /sbyor shes
306b4(rgyud 'grel): ye shes pha rol 'gro /thod pa la sogs spyi bor bcings/ /yan lag thams cad rnam par byugs/ /lus la phyag rgya drug la sogs/ /kha TwAM ga ni lag na thogs/ /brgya phyed pa'i phreng bas brgyan/ /he ru ka'i rang byas te/ /'khor lo la
306b5(rgyud 'grel): bltas snying gar dgod/ /de ltar bdag nyid go bgos shing/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas brgyan nas ni/ /dngos grub chen por brtsol ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri bar bya/ /de nas ro yi srang bu la/ /mahA ru ti ras brlan pas/ /dpal ldan
306b6(rgyud 'grel): khrag 'thung dkyil 'khor bri/ /grong khyer dam pa'i thig gdab po/ /khru gang pa la sogs pa bri/ /ji srid bcu gnyis bcu drug par/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug dbang phyug che/ /shes rab can gyi thig gdab po/ /ji bzhin srad bus lnga ru ni/ /rnam
306b7(rgyud 'grel): par phye ste bcos nas su/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung la sogs pa/ /spyan drangs gnas ni de ru bzhugs/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mkha' 'gro ma/ /rtsa ba'i sngags dang gnyis med de/ /pad+ma'i snod du legs bzhag ste/ /rang byung me tog dag
307a1(rgyud 'grel): gis mchod/ /ye shes thig ni bskyed nas su/ /mkhas pas thig ni gdab bar bya/ /sngon chad cho ga mthong gyur pas/ /ye shes thig ni gdab par bya/ bla mas khu tshur gyis gzung zhing/ /gcig gi mdza' du slob ma
307a2(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /dbugs 'byin 'gro bar bsam nas su/ /thig gnyis ngag ni legs par bsgril/ /gnyis med gnyis su med sngags kyis/ /bsgril nas de ni thig gdab bya/ /dzdza dzdza zhes pas legs btang zhing/ /blo ldan rgyab nas 'gro bar bya/ /dang
307a3(rgyud 'grel): por lho dang shar yi ni/ /sgo dbus ji bzhin gnas nas su/ /lho ru mngon par phyogs nas kyang/ /nam mkhar de bzhin thig gdab bo/ /g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur gyis/ /lte ba'i phyogs su bzung nas su/ /shar du bltas nas dpa' bo yis/ /sa
307a4(rgyud 'grel): la tshangs pa'i thig gnyis gdab/ /thig skud dag ni 'degs pa yi/ /'jig rten khams ni ma lus pa'i/ /sangs rgyas la sogs 'gro don gyis/ /khyod ni don dus yin zhes bskul/ /slob dpon nyid dang grogs kyis ni/ /g.yon nas
307a5(rgyud 'grel): bskor ba shin tu brtsom/ /rlung dang dbang ldan phyogs nas nang/ /me dang bden bral phyogs nas te/ /bla mas mtshams su thig gnyis ni/ /me yi phyogs nas brtsams te gdab/ /byang du mngon par bltas nas ni/ /me yi phyogs su thig
307a6(rgyud 'grel): gdab bo/ /nub phyogs su ni kha bltas la/ /bden bral du ni srad bus bri/ /rlung gi phyogs su gnas pa dang/ /lho phyogs su ni bltas pa yi/ /nub kyi thig ni gang yin pa/ /brtul zhugs can gyis chogs gdab/ /dpa' bos shar du bltas
307a7(rgyud 'grel): nas ni/ /byang gi thig ni gdab par bya/ /phyogs la sogs pa dbye shes nas/ /kun nas thig ni thams cad kyang/ /man ngag ji ltar thob pa las/ /blo ldan ji bzhin thig gdab bo/ /zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi ni rnam
307b1(rgyud 'grel): par brgyan/ /dra ba dra phyed 'phyar bas mdzes/ /g.yer ga'i phreng ba'i dra ba can/ /mtshams kyi cha ni thams cad dang/ /sgo khyud kyi ni nang rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen gyis spras pa/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bo/ /de yi nang du pad+ma ni/ /pad+ma'i rgyab tu
307b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo bya/ /'khor lo gnyis pa de yi rgyan/ /rdo rje phreng bas bskor bar bya/ /rdo rje 'khor lo cha mnyam par/ /rdo rje'i thig gis bskor bar bya/ /ge sar dang ni 'dab mar bcas/ /'dab ma bcu drug dag tu gnas/ /man ngag dag ni thob pa las//
307b3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor thig gdab kun shes nas/ /sgo ni 'khor lo'i brgyad cha ste/ /khyams ni de yi phyed du bya/ /sgo khyud dag ni sgo yi tshad/ /lha yi snam bu'i tshang de bzhin/ /mtshams kyi thig nas bskor ba dag /rta babs kyi ni gnas su bshad/ /ba
307b4(rgyud 'grel): dan dril bu'i 'od zer gyis/ /brgyan par thams cad thig gdab bo/ /lcags ris mthar thug pa yi bar/ /rdo rje'i phreng bas mngon bskor zhing/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor nang du ni/ /rim gnyis thig ni gdab par bya/ /tshon gyi sa ni de yi
307b5(rgyud 'grel): phyed/ /rtsa ba'i thig ni gdab par bya/ /dang por rdor rgyus thig sogs pas/ /thig rnams thams cad nges par bya/ /de'i steng du ye shes thig/ /kun nas yongs su brkyang bar bya/ /ye shes thig gdab po/ /dur khrod rus pa'i phye ma dang/ /de yi
307b6(rgyud 'grel): so phag yang dag ldan/ /de yi shing gi 'dab ma ni/ /rnal 'byor pas de'i tshon du sbyar/ /de yi sol ba'i phye ma dang/ /ba bla dag dang de bsres te/ /kha dog lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /lnga po lnga ni sprul par bya/ /dur khrod sa gnas thams cad ni//
307b7(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug chen po'i rgya 'di yis/ /ye shes thig ni ji bzhin du/ /brtul zhugs can gyis tshon bskyed bya/ /sems dag nang par longs nas ni/ /khrus ni legs par byas nas su/ /rgyud kyi yan lag ma lus pa'i/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor dag tu brtsam//
308a1(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni chos dbyings dag pa ste/ /sems can khams ni sgrol byed pa/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung rgyal po nyid/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gnas/ /nyes pa kun las rnam par grol/ /tshon gyi las ni yang dag
308a2(rgyud 'grel): brtsam/ /slob dpon gyi ni dang por dgye/ /phyi nas kun tu slob mas so/ /gnas lnga sogs par brtsams nas ni/ /ri mo lnga la rgyab tu'o/ /tshon dang gzo yi las byed pa/ /dam tshig dang ni slab pa sbyin/ /mthe chung gi ni sor gyi dpangs//
308a3(rgyud 'grel): drang la mtho bar yang dag bri/ /gal te ri mo mi mnyam pa 'am/ /yo zhing dma' dang chad pas kyang/ /ri mo dma' bas mi 'grub cing/ /yon pos gdung ba bskyed byed la/ /chad pas slob dpon slob ma brtag /gnyis ka 'chi bar shes
308a4(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /de bas mtshan ldan ri mo ni/ /mtshan nyid kun gyis mtshan par bya/ /slob ma la sogs 'dir zhugs nas/ /dri yi chus ni rab gar bas/ /lus kun dbang ni bskur bya zhing/ /gnod mdzes sngags kyi rig pas blud/ /yig bdun
308a5(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor bdag nyid can/ /skye ba bdun sogs big pa can/ /slob ma cho gas dkrus pas ni/ /sems ni shel dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /nang gi pad+ma'i 'dab ma ni/ /gser la sogs pa'i phye mas so/ /pad+ma'i rgyab kyi 'khor lo ni/ /
308a6(rgyud 'grel): rtsibs brgyad pa yang de dang mnyam/ /rdo rje ka ba'i rtsibs la ni/ /rdo rje'i thig gis bskor bar bya/ /mthing shun la sogs mdog gis ni/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo rab tu grags/ /de bzhin 'khor lo'i rtsibs dag kyang/ /pad+ma'i ka bar
308a7(rgyud 'grel): yang dag ldan/ /pad+ma'i thig gis bskor ba ni/ /gsung gi 'khor lo zhes sprul pa/ /byu ru la sogs mdog 'dra yi/ /'khor lo 'bar ba'i las bya'o/ /sku'i 'khor lo rnam bgos la/ /rtsibs brgyad snga ma de dang 'dra/ /de bzhin 'khor
308b1(rgyud 'grel): lo'i ka ba dang/ /'khor lo'i thig gis dbye bar bya/ /mu tig la sogs phye ma yis/ /sku yi 'khor lo bri bar bya/ /ji ltar pad+ma la sogs cha/ /sgo'i cha yi kha dog ste/ /ri mo lnga sogs kha dog mdzes/ /ji ltar mdzes pa rab tu bstan/ /tshon dgye
308b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ //de ltar sna tshogs bris pa yis/ /gzhal yas khang mchog lha yi gnas/ /cho ga mthong bas dang por ni/ /ji srid bshad bzhin rdzogs par bya/ /tshogs rnams kun gyis rab brgyan cing/ /bde ba thams cad rab ster ba'o/ /
308b3(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan khrag 'thung la sogs ni/ /'khor lo gsum bdag nyid can sprul/ /mkha' spyod sa spyod ces bya dang/ /sa 'og la sogs mi 'am ci/ /khwa gdong la sogs brgyad po ni/ /rang gi stan la bzhugs par dgod/ /ri yi rtse mor ge sar
308b4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /sna tshogs pad+mar A li dang/ /kA li uSh+ma Na'i bzhi pa/ /thig le sgra las yang dag 'byung/ /he ru ka dpal rgyal po che/ /shes rab yan lag gnyis med 'du/ /zhal bzhi zhal re spyan gsum pa/ /mgo dang dum bus rnam par
308b5(rgyud 'grel): brgyan/ /ljang dang dmar dang de bzhin ser/ /phyag ni bcu gnyis yang dag ldan/ /g.yas rkyang ba yi rnam par bzhugs/ /ral pa'i thor tshugs dar dpyangs dang/ /phyag gnyis dag gis 'khyud par mdzad/ /gzhan gnyis glang chen pags
308b6(rgyud 'grel): pa te/ /dgra ste rtse gsum gri gug dang/ /Da ma ru ni phyag g.yas na/ /kha TwAM ga dang de bzhin du/ /thod pa khrag gis bkang ba dang/ /phyag na zhags pa dag dang mgo /bdud ni bzhi las rnam rgyal ba/ /phyag g.yon dag na bsnams par
308b7(rgyud 'grel): mdzad/ /yi dags chen po kun khyab bo/ /pang na gnas pa'i phag mo ni/ /phyag gis 'khyud par mdzad pa las/ /gdug pa bdud kyi khrag 'chang zhing/ /zhal nas khrag gis rgyun 'dzag pa/ /khrag chen gyis phyugs sku yan lag /
309a1(rgyud 'grel): chags dang bcas shing sgra grol ba/ /thod pa'i phreng bas bcings pa yin/ /ha he zhes bzhad spyan gsum sku/ /dum bu dang ni thod pas brgyan/ /g.yas na sdigs mdzub rdo rje ste/ /bdud sogs kun la sdigs par
309a2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni mA ma kI/ /mdun gyi 'dab ma gnon par bzhugs/ /phyag bzhi skra ni grol ba la/ /rtse mo lnga yis rnam brgyan pa/ /phyag rgya lnga sogs sku la mnga' / /spyan gsum khro bo hUM mdzad cing/ /sku mdog sde la 'jigs pa
309a3(rgyud 'grel): che/ ha ha zhes ni 'jigs par mdzad/ /thod pa'i cod pan lnga pa ste/ /dbu skra grol zhing 'jigs par mdzad/ /kha TwAM ga brten thod pa bsnams/ /rnal 'byor mtshon chags ma ru g.yas/ /phyag bzhi pas ni rnam par brgyan/ /g.yon nas
309a4(rgyud 'grel): bskor ba'i pad+ma la/ /lA ma zhes bya sgrel mdzad ma'o/ /sku mdog ljang gu 'jigs pa che/ /ha ha zhes bzhang gtsigs pa po/ /rtse dran lngas ni brgyan pa ste/ /dbu skra grol zhing 'jigs mdzad pa/ /spyan gsum ba la hUM mdzad cing/ /khatA ga
309a5(rgyud 'grel): brten thod pa bsnams/ /rnal 'byor mtshon dang Da ma ru/ /phyag bzhi pas ni rnam par brgyan/ /khaN+Da ro ni gos dkar mo/ /byang gi 'dab ma gnon pas bzhugs/ /sku mdog dmar mo shas cher 'bar/ /phyag bzhi 'jigs pa'i hUM mdzad pa/ /
309a6(rgyud 'grel): dbu skra grol zhing 'bar ba la/ /rtse bran lngas ni rnam par brgyan/ /rnal 'byor snod dang kha TwAM ga /rnal 'byor mtshon dang Da ma ru/ /phyag rgya lngas ni brgyan pa dang/ /spyan gsum 'og pag dag gis brgyan/ /nub kyi 'dab mar gzugs can ma//
309a7(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog sar zhing cher 'bar ba/ /ha ha zhes bzhad 'jigs par mdzad/ /sgra grol kha twAM ga dang bcas/ /phyag bzhi dag gis rnam par brgyan/ /spyan gsum hUM gis 'jigs par mdzad/ /rtse bran lngas ni rnam par brgyan/ /phyag rgya lnga
309b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs sku la mnga' / /rnal 'byor mtshon pa snod rnams pa'o/ /chu dang me dang rlung dang ni/ /sa yi khams bdag nyid yin no/ /sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor ma bzhi po/ /phyi dang nang na yang dag bzhugs/ /mtshams kyi cha yi pad+ma la/ /ma dang de bzhin pha ngag dang/
309b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po dang ni rgyal rigs gnyis/ /mdo bo'i snod ni mchod byed pa/ /gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor ma/ /bu la sogs pas yang dag drangs/ /bkug ste 'khor lo'i nang du bzhugs/ /rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu mchog/ /de la bu skyes rnal
309b3(rgyud 'grel): 'byor ma'i/ /'khor lo'i gnas ni bshad bya ste/ /pu zhes bya ba ni pul+lir ma la ya ste/ thad pa'i dum bu can dang/ rab gtum ma'o/ /dza zhes bya ba ni dzA land+ha ra ste/ keng rus chen po dang/ gtum mig ma'o/ /o zhes bya ba ni u rgyan te/ keng
309b4(rgyud 'grel): rus can dang/ 'od ldan ma'o/ /oM zhes bya ba ni arpu ta ste/ mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang/ /sna chen ma'o/ /de dag ni gnas so/ /go zhes bya ba ni go dA bar ste/ /lha dgra dang/ brtan pa'i blo can ma'o/ /rA zhes bya ba ni rA ma shwa ri ste/ 'od
309b5(rgyud 'grel): dpag med dang/ me'u thung ma'o/ /de zhes bya ba ni de bi ko TaM ste/ rdo rje 'od dang laM ka'i dbang phyug ma'o/ /mA zhes bya ba ni mA la ba ste/ rdo rje'i sku dang/ shing grub ma'o/ /de dag ni nye ba'i gnas yin la/ thugs kyi 'khor lo ste/ nam mkha' la rgyu ba yin no// //
309b6(rgyud 'grel): kA zhes bya ba ni kA ma ru pa ste/ myu gu can dang/ sa srungs ma'o/ /oM zhes bya ba ni o Te ste/ rdo rje ral pa can dang/ 'jigs byed chen mo'o/ /de dag ni zhing ngo/ /tri zhes bya ba ni tri sha ku ne ste/ dpa' bo chen po dang/ rlung gi shugs can ma'o/ /ko
309b7(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa ni ko sa la ste/ rdo rje hUM mdzad dang/ chang 'thung ma'o/ /de dag ni nye ba'i zhing ngo/ /ka zhes bya ba ni ka ling+ga ste/ rab tu bzang po dang/ mdog ljang ma'o/ /la zhes bya ba ni laM pA ka ste/ rdo rje bzang po dang/ shin tu bzang mo'o/ /de dag ni
310a1(rgyud 'grel): tshand+ho ha'o/ /ka zhes bya ba ni kany+tsi ste/ 'jigs byed chen po dang/ rta rna ma'o/ /hi zhes bya ba ni hi mA la ya te/ /mig mi bzang dang/ bya gdong ma'o/ /de dag ni u pa tshand+ho ha yin pas gsung gi 'khor lo ste sa la rgyu ba  
310a2(rgyud 'grel): yin no/ /pra zhes bya ba pre ta pu ri ste/ stobs bo che dang/ 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o/ /gri zhes bya ba ni gri ha de ba ste/ rin chen rdo rje dang/ dum skyes ma'o/ /de dag ni 'dus pa zhes bya'o/ /so zhes bya ba sa rOSh+TA ste/ /rta mgrin dang/ shauN+Di
310a3(rgyud 'grel): ni'o/ /su zhes bya ba ni su war+N+Na dwI pa ste/ nam mkha' i snying po dang/ /'khor lo'i go cha ma'o/ /de dag ni nye ba'i 'dus pa can no/ /na zhes bya ba ni na gar ste/ dpal he ru ka dang/ shin tu dpa' mo'o/ /sa zhes bya ba ni sind+hU ste/ pad+ma gar gyi dbang
310a4(rgyud 'grel): phyug dang/ stobs chen ma'o/ /de dag ni dur khrod de/ ma zhes bya ba ni ma ru de sha ste/ rnam par snang mdzad dang/ 'khor lo sgyur ma'o/ /ku zhes bya ba ni ku lu ta ste/ rdo rje sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen mo'o/ /de dag ni nye ba'i dur khrod do//
310a5(rgyud 'grel): sku'i 'khor lo ste sa 'og na gnas pa yin no/ /sgo rnams ni khwa gdong ma dang/ 'ug gdong can ma dang/ khyi'i gdong can ma dang/ phag gdong can ma'o/ /mtshams rnams su ni gshin rje brtan ma dang/ /gshin rje'i pho nya mo dang/
310a6(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje mche ba ma dang/ gshin rje 'joms ma'o/ /grub pa'i dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma/ /phyogs kun tu ni rnam par gnas/ /pha rol phyin bcu dag pa ste/ /sa bcu la ni rnam par bzhugs/ /he ru ka dpal rgyal po che/ /phyi dang nang du
310a7(rgyud 'grel): yang dag bzhugs/ /de la sogs pa mdza' yas mchog /byang chub sems dpa' du ma'o/ /dkyil 'khor du lha dgod pa'o// //mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa dang/ /sgo spungs brgyad po gtogs pa/ 'khor lo gsum la thod
310b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dum bu la sogs pa rnams ni phyag gnyis pa/ zhal gcig pa/ ral pa'i thor tshugs dang dar gyis brgyan pa/ phyag rgya lnga dang spyi gtsug gi nor bu dang ldan pa 'og pag gis brgyan pa/ /spyan gsum pa/ phyag gnyis kyis 'khyud pas/ rdo rje dang
310b2(rgyud 'grel): dril bu bsnams pa/ lha mo la gzigs shing spros 'dzin pa'o/ /rab tu gtum ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams ni/ rang gi bdag po'i sku mdog dang ldan pa/ zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa ste/ dbu skra grol bas rnam brgyan pa/ /thod pa dang ni
310b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khyud pa dang/ /gri gug dang ni sdigs mdzub can/ /spyan gsum hUM gis 'jigs par byed/ /rtse bran dum bus rnam par brgyan/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs thams cad kyang/ /g.yon nas skor ba sngon 'gro ba/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten gsum/ /
310b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro kun g.yon nas 'byung ba yin/ /dkar min dkar dang dmar po ni/ /tha ma mchog dang bar ma ste/ /thams cad ji bzhin dgod pa ni/ /bla ma'i rim gyis drin yin no/ /kha la sogs pa brgyad po ni/ /mkha' 'gro la sogs dbye ba yis/ /zhabs?
310b5(rgyud 'grel): kyis rol gnon pa dang/ /sna tshogs gzugs can bzhi bo yin/ /thams cad khro bo rnam rgyal sogs/ /rnal 'byor ma brgyad sprul ba yin/ /rdo rje mtshan ba'i kha TwAM ga /pad+ma'i snod ni lnga can te/ /g.yas pas mtshon cha 'phyar ba ni/ /gdug pa
310b6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad des gnon pa'o/ /dpal ldan he ru ka sogs kun/ /g.yon gyis 'khyud cing nu ma 'dzin/ /lha rnams kyi phyag dang/ sku mdog dang/ phyag mtshan te/ byang chub kyi yan lag gsum cu rtsa bdun du byas pa'o// //nA da'i gzugs
310b7(rgyud 'grel): sogs sngon du 'gro ba dang/ gos dang/ phyag rgya lnga la sogs pa dang/ shes rab kyi yan lag dang/ phur bu dang/ dra ba dang/ A li kA li zhes brjod nas/ /rgyu sogs rtog pa sngon 'gro ba/ /'jug pa sgra la sogs pa nas/ /ji srid bsdus
311a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rim gyis so/ /'bad pa yis tre de bzhin du/ /shes rab yan lag bstan gyi ste/ /mgul rgyan gtsug tor dbu rgyan dang/ /rna rgyan tshangs pa'i srad bu dang/ /mgul bar rgyan bcings mgo bor phreng/ /ska rags
311a2(rgyud 'grel): dang ni sil khrol sgra/ /ral pa cod pan dar dang ni/ /bcos ma'i sgra yis rnam par brgyan/ /rdo rje pad+ma kha TwAM bcas/ /rde'u chung sgra dang hUM sgrogs shing/ /dpa' bo kun dang rnal 'byor ma'i/ /go cha gsum gyis brgyan pa yin/ /he ru ka dpal
311a3(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo che/ /rang gi bdag nyid gcig tu byas/ /sems can kun la rjes brtse ba'i/ /blo ldan bum pa mngon par bzlas/ /bum pa mchog ni bcu dag tu/ /de nyid kyi ni mtshan nyid gsungs/ /chu ni 'o mar yang dag bsre/ /chu chen chu chung
311a4(rgyud 'grel): bum pa dag /dri dang me tog sna tshogs pas/ /dbugs dbyung mchog dang bar ma yis/ /dri yi chus ni yang dag byug /kha ni 'dab mas yang dag brgyan/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mkha' 'gro ma/ /cho ga bzhin du mngon par bzlas/ /mgul
311a5(rgyud 'grel): pa gos kyis rnam dkris shing/ /rgyan ni mdzes pas rnam par brgyan/ /me tog phreng gis kun bskor ba/ /brgyad po dag ni sgo ru dgod/ /bum pa dgu pa dbus su'o/ /ma dang de bzhin pha dag dang/ /rgyal po rgyal rigs gnyis kyi ni/ /bum
311a6(rgyud 'grel): pa chus ni rab tu dga' / /kha dog lnga pa'i gos kyis ni/ /brgyan cing mgul pa dkri bar bya/ /sna tshogs 'dab mas kha dgab cing/ /rang byung me tog dag gis mchod/ /lho yi sgo yi logs su ni/ /ri mo'i dbus su bzhag par bya/ /bla bre
311a7(rgyud 'grel): dag ni bre bya zhing/ sna tshogs pa yi gos kyang bri/ /rgyal mtshan gdugs sogs dar rnams kyis/ /gnas dang gnas su rnam par brgyan/ /bum pa bzhag nas mchod pa ni/ /ji skad bshad pa bzhin du bya/ /rin chen gser gyis mdzes par
311b1(rgyud 'grel): ni/ dkyil 'khor kun tu gtong bar bya/ /spos snod dag ni brgyad po dang/ /mar me'i sdong bu de mnyam bya/ /til mar chen po rab sbar la/ /spos ni lnga po sngon 'gro ba'o/ /sna tshogs me tog 'phyang ba dang/ /sna tshogs chad dang khu ba dang/ /rol mo
311b2(rgyud 'grel): dag gis rab bkar zhing/ /sna tshogs rnal 'byor ma spang na/ /dri bzang me tog sna tshogs ldan/ /sna tshogs pa yi glu len cing/ /sna tshogs gar gyi gar bzang? byed/ /bkra shis sgra ni sna tshogs pa'i/ /dga' ston sh+rI he ru ka yi/ /spyod pa dang ni
311b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba'i gnas/ /'dod pa rnal 'byor ma yi laM/ /sgo bzhi dag tu rnal 'byor ma/ /dpa' bo gnyis med dag gis mtshan/ /tshon chen la sogs gos dag gam/ /dar la sogs pa dag gis brgyan/ /phyag rgya lnga la sogs pa'i lus/ /rtse bran
311b4(rgyud 'grel): lngas ni rnam par brgyan/ /rdo rje dril bu yang dag 'khyud/ /sgo brgyad ngag tu kha sbyor ro/ /tshogs kyi gtso bo bdag po kun/ /'khor lo sgyur ba'i rnal 'byor yin/ /sngar bshad rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang/ /ston dang gnas ni rnam mdzes par/ /
311b5(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan rdo rje dril bu 'phyad/ /'khyud cing nu ma 'tshir ba dang/ /steng gi mgo bo spyi gtsug dang/ /mig sogs gos chas rnam par brgyan/ /rdo rje sems sogs byin brlabs la/ /rnal 'byor chen po gnyis med gnas/ /byang chub yan lag
311b6(rgyud 'grel): sum cu bdun/ /byas shing go bgos mnyam par bzhag /de ltar go bgos bdag nyid ni/ /sum cu gsum pas kyang mi shigs/ /dkyil 'khor gyi lha mo dang dpa' mo rnams la mchod pa'o/ /rang nyid ji ltar grub par ni/ /ye shes 'khor lo
311b7(rgyud 'grel): rnam par bsgom/ /bdag nyid kha sbyar byas pa yis/ /dam tshig la ni gzhug par bya/ /dang por spyan drangs phyag rgya yis/ /gyen du pheM gi sgra bsgrags la/ /mchog dang bar ma'i rnal 'byor ma/ /'jig rten khams la sogs pas dgug /rang
312a1(rgyud 'grel): nyid sku mdog phyag mtshan dbyibs/ /sngar bshad pa yi rgyan dang ldan/ /rang gi phyag mtshan rgyan bcas la/ /ral pa'i thor tshugs dag dang ldan/ /dam tshig 'khor lor zhugs nas ni/ /gnyis med ye shes
312a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya/ /he ru ka dpal la sogs kun/ /g.yas brkyang bas ni gdan la bzhugs/ /ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drang ba'o// //he ru ka dpal sogs 'khor lo'i/ /lha rnams phyi dang nang gis mchod/ /lha yi grangs bzhi blo
312a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan pas/ /mdzes pa'i gos kyang dbul bar bya/ /'khor lo sgyur dang dpa' bo ni/ /rang 'byung me tog gis mchod cing/ /gdong ni dag bar bkru bar bya/ /lho phyogs sgo nas dag bas so/ /gnyis med gnyis med sngags kyis ni/ /
312a4(rgyud 'grel): mngon par bzlas la byin gyis brlab/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mkha' 'gro mas/ /khyad par du ni mngon par bzlas/ /sgo srung kun gyi rnal 'byor mas/ /ji srid brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par/ /sngags pas lha yi grangs bzhin du/ /A
312a5(rgyud 'grel): li kA li zhes smra zhing/ /byin gyis brlabs la mnyam par mchod/ /dkyil 'khor lha rnams mnyes par bya/ /dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab pa'o// //bya ba'i mchod pa'i khyad par ni/ /b+ha ra tis ti gi bri ste/ /ki shi ge
312a6(rgyud 'grel): kya dang ar ba di/ /bar rnams kun gyis gar bya'o/ /chags bcas mngon sbyor tshul gyis ni/ /rnam par 'phyar bas rnam rol cing/ /sgeg dang bcas pa'i gom stobs kyis/ /gom stabs brgyad kyi gar bya'o/ /'khyud sogs bya ba kun dad?
312a7(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /'khyud cing nu ma btsir ba dang/ /dang po rnal 'byor ma mnyes bya/ /nang gi bdag nyid sbyin sreg gis/ /skye bo dam pa kun 'dus bya/ /he ru ka dpal rgyal po che/ /mdza' ba thams cad yang dag 'dus/ /zhi ba'i chu la dngos grub ni/ /
312b1(rgyud 'grel): dam pa'i gnas ni rtag pa 'grub/ /rgyun chags la sogs thams cad dang/ /bza' ba zhim po sna tshogs dang/ /sha rlon dag gis khyad par du/ /sngags dang ldan pas sbyin sreg bya/ /oM sarba badzra kA mi ni b+hak+ShaM sho d+ha ya gu hya badzrI Na hUM phaT
312b2(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ mngon par bsngags shing byin gyis brlab pa'o/ /lta ba yis ni sbyin sreg mes/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dab brgyad ba/ /dpa' bo'i dbang sogs sum cu bdun/ /pad+ma'i lte ba ge sar la/ /ji bzhin las kyi rjes mthun par/ /lha yi bdag nyid
312b3(rgyud 'grel): dngos byas la/ /cho gas sbyin sreg kun byas na/ /brtag mi dgos par dngos grub 'gyur/ /bza' 'am yar na btung ba dag /brtul zhugs can ni ci za ba/ /mchog dang bar ma'i dbugs dbyung ba/ /bsam pa thams cad rab tu brtag /bdag
312b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid lha ni lha yi mchog /bdag nyid lha ni lha dam pa/ /bdag gi gzugs la ma chags la/ /gzugs brnyan la sogs lta bur shes/ /bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ /dpa' bo kun gyi gnas yin te/ /de las 'bad pa thams
312b5(rgyud 'grel): cad kyis/ /bdag nyid he ru ka dpal mchod/ /de ltar 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /dge ba yongs su rgyas par 'gyur/ /las tshogs gang zhig bsams pa rnams/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /dpal 'khor las kyi nang gi sbyin sreg
312b6(rgyud 'grel): go/ drug cu pa sogs bzar bcas pa'i/ /zan dron sha dang nya sha dang/ /bar dang mchog gi lnga po yi/ /gtor ma 'bad de dbul bar bya/ /thod pa'i nang du legs bzhag ste/ /dang po phyag rgyas spyan drang ngo/ /gyen du pheM gi sgra sgogs shing/ /
312b7(rgyud 'grel): mig dang gdod dang yan lag bsgyur/ /bkug cing bkug cing kun mchod la/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor mas spyan drang/ /rdo rje thal mo spyi bor dbye/ /reg par gyur na 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dpa' bo rdo rje rnal 'byor ma/ /ji bzhin las la sbyar bar bya/ /
313a1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan mo skra grol gcer bu yis/ /brtul zhugs can gyis gtor ma sbyin/ /he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor bdag /des ni rnal 'byor ma rnams mnyes/ /gtor ma'i cho ga'o/ /pha rol phyin pa'i rgya drug sogs/ /
313a2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sum cu rtsa bdun nyid/ /gnas la sogs pa sa bcu dang/ /che mchog lha yi bdag nyid can/ /gdan du byas pa'i bdag nyid can/ /dbang bskur ba ni dam pa'o/ /dag dang ma dag 'dres pa ste/ /sgrub pa po ni mngon sum gnas//
313a3(rgyud 'grel): mnyes byed rnam par dag pa dang/ /gsal byed yon tan ldan pa'i mi/ /de ltar phyi dang nang gi sbyin sreg bya/ /gtor ma'i bya ba dang/ mchod pa'i bya ba'i las ma lus par byas pa'i rnal 'byor pas slob ma ma lus pa'i tshogs kyi bdag
313a4(rgyud 'grel): po nyid mngon sum du byas la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /gong nas gong ma'i sdom pa ni/ /bu khyod kyis ni bsrung bya ste/ /grol ba'i rgyu ni de las gzhan/ /thabs ni ci yang yod ma yin/ /gnyis med gnyis med rnal 'byor dag /
313a5(rgyud 'grel): byang chub shes rab yan lag sprul/ /ma dang de bzhin pha dag dang/ /rgyal po dang ni rgyal rigs gnyis/ /thod pa der ni legs bzhag pa/ /slob ma'i sdig pa 'jig byed pa'o/ /slob dpon mkhas ni dbang bskur ba/ /yig bdun kun
313a6(rgyud 'grel): mkhyen gyi slob ma/ /khu tshur zhes ni brjod bya zhing/ /go cha che la sogs pas bsrung/ /rdo rje sems sogs pas go bskon/ /dar dpyangs dag kyang bcings par bya/ /sems can dman dang mchog dang ni/ /slob ma la sogs yid
313a7(rgyud 'grel): shes bya/ /dngos grub 'dod pas dngos kun gyis/ /dang por slob don mgu bar bya/ /slob ma yongs su brtag pa'o// //de nas slob ma sogs bya ba/ /lag pas lag pa gzung nas ni/ /sh+rI he ru ka ya padmi he bi dyA rA dzA d+hi ma he
313b1(rgyud 'grel): swAhA zhes bya bas dpa' bo bskul bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku/ /slob dpon la ni skyabs su mchi/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma 'khor ro/ /rnal 'byor gnas la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /slob ma'i gsol ba'o/ /don dam smra ba'i seng ge
313b2(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor che zhes pa/ /nyon mongs gcod pa'i don la shin tu mkhas gyur pa/ /srid pa'i nyes brgya bskyed la nyon mongs gcod mdzad lha'i/ /rnal 'byor don dam rgyal po de nyid grub par mdzod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /he ru
313b3(rgyud 'grel): ka dpal grong khyer mchog /snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di ru ni/ /bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bgyi/ /de nas lho phyogs kyi sgor mngon du phyogs par byas la/ oM na ma ste hUM/ na mA mi hUM/ na mo na ma hUM swAhA/ zhes bya bas sku gsung thugs kyi
313b4(rgyud 'grel): sgo nas phyag bya ba sngon du 'gro bas lan gsum phyag byas la/ oM sarba bI ra yo gi ni pU dzo pa s+tha na ya At+ma naM nirya ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta bI ra yo gi rI At+ma naM badzra DA ki ni a d+hi tiSh+Tha swA mAM zhes bya bas lus thams cad kyis phyag byed du
313b5(rgyud 'grel): gzhug go /de nas g.yon phyogs su de snying gar thal mo sbyor du bcug la shar phyogs kyi sgo nas/ oM sarba bI ra yo gi nI pU dza a b+hi She ka At+ma ni nirya ta yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta bI ra yo gi ni a ha ma naM badzra lA mi ratna a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu mAM/ de nas byang
313b6(rgyud 'grel): phyogs kyi sgor thal mo de nyid dpral bar bzhag la phyag byed du gzhug ste/ oM sarba bA ri yo gi ni pU dza pra brtan ya At+ma na nirya ta yU mi/ sar ba ta thA ga ta bI ra yo gi ni at+ma na badzra khaN+Da ro ha ryi pra barta ya mAM/ de nas nub phyogs kyi sgor thal mor
313b7(rgyud 'grel): nyid mgor bzhag la phyag byed du gzhug ste/ oM sarba bI ra yo gi ni pU dza karma ka ra Na ya at+ma naM nirya ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta bI ra yo gi ni At+ma badzra rU paM Nirya karma ka ru mAM/ phyag bzhi'o/ /de nas lhor ni phyag byas te/ /slob ma'i lag nas bzung
314a1(rgyud 'grel): nas ni/ /bde mchog sdom pa'i cho ga bzhin/ /thams cad brjod de sbyin par bya/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song/ /'di ni sangs rgyas rigs 'das pa'i/ /sdom pa brtan
314a2(rgyud 'grel): par gyur pa'o/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag gya ni/ /blo chen khyod kyis bzung bar bya/ /byang chub sems gang rdo rje/ /she rab dril bu zhes grags so/ /slob don khyod kyis bzung bya ste/ /bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /'di ni rdo rje rigs dag
314a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ /dam tshig sdom pa yin par bshad/ /rin chen rigs la rtag tu ni/ /nyin re bzhin yang lan drug tu/ /chos dang zang zing mi 'jigs byams/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /phyi dang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos
314a4(rgyud 'grel): kyang ma lus gzung/ /'di ni pad+ma'i rigs dag pa'i/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba'o/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bya/ /rtsa ba'i ltung
314a5(rgyud 'grel): ba bcu zhi ni/ /gang phyir rgyud las gsungs pa rnams/ /blo chen khyod kyis rtag tu ni/ /dngos grub phyir ni bsrung bar bya/ /dam tshig bsgrag pa'o/ /slob dpon 'dir ni bdag la gson/ /gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa/ /de ltar bdag ni
314a6(rgyud 'grel): bgyid par 'tshal/ /ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la/ /sdom pa yi ni tshul khrims
314a7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa ngo/ /sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/ /bdag gis brtan por gzung bar bgyi/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /de nas brtsams te gzung bar
314b1(rgyud 'grel): bgyi/ /nam du yang mi btang ngo/ /rdo rje'i rigs mchog chen po la/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag gya yang/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /
314b2(rgyud 'grel): nyin re bzhin du dus drag tu/ /spyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba'i/ /pad+ma'i rigs mchog dag pa la/ /phyi dang gsang ba theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos ni gzung bar bgyi/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen
314b3(rgyud 'grel): po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang bdag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed bgyis nas/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /bdag gis
314b4(rgyud 'grel): sdom pa ma lus gzung/ /ma sgral ba ni bsgral bar bgyi/ /ma grol ba ni dgrol bar bgyi/ /dbugs ma phyung ba dpungs du byung zhing/ /sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod/ /sdom pa gzung ba'o/ /deng khyod dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma
314b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis/ ngas khyod la dpal he ru ka'i ye shes bskyed par bya ste/ ye shes gang gis khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ /dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur na
314b6(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub gzhan lta ci smos/ khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthon ba rnams kyi mdun du smra bar mi bya ste/ dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re/ he ru ka dpal deng khyod kyi snying la yang dag gzhugs par gyur/ /gal te tshul 'di smras na ni/ /de
314b7(rgyud 'grel): ma thag tu dral te gshegs/ /de nas dam tshig blud pa ni/ /ga bur tsan dan ldan pa dang/ /bde ba'i me tog chur bcas pa/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mkha' 'gro ma'i/ /slob ma blo gros brtan pa la/ /blangs te rgyan gyis de la sbyin/ /
315a1(rgyud 'grel): thod pa legs par sbyar nas ni/ /gzi mdang bcas pa 'di skad brjod/ /'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig 'das na bsreg par byed/ /dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis
315a2(rgyud 'grel): 'thob/ /oM sarba pany+tsa a mri ta da ka tha:hUM/ der nas brtsams te khyod kyis dpal he ru ka nga nyid yin gyis/ gang 'di byos shig ces bsgo ba de khyod kyis bya'o/ /khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig /khyod mi bde ba ma spangs par dus
315a3(rgyud 'grel): byas nas dmyal bar lhung bar 'gyur ta re/ de nas dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs shig /dpal he ru ka bdag la 'bab par mdzod cig ces smrar gzhug go /thar chu lnga rtsi legs sbyar ba'i/ /bskus shing gos
315a4(rgyud 'grel): ni legs brdungs dang/ /byi la'i rtug pa nyid dang ni/ /gu gul lhan cig sbyar nas ni/ /pad+ma'i snod du gzhag nas su/ /yi dags me yis gdung bar bya/ /gnyis med gnyis med sngag kyis ni/ /'gyings bcas 'dug ste gzi ldan pa/ /sngar
315a5(rgyud 'grel): bshad rgyan dang ldan pa dang/ /de bzhin go cha bgos nas ni/ /'khor lo kun gyi dpa' bo dang/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams de snying gzhug /g.yas brkyang pa la legs bsdams pas/ /gnyis med sngags ni brjod nas ni/ /gdug pa de dang
315a6(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags kyis/ /skad cig de nyid dag la 'jug /oM tiSh+Tha mahA kro d+ha A be sha hUM/ oM sh+rI he ru k+Sha ya bi dma he pi dyA rA dz+nyA ya d+hi ma he swAhA/ zhes bya ba 'dis dpa' bo bskul bar bya'o/ /de nas lag ba bzung ba yis/ /mig phye nas
315a7(rgyud 'grel): ni blta bar bya/ /he ru ka dpal der khyod kyis/ /mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad/ /oM badzra Na tra ya a pa ha ra pa Ta laM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bzang po 'di la ltos/ /da ni dad pa rab tu bskyed/ /khyod ni rnal 'byor ma rigs skyes/ /
315b1(rgyud 'grel): sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs/ /'gro ba phun sum tshogs kun dang/ /dngos grub phun tshogs khyod mngon 'gyur/ /dam tshig thams cad bskyang ba dan/ /gsang sngags la yang brtson par gyis/ /gang du me tog lhur gyur pa/ /de yi
315b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas sogs bstan par bya/ /slob ma gzhug pa'o// //sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte bar bzhugs/ /gnyis med gnyis med par na gnas/ /brtan g.yo kun gyi bdag nyid can/ /spyod dang grol ba rab stsol ba/ /kun mkhyen kun mdzad gtso
315b3(rgyud 'grel): bo ste/ /dpa' bo che la bu khyod ltos/ /rnal 'byor ma la sog pa'i tshogs/ /grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma lnga po/ /thor pa'i dum bu la sogs kun/ /'khor lo mkha' la spyod pas bskor/ /rab gtum mo sogs yang dag 'khyud/ /gnyis po
315b4(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyi sprul pa yin/ /myu gu can la sogs ba kun/ /rnal 'byor ma brgyad gnyis su med/ /gsung ni rnam dag ngo bo yis/ /mi yi 'jig rten dag tu khyab/ /stobs po che sogs par gnas pa/ /grub pas sa 'og gnas pa yin/ /sku'i sprul
315b5(rgyud 'grel): par bshad pa ste/ /chags pa kun gyi rjes su chags/ /he ru ka dpal sogs 'khor la/ /g.yon nas 'khyud cing nu ma 'dzin/ /sku gsum zhes bya'i sprul pa ste/ /'bring dang mchog dang tha ma'o/ /khwa la sogs pa brgyad pa yi/ /gzugs ni sgyu
315b6(rgyud 'grel): yis yang dag bstan/ /khro bo rnam rgyal la sogs brgyad/ /byang chub sum cu rtsa bdun sprul/ /mkha' la spyod dang sa la spyod/ /sa 'og dag gis ma mo brgyad/ /brgyad gnyis mchod pa'i lha mo yis/ /lha rnams de nyid mtshan pa yin/ /
315b7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi de ho na nyid do// //de nas slob ma bla ma yi/ /zhabs la dad pas phyag 'tshal te/ /thal sbyar yon ni phul ba yis/ /dbang bskur don du gsol ba gdab/ /he ru ka dpal dbang bskur ba/ /'gro ba skyob phyir gzi brjid can/ /
316a1(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar yon tan 'byung gnas sogs/ /de bzhin dag la de stsol cig /dpa' bo chen po mi ldog pa'i/ /dbang bskur ba ni bdag la stsol/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon bgyid//
316a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jug pa sgo yi lho phyogs su/ /he ru ka dpal bdag nyid sems/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad steng du ni/ /seng ge'i khri sogs la bzhag ste/ /slob ma gnyis med sbyar ldan pa/ /sna tshogs stan la gzhag nas ni/ /gnyis med ye she sems
316a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan gyis/ /me tog dbang bskur la sogs pa/ /thams cad cho ga bzhin sbyin zhing/ /dkyil 'khor lus nang chud par bya/ /phyag rgya lnga la sogs pa'i lus/ /he ru ka dpal bdag nyid sprul/ /spyod dang brtul zhugs brtan pa dang/ /de
316a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gnyis med tshangs spyod bstan/ /steng du gdugs dkar bzung nas ni/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma tshogs kyi/ /bkra shis sgra yis gang ba yis/ /glu len rol mo snyan pa yis/ /he ru ka dpal bdag nyid sprul/ /rab tu 'bad de mchod
316a5(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /dbang bskur bar gsol ba'o/ /rnal 'byor pa yis yungs kar ni/ /cho ga bzhin du yongs bzlas pas/ /gsang sngags brjod cing brdeg pa ste/ /he ru ka dpal sogs gnyis med/ /bzlas nas dkyil 'khor thams cad ni//
316a6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor glu yis glu len cing/ /gnyis med ye shes gzigs pa rnams/ /thams cad cho ga bzhin dbang bskur/ /yang na sngar gyi cho ga yis/ /rnam rgyal bum par brdeg par bya/ /'dab ma'i rtse mos blangs nas ni/ /snga ma
316a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du dbang bskur zhing/ /gsang sngags nyi shu gnyis pa dang/ /sngar bsnyen pa yi sngags kyis ni/ /he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor che/ /brtag mi dgos par 'grub par 'gyur/ /yang na nus pa med gyur na/ /'khor lo kun gyi lha
316b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni/ /gnyis su med pa'i ye shes can/ /nam mkha' i khams ni thams cad dgang/ /sngon mdzad pa yi shugs kyis ni/ /dgyes pa chen pos legs byon te/ /he ru ka dpal la sogs pa/ /bsgoms nas thams cad dbang bskur ro/ /
316b2(rgyud 'grel): bkra shis glu yi rnam pa dang/ /chang dang sha khu'i dga' ston gyis/ /rnal 'byor ma kun dpa' bo rnams/ /gnyis med ye shes dag gis sprul/ /lha yi rigs kyis mtshan pa yi/ /me tog ji bzhin gtor par bya/ /me tog lhung ba blangs
316b3(rgyud 'grel): nas ni/ /slob ma'i mgo la bcing bar bya/ /'dab ma'i rtse dang lag gnyis kyis/ /sngags pas bum pa bteg nas ni/ /lus dang gtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /cho ga bzhin du kun dbang bskur/ /de 'og rnam rgyal bum pa dang/ /
316b4(rgyud 'grel): dril bu sgra sgrogs glu yis ni/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma sogs kun/ /bsgoms la thams cad dbang bskur ro/ /chu yis dbang bskur byin pa yis/ /sdig pa thams cad bkru bar bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje rgya gram mgor/ /ral pa'i thor tshugs
316b5(rgyud 'grel): kyis brgyan pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa yis/ /dar dpyangs dbang bskur byin par bya/ /oM sarba bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye badzra war+N+Na nI ye hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ zhes brjod la 'khor lo thams cad kyi dpa' bo la sogs pa brjod do/ /sngags kyi bskul
316b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /lag tu rang mtshan de nyid dang/ mtshan ma'i dbang bskur sbyin par bya/ /he ru ka dpal dbang bskur bas/ /de ring khyod ni dbang bskur bya/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad de/ /rab tu sgrub phyir rdo rje long/ /de nas 'dir rang gi mtshan ma'i
316b7(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur sbyin par bya ste/ oM sh+rI he ru ka a d+hi pa ti stwaM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi tiSh+Tha mi tiSh+Tha bI ra sa ma ya stwaM/ thog mdza' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje snyems tshul bdag
317a1(rgyud 'grel): po'i bdag /rdo rje'o/ /'di ni rnal 'byor ma kun gyi/ /shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror bshad/ /khyad kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcad/ /byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed/ /srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag /ngo bo nyid kyis srid
317a2(rgyud 'grel): bral byas/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /srid pa dam pa byed par 'gyur/ /dril bu'o/ /rdo rje dril bu yang dag 'khyud/ /g.yon bsnyems pa dang sgros gnon 'chang/ /gnyis med gnyis med rnal 'byor bdag /phyag rgya chen
317a3(rgyud 'grel): por byin gyis brlab/ /nyi shu rtsa gnyis sngags kyis ni/ /sngags kyi dbang bskur sbyin par bya/ /oM sh+rI he ru ka a d+hi pa ti twaM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ sh+rI he ru na ma a b+hi She ka ta zhes bya ba dang/ sh+rI'i sgra dang bcas pas ming gi dbang
317a4(rgyud 'grel): bskur sbyin par bya'o/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad de/ /he ru ka dpal phyag na gnas/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcad/ /he ru ka dpal brtul zhugs brtan/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+he badzra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha ye Sha tpaM d+ha ra yA mi hUM ha ha
317a5(rgyud 'grel): ha ha ho/ rdo rje'i brtul zhugs so// /kha TwAM ga dang Da ma ru bzung ste/ he ru ka dpal kha TwAM ga /rnal 'byor ma ni Da ma ru/ /rdo rje kha TwAM rdo rje bcas/ /dril bu sil sil sgra sgrogs shing/ /tshangs pa'i skud thogs rnal 'byor bdag
317a6(rgyud 'grel): kha TwAM ga dang rnal 'byor snang/ /dpa' bo chen pos blang bar gyis/ /dbang bskur ba bdun no/ /de nas brtsams te rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo'i tshogs/ /shes rab thabs kyi bsnyems chen gyis/ /gang mchod
317a7(rgyud 'grel): bde ba'i dga' ston gyis/ /gar ro/ /sgeg dang bcas pas phreng ba 'chang/ /sangs rgyas kun sogs rnal 'byor ma/ /des na bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /phreng ba de ni rgyan yin no/ /phreng ba'o/ /lus can kun la
317b1(rgyud 'grel): dam chos kyi/ /khyod kyis glu ni blang bar bya/ /de nas rnal 'byor ma de dang/ /myur du bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ /glu'o/ /khyod kyis rgyal la dri phul bas/ /tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab dang/ /rnam rdol? ye shes mthong ba yis/ /byang
317b2(rgyud 'grel): chub lus can rnams la bsgo/ /dri'o/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas la spos phul bas/ /brtul zhugs bzang po la legs tshim gyis/ /lus can bde gshegs cha lugs su/ /ye shes kyis ni tshim par 'gyur/ /sbos so/ /chos kyi mig ni legs
317b3(rgyud 'grel): gsal ba/ /pad+ma gar dbang rang nyid de/ /sems can ma rig ldongs byas pa/ /ye shes sgron mas snang bar gyis/ /mar me'o/ /ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po gis/ /'jig rten rab rib bsal ba ltar/ /su khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i/ /rab
317b4(rgyud 'grel): rib rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal/ /oM badzra Ne Ta ya a pa ha ra phaT laM? trI:thur ma'o/ /chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med/ /gzung du med cing brjod du med/ /rgyu dang las las kun tu 'byung/ /ngo bo
317b5(rgyud 'grel): med cing gnas med par/ /de ltar chos 'di shes gyis la/ /sems can don ni mnyam med byas/ /'on kyang rnal 'byor ma sras skye/ /me long ngo/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /'jig rten khams ni thams cad du/ /bya ba spyod
317b6(rgyud 'grel): tshul gsar ba yis/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyis/ /'khor lo'o/ /khyed kyi the tshom dogs med par/ /yid gnyis med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /chos kyi dung ni bla med pa/ /dri med kun hu gang bar gyis/ /dung ngo/ /de dag ni chos kyi 'khor
317b7(rgyud 'grel): na nyid do/ /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang dgug /sdang bar byed dang gnod sogs dang/ /gsod dang bskrab pa thams cad de/ /las de rnams ni grub par gyis/ /ral gri mig sman sa 'og dang/ /mchil ltam de bzhin ring po ste/ /rnal
318a1(rgyud 'grel): 'byor ma yi dngos grub ni/ /de ni cig dgar bsgrub par bgyis/ /gnang ba'o/ /nang pas sngar langs sems bdag nyid/ /ma lus las ni byas nas kyang/ /bsrung dang bza' la sogs pa yi/ /sdom pa'i bdag nyid
318a2(rgyud 'grel): can bsrung ngo/ /lus dang srog la bltos med bar/ /dam tshig dang ni sdom pa 'grub/ /nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du/ /nyin re bzhin ni bzlas par bya/ /gang tshe nyams na rnal 'byor pa/ /kha nam tho sbom por 'gyur/ /dgun
318a3(rgyud 'grel): zla 'bring? po nas brtsams te/ /zla ba re re bsrung bar ni/ /gnyis med gnyis med 'khor lor gnas/ /tshes bcu la ni de rab mchod/ /chang dang sha sogs gang ci'ang rung/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs/ /thams cad gnyis med pang?
318a4(rgyud 'grel): na gnas/ /he ru ka dpal rab tu mchod/ /theg pa dman pa 'dod mi bya /sems can la yang rgyab mi phyogs/ /'khor bdag kyang mi spang zhing/ /mya ngan 'das la dgar mi 'gro /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma kun la/ /khyod kyis brnyas
318a5(rgyud 'grel): par mi bya ste/ /phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha dang/ /mtshan ma bgom par mi bya'o/ /dam tshig rab bsrungs bsod nams kyis/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /bud med thams cad mthong ba na/ /g.yon nas lan gsum bskor
318a6(rgyud 'grel): bya zhing/ /spyi bos phyag ni byas nas kyang/ /lan gsum bar du gsol ba gdab/ /bdag gi ma khyod bu yin te/ /ji srid byang chub byung bar du/ /byang chub yan lag nu ma las/ /byung ba'i rang gi 'o mas skyongs/ /gnyis med ye
318a7(rgyud 'grel): shes sbyong ldan pa'i/ /bslab pa blangs pa sngon 'gro ba'i/ /nad la sogs sngon 'gro bas/ /tshangs par spyod pa shin tu bsrung/ /dam tshig de la rtag tu bsrung/ /de sngon 'gro ba sbas pa'i gnas/ /spyod dang grol ba'i gnas 'dod pa'i//
318b1(rgyud 'grel): yid la 'dod pa kun 'byung 'gyur/ /gtso bas ji ltar bka' stsal pa/ /ji ltar bdag ni bgyis par 'tshal/ /dam tshig dang snom pa bsrung ba'o// //'dir dbang bsdus pa'i slob ma ni/ /lag nas bzung nas gzi bcas pas/ /gnyis med
318b2(rgyud 'grel): ye shes bla med pa/ /ma lus don ni kun brjod bya/ /gnyis med ye shes sems ldan la/ /mi bya ba ni ci yang med/ /tshangs par spyod pa rtag mnos pa/ /'dod pa lnga ni sbyad par gyis/ /gnyis med la gnas zas la ni/ /rdo rje sems
318b3(rgyud 'grel): dpa' la sogs brda/ /gnyis med pa dang thogs med pa/ /dam tshig sbyong pa'i sbyor ba bya/ /sna tshogs dbang phyug legs spyad cing/ /tshangs par spyangs pa de bzhin no/ /khro ba med pa'i rgyun spyad pa/ /sgrub pa pos ni yongs su bsrung/ /rtag tu
318b4(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub la gnas nas ni/ /yul kun la ni rnal 'byor pa'i/ /gnas med grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma/ /mi brtan srog na ji srid bar/ /bu khyod kyis ni bsgrub par bya/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la/ /ci dga' bar ni longs spyod thams
318b5(rgyud 'grel): cad/ he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor ched/ /bsams nas thams cad rab tu brtag /bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ /rnal 'byor ma ni kun gyi gnas/ /de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /he ru ka dpal bdag mchod do/ /'dod
318b6(rgyud 'grel): chags bral ba lta bu yi/ /khams gsum na ni sdig med pas/ /de bas 'dod la chags bral bar/ /khyod kyis nam yang mi bya'o/ /bsrung ba'i dam tshig go/ //g.yon pa yis ni chos gos mdza' / /g.yas kyis mi 'jigs dbugs
318b7(rgyud 'grel): 'byin pa/ /he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor che/ /'khor lo thams cad rnam par gnas/ /he ru ka dpal lung ston bzhin/ /mgrin gcig tu ni thams cad kyis/ /'di ltar nga yis lung bstan te/ /he ru ka dpal de bzhin gshegs/ /dngos po
319a1(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu grub pa'i phyir/ /srid pa'i ngan 'gro rnams las bton/ /sh+rI he ru ka nA ma ta tha ga ta sid+d+hi sa ma ya stwaM b+hu rb+hu pa swA:/ gang la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis don yod par grub pa'i phyag rgyas gnas pa las mchog tu
319a2(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i cho gas mgrin gcig tu rgyal ba rnams kyis lung ston par mdzad do/ /lung bstan pa dang gzeng bstod pa'o// //khams gsum gyis ni rgyal srid che/ /rgyal ba'i bdag por bstan pa dang/ /deng ni bdud las rnam rgyal
319a3(rgyud 'grel): zhing/ /grong khyer mchog tu zhugs pa yis/ /deng ni sangs rgyas nyid thob par/ /khyed rnams the tshom med pa yin/ /dbang ni bskur ba tsam gyis ni/ /slob ma yon tan bdag par 'gyur/ /slob dpon nyid kyi bde ba yis/ /brtan g.yo
319a4(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi dam tshig yin/ /dbugs dbyung ba'o// //rta dang glang po shing rta nor/ /nor bu byu ru mu tig sogs/ /yon gyi mchog ni blangs pa rnams/ /phyag byas nas ni dbul bar bya/ /de nas brtsams te bdag bran du/ /khyod la bdag
319a5(rgyud 'grel): ni phul ba lags/ /rang gi slob mar gyur pa dang/ /cha yis kyang ni sbyang du gsol/ /slob ma gus pa med pa yis/ /dngos grub ring bar the tshom med/ /mos pa kun gyis slob ma yis/ /dang por yon gyis bya ba yin/ /gal te
319a6(rgyud 'grel): lha ni mnyes 'dod na/ /'bad de bla ma mnyes par bya/ /dpa' bo ji bzhin rig de bzhin/ /rig pa ji bzhin bla ma 'dra/ /dpa' bo rig dang bla ma la/ /mchod pa'i 'bras bu mnyam pa yis/ /slob dpon gyi ni yon yin no/ /de bas
319a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dir ni mdor bsdus nas/ /me tog ldan zhing shin tu brlabs/ /shin tu gsang ba'i sa phyogs ni/ /khams lnga dang ni yang dag ldan/ /phye mar byas te de thams cad/ /rdo rje lam du byug par bya/ /kun tu dga' la sogs pa bzhi/ /
319b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo kun bdag rnal 'byor ldan/ /'dod chags chos las byung ba'i mgon/ /chags pa kun gyis rjes chags pas/ /pad+ma'i snod du lag bzhag ste/ /rnal 'byor ma ni 'di skad smra/ /bram ze rgyal rigs rje rigs dang/ /dmangs
319b2(rgyud 'grel): rigs thar gnas bud med kun/ /gus dang bcas pas mchod pa dang/ /gnyis med tshul gyis tsam pa na/ /dpa' bo khyod ni spro gyur tam/ /smros shig dpa' bo bde ba che/ /ci gsungs dam tshig bsten par ni/ /lha mo bdag gis byed par
319b3(rgyud 'grel): nus/ /pad+ma bi ga sa twaM kri mugte? ke shi bi ba sre ke me tog tshur ldan dpa' bo yis/ /rnal 'byor ma la rdo rje sbyin/ /de nas brtsams te bu khyod ni/ /brtul zhugs bzang pos 'gro don gyis/ /bram ze rgyal rigs rje rigs dang/ /dmangs
319b4(rgyud 'grel): rigs tha ma dag spyad cing/ /b+ha ga pad+mar tsumpa na/ /bdud rtsi lnga ni bsgrub par bya/ /rnal 'byor ma yi rkang g.yon ni/ /lung bsgo bar ni sbyi bor bzhag /rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dpa' bo/ /gnyis med ye shes sems ldan la/ /dpa' bo
319b5(rgyud 'grel): las byung byang chub sems/ /rgyun gyis dbang ni bskur bar bya/ /'di ni byang chub 'grub rnal 'byor/ /khams lnga bcud kyi bdag nyid can/ /he ru ka dpal bdag sbyor bas/ /yang dag bde ba myong bar gyis/ /gnyis med ye shes dbang
319b6(rgyud 'grel): bskur ni/ /gsang ba kun la sogs par bshad/ /'di dag thams cad gsal ba che/ /dbang bskur ba ni mchog gi gnas/ /yon dang dad pa sngon 'gro bas/ /der ni phyag rgya gtang par bya/ /de nas ji skad bshad pa yis/ /cho gas sbyin
319b7(rgyud 'grel): sreg las bya zhing/ /rnal 'byor ma la gtor ma sbyin/ /mal 'gro ma ni mchod 'grub 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas zhing sogs zhing rnams la/ /khyad par du ni sbyin la spyod/ /dmangs rigs stong phrag gnyis dag kyang/ /bram ze gtsang ma gcig
320a1(rgyud 'grel): dang 'dra/ /bram ze stong phrag gnyis dag ni/ /dge slong gcig dang rab tu sbyad?/ /dge slong stong phrag gnyis dag ni/ /rdul med pa ni gcig dang mnyam/ /rdul med stong phrag gnyis dag ni/ /ye shes ldan pa gcig dang
320a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyar/ /ye shes ldan pa stong phrag gnyis/ /slob dpon gcig dang mnyam par brtag /de ltar sbyin pa'i zhing byas nas/ /blo dang ldan pas rtag tu sbyin/ /rnal 'byor rtsa ba'i chos la ni/ /zhing bzang po la sa bon btab/ /mtshams med pa dang
320a3(rgyud 'grel): sdig can yang/ /tshon rtsi mthong bas grol bar 'gyur/ /mngon par zhugs pa tsam gyis ni/ /gtsang ma'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur/ /sbyin bdag bzang po rnal 'byor pa/ /rim gyis myur du byang chub 'thob/ /me tog chu yi dbang bskur dang//
320a4(rgyud 'grel): cod pan rdo rje bdag po dang/ /ming dang sngags dang brtul zhugs dang/ /gnas dang dam tshig spyod pa dang/ /de bzhin lung bstan dbugs dbyung dang/ /gsang dang phyag rgya gtad pa dang/ /dbang bskur 'di rnams thob pa ni/ /sangs rgyas
320a5(rgyud 'grel): kun gyis rab tu mchod/ /dbang bskur ba bcu bzhi pa'o// //g.yas dang g.yon gyi legs su ni/ /bskor la de nas 'jug par bya/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa gzung nas ni/ /gnyis med ye shes dal bso'o/ /tshon la sogs pa'i
320a6(rgyud 'grel): dngos po kun/ /nang bar tho rangs bsdu bar bya/ /bsdus nas gser gyi bum par ni/ /bcug nas chu bo chen por dor/ /bum pa thams cad bsdus nas ni/ /sngon bzhin du ni dga' ston bya/ /de nas bdud rtsi lnga sogs dang/ /sbyar bas sa
320a7(rgyud 'grel): ni byug par bya/ /sngar gyi rdzas kyi lhag ma rnams/ /gnyis med ye shes sbyin sreg bya/ /mdza' bo sdug dang rigs mthun bcas/ /snod gyur skye bo gnyis med dang/ /bkra shis glu yi rnam pa dang/ /rdo rje dril bus rol pa bya/ /srid pa
320b1(rgyud 'grel): gsum 'bar sku ni rjes chags dul bar ldan/ /'od zer sngon po stong ldan nyi ma brgya stong ldan/ /rnam mang sku dang cha lugs rjes chags sems dpar ldan/ /he ru ka dpal sngags pa lhan cig gar byed do/ /ha ha hi hi hu hu ho/ /bcom ldan
320b2(rgyud 'grel): 'das dpal bde mchog 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga slob dpon chen po brtul zhugs spyod pa nag po pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bud+d+ha sh+rI shAn+ti dang/ lo tsa pa dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur/
320b3(rgyud 'grel): slad kyi paN+Di ta chen po ga d+ha ra dang/ lo tsa ba mgos lha btsas kyis bcos te gtan la phab pa'o// // */ (/dpal bde mchog 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bzhugs//) //*/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje
320b4(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung 'gro ba'i mgon/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi gnyis med la/ /phyag 'tshal dkyil 'khor spyod pa yis/ /brtul zhugs rim pa'i bsnyen pa bshad/ /lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog pa dang/ /
320b5(rgyud 'grel): mdza' dang spyi ni sbas pa dag /gang yang shes nas cho ga 'di/ /bdag gis thams cad bshad par bya/ /sgra dang sgra nyams brda dang ni/ /sdeb sbyor mtshan nyid spangs pa yi/ /'khor lo mchod pa'i cho ga gsal/ /de ni bdag nyid dran phyir bya/ /
320b6(rgyud 'grel): phyi rol bstan chos sun 'byin pa/ /gang gi gtan mo 'dra zhing mtshungs/ /don la rton pa'i don gnyer ba'i/ /spyod dang thar pa rang dga' yin/ /legs par brtags pa'i slob ma la/ /slob dpon gyis ni dkyil 'khor bri/ /'jam zhing snyan par
320b7(rgyud 'grel): smra ba dang/ /snying rje la sogs phan sems ldan/ /thos dang klog la sogs la rtson/ /gsang ba'i chas la lhag dang ldan/ /rtag par rgyun du bla mar gus/ /slob ma de ni yongs su gzung/ /de ni dngos grub ma lus pa'i/ /sgrub byed ye shes bshad
321a1(rgyud 'grel): bya ste/ /lha ni mnyes par ma byas na/ /bdag nyid rnam par sun 'byin yin/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung sogs 'khor lo'i/ /sngags rnams mnyes la rab brtson pas/ /dpa' bo'i snying po'i gsang sngags ni/ /khri phrag
321a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum du bzlas brjod bya/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma 'khor lo'i/ /khri phrag gnyis ni bsnyen byas shing/ /bya rog gdong sogs rnam pa brgyad/ /snying po'i rnal 'byor ma bzhi yi/ /stong phrag lnga dang lnga brgya ni/ /sngon du bsnyen pa bya ba ste/ /
321a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis ye shes dkyil 'khor ni/ /sngon du bsnyen pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /gang 'dod dbang bskur rjes gnang ba'i/ /bla ma nyid kyis bri bar bya/ /'khor lo'i yo byad phun tshogs pa'i/ /slob mas de la gsol ba gdab/ /'khor lo mchod
321a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rim ji bzhin/ /khyod kyis thams cad 'byor gyur tam/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma dga' ba/ /gus pa yis ni byed nus sam/ /gal te dpa' bo gzi brjid can/ /thams cad du byed nus smras nas/ /de nas dpa' bo chen por 'dir/ /
321a5(rgyud 'grel): shes rab yan lag gnyis med 'dus/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung rnal 'byor che/ /'khor lo kun la rnam par bzhugs/ /dang po gnas ni khyad par du/ /de la 'bad pas btsal bar bya/ /sems can don bya'i rgyu ru ni/ /bdag gis byang chub
321a6(rgyud 'grel): la rab gzhag /da ni dngos grub thams cad kyi/ /yon tan gnas ni bshad bya ste/ /shin bkod dka' dur khrod chen po'i/ /mi bzad drag shul can/ ro langs dang ni srin po rnams dang yi dags sgra sgrogs pas/ ces sbyang peM zhes sgra 'byin
321a7(rgyud 'grel): pa yis khyab pa'i sa dag gam/ /bsgrub pa po'i yid ni brtan par rung ba'i yul gzhan du/ 'jigs pa dang bral yongs su dag pa'i blos/ /rnam rtog dra ba ma lus bsal byas te/ /byams dang snying rje'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i lus/ /'dres
321b1(rgyud 'grel): med rnal 'byor pas ni bde bar gnas/ /sems can gcig tu gdug cing drag /sdug bsngal dang ni las kyis gzir/ /stong dang snying rje'i snying po yis/ /byang chub la bzhag yid la bya/ /kye ma sems can sdug bsngal zhing/ /kun rtog la ni mngon
321b2(rgyud 'grel): par zhe na/ /de'i rtog pa gzhom phyir bdag /dpal ldan he ru kar rang bya/ /sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o/ /gnas dang ldang ba nyer dang ni/ /'jug dang rdzogs pa nyid dag dang/ /byin gyis brlabs dang dbang bskur dang/ /ting 'dzin mchod pa nye bar
321b3(rgyud 'grel): bsdu/ /yang dag ye shes rgyud shes shing/ /he ru ka dpal gsang sngags shes/ /khro ba med cing gtsang la brtson/ /sbyor shes ye shes pha rol son/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung yang dag bzhugs/ /bde zhing rang dbang bdag nyid can/ /skya ba bye ba
321b4(rgyud 'grel): stong phrag du/ /gsang ba'i ye shes kyis bskul ba/ /dman la mos pa'i sems can rnams/ /mthong na spyod pa'i tshul la gnas/ /sems can de dag gdon bya'o zhes/ /snying rjes non pa'i sems dang ldan/ /khrag 'thung dpal zhes brjod pa'i/ /
321b5(rgyud 'grel): sdom pa bza' dang ltung ba yi/ /dam tshig skyong zhing sten byed par/ /bu khyod ci dga' spro gyur tam/ /skye dang skye bar sdig bgyis pa/ /khyod kyis spyan sngar bshags par bgyi/ /dpa' bo 'khor lo sdom pa'i/ /sdom pa so sor skyang bar bgyi/ /slob
321b6(rgyud 'grel): ma'i gsol ba gdab pa'o/ /de nas 'dir yang dpa' bo ches/ /bsnyen phyir sngar sbyar byas nas ni/ /sems can sgrol bar byed don du/ /dam pa'i sems ni sngon du bya/ /'khor lo sdom pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i/ /rgyud chen cho gas lha rnams ni/ /
321b7(rgyud 'grel): mnyes bya dkyil 'khor bri bya'i phyir/ /sa yang yongs su brtag par bya/ /ri bo tshang tshing sman ljongs dang/ /rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram dang ni/ /sngon du grub pa'i dur khrod dam/ /yid du 'od ba'i sa phyogs su/ /gang kun sems ni 'jug pa dang/ /
322a1(rgyud 'grel): mdzes shing yid ni gang dga' bar/ /sa la ma lhung lci bas byug /sna tshogs me tog rnam par bkram/ /bar ma mchog dang dbugs 'byung dang/ /dri dang chu dang bcas pas mchod/ /der ni sa la sogs pa mnye/ /
322a2(rgyud 'grel): kun tu rgya cher legs par bcag /shar dang byang du gzhol bar ni/ /sngags pa rnams kyi dngos grub 'gyur/ /dbus su mtho bas rgyal srid dam/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i gnas dag thob/ /byang du mtho bas 'chir 'gyur ram/ /nor rnams
322a3(rgyud 'grel): rab tu 'jig par byed/ /ji skad bshad pa'i shar mtho bas/ /myur du rigs rnams zad par byed/ /dbus su dma' ba' i mtshan nyid gang/ /sgrub pa po ni 'joms par byed/ /de ltar mtshan nyid bcas pa yis/ /dpa' bo dbang pos sogs
322a4(rgyud 'grel): pas mtshon/ /sa'i mtshan nyid do/ /de la sbyar ba mdzes byas pa'i/ /sa'i dbus su 'dug nas su/ /nor 'dzin zhes bya'i ma mo ni/ /bskul la 'di yis gsol ba gdab/ /dang po sgra sogs sngon gyi ni/ /rnal 'byor dmigs la thams cad
322a5(rgyud 'grel): bsdu/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung rnal 'byor che/ /gnyis med ye shes la legs gnas/ /sa la reg pa'i phyag rgya dang/ /mi shig thig ler bcas pa yi/ /sor mo lan gsum bsnun nas ni/ /bkug nas mdun du 'dug par bsam/ /
322a6(rgyud 'grel): yan lag rgyan rnams thams cad dang/ /kha dog sar pos legs par mdzes/ /lag na bum pa thogs nas ni/ /bdag gis ci bgyi bka' stsol smra/ /mchod yon bka' bsgo sogs byin la/ /gzi brjid can des 'di ltar bya/ /skyob
322a7(rgyud 'grel): pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyis/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ /lha mo khyod ni dpang du 'gyur/ /shAkya seng ge skyobs pa yis/ /ci ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa/ /de bzhin bdag gis bdud kyi stobs /
322b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal bar byas nas dkyil 'khor bri/ /de skad lan gsum brjod nas ni/ /der ni thim par rnam par bsam/ /sa la gsol ba gdab pa'o/ /mgul rgyan gdu bu rna brgyan dang/ /spyi bor nor bus rnam par brgyan/ /mchod phyir thogs bdag
322b2(rgyud 'grel): thal ba'i/ /phyag rgyas yan lag kun rnams brgyan/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung rnal 'byor che/ /bsgoms nas bgegs ni bsal bar bya/ /de nas rkang pa gnyis su yi ge hUM las 'bar ba'i rdo rje dang/ mig gnyis su ma dang ta las zla ba dang nyi ma
322b3(rgyud 'grel): bsams te/ /rdo rje'i lta bas thams cad du bltas la/ lag pa g.yon gyis dril bu bzung zhing/ g.yas kyis rdo rje gsor pa la 'bad cing khA twAM ga legs par 'khyud nas/ sa de na gnas pa 'dis bsku bar bya'o/ /sems can
322b4(rgyud 'grel): gyi don byed par rtsom gyis/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ 'byung po dang/ sha za dang/ yi dags dang/ srin po la sogs pa gnas kyi bdag po gang su yang rung ba khyer byer cig /myur du song shig /'di ltar dpal he ru
322b5(rgyud 'grel): ka'i bka' thos nas/ myur du song shig /gang dag mi 'gro ba de la nga'i rdo rje 'bar ba dang kha TwAM ga 'dis/ spyi bo rnam pa brgyar 'gas par bya'o/ /zhes lan gsum gyi bar du brjod do/ /dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te/ g.yas nas
322b6(rgyud 'grel): lan gsum bskor bar bya'o/ /bskal pa'i me lta bu'i 'od zer gyis rkang pa nas byung nas/ 'dug pa rnams bsregs par gyur nas/ phan tshun 'bros par gyur par bsam mo/ /g.yas dang g.yon du bskor ba dang/ /ku tsa ba ril? 'khyud
322b7(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ /ba ra ti dang sa tI kri/ /'bre te k+She shig kya la sogs /chags bcas tshul gyi sbyor ba ni/ /rol pas rab tu 'phyang ba dang/ /rol ba'i gom stabs bcas pa 'am/ /goms pa brgyad pas gar bya'o/ /rkang pa bskyod dang lag pa
323a1(rgyud 'grel): bskyod/ /smin 'degs rab dga' i rjes su 'brang/ /cung zad ngo tsha'i mig zur dang/ /brlab rgyas bltas na sdug pa dang/ /mig yangs gar ni byed 'gyur zhing/ /kha'i pad+mar 'dzum dang bcas/ /cung zad mche ba ma
323a2(rgyud 'grel): mchu dmar/ /kun da zla ltar dri med pa'o/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung rnal 'byor che/ /sems can sgrol la rmad du byung/ /de la sogs pa'i gar gyis ni/ /bgegs la sogs pa skrag par byed/ /zhal bzhi la sogs sngags kyis ni//
323a3(rgyud 'grel): phur bu ra ba dra ba bya/ /mdza' yi dbyangs yig las byung ba'i/ /sna tshogs rdo rje'i rang bzhin pa/ /yi ge bdun pa'i sngags kyis ni/ /rdo rje lta bas bltas nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor gyis ni sa'i cha/ /nyes dang ldan yang dag par
323a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /bgegs bsal ba'o/ /sgra'i gzugs la sogs las byung/ /re la sogs pa ji bzhin bsam/ /in tra ni la rang bzhin sar/ /'khor lo gsum gyi bdag nyid bsam/ /sna tshogs 'dab ma 'jam pa la/ /ji bzhin gnas su
323a5(rgyud 'grel): rnam par bsam/ /a li ka li la sogs las/ /dkyil 'khor ru ni rnam par brtag /de la gtso bo'i stan la ni/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung shes rab lus/ /gnyis med du gyur gzhal yas khang/ /mchog tu dpa' bo rnal
323a6(rgyud 'grel): 'byor ma/ /gnyis su med par ci bzhen bsam/ /rang bzhin mi gnas ye shes 'khor lo ni/ /dam tshig 'khor lor 'di yis gzhug par bya/ /rkang pa mnan cing gyen du blta/ /gyen du pheM zhes sgra sgrogs pa/ /phyogs bcu
323a7(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten khams gnas pa'i/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams dgub/ /dang por cho ga ci lta ba bzhin du sngags dang bcas pas so/ /mdzub mo btung byas gung mo rtser sbyar te/ /mthe bong rdo rje brtan por rab sbyar la/ /dpral ba'i
323b1(rgyud 'grel): phyogs su legs par bzhag byas te/ /phyag rgyas ma mo'i tshogs rnams bskul par bya/ /bskor zhing bskor zhing bsgyur bas bkug nas ni/ /dam tshig 'khor lo mchog la sems kyis bcug /mkha' 'gro ma dang gzhan gyi bdag po'i/ /nam mkha' i yid
323b2(rgyud 'grel): ni zhugs par legs bsams la/ /sa'i 'jig rten de dag mkha' phyogs bzhugs/ /sa 'og lus skyes kun la sbyang bar bya/ /rang mdog phyag sogs yan lag 'khyud pa dang/ /rang gi rigs dang mthun par thams cad mchod/ /phyogs dang
323b3(rgyud 'grel): 'tshams kyi ma mo brgyad po dang/ /gnas kyi bdag po thams cad bsam par bya/ /ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drangs pa'o/ /rang gi ming brjod gsang sngags rgyal/ /dang por AM dang hUM gnyis ldan/ /phaT dang yang dag sbyang ba ni/ /lha rnams ma lus pa
323b4(rgyud 'grel): yi yin/ /bar ma mchog dang dbugs 'byung dri dang chus/ /cho ga rjes mthun thams cad mchod par bya/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung la sogs rang gis gnas/ /dbus phyogs yongs bskor dkyil 'khor rnams bsams la/ /bshad pa'i sngags kyis
323b5(rgyud 'grel): rim bzhin dang por ni/ /g.yon nas bskor zhing rang bdag tha mi dad/ /phyi'i me tog sogs kyis mchod la brtson/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung rjes mthun thams cad ni/ /ma lus mgon gnyer sngon 'gros lhag gnas ba/ /phyogs kun ma lus
323b6(rgyud 'grel): khyab pa dang/ /ku tsa pa na 'khyud pa dang/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung sogs sum cu/ /rtsa bdun rnams bsams cho gas mchod/ /gnyis med ye shes las byung ba/ /khyab bdag dngos kun bdag nyid can/ /ston pa'i gtso bo khrag 'thung dpal/
323b7(rgyud 'grel): phag mo lhan cig yang dag ldan/ /gang zhig phyogs bcu'i dpa' bo dang/ /rig pa'i lha mo rdzu 'phrul can/ /byang chub sems la sogs pa kun/ /ma lus bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /slob ma la ni phan pa dang/ /khyed rnams la yang
324a1(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa'i phyir/ /rdo rje can bdag 'di bzhes pas/ /nang par dkyil 'khor bri bar bgyid/ /rjes su brtse bar nyer dgongs te/ /nye ba ru ni mdzad pa'i rigs/ /dri zhim me tog me tog 'phreng/ /thod pa der ni lnga po ste/ /
324a2(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan khrag 'thung la sogs kun/ /bdug spos legs par dbul bar bya/ /de 'og rang gi dbugs 'byung bas/ /cho gas brtul zhugs can gzhug bya/ /lha la gsol ba gdab pa'o/ /slob ma'i gtso bo la sogs pa/ /lhag par gnas bya
324a3(rgyud 'grel): mchod par bya/ /bu tshur theg pa chen po la/ /khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te/ /gsang sngags spyod pa'i cho ga 'di/ /khyod la yang dag bshad par bya/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'das dang/ /de bzhin du yang ma byon dang/ /da ltar byung ba'i
324a4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo gang/ /'gro la phan phyir bzhugs pa kun/ /de dag kun kyang gsang ba'i mchog /cho ga mchog bzang 'di mkhyen nas/ /dpa' bo byang chub shes rab kyi/ /'dus dang gnyis med kun mkhyen brnyes/ /gsang sngags spyod pa mnyam med pa
324a5(rgyud 'grel): skyob pa dpal ldan he ru kas/ /bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa/ /stobs chen dag kyang de yis bcom/ /de bas kun mkhyen gnyis med ma/ /bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig /dpa' bo yan lag las 'byung ba'i/ /sdom pa la sogs slob ma la/ /
324a6(rgyud 'grel): byang chub 'grub pa'i don gyi phyir/ /cho ga thams cad sbyin par bya/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /rtag tu bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /rnal 'byor gsang sogs mkha' 'gro ma/ /'khor lo gsum gyi bdag nyid kun/ /dpa' bo dpa' 
324a7(rgyud 'grel): mo dbang lha mo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che/ /khyad par du yang slob dpon la/ /rtag tu bdag nyid skyabs su mchi/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung sogs dpa' bo/ /rnal 'byor ma dang snang mdzad sogs de kun/ /byang chub sems
324b1(rgyud 'grel): dpa' dpag med du ma dag /thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /che ge mo bdag la dus 'di nas/ /bzung ste gnyis med mchis kyis bar/ /de'i tshang spyod gnyis med zung/ /nyi shu rtsa gnyis legs par gsungs/ /rang gi sho ni ta'i rgyun/ /yi
324b2(rgyud 'grel): ge bdun gyis mngon sngags pa/ /slob ma bsrung zhes bsrung ba'i phyir/ /theg pas kun tu dag par bya/ /'jig rten dbang po thams cad kyi/ /kha nas thams cad dbang bskur ro/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni sa'i cha/ /gnyis med ye shes lam 'byung mchog/
324b3(rgyud 'grel): dpal chen kun gyi rang lha mo/ /mchod pa'i cho ga rjes su spyang/ /phyi nang bdag nyid can gyis kyang/ /khrag 'thung dpal sogs 'khor lo mchod/ /slob ma lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o/ /shes rab can gyis nang par sngar/ /thig gdab gnyis
324b4(rgyud 'grel): med ye shes las/ /byung bas dkyil 'khor mchog bri bar/ /slob dpon mtshan nyid bzang dang ldan/ /yang dag ye shes de nyid shes/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung gsang sngags shes/ /khro med gtsang la mkhas pa dang/ /sbyor shes ye shes pha
324b5(rgyud 'grel): rol son/ /thod pas skra ni mdzes byas shing/ /lus la thal bas rnam par byugs/ /lus la phyag rgya drug sogs btags/ /rus pa'i 'phreng ba 'phyang ba ste/ /khA twAM kha ni lag na thogs/ /brgya phyed pa'i 'phreng bas brgyan/ /he ru ka dpal rang
324b6(rgyud 'grel): bya ste/ /'khor lo snying kar dgod par bya/ /de ltar bdag nyid go bgos shing/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas brgyan nas ni/ /dngos grub chen po rab stsol ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri bar bya/ /de nas mri hu ka thig gam/ /ma ha ru ti ras brlan?
324b7(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung dkyil 'khor mchog /grong khyer dam pa'i thig gdab bo/ /khru gang khru do la sogs pa/ /ji srid bcu gnyis bcu drug bri/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po'i grong/ /shes rab can gyis thig gdab bo/ /ji srid
325a1(rgyud 'grel): srad bu lnga po ni/ rnam par phye ste btsos nas su/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung la sogs kun/ /spyan drangs nas ni de su? gzhag /sangs rgyas kun gyi mkha' 'gro ma/ /rtsa ba'i sngags ni gnyis med pa/ /pad+ma'i snod du
325a2(rgyud 'grel): legs bzhag la/ /rang 'byung me tog dag gis mchod/ /ye shes thig ni bskyed nas su/ /thig 'debs pa la mkhas pa yis/ /sngon chad cho ga mthong gyur pas/ /ye shes thig ni gdab par bya/ /bla mas khu tshur gyis bzung zhing/ /
325a3(rgyud 'grel): gcig ni mdza' du slob ma yis/ /dbugs 'byin 'gro bar bsams nas su/ /thig gnyis dag ni legs par bsgril/ /gnyis med gnyis su med sngags kyis/ /bsgril nas der ni thig gdab bya/ /dzA dzA dzA zhes ni legs brjod
325a4(rgyud 'grel): zhing/ /blo ldan rgyab kyis 'gro bar bya/ /dang por byang dang lho yi ni/ /sgo dbus ji bzhin gnas dbus su/ /lho ru mngon par phyogs gyur nas/ /nam mkhar de bzhin thig gnyis gdab/ /g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis/ /lte ba'i phyogs
325a5(rgyud 'grel): su bzung nas su/ /shar du bltas nas dpa' bo yis/ /sa la tshangs pa'i thig gnyis gdab/ /thig skud dag ni rdebs pa'i tshe/ /'jig rten khams ni ma lus pa'i/ /sangs rgyas la sogs 'gro don gyi/ /khyed kyi dus ni yin
325a6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bskul/ /slob dpon slob ma dang bcas pas/ /g.yon nas bskor la shin tu brtsen/ /rlung dang dbang ldan phyogs gnas la/ /me dang bden bral kha bltas te/ /bla mas mtshams su thig gnyis ni/ /me'i phyogs nas brtsams
325a7(rgyud 'grel): te gdab/ /byang du mngon par bltas gyur nas/ /me'i phyogs su thig gdab bo/ /nub kyi phyogs su bltas nas ni/ /bden bral du ni srad bu bre/ /rlung gi phyogs su gnas byas la/ /lho phyogs su ni bltas pa yis/ /nub kyi thig ni gang
325b1(rgyud 'grel): yin pa/ /brtul zhugs can gyis cho gas gdab/ /dpa' bo shar du bltas nas ni/ /byang du thig gnyis gdab par bya/ /phyogs la sogs pa'i? ye shes bya/ /kun nas thig ni thams cad kyang/ /man ngag ji ltar thob pa las/ /blo ldan gyis ni
325b2(rgyud 'grel): thig gdab po/ /zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan/ /dra ba dra phyed 'phyang bas mdzes/ /g.yer ka'i 'phreng ba'i dra ba can/ /grwa'i cha ni thams cad dang/ /sgo khyud kyi ni nang rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen gyis spras par/ /
325b3(rgyud 'grel): phyi'i dkyil 'khor thig gdab bo/ /de'i nang du pad+ma ste/ /pad+ma'i rgyab du 'khor lo bya/ /rdo rje thig ni gnyis kyi bar/ /rdo rjes 'phreng bas bskor bar bya/ /'khor lo gsum gyi cha chen por/ /rdo rje thig gis bskor bar bya/ /ge sar dang bcas pad+ma
325b4(rgyud 'grel): ni/ 'dab ma bcu drug dag tu gnas/ /man ngag dag ni thob pa las/ /dkyil 'khor thig gdab kun shes nas/ /sgo ni 'khor lo'i brgyad cha ste/ /'khyams ni de'i phyed du bya/ /sgo khyud dag ni sgo'i tshad/ /lha'i snam bu de bzhin te/ /grwa nas
325b5(rgyud 'grel): thig ni bskor ba dag /rta babs kyi gnas su brtags/ /ba dan dril bu 'od zer gyis/ /brgyan par thams cad thig gdab cing/ /'khor yug gi ni mthar thug par/ /rdo rje'i 'phreng bas mngon bskor cing/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor mdza' mar? te/ /
325b6(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon nyis 'gyur du thig gdab/ /mtshon gyis ni de'i phyir/ /rtsa ba'i thig gi phyi rol du'o/ /dang por rdo rgyas thig sogs pas/ /thig rnams thams cad nges par bya/ /de'i steng du ye shes thig /kun nas yongs su bskyang bar bya /ye shes
325b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi thig gdab pa'o/ /dur khrod dus pa'i thal ba dang/ /de yis? phag yang dag ldan/ /de'i shing gi 'dab ma ni/ /de'i mtshon du sbyar bar bya/ /de'i sol ba'i phye ma dang/ /bab bla ngag dang yang dag ldan/ /kha dog sngon po yongs dag pa/ /
326a1(rgyud 'grel): lnga por lngar? ni sprul par bya/ /dur khrod pa rnams thams cad ni/ /dbang phyug chen po'i rgyan 'di yin/ /ye shes thig ni ji bzhin du/ /brtul zhugs can gyis mtshon bskyed bya/ /nang par sngar langs sems
326a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid/ /lus las ma lus byas nas su/ /lus kyi yan lag las 'das pa'i/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor nyid du brtsam/ /'di ni chos dbyings dag pa ste/ /sems can khams ni grol byed pa/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung rgyal po nyid//
326a3(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gnas/ /nyes pa kun las rnam grol ba/ /mtshon gyi las ni yang dag brtsam/ /slob dpon gyis ni dang por bkye/ /phyi nas kun tu slob mas so/ /gnas lnga sogs par brtsams nas ni/ /phyi
326a4(rgyud 'grel): ri mo lnga pa rgyab du'o/ /mtshon dang bzo'i las byed la/ /dam tshig dang ni sbas pa sbyin/ /mthe'u chung gi ni sor mo'i dpangs/ /drang la mtho ba yang dag bri/ /gal te ri mo mi mnyam par/ /yo zhing dma' zhing chad pa 'am/ ri
326a5(rgyud 'grel): mo dma' bas mi 'grub cing/ /yon po gdud ba bskyed byed pa/ /chad pas slob dpon slob ma dag /gnyis ka 'chi bar shes par bya/ /de bas mtshan ldan ri mos ni/ /mtshan nyid kun gyis mtshon par bya/ /slob ma la sogs 'di zhugs
326a6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ dri'i chu ni rab bkang bas/ /lus kun la ni gtor bya zhing/ /gnod mdzes sngags rigs pa yis glung/ /yig bdun rnal 'byor bdag nyid can/ /skye ba bdun sogs sdig pa can/ /slob dpon cho ga 'grus pas ni/ /sems ni
326a7(rgyud 'grel): shel dad 'dra bar 'gyur/ /nang gi pad+ma'i 'dab ma ni/ /gser la sogs pa'i phye ma yis/ /pad+ma'i rgyab kyi 'khor lo ni/ /rtsibs brgyad pa yang de dang mnyam/ /rdo rje'i ka ba'i rtsibs la ni/ /rdo rje thig gis bskor bar bya/ /shing
326b1(rgyud 'grel): shun la sogs mdog gis ni/ /thugs kyi 'khor lor rnam par grags/ /de bzhin 'khor lo rtsibs dag kyang/ /pad+ma'i ka par yang dag ldan/ /pad+ma'i thig gis bskor ba ni/ /gsung gi 'khor lo zhes sprul pa/ /byi ru la sogs mdog 'dra'i phyes//
326b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo bar ma'i las bya'o/ /sku'i 'khor lo'i rnam dgod par/ /rtsibs brgyad snga ma de dang mnyam/ /de bzhin 'khor lo'i ka ba ni/ /'khor lo'i thig gis dbye bar bya/ /mu tig la sogs phye ma yis/ /kun nas sku'i 'khor lo bya/ /ji ltar pad+ma'i
326b3(rgyud 'grel): phyogs kyi cha/ /sgo ni cha'i kha dog ste/ /ri mo lnga sogs kha dog phyug /ji ltar mdzes par rab tu brtag /mtshon dgye ba'o/ /de ltar cho ga sna tshogs bris pa'i/ /gzhal yas khang mchog lha yi gnas/ /cho ga mthong bas dang por ni/ /ji skad bshad
326b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin rdzogs par bya/ /tshogs rnams kun gyis rnam rgyas shing/ /bde ba thams cad ster ba'o/ /snying po'i dpal ldan khrag 'thung sogs/ /'khor lo gsum bdag nyid can sprul/ /mkha' spyod sa spyod ces bya dang/ /sa 'og sogs dang mi 'am
326b5(rgyud 'grel): ci/ khwa'i gdong sogs brgyad po ni/ /rang gi stan la bzhugs par dgod/ /ri'i rtse dang ge sar dang/ /sna tshogs pad+ma a li dang/ /ka li usma'i bzhi pa dang/ /thig le sga yang yang dag 'byung/ /he ru ka dpal rgyal po che/ /shes rab yan lag
326b6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med 'dus/ /zhal bzhi zhal de spyan gsum mnga' / /mgo yi dum bus rnam par brgyan/ /ljang dang de bzhin dmar dang gser/ /phyag ni bcu gnyis yang dag ldan/ /g.yas brkyang ba yis gdan la bzhugs/ /ral pa'i thor tshugs
326b7(rgyud 'grel): dar dpyangs can/ /phyag gnyis dag gis de bzhin 'khyud/ /gzhan gnyis glang chen pags pa ste/ /dgra sta rtse gsum gri gug dang/ /da ma ru ni phyag g.yas na/ /kha TwAM ga dang de bzhin du/ /thod ba khrag gis bkang ba dang/ /phyag na zhags pa
327a1(rgyud 'grel): dag dang rol/ /bdud ni bzhi las rnam rgyal ba/ /phyag g.yon dag nas bsnams par bshad/ /yi dags chen po kun khyab pa'o/ /ba dan gnas pa'i phag mo ni/ /sku mdog dmar zhing cher 'bar ma/ /phyag
327a2(rgyud 'grel): gis 'khyud par mdzad pa la/ /gdug pa bdud sogs khrag 'chang zhing/ /zhal nas khrag gis rgyun 'dzag la/ /khrag chen gyis byugs sku yan lag /chags dang bcas shing skra grol ma/ /thod pa'i 'phreng bas bcings pa yin/
327a3(rgyud 'grel): ha ha zhes bshad spyan gsum sku/ /dum bu dang ni mgo bos brgyan/ /g.yas na sdigs mdzub rdo rje ste/ /bdud sogs kun la sogs gdug par ldan/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni ma ma ki /lho'i 'dab ma gnon na bzhugs/ /phyag bzhi skra
327a4(rgyud 'grel): ni grol ba la/ /rtse bran lnga yis rnam brgyan pa/ /phyag rgya lnga sogs sku la mnga' / /spyan gsum khro bos hUM mdzad cing/ /sku mdog sngo la 'jigs pa che/ /gad mo rgyad mdzad gtsigs pa ste/ /spyan gsum can la hUM mdzad pa/ /
327a5(rgyud 'grel): kha TwAM ga ste thod pa bsnams/ /rnal 'byor mtshon cha g.yas dag nas/ /phyag bzhi pas ni rnam par brgyan/ /g.yon nas bskor ba'i pad+ma la/ /la ma zhes bya sgrol mdzad mo/ /sku mdog ljang khu 'jigs pa che/ /ha ha zhes bzhad gtsigs
327a6(rgyud 'grel): pa tshe/ /rtse bran lngas ni brgyan pa ste/ /dbu skra grol zhing 'jigs mdzad pa/ /spyan gsum pa la hUM mdzad cing/ /kha TwAM ga ste thod pa bsnams/ /rnal 'byor mtshon dang Da ma ru/ /phyag bzhi pas ni rnam par brgyan/ /kha b+ha ro ha gos
327a7(rgyud 'grel): dkar mo/ /byang gi 'dab ma gnon pas bzhugs/ /sku mdog dmar mo shas cher 'bar/ /phyag bzhi 'jigs pa'i hUM mdzad pa/ /dbu skra grol zhing 'bar ba la/ /rtse bran lngas ni rnam par rgyan/ /rnal 'byor snod dang kha TwAM ga /
327b1(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor mtshon dang ra ma ru/ /phyag rgya lngas ni rnam par brgyan/ /spyan gsum 'og pa? dag gis pa ?byin/ /nub kyi 'dab mar? gzugs can ma/ /spyan de wa ba'i bdag nyid can/ /sku mdog ser zhing shes ched 'bar/ /ha? zhes bzhad? 'jigs
327b2(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ /skra grol kha TwAM ga dang sdod/ /phyag bzhi dag gis rnam par brgyan/ /spyan gsum hUM gis 'jigs pa ste/ /rtse bar lngas ni rnam par brgyan/ /phyag rgya lnga sogs sgyu? la mnga' / /rnal 'byor na chen dang Da ma ru/ /chu dang me dang rlung dang ni//
