327b3(rgyud 'grel): sa'i khams dag nyid yin no/ /grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma bzhi pa'o/ /phyi dang nang ma yang dag bzhugs/ /'tshams? kyi cha'i pad+ma la/ /ma dang de bzhin pha dag dang/ /rgyal po dang mi rgyal rigs gnyis/ /thod pa'i snod ni mchod byed pa/ /gnyis
327b4(rgyud 'grel): med ye shes rnal 'byor ma/ /phul sogs pa yang dag drangs/ /bkug ste 'khor lo'i nang du gzhag /rnal 'byor rig pas rtog par mchod/ /de la dpal skyes rnal 'byor ma'i/ /'khor lo'i gnas ni bshad par? bya/ /bu zhes bya ba ni pu li
327b5(rgyud 'grel): ra ma la ya ste/ thod pa'i dum bu dang rab tu gtum mo'o/ /dza zhes bya ba ni 'a dzA? lan d+ha ra? ste/ keng rus chen po dang gtum mig can ma'o/ /u zhes bya ba ni u rgyan re keng rus dang 'od ldan ma'o/ /a zhes bya ni ar bu ta ste/ mche ba rnam
327b6(rgyud 'grel): par gtsigs pa dang sna chen ma'o/ /de dag ni gnas so/ /g+ho zhes bya ba ni go d+ha ba rya ste/ /lha'i sgra dang dpa' bo'i blo gros ma'o/ /ru zhes bya ba ni rA mi shA rA ste/ 'od dpag med dang/ mig 'thung ma'o/ /b+he zhes bya ba ni d+he ba'i ko ti ste/
327b7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i 'od dang lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'o/ /mA zhes bya ba ni ma la ba ste/ /rdo rje'i sku dang shing grib ma'o/ /de dag ni nye ba'i gnas yin te/ thugs kyi 'khor lo ste/ nam mkha' la rgyu ba yin no/ /ka zhes bya ba ni ka ma ru ste/ myu gu can de nas
328a1(rgyud 'grel): bsrungs ma'o/ /o zhes bya ba ni o da ste/ rdo rje ral pa can dang 'jigs byed chen mo'o/ /de dag ni zhing ngo/ /tri zhes bya ba ni tri sha ku ne ste/ dpa' bo chen po dang rlung gi phugs can ma'o/ /ko zhes bya ba ni ko sa la ste/
328a2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje hUM mdzad dang chang 'thung ma'o/ /de dag ni nye pa'i zhing ngo/ /ka zhes bya ba ni ka ling ka ste/ rab tu bzang po dang ljang lha mo'o/ /la zhes bya ba ni lam pa ka ste/ rdo rje bzang po dang shin tu bzang mo'o/ /de dag ni tshan d+ho ha'o/ /ka zhes bya ba
328a3(rgyud 'grel): ni kan tsi ste/ 'jigs byed chen po dang rta sna ma'o/ /he zhes bya ba ni he ma la ya ste/ mig mi bzang dang bya gdong ma'o/ /de dag ni nye ba'i tshan d+ho ha yin la/ gsung gi 'khor lo ste/ sa la rgyu ba yin no/ /pre zhes bya ba ni pre ta pu rI ste/ stobs
328a4(rgyud 'grel): po che dang 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o/ /grI zhes bya ba ni grI ha de ba te ste/ rin chen rdo rje dang dum skyes ma'o/ /de dag ni 'du ba can zhes bya'o/ /sO zhes bya ba ni sau rasta ste/ rta mgrin dang shon ti ni'o/ /su zhes bya ba ni su bar na ti pa ste/
328a5(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' i snying po dang 'khor lo'i go cha ma'o/ /de dag ni nye ba'i 'du ba can no/ /na zhes bya ba ni na ga ra ste/ dpal he ru ka dang shin tu dpa' ma'o/ /si zhes bya ba ni sin 'du ste/ pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang stobs chen ma'o/ /de dag ni dur
328a6(rgyud 'grel): khrod do/ /ma zhes bya ba ni ma ru ste/ rnam par snang mdzad dang 'khor lo sgyur ma'o/ /ku zhes zhes bya ba ni ku lu ta ste/ rdo rje sems dpa' dang/ brtson 'grus chen mo'o/ /de dag ni nye ba'i dur khrod do/ /sku'i 'khor lo ste/ sa 'og na gnas
328a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i yin no/ /sgo rnams su ni/ khwa gdong ma dang/ 'ug gdong ma dang/ khyi gdong ma dang/ phag gdong ma'o/ /'tshams rnams su ni/ gshin rje brtan ma dang/ gshin rje pho nya ma dang/ gshin rje mche ba ma dang/ gshin rje 'joms ma'o//
328b1(rgyud 'grel): grub pa'i dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma/ /phyogs kun tu ni rnam par gnas/ /pha rol phyin bcu dag pa ste/ /sa bcu la ni rnam par bzhugs/ /he ru ka dpal rgyal po che/ /phyi dang nang nas yang dag bzhugs/ /de la sogs pa mdza' yas mchog /byang
328b2(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpa' du ma'o/ /dkyil 'khor du lha rnams dgod pa'o/ /mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa dang/ /sgo srung brgyad po ma gtogs pa/ /'khor lo gsum la thod pa yi/ /dum bu la sogs pa rnams la ni/ phyag gnyis pa/ zhal gcig pa/
328b3(rgyud 'grel): ral pa dang/ thor tshugs dang/ dar? gyis brgyan pa/ phyag rgya lnga dang/ dbu'i nor bu dang ldan pa/ 'og pag gis brgyan pa/ spyan gsum pa la/ phyag gnyis kyis 'khyud pa/ rdo rje dang/ dril bu bsnams pa/ lha mo la gzigs shing/
328b4(rgyud 'grel): ma mchu 'dzin no/ /rab tu gtum mo la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams ni/ rang gi bdag po'i sku mdog dang ldan pa/ zhal gcig pa/ phyag gnyis pa ste/ dbu skra grol bas rnam par brgyan/ /thod pa dang ni 'khyud pa dang/ /gri gug dang ni sdigs
328b5(rgyud 'grel): mdzub can/ /spyan gsum hUM ni 'jigs par mdzad/ /'og pag dum bus rnam par brgyan/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs thams cad kyang/ /g.yon nas bskor bar sngon 'gro bas/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten gsum/ /'gro kun g.yon las byung
328b6(rgyud 'grel): pa yin/ /dkar min dkar dang dmar po ni/ /mdza' ma mchog dang bar ma ste/ /thams cad ci bzhin dgod pa'o/ /bla ma'i rims kyi bka' drin gyis/ /khwa gdong la sogs brgyad po ni/ /mkha' 'gro la sogs dbye bas so/ /zhabs kyis ro
328b7(rgyud 'grel): la gnon pa dang/ /sna tshogs gzugs can bzhi po yin/ /rnal 'byor ma brgyad de dag kun/ /khro bo rnam rgyal sogs sprul yin/ /rdo rjes mtshan pa'i kha TwAM ga /pad+ma'i snod can lnga po ste/ /g.yas pas mtshon cha 'phyar ba ni/ /gdug pa
329a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad nges gnon pa'o/ /dpal ldan he ru ka sogs kun/ /g.yon gyis 'khyud cing nu ma 'dzin/ /lha rnams kun gyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan no/ /na d+ha gzugs sogs sngon 'gro bas/ /byang chub yan lag so
329a2(rgyud 'grel): bdun bya/ /gos dang phyag rgya lnga la sogs/ /shes rab yan lag phur bu 'dra/ /a li ka li zhes brjod nas/ /rgyu sogs stong pa sngon 'gro bas/ /'jug pa sgra la sogs pa nas/ /ji srid srub pa'i sbyor ldan pas/ /bde ba'i stan la
329a3(rgyud 'grel): 'bad pa yis/ /shes rab yan lag stan gyi steng/ /mgul rgyan gtsug phud dbu rgyan dang/ /rna rgyan tshangs pa'i skud pa dang/ /mgul par brgyan cing mgo po'i phreng/ /'og pag dang ni rkang gdub dang/ /ral pa'i cod pan dar dang ni/ /bcos
329a4(rgyud 'grel): ma'i sku la sogs pas brgyan/ /pad+ma rdor bcas kha TwAM ga /Da ma ru sgra hUM sgrogs shing/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma kun gyi/ /go cha gsum gyis brgyan pa yin/ /he ru ka dpal rgyal po che/ /rang gi bdag nyid gcig tu byas/ /sems can
329a5(rgyud 'grel): kun la rjes brtse ba'i/ /blo ldan bum pa mngon par bzlas/ /de nyid mtshan nyid gsungs pa'i/ /bum pa mchog ni bcu dag du/ /chu dang 'o ma yang dag bsres/ /chu klung 'bab chus bum pa dgang/ /dri dang me tog sna tshogs pas/ /
329a6(rgyud 'grel): dbugs 'byung mchog dang bar ma dang/ /dri'i chus ni yang dag byugs/ /kha ni 'dab mas yang dag brgyan/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mkha' 'gro ma/ /cho ga bzhin du mngon par bzlas/ /mgul ba gos kyis rnams dkris shing/ /rgyan ni mdzes
329a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rnam par brgyan/ /me tog me tog 'phreng gis dkris/ /brgyad po dag ni sgo ru dgod/ /bum pa rgyu ba dbus su'o/ /ma dang de bzhin pha dag dang/ /rgyal po rgyal rigs gnyis yang ste/ /rdo rje chus ni rab tu dag /kha dog lnga pa'i gos
329b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis ni/ /brgyan cing mgul par dkri bar bya/ /sna tshogs pad+mas kha dgab cing/ /rang 'byung me tog dag gis mchod/ /lha'i sgo'i logs su ni/ /ri mo'i dbus su gzhag par bya/ /bla re dag ni bre bya zhing/ /sna tshogs pa'i gos kyang bre/ /rgyal
329b2(rgyud 'grel): mtshan gdugs sogs dar rnams kyis/ /gnas dang gnas su brgyan par bya/ /bum pa bzhag sogs mchod pa ni/ /ji skad bshad pa bzhin du bya/ /rin chen gser gyis mdzes par ni/ /dkyil 'khor kun tu gtor bar bya/ /spos snod
329b3(rgyud 'grel): dag ni brgyad po dang/ /mar me mchod sdong de mnyam bya/ /til mar chen po de spar la/ /spos ni lnga po sngon 'gro ba'o/ /sna tshogs me tog 'phyang ba dang/ /sna tshogs 'chang dang khur ba kun/ /sna tshogs rol mos rab dga' zhing/ /sna tshogs
329b4(rgyud 'grel): kha zas ston mo dang/ /sna tshogs rnal 'byor ma dang ni/ /dri bzang me tog sna tshogs ldan/ /sna tshogs pa'i glu len cing/ /sna tshogs gar gyis gar bzang byed/ /bkra shis sgra ni thams cad pa'i/ /dga' ston khrag 'thung dpal 'byung ba'i/ /
329b5(rgyud 'grel): spyod dang grol bar 'dod pa'i/ /rnal 'byor ma'i lam gyis ni/ /sgo bzhi dag tu rnal 'byor pa/ /dpa' bo'i lus dang gnyis med pa sten/ /mtshon chen sogs pa'i gos dag gam/ /dar la sogs pa dar gyis brgyan/ /phyag rgya lnga la sogs
329b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lus/ /rtse bran lngas ni rnam par brgyan/ /rdo rje dril bu yang dag 'khyud/ /rang stan dag tu kha sbyar ba/ /'tshogs kyi gtso bo bdag po kun/ /'khor lo sgyur ba'i rnam rol yin/ /sngar bshad rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang/ /stan dang gnas ni
329b7(rgyud 'grel): rnam mdzes pa/ /dpal ldan rdo rje dril bu 'chang/ /'khyud cing nu ma 'tshir ba dang/ /snying ka mgo bo spyi gtsug dang/ /mig sogs go cha gsum gyis brgyan/ /rdo rje sems sogs 'dod pa'i/ /rnal 'byor chen po gnyis med gnas/ /
330a1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub yan lag sum cu bdun/ /byas shing go bgos rab mnyam gzhag /de ltar go bgos bdag nyid ni/ /sum cu gsum pas kyang mi shis/ /dkyil 'khor lha mo dpa' bo rnams/ /ji lta ba bzhin mchod pa'i las/
330a2(rgyud 'grel): rang gi 'khor lo bsgom bsgrub par/ /ye shes 'khor lo rnam par bsgom/ /bdag nyid las sbyar byas pa yis/ /dam tshig thams cad la gzhug bya/ /sngar bstan pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /gyen du pheM gi sgra bsgrags la/ /mchog dang bar
330a3(rgyud 'grel): ma'i rnal 'byor ma /'jig rten khams la sogs pa dgug /rang gi sku mdog phyag dang dbyibs/ /sngar bshad pa'i rgyan dang ldan/ /rang gi phyag mtshan rgyan bcas pa/ /ral pa thor tshugs cod pan can/ /dam tshig 'khor lor zhugs
330a4(rgyud 'grel): nas ni/ /gnyis med ye shes bsgom par bya/ /he ru ka dpal la sogs kun/ /g.yas brkyang ba yis gdan la bzhugs/ /ye shes 'khor lor spyan drangs pa'o/ /he ru ka dpal sogs 'khor lo yi/ /lha rnams phyi dang nang gis mchod/
330a5(rgyud 'grel): lha'i grangs bzhin blo ldan pas/ /mdzes pa'i gos kyang dbul bar bya/ /'khor lo sgyur ba dpa' bo ni/ /rang 'byung me tog gis mchod cing/ /gdong ni dag par bkru bar bya/ /lho phyogs sgo nas lag pas so/ /gnyis med ye shes sngags
330a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis ni/ /mngon par bzlas la byin gyis brlab/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mkha' 'gro ma/ /khyad par du ni mngon par bzla/ /rnal 'byor ma'i sgo dang sgor/ /ji srid brgya rtsa brgyad par bzla/ /sngags pas lha'i grangs bzhin ni/ /a li ka li zhes
330a7(rgyud 'grel): smra zhing/ /byin gyis brlabs la yang dag mchod/ /dkyil 'khor lha rnams mnyes par bya/ /dkyil 'khor gyi mnyes par bya'o/ /bya ba'i mchod pa'i khyad par ni/ /rgyal byed snying stobs can gyis lugs/ /ko shig kya dang rtsom pa ste/ /
330b1(rgyud 'grel): gar dang gar gyi lan kun bya/ /chags bcas tshul gyis sbyor ba yis/ /bag ma'i rnam par sgeg pa yis/ /rol bcas gom pa 'deg pa'i/ /gom stabs brgyad kyis gar bya'o/ /sgeg sogs bya ba kun dang ni/ /'khyud cing nu ma 'tshir ba dang/
330b2(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i mchod pa'i khyad par gyis/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma mnyes bya/ /nang gi bdag nyid sbyin sreg gis/ /skye bo dam pa kun 'dus bya/ /he ru ka dpal rgyal po che/ /mdza' bo thams cad yang dag 'dus/ /zhi ba'i btung bas dngos grub ni/ /
330b3(rgyud 'grel): rtag pa'i dam pa'i gnas ni 'grub/ /chang dang rgun chang sogs kun la/ /bza' dang btung sogs zhim po dang/ /nya dang sha ni khyad par du/ /sngags dang ldan pas sbyin sreg bya/ /oM badzra ko me shwa re sarba b+ha k+ShaM bi sho d+ha yA/ bu hye ? Na? hUM
330b4(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ mngon par sngags shing byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /lte ba'i ni sbyin sreg me/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ma brgyad pa ru/ /dpa' bo'i dbang sogs sum cu bdun/ /pad+ma'i lte ba ge ser la/ /ji bzhin las kyi rjes mthun par/ /bdag nyid lha'i dngos
330b5(rgyud 'grel): byas la/ /cho gas sbyin sreg kun byas na/ /brtag mi dgos par 'dir 'grub 'gyur/ /bza' ba 'am yang na btung ba dag /brtul zhugs can gyis ci za bar/ /mchog dang bar ma'i dbugs 'byung sogs/ /bsams la thams cad la?
330b6(rgyud 'grel): tu brtag /bdag nyid lha ni gzhan dag lha/ /bdag nyid lha ni dam pa yin/ /bdag gi gzugs kyi rang bzhin kun/ /gzugs brnyan la sogs shes par bya/ /bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ /dpa' bo kun gyis gnas yin te/
330b7(rgyud 'grel): de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /bdag nyid he ru ka dpal mchod/ /de ltar 'bad par thams cad kyis/ /dge ba yongs su tshim par bya/ /la sogs gang zhig brtsams pa ni/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /dkyil 'khor gyi las kyi
331a1(rgyud 'grel): nang gi sbyin sreg go /drug cu la sogs bza' bcas pa'i/ /zan dron sha dang nya sha dang/ /bar ma mchog dang lnga po yi/ /gtor ma 'bad de dbul bar bya/ /thod pa'i nang du legs bzhag ste/ /dang po phyag rgya
331a2(rgyud 'grel): spyan drangs te/ /gyen du pheM gi sgra sgrogs shing/ /mig dang gdong dang yan lag bsgyur/ /bkug la dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma/ /sngags kyis yang dag mchod par bya/ /rdo rje thal mo gyen du dbye/ /reg par gyur nas 'byung bar 'gyur/ /
331a3(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo rdo rje rnal 'byor ma/ /ji bzhin las la sbyar bar bya/ /mtshan mo skra grol gcer bu yis/ /brtul zhugs can gyis gtor ma sbyin/ /he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor bdag /des na rnal 'byor ma rnams mnyes/ /gtor ma'i cho ga'o/ /pha
331a4(rgyud 'grel): rol phyin pa phyag rgya drug /byang chub sum cu rtsa bdun nyid/ /gnas la sogs pa sa bcu dang/ /che mchog lha'i bdag nyid dang/ /go bgos pa'i bdag nyid can/ /dbang bskur ba'i dam pa'o/ /dag dang ma dag 'dres ma ste/ /sgrub pa
331a5(rgyud 'grel): po ni gsum du gnas/ /mnyes byed rnam par dag pa dang/ /gsal byed yon tan ldan ba'i mi/ /de ltar phyi dang nang gi sbyin sreg dang/ /gtor ma'i bya ba dang/ mchod pa'i yo byad mdza' dag gi cho ga yongs su bsngos pa'i rnal 'byor pa/
331a6(rgyud 'grel): slob ma ma lus pa'i tshogs kyi bdag po mngon du byas la/ 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /gong ma gong ma'i sdom pa ni/ /bu khyod kyis ni bsrung bya ste/ /grol ba'i rgyu ni de las gzhan/ /thabs ni ci yang yod ma yin/ /gnyis med
331a7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med rnal 'byor bdag /byang chub shes rab yan lag sprul/ /ma dang de bzhin pha dag dang/ /rgyal po dang ni rgyal rigs gnyis/ /thod pa der ni legs bzhag la/ /slob ma'i sdig pa 'jig byed pa'o/ /slob dpon kun mkhyen
331b1(rgyud 'grel): yig bdun gyis/ /slob ma'i khar ni yang dag gtor/ /bu tshur zhes ni brjod bya zhing/ /go cha che la sogs pas bsrung/ /rdo rje sems sogs pas go bskon/ /dar dag kyang ni bcing bar bya/ /sems can dman dang mchog gi ni/ /slob ma la
331b2(rgyud 'grel): sogs yid shes bya/ /blo dang ldan pas dngos kun gyis/ /dang por slob dpon mnyes par bya/ /slob ma yongs su brtag pa'o/ /de nas slob ma sogs bya ba/ /lag pas lag pa bzung nas ni/ /a'oM sh+ri he ru kA A bir ma he/ bidya rA dzA d+hA ma he
331b3(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ zhes bya ba 'dis dpa' bo bskul bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku/ /slob dpon la ni skyabs su mchi/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma 'khor lo/ /rnal 'byor gnas la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /slob ma'i gsol ba'o/ /don dam smra ba'i
331b4(rgyud 'grel): seng ge rnal 'byor zhes bya ba/ nyon mongs gcod pa'i don la shin tu mkhas gyur pa/ /sred pa'i nyes brgya skye ba nyon mongs bcom mdzad pa/ /rnal 'byor don dam rgyal po de nyid grub par mdzod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /he ru ka
331b5(rgyud 'grel): dpal grong khyer mchog /snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di ru ni/ /bdag gis slob mas gzhug par bgyi/ /de nas lho phyogs kyi sgor mngon par phyogs par bsdad la/ a'oM na ma ste hUM/ na ma he hUM/ na mo na ma hUM swAhA/ zhes bya ba sku gsung thugs
331b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi sgo nas lan gsum phyag bya ba sngon du 'gro bas/ a'oM sarba bI rA yo gi bye pu dzo pAs+tha nA ad mA nan ni tyata yA maM/ sarba ta tha ga ta pi ra yo gi ni ar ma d+hA ki n+ya? a d+hi shTa swAM mAM/ zhes bya bas lus thams cad kyis phyag byed du gzhug go /
331b7(rgyud 'grel): de nas g.yon phyogs su thal mo de nyid snying kar sbyor du bcug la/ shar phyogs kyi sgo nas/ a'oM sarba bi ra yo gi bye phu dza a b+hi she ka ya ad ma na ma ni tya ta yA mi/ sarba ha tha ga ta bi ra yO gi ni ad ma la ma tya a b+hi du maM/ de nas byang
332a1(rgyud 'grel): phyogs su thal mo de nyid dpral bar bzhag la phyag byed du gzhug go /a'oM sarba bI ra yo gi ni byai su dzA ba ra tA na yA/ ad man ma nitya ta yA mi/ sarba ta tha ga ta bi rA yO gi ni ad ma/ khan d+ha rO na tya pra bar
332a2(rgyud 'grel): ta yA maM/ de nas nub phyogs kyi sgor thal mo de mgor bzhag la/ phyag byed du gzhug go /a'oM sarba birA yO gi byai su dza gar ma ka ra nA yA/ ad ma nam nitya ta yA mi/ sarba ta tha ga ta bI rA yO gi ni ad ma ru pa ni/ Arya kar ma ku
332a3(rgyud 'grel): ru maM/ phyag bzhi pa'o/ /de nas lhor ni phyogs byas te/ /slob ma lag pas bzung nas ni/ /bde mchog sdom par gsungs pa bzhin/ /cho gas thams cad sbyin par bya/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /dkon mchog gsum la
332a4(rgyud 'grel): skyabs su song/ /'di ni sangs rgyas rigs yin 'ong/ /sdom pa brtan par gyur pa'o/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang/ /blo chen khyod kyis gzung bar bya/ /byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/ /shes rab dril bu zhes grags so/ /slob dpon
332a5(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyis bzung bya ste/ /bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /'di ni rdo rje rigs dag pa'i/ /dam tshig sdom pa yin par bshad/ /rin chen rigs la rtag tu ni/ /nyin re zhing ni lan drug du/ /chos dang zang zing mi 'jigs byams/ /sbyin par
332a6(rgyud 'grel): rnam bzhi rab tu sbyin/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos kyang ma lus gzung/ /'di ni pad+ma'i rigs dag pa'i/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba'o/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan pa ni/ /yang
332a7(rgyud 'grel): dag nyid du gzung bar bya/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bya/ /sdom pa'o/ /deng khyod dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyi/ ngas khyod la dpal he ru ka'i ye shes bskyed bar bya ste/ ye shes gang gis khyod de bzhin
332b1(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa thams cad dang/ dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur na/ dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smos/ khyod kyi dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba'i mdun du/ smra bar mi bya ste/ dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re/
332b2(rgyud 'grel): he ru ka dpal deng khyod kyi/ /snying la yang dag bzhugs pa ni/ /gal te tshul 'di smras na ni/ /de ma thag tu dral te gshegs/ /de nas dam tshig glud pa ni/ /ga pur tsan dan ldan pa dang/ /bde ba'i stan thog chur bcas pa/ /sangs rgyas kun
332b3(rgyud 'grel): gyi mkha' 'gro mas/ /slob ma blo gros brtan pa la/ /blangs te rgyun gyis de la sbyin/ /thod pa legs par gzhag nas ni/ /gzi mdangs bcas par 'di skad brjod/ /'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed/ /dam
332b4(rgyud 'grel): tshig bsrung na dngos grub ni/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi chu 'dis 'thung/ /a'oM pan tsa a mi to tha tha tha hUM/ de nas brtsams te khyod kyis dpal he ru ka nga nyid yin gyis/ ngas gang 'di bsgos shig ces bsgo ba de khyod kyis bya'o/ /khyod kyis nga la brnyas
332b5(rgyud 'grel): par ma byed cig /khyod mi bde ba ma spangs par dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re/ de nas dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma tham cad kyis byin gyis rlobs shig /dpal he ru ka'i ye shes bdag la dbab par mdzod cig /ces smrar
332b6(rgyud 'grel): gzhug go /thang chu lnga dang legs sbyar ba/ /bskus shing gos ni legs brtungs dang/ /byi la'i rtug pa nyid dang ni/ /gu gul lhan cig sbyar nas ni/ /pad+ma'i snod du bzhag nas ni/ /yi dags me yis gdung bar bya/ /gnyis med gnyis su med sngags
332b7(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ /bsgyings bcas 'dug ste gzir ldan pa/ /sngar bshad rgyan dang ldan pa dang/ /de bzhin go cha bgos nas ni/ /'khor lo kun gyi dpa' bo dang/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams de snying gzhug /g.yas brkyang ba yis gnas pa la/ /gnyis med sngags 
333a1(rgyud 'grel): ni brjod nas ni/ /bdug pa de dang gsang sngags kyis/ /skad cig de nyid dag la'ang 'jug /a'oM tiSh+Ta ma ha kro d+ha a be sha hUM/ a'oM sh+ri he ru kA bId ma he bIdya rA dzi ya d+hi ma he swAhA/ zhes bya ba 'dis dpa' bo bskul bar bya'o/ /
333a2(rgyud 'grel): de nas lag pa bzung ba yis/ /mig phye nas ni blta bar bya/ /he ru ka dpal deng khyod kyi/ /mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad/ /a'oM badzra ne tra pa sa ha ra pa ta laM h+ri/ /dkyil 'khor bzang po 'di la ltos/ /da ni dang ba rab tu bskyed/ /khyod/
333a3(rgyud 'grel): ni rnal 'byor ma rigs skyes/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab/ /'gro ba phun sum tshogs kun dang/ /dngos grub phun tshogs khyod mngon 'gyur/ /dam tshig thams cad bskyang ba dang/ /gsang sngags la yang brtson par gyis/ /gang/
333a4(rgyud 'grel): du me tog lhung 'gyur ba/ /de'i gnas sogs bstan par bya/ /slob ma gzhug pa'o/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte ba bzhugs/ /gnyis med gnyis med pa na gnas/ /brtan g.yog kun gyi bdag nyid can/ /spyod dang grol bar rab brtson pa/ /
333a5(rgyud 'grel): kun mkhyen kun mdzad gtso bo ste/ /dpa' bo che la bu khyod ltos/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs rnal 'byor ma/ /grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma lnga po/ /thod pa'i dum pu la sogs kun/ /sems dang sems las byung las sprul/ /'khor lo mkha' la
333a6(rgyud 'grel): spyod pas bskor/ /rab gtum ma sogs yang dag 'khyud/ /gnyis po thugs kyi sprul pa yin/ /myu gu can la sogs pa kun/ /rnal 'byor ma brgyad gnyis su med/ /gsung ni rnam dag ngo bo yin/ /mi'i 'jig rten du dag tu khyab/ /
333a7(rgyud 'grel): stobs po che sogs par gnas pa/ /grub pa sa 'og gnas pa yin/ /sku'i sprul par bshad pa ste/ /chags pa kun gyi rjes su chags/ /he ru ka dpal sogs 'khor lo/ /g.yon pas 'khyud cing nu ma 'tshir/ /sku gsum zhes bya ba'i
333b1(rgyud 'grel): sprul pa ste/ /'bring dang mchog dang tha ma'o/ /khwa la sogs pa brgyad po ni/ /gzugs ni rgyu yis yang dag bstan/ /khro bo rnam rgyal la sogs brgyad/ /byang chub sum cu rtsa bdun sprul/ /mkha' spyod sa spyod zhes bya gang/ /sa 'og ngag gis ma
333b2(rgyud 'grel): mi ste/ /bzhi po mchod pa bzhi yin te/ /lha'i de nyid mtshon pa yin/ /dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid do/ /de nas slob ma bla ma'i/ /zhabs la dad pas phyag 'tshal te/ /thal sbyar yon dang tshig bshad kyis/ /dbang bskur don du gsol bar gdab//
333b3(rgyud 'grel): he ru ka dpal dbang bskur ba/ /'gro ba skyob phyir gzi brjid can/ /ci ltar yon tan 'byung gnas stsal/ /de bzhin bdag la deng gsol cig /dpa' bo chen po mi ldog pa'i/ /dbang bskur ba ni bdag la stsol/ /sems can kun gyi don bgyid
333b4(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ /bdag nyid rtag tu slob dpon 'gyur/ /'jug pa'i lho'i sgo phyogs su/ /he ru ka dpal bdag nyid sems/ /thams cad cho ga bzhin sbyin zhing/ /dkyil 'khor lus la chung par bya/ /phyag rgya lnga la sogs pa'i lus/ /seng ge'i khri sogs
333b5(rgyud 'grel): la bzhag pa/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad steng du ste/ /slob ma gnyis med sbyor ldan par/ /sna tshogs snan la bzhag nas ni/ /gnyis med ye shes sems ldan gyis/ /me tog dbang bskur la sogs pa/ /thams cad cho ga bzhin sbyin phyir/ /dkyil
333b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lus nad chud par bya/ /phyag rgya lnga la sogs pa'i lus/ /he ru ka dpal ngo bor sprul/ /spyod dang brtul zhugs bstan pa dang/ /de bzhin gnyis med tshangs spyod do/ /steng du gdugs dkar bkab nas ni/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma tshor/
333b7(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ /bkra shis sgra yis gang ba yis/ /glu len rol mo snyan pa yin/ /he ru ka dpal ngo bor sprul/ /rab tu 'bad de mchod par bya/ /dbang bskur bar gsol ba gdab pa'o/ /rnal 'byor pa yis yungs ker ni/ /cho ga bzhin du mngon bzlas
334a1(rgyud 'grel): pas/ gsang sngags brjod cing brtan bya ste/ /he ru ka dpal sogs gnyis med/ /bslad nas dkyil 'khor thams cad ni/ /bkra shis dag gi glu len cing/ /gnyis med ye shes gzigs pa rnams/ /thams
334a2(rgyud 'grel): cad cho ga bzhin dbang bskur/ /yang na sngar gyi cho ga yis/ /rnam rgyal bum pa gdeg par bya/ /'dab ma'i rtse mo can bslangs nas/ /snga ma bzhin du dbang bskur zhing/ /gsang sngags nyi shu gnyis pa dang/ /sngar bsnyen pa'i sngags kyis ni//
334a3(rgyud 'grel): he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor che/ /brtag mi dgos par 'grub par 'gyur/ /yang na bum pa med gyur na/ /'khor lo kun gyi lha rnams ni/ /gnyis su med pa'i ye shes can/ /nam mkha' i khams ni thams cad gang/ /sngon mdzad brtse ba'i
334a4(rgyud 'grel): shugs kyis ni/ /dgyes pa chen po legs byon te/ /he ru ka dpal la sogs pa/ /bsgoms nas thams cad dbang bskur ro/ /bkra shis glu'i rnam pa/ chang dang sha yi dga' ston gyis/ /rnal 'byor ma kun dpa' bo rnams/ /gnyis
334a5(rgyud 'grel): med ye shes dag gis sprul/ /ci ltar me tog dor byas nas/ /lha'i rigs ni mtshon byas pa'i/ /me tog lhung ba blangs nas ni/ /slob ma'i mgo la bcing bar bya/ /'dab ma'i rtse mo lag gnyis kyis/ /sngags pas bteg pa'i bum
334a6(rgyud 'grel): pa yis/ /lus nang gtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /cho ga bzhin du kun dbang bskur/ /de 'og rnam rgyal bum pa dang/ /dril bu sgra bsgrags glu yis ni/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma tshogs kun/ /bsgoms la thams cad dbang bskur ro/ /
334a7(rgyud 'grel): chu'i dbang bskur sbyin bya ste/ /sdig pa thams cad bkru bar bya/ /de nas rdo rje rgya gram mgor/ /ral pa'i thor gtsugs kyis brgyan pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa yis/ /dar dpyangs dbang bskur sbyin par bya/ /a'oM sarba pu
334b1(rgyud 'grel): twad d+ha ki nI yI badzra wa ra na nI ye hUM hUM phaT/ zhes brjod la/ 'khor lo thams cad kyis dpa' bo la sogs pa sngags brjod kyis bskul ba'o/ /lag du mtshan ma'i de nyid dang/ /mtshan ma'i dbang bskur sbyin par bya/ /he ru ka dpal dbang bskur
334b2(rgyud 'grel): bas/ /de ring khyod ni dbang bskur te/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad de/ /rab tu grub phyir rdo rje long/ /de nas 'dir rang gi mtshan ma'i dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya ste/ a'oM sh+ri he ru ka a d+hi pa ti twaM/ a bi Shiny+tsA ma tiSh+Ta bI ra sa yA twaM/ thog
334b3(rgyud 'grel): mdza' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po'i bdag /rdo rje'o/ /'di ni rnal 'byor ma kun gyi/ /shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gro bshad/ /khyod kyis kyang ni
334b4(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu 'chang/ /byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed/ /srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag /ngo bo nyid kyis srid bral bya/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' mchog /srid pa dag par byed par 'gyur/ /dril bu'o/ /rdo rje dril bu yang dag 'khyud/ /g.yon
334b5(rgyud 'grel): bsnyems pa dang mchu 'dzin pa'o/ /gnyis med gnyis med rnal 'byor bdag /phyag rgya chen por byin gyis brlab/ /nyi shu rtsa gnyis sngags kyis ni/ /sngags kyi dbang bskur sbyin par bya/ /a'oM sh+ri he ru ka a d+hi pa d+hi twAm/ A dI Shiny+tsa mi/ /
334b6(rgyud 'grel): sh+ri he ru ka na ma a b+hi She ka ta/ zhes bya ba dang/ ming gi dbang bskur ba'o/ /'di des sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /he ru ka dpal phyag na gnas/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu 'chang/ /haM ru ka dpal brtul zhugs brtan/ /a'oM sarba ta tha ga ta
334b7(rgyud 'grel): sid+d+hi badzra sa ma ye tiSh+Ta e Sha twaM d+ha ra ya mi hUM hi hi hi hi ho/ /rdo rje brtul zhugs so/ /kha TwAM Da ma ru bdud rtsi/ /khrag 'thung dpal lus kha TwAM ga /rnal 'byor ma ni Da ma ru/ /rdo rje kha TwAM rdo rje bcas/ /dril bu sil sil sgra sgrogs shing/ /mchod
335a1(rgyud 'grel): phyir thogs dang rnal 'byor bdag /kha TwAM ga dang rnal 'byor snod/ /dpa' bo chen pos blang bar gyis/ /dbang bskur ba bdun no/ /de nas brtsams te rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' tshogs dang/ /shes rab
335a2(rgyud 'grel): thabs kyis bsnyems chen gyis/ /gar mchod bde ba'i dga' ston gyis/ /gar ro/ /sgeg dang bcas pas 'phreng ba 'phyang/ /sangs rgyas kun sogs rnal 'byor ma/ /des ni 'bral bar mi 'gyur te/ /'phreng ba nyid brgyan yin no/ /'phreng ba'o/ /
335a3(rgyud 'grel): lus can rnams la dam chos kyi/ /khyod kyis glu ni blang bar bya/ /de nas rnal 'byor ma de dang/ /myur du bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ /glu'o/ /khyod kyis rgyal la dril bu phul la/ /tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab dang/ /rnam grol ye shes mthong ba'i//
335a4(rgyud 'grel): byang chub lus can rnams la bsgo/ /dri'o/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas la spos gtul la/ /brtul zhugs bzang po legs tshims kyis/ /lus can bde gshegs cha lugs su/ /ye shes kyis ni tshim par 'gyur/ /spos so/ /chos kyi mig ni legs
335a5(rgyud 'grel): sbar la/ /pad+ma gar dbang rang nyid de/ /sems can ma rig mdongs byas pa/ /ye shes sgron mas snang bar gyis/ /mar me'o/ /ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis/ /'jig rten rab rib bsal ba ltar/ /bu khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i/ /rab
335a6(rgyud 'grel): rib rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal/ /a'oM badzra ge tra ya a pa ha ra sa ta/ laM h+ri(rgyud 'grel): thur ma'o/ /chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med/ /gzung du med cing brjod du med/ /rgyu dang las las kun tu 'byung/ /ngo
335a7(rgyud 'grel): bo med cing gnas med par/ /de ltar chos 'di shes kyis la/ /sems can don ni mnyam med byos/ /'on kyang rnal 'byor ma sras skyes/ /me long ngo/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /'jig rten kun tu thams cad du/ /bya ba'i
335b1(rgyud 'grel): spyod tshul gsang ba yi/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyis/ /'khor lo'o/ /khyod kyis the tshom dogs med pa/ /yid gnyis med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /chos kyis dung ni bla med par/ /dri med kun tu dgang bar gyis/ /dung ngo/ /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang
335b2(rgyud 'grel): dang dgug /sdang bar byed dang gnod sogs dang/ /gsod dang bskrad pa thams cad de/ /las de rnams dang ni bsgrub par gyis/ /ral gri mig sman sa 'og dang/ /mchil lham de bzhin ri lu ste/ /rnal 'byor pa'i dngos grub ni/ /gang 'dod pa de bsgrub
335b3(rgyud 'grel): par gyis/ /gnang ba'o/ /nang par sngar langs sems bdag nyid/ /ma lus lus ni byas nas su/ /btung dang bza' la sogs pa'i/ /sdom pa'i mtshan nyid bsrung ba'o/ /lus dang srog la ltos med par/ /dam tshig dang ni sdom pa bsrung/ /nyin
335b4(rgyud 'grel): dang mtshan mo lan gsum du/ /nyin re zhing ni bzla bar bya/ /gang tshe nyams na rnal 'byor pa/ /kha na ma tho sbom por 'gyur/ /dgun zla 'bring po nas brtsams te/ /zla ba re re bsrung ba bya/ /gnyis med gnyis med 'khor lor gnas/ /tshes bcu
335b5(rgyud 'grel): la ni de rab mchod/ /chang dang sha sogs gang ci yang rung/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs/ /thams cad gnyis med paM na gnas/ /he ru ka dpal rab tu mchod/ /theg pa dman la 'dod mi bya/ /sems can la yang rgyab mi phyogs/ /
335b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba dag kyang yongs mi spong/ /rtag tu mya ngan 'das dga' min/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma kun la/ /khyod kyis brnyas par mi bya'o/ /phyag rgya bzhin pa mtshon cha dang/ /mtshan ma bgom par mi bya'o/ /dam tshigs rab bsrungs bsod nams
335b7(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /bud med thams cad mthong ba na/ /g.yon nas lan gsum bskor bya zhing/ /spyi bo phyag ni byas nas kyang/ /lan gsum bar du gsol ba gdab/ /bdag nyid ma khyod bu yin te/ /ji srid byang chub 'byung
336a1(rgyud 'grel): bar du/ /byang chub yan lag nu ma nas/ /byung ba'i rang gi nu mas skyongs/ /gnyis med ye shes spyod pa'i tshul/ /bslab pa blangs pa kun 'gro bas/ /na d+ha la sogs sngon 'gro ba'i/ /tshangs par spyod pa shin tu bsrung/ /dam
336a2(rgyud 'grel): tshig de la rtag gnas te/ /de sngon 'gro ba'i spas pa'i yid/ /spyod dang grol ba'i gnas 'dod pa'i/ /yid la 'dod pa kun 'grub 'gyur/ gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa/ /de ltar bdag ni bgyid par 'tshal/ /bsrung ba'i dam tshig go /
336a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dir dbang bskur ba'i slob ma ni/ /lag nas bzung ste gzi bcas pas/ /gnyis med ye shes bla med pa/ /ma lus don ni kun brjod bya/ /gnyis med ye shes sems ldan la/ /mi bya ba ni ci yang med/ /tshangs par spyod la rtag gnod la/ /
336a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa lnga ni spyad par gyis/ /gnyis med la gnas zas la ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs brda'/ /gnyis med pa dang thogs med pa/ /dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod pa bya/ /mi mo dbang phyug legs spyad cing/ /tshangs spyod bsam gtan  
336a5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin no/ /'khro ba med pa'i rgyud spyad pa/ /bsgrub pa pos ni yongs su bsrung/ /rtag tu bsgom pa la gnas nas/ /yul kun la ni rnam 'gying ba'i/ /gnyis med grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma/ /ci srid srog ni gnas pa'i bar/ /bu khyod kyis ni
336a6(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub par bya/ /'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad la/ /ci dga' bar ni bsten par bya/ /he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor che/ /bsams nas thams cad rab tu brtag /bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams kun gyis gnas//
336a7(rgyud 'grel): de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /he ru ka dpal bdag mchod do/ /'dod chags bral bar lta bu'i sdig /khams gsum na ni gzhan med de/ /de bas 'dod la chags bral bar/ /khyod kyis nam yang mi bya'o/ /bza' bar bya ba'i dam tshig go /
336b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa yis ni tshogs mdza' / /g.yas kyis mi 'jigs stsol mdzad pa'i/ /he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor che/ /'khor lo thams cad rnam par gnas/ /da he ru ka dpal lung ston bzhin/ /mgrin gcig tu ni de dag kun/ /'di nang ngas khyod lung
336b2(rgyud 'grel): bstan te/ /khrag 'thung dpal zhes de bzhin gshegs/ /srid pa mchod du dag bya'i phyir/ /sred pa'i ngan song rnams las bton/ /sh+rI he ru kA nA ma ta tha ga tI si d+hi sa ma ya stwaM/ b+hur bu bA swAhA/ gang la don yod grub pa'i phyag rgya chen po mthon
336b3(rgyud 'grel): 'phags 'dis/ /mchog du gnas gsang chen du gnas pa las/ cho gas mgrin gcig tu/ rgyal ba rnams kyis lung ston par mdzad do/ /lung ston mthon 'phags so/ /khams gsum rgyal ba'i rgyal srid che/ /rgyal po bdag por brtan pa dang/ /
336b4(rgyud 'grel): de ring bdud las rnam rgyal zhing/ /pho brang mchog tu zhugs pa yis/ /deng ni sangs rgyas nyid thob par/ /khyed rnams 'dir ni the tshom med/ /dbang bskur ba tsam 'di yis ni/ /slob ma yon tan bdag por 'gyur/ /brtan g.yon kun gyi dam tshig gi/
336b5(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon nyid duAng bde blag 'gyur/ /dbugs 'byung ba'o/ /yon gyi mchog ni dbul bya ste/ /glang po rta dang shing rta nor/ /nor bu byu ru mu tig sogs/ /phyag byas nas ni dbul bar bya/ /dir nas brtsams te bdag bran du/ /khyed la bdag ni phul
336b6(rgyud 'grel): ba lags/ /slob mar rang nyid bsgyur btsongs pa'i/ /chang gis kyang ni mchod par bya/ /slob ma gus pa med pa yis/ /dngos grub ring bar the tshom med/ /dngos po kun gyis slob ma yis/ /dang por yon ni bya ba yin/ /gal te lha ni mnyes 'dod na/ /
336b7(rgyud 'grel): 'bad de bla ma mnyes par bya/ /dpa' bo ji bzhin rig de bzhin/ /rig ma ci bzhin bla ma bzhin/ /dpa' bo rig dang bla ma la/ /mchod pa'i 'bras bu mnyam par yi/ /slob dpon gyi yon dbul ba yin no/ /de nas shes rab ma 'dir ni rnyed pa gang/ /
337a1(rgyud 'grel): me tog ldan zhing shin tu bslabs/ /shin tu gtsang ba'i sa phyogs su/ /khams lnga dag dang yang dag ldan/ /phye mar byas te de dag kun/ /rdo rje la ni byug par bya/ /dga' ba la sogs bzhi po dang/ /'khor lo gsum bdag
337a2(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor ldan/ /'dod chags che la 'byung ba'i mgon/ /chags pa kun gyis rjes chags pa/ /pad+ma'i snod du legs bzhag ste/ /rnal 'byor mas ni 'di skad smra'o/ /bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u rigs dang/ /dmangs rigs mthar gnas
337a3(rgyud 'grel): bud med kun/ /gus pas rtag tu rab mchod dang/ /gnyis med 'khyud dang tsum pa na/ /dpa' bo khyod ni spror gyur (gseng ba'i dbang) tam /smros shig dpa' bo bde ba che/ /ci gsung dam tshig bsten par ni/ /lha mo bdag gis byed par nus/ /pad+ma
337a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas par byas nas ni/ /skra bshig gos kyang sral byas nas/ /me tog tshur ldan dpa' bo yis/ /rnal 'byor ma'i rdo rje sbyin/ /deng nas brtsams te bu khyod ni/ /brtul zhugs bzang pos 'gro don gyis/ /bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u rigs dang/ /dmangs
337a5(rgyud 'grel): rigs mthar skyes mtshan nyid can/ /ba ga pad+ma btsum pa na/ /bdud rtsi rnams ni bsgrub par bya/ /rnal 'byor ma yi rkang g.yon ni/ /lung bsgo bas ni spyi bor gzhag /rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dpa' mo/ /gnyis med ye shes sems ldan pas/ /dpa' 
337a6(rgyud 'grel): po las byung byang chub sems/ /rgyun gyis dbang ni bskur ba yin/ /'di ni byang chub 'grub rnal 'byor/ /khams lnga bcud kyi bdag nyid can/ /he ru ka dpal bdag sbyor ba/ /yang dag bde la myong bar gyis/ /gnyis med ye shes dbang skur
337a7(rgyud 'grel): ni/ gsang ba kun la sogs par bshad/ /'di dag thams cad gsang ba che/ /dbang bskur ba ni mchog gis gnas/ /yon dang dad pa sngon 'gro bas/ /der ni phyag rgya gtad par bya/ /bla na med pa'i dbang bskur ba'o/ /de nas skad (mchod pa)
337b1(rgyud 'grel): cig bshad pa'i/ /tshogs sbyin sreg las bya zhing/ /rnal 'byor ma la gtor ma sbyin/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni mchog 'grub 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas zhing sogs dag bya'i phyir/ /khyad par du ni sbyin la spyad/ /dmangs rigs stong phrag gnyis dag
337b2(rgyud 'grel): kyang/ /bram ze gtsang ma gcig dang 'dra/ /bram ze stong phrag gnyis dag ni/ /dge slong gcig la rab tu sbyar/ /dge slong stong phrag gnyis dag ni/ /rdul med pa ni gcig dang mnyam/ /rdul med stong phrag gnyis dag ni/ /ye shes ldan
337b3(rgyud 'grel): pa gcig la sbyar/ /ye shes ldan pa stong phrag gnyis/ /slob dpon gcig dang mnyam par mchod/ /de ltar sbyin pa'i zhing shes nas/ /blo dang ldan pas rtag tu sbyin/ /rnal 'byor rtsa ba'i chos la ni/ /zhing bzang po la sa bon gdab/ /
337b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshams med pa dang sdig ngan yang/ /tshon rtsi mthong bas grol bar 'gyur/ /'dir dbang bskur ba tsam gyis ni/ /gtsang ma'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur/ /sbyin bdag bzang po rnal 'byor pa/ /rims kyis myur du byang chub thob/ /me tog
337b5(rgyud 'grel): chu'i dbang bskur dang/ /cod pan rdo rje bdag po dang/ /ming dang brtul zhugs rjes gnang dang/ /bka' dang mthon 'phags nyid dang ni/ /spyod pa'i brtul zhugs bstan pa'i/ /gsang ba phyag rgya gtad pa ste/ /dbang bskur 'di dag thob pa ni/ /sangs
337b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kun gyis rab tu mchod/ /dbang bskur ba bcu bzhi pa'o/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi logs su ni/ /bskor la de nas 'jug pa dang/ /longs spyod rdzogs par bzung nas ni/ /gnyis med ye shes ngal bso'o/ /tshon la sogs pa dngos po kun/ /
337b7(rgyud 'grel): nang bar tho rangs bsdu bar bya/ /bsdus nas gser gyis bum sogs/ /bcug nas chu bo chen por dor/ /bum pa thams cad bsdus nas ni/ /don bzhin du ni dga' ston bya/ /de nas rdzas lnga la sogs dang/ /sbyar bsres pa ni byug par bya/ /
338a1(rgyud 'grel): sngar gyi rdzas kyi lhag ma la sogs/ /gnyis med ye shes sbyin sreg bya/ /tsha'o sdug dang rigs mthun bcas/ /skye bo dam pa gnyis med dang/ /bkra shis glu'i rnam pa dang/ /rdo rje dril bu rol par bya/ /srid pa gsum 'bar
338a2(rgyud 'grel): sku ni rjes chags 'dul bar ldan/ /'od zer sngon po stong ldan nyi ma brgya stong ldan/ /rnam mang sku dang cha lugs rjes chags sems dpar ldan/ /he ru ka dpal sngags pa lhan cig gar byed do/ /ha ha hu hu huM/ sems can kun la phan byed pa'i/ /
338a3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor cho ga byas pa las/ /bsod nams thob pa de yis ni/ /'gro ba he ru kar gyur cig /bcom ldan 'das dpal bde mchog 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga /slob dpon nag po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa yin no// //
338a4(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma sh+rI b+ha dra dang/ zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba/ slad nas pan Ti ta su ma ti kir ti'i zhal snga nas/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba arya mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug gis zhu chen bgyis pa// //
338a5(rgyud 'grel): */ (/dpal bde mchog 'khor lo'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga bzhugs/) //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI tsakra sam+ba ra ho ma bid+hi/ bod skad du/ dpal bde mchog 'khor lo'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag
338a6(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /sngo ser dmar po marga ta ljang gu'i sku 'chang spyan gsum can/ /dbang chen la sogs phyogs bzhi'i zhal snga shes rab dmar spyan gsum/ /phyag gnyis bgegs kyi lpags 'dzin rdo rje dril bu gnyis na 'chang/ /phyag gzhan phyag mtshan
338a7(rgyud 'grel): brgyad po 'dzin pa bde ba mchog gis bsrungs/ /thog mar bde mchog 'khor lo yi/ /rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud las ni/ /sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir/ /sbyin sreg rim pa bdag gis bshad/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni sgrub dus su/
338b1(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sreg gis ni tshim par byas/ /gsang sngags ma bzlas mi 'grub la/ /sbyin sreg ma byas 'bras mo 'byung/ /las rnams thams cad rab bsgrub phyir/ /sbyin sreg las rnams brtsam par bya/ /sbyin sreg las rnams med pa la/ /dngos grub
338b2(rgyud 'grel): 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bas 'di nga ni sngags pa yis/ /brtson pas sbyin sreg las rnams bya/ /bla med nang dang phyi yi ste/ /sbyin sreg dag ni gsum du 'dod/ /gzhan dag zhi ba la sogs pa/ /sbyin sreg dag ni bzhi ru 'dod/ /de la bla na med pa
338b3(rgyud 'grel): dang por brjod par bya ste/ rnam rtog med pa'i sems nyid ni/ /thab khung sgra yi mtshan ma dang/ /rnam dben me yi dbus su ni/ /gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po lnga/ /sems las byung ba ma lus pa'i/ /yam shing dag gi sreg blugs byas/ /
338b4(rgyud 'grel): gzugs la sogs pa'i 'byung ba rnams/ /yam shing du ni rab grags yin/ /pad+ma thab khung yin par bshad/ /rdo rje blugs gzar yin par grags/ /rtag tu sa bon sreg blugs kyis/ /bla med gnas ni thob par 'gyur/ /bla med rjes su sbyor ba yis//
338b5(rgyud 'grel): phung po pa'i rtsa rnams ni/ /bzhi po yang de ru son pa'o/ /bdud rtsi lnga 'bab pa de ni/ /mchod pa'i ngo bor gnas pa ste/ /de yi gzugs nyid dngos po yis/ /mchod pa bzhi zhes rnam par bshad/ /lus can snying gi nang du ni/ /sna rnam lnga ni
338b6(rgyud 'grel): rnam par gnas/ /sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo la/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhir yang dag brjod/ /gnas sogs bye ba la brten te/ /gnas dang gnas la rnam par gnas/ /spyi bor yang dag 'byung ba yi/ /rtsa rnams spyi bor skyes zhes dran/ /de yi
338b7(rgyud 'grel): nang na 'dren pa ni/ /rdul dang snying stobs mun pa'i tshul/ /pul+lIr rab gtum mo zhes dran/ /so dang sen mo 'bab par dran/ /dzA land+ha rar gtum mig ma/ /de bzhin skra dar ba spu 'bab/ /o Di ya na gnas chen por/ /'od ldan ma ni rnam
339a1(rgyud 'grel): par gnas/ /g.yas pa'i gnas la brten nas ni/ /pags pa'i dri ma 'dzin la gnas/ /arbu dang ni sna chen mo/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni sha zan bsam/ /gnas kyi 'dren pa mkha' 'gro ma/ /gnas bzhi ru ni yang dag
339a2(rgyud 'grel): bshad/ /gang zhig chu rgyas 'bab pa'i rtsa/ /go dA ba ri rnam dag gnas/ /de ni sra ba'i tshul gyis gnas/ /dpa' bo'i blo gros ma zhes bshad/ /rA me shwa ri'i rtsa gang zhig /de ni mi'u thung ma zhes grags/ /rus pa'i phreng ba rnams gnas
339a3(rgyud 'grel): pa/ sra ba yi ni dngos pos gnas/ /lha mo mkhar duAng gang zhig rtsa/ /'jam lus lang ka'i dbang phyug ma/ /de ni rtag tu mchin pa 'bab/ /kun gyi lus ni rtag par gnas/ /ma la bar ni shing grib mig /rgyal ba'i dbang phyug snying
339a4(rgyud 'grel): la gnas/ /mkha' 'gro 'jig rten ma mo rnams/ /nye ba'i gnas su yang dag bshad/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo mkha' spyod ma/ /gnas dang nye gnas yang dag gnas/ /mig 'bab pa yi rtsa gang zhig /'dod pa'i gzugs su rnam par gnas//
339a5(rgyud 'grel): gzugs ni mthong bar 'dod pa ste/ /e ra ba ti zhes byar bshad/ /o Ter mkhris pa 'bab pa'i rtsa/ /'jigs byed chen mo ru ni brjod/ /mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma mo dag /'di dag zhing du yang dag bshad/ /tri sha ku ner yang dag byung/ /rlung gi
339a6(rgyud 'grel): shugs ma 'gro bar bcas/ /char 'thung ma ni ko sa lar/ /rgyu ma'i phreng ba 'khrug lha rdzas/ /mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma mo dag /nye ba'i zhing du yang dag bshad/ /ljang lha ma ni ka ling+gar/ /logs su yang dag gnas pa'o/ /ltor gnas shin
339a7(rgyud 'grel): tu bzang mor nges/ /lam pA kar ni yongs su grags/ /mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma mo dag /mtshan ngo har ni rnam bshad pa'o/ /rta rna ma ni kAny+tsir gnas/ /bshad ba rtag tu 'bab pa'o/ /hi mA la yar bya gdong ma/ /mtshams mdza' i dbus su
339b1(rgyud 'grel): son pa'i ste/ /mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma mo dag /nye ba'i tshan do ha zhes bshad/ /gsung gi 'khor lo yang dag bshad/ /sa spyod pho nya rnam gnas pa'o/ /yi dags lhag gnas yang dag gnas/ /'khor lo shugs ma bad kan can/ /gang zhing
339b2(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu rnag 'bab pa/ /khyim gyi lhar ni yang dag gnas/ /mkha' 'gro dam pa'i dbang phyug ma/ /dum skyes ma zhes rnam par bshad/ /mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma mo dag /'du ba can du yang dag bshad/ /sau rAshtsa? ni dmar pos mnan/ /chang tshong
339b3(rgyud 'grel): ma ni mkha' 'gror 'dod/ /rdul ni 'bab par 'gyur ba'o rtsa?/ /gser gling du ni yang dag gnas/ /shin tu bzang lugs yang dag 'khrug /de yi 'khor lo go cha 'dod/ /mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma mo dag /nye ba'i 'du ba can rab smras/ /na? gar
339b4(rgyud 'grel): shin tu dpa' mo zhes/ /tshal can sbom po'i lus can ma/ /si nd+hur stobs chen ma zhes bya/ /mya ngam gyi ni mchi ma 'bab/ /mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma mo dag /'di dag dur khrod yang dag 'bab/ /mchil ma skam po 'bab pa gang/ mya ngan
339b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor los sgyur ma'o/ /ku lA tA ni brtson chen mo/ /phung po la sogs bud shing bsreg /ye shes me ni skyes gyur pas/ /phyi rol bsreg pa bdag med yin/ /dz+nyA na pA da pas bshad pa/ /sbyin sreg cho ga phyi rim pa/ /sems dang sems byung
339b6(rgyud 'grel): dag yin te/ /phung po la sogs bud shing bsreg /ye shes 'bar ba bla med 'dod/ /sems kyis ji tsam bsam pa dag /phyi rol sbyin sreg yin par 'dod/ /ye shes me la phung po la/ /yam shing sreg pa bla med yin/ /de nas yang nang
339b7(rgyud 'grel): gi brjod par bya ste/ /nyon mongs se ba zhi byed yin/ /ting nge 'dzin ni rgyas byed phyir/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor bas bdag /ji lta bar ni sems kyi bya/ /skye ba'i las las rnam grol zhing/ /tshe ni yang dag 'phel ba'i phyir/ /ci 'dod sreg blugs las
340a1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba/ /nang gi sbyin sreg dag tu bshad/ /ji ltar dus bzhi'i rim pa yis/ /sbyin sreg bzhi yang rab tu bshad/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang/ /dbang dang mngon spyod shes par bya/ /sdig pa 'jig phyir zhi ba ste/ /bsod
340a2(rgyud 'grel): nams yongs 'dzin rgyas pa yin/ /chags pa bsgom phyir dbang 'gyur te/ /rtog pa zad phyir gsod pa yin/ /de nas yang phyi'i bshad par bya ste/ /rgyud so so las slob dpon tha dad pas sbyin sreg gi cho ga ji skad bshad pa bya/ 'di ni
340a3(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud las bstan te/ bdag gis 'khor lo sdom pa'i man ngag cung zad brjod par bya'o/ /de la thab khung ni/ sems can dbye bas mdza' yas te/ /rigs kyi dbye bas lnga ru 'gyur/ /las kyi dbye bas bzhi ru 'gyur/ /thab
340a4(rgyud 'grel): khung rnams ni de ltar bshad/ /zhi ba la ni zlum la dkar/ /rgyas la ser po dbang chen te/ /dbang la dmar po gru gsum pa/ /mngon spyod zla ba phyed pa yin/ /khru gang tshad nas brtsams nas ni/ /khru ni bcu drug pa yi bar/ /de'i phyed du
340a5(rgyud 'grel): bgos nas ni/ /rang gi tshad du bya ba yin/ /khru gar tshad kyis thab khung la/ /sor bzhi dor bar kha khyer sor bzhis gsod/ /khru phyed brkos la de bzhin du/ /thams cad la yang blta bya ste/ /kun kyang rang gi kha khyer du bya'o/ /thab khung gi
340a6(rgyud 'grel): dbus su rdo rje dang zangs gri bri'o/ /thab khung gi nang du phyogs bzhir kha TwAM ga dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag mtshan rnams bri'o/ /kha khyer la pad+ma'i steng du zangs gri'i phreng ba/ thab kyi phyi rol du gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi par dkyil 'khor
340a7(rgyud 'grel): gyi thig btab ste/ 'khor lo gsum gyi byin gyis brlabs la/ sgo bzhi dang ldan pa/ dur khrod brgyad dang bcas pa/ ji ltar 'khor lo gsum gyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag mtshan bzhin du 'dir yang de ltar blta'o/ /shar gyi sgo la sogs
340b1(rgyud 'grel): par lcags kyu la sogs pas mtshan par bya'o/ /phyi'i dkyil 'khor la/ pad+ma nags kyi lcug ma dang/ /phreng ba dang ni spyi blugs danha?/ /yi dags pags pa mdung rtse gsum/ /zla ba byed pa rgyal mtshan dang/ /ral pa'i tshogs dang mig dang ni/ /
340b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo dung dang dbyug pa dang/ /ral gri bu ba dang mdung dang ni/ /dril bu ba dan rma bya dang/ /ra skyes lnga lnga byas nas ni/ /shar phyogs snam bu dag la bri/ /de ltar thab thams cad byas nas/ /las dang rjes su mthun pa'i kha khyer bya'o/ /zhi ba la
340b3(rgyud 'grel): ni rdo rjes mtshan pa'am/ 'khor los mtshan pa'o/ /rgyas pa la ni rin po ches mtshan pa/ dbang la ni pad+mas mtshan pa/ drag po la ni rtse gsum pas mtshan pa ste/ 'di ltar las rjes su mthun par rang rang gi mtshan mas mtshan pa'i kha khyer
340b4(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ shar du zhi ba bya bar bshad/ /lho phyogs su ni rgyas pa ste/ /dbang gi las ni nub tu bshad/ /gsad pa byang du bya ba yin/ /ji ltar las dang rjes mthun par/ /rdul tshon gyis ni rdzogs par bri/ /yang na me tog dag kyang rung/ /thab khung dag kyang
340b5(rgyud 'grel): de ltar bya/ /yam shing bud shing rdzas la sogs/ /mtshan nyid me yi rtags rnams ni/ /gzhan du rgya cher bshad pas na/ /'dir ni bdag gis ma bsgrubs so/ /man ngag gcig pu'i rim pa dag /rnal 'byor gyi rgyud las grags pa rnams/ mdor
340b6(rgyud 'grel): bsdus nas ni nges par yang/ /ji tsam nus pa bshad par bya/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis lus khrus byas te/ dri zhim pos bdug la/ gur gum dang/ tsan dan dang/ thal ba bsres pas lus byugs te/ ji skad bshad pa'i rgyun bsgo par
340b7(rgyud 'grel): bya ste/ stag gi pags pa bgos shing/ phyag rgya lngas brgyan te/ na ra'i rus pa'i rgyan dang las sems can gyi don rtag tu bya'o/ /phyi rol bzlog tshul 'chang ba ni/ /de ni zhi sogs las rnams la/ /thugs ni zhi bar shes par bya/ /nyi mas
341a1(rgyud 'grel): gdungs pa'i rgya mtsho tsha/ /gangs ltar nang grang phyi rol tsha/ /thugs rje chen po'i khro bo yis/ /de bzhin 'gro ba tshul 'di gsungs/ /de lta bu'i las dang rjes su mthun par gos kyi bye brag bgo bar bya'o/ /de ni sgrub pa po'i
341a2(rgyud 'grel): las so/ /de nas rang gi lha'i nga rgyal bskyed de/ ji ltar bshad pa'i las dang rjes su mthun pa'i gzugs su byas la/ zhal bzhi pa dang sku gsung thugs kyi phur bu'i sngags dang/ de bzhin du gsal byed ni rak+Sha rak+Sha dang/ hUM gsum dang phaT ni brjod
341a3(rgyud 'grel): par gsang sngags de las khro bo la sogs pa spros te/ bgegs kyi tshogs thams cad bsreg par byas nas/ thal dang bgegs rnams bsregs te/ phyogs bcur byer bar bsam mo/ /de bzhin du g.yas brkyang ba la sogs pa'i stangs
341a4(rgyud 'grel): stabs kyang bya'o/ /'di ltar bgegs kyi tshogs rnams phur bu dang/ rdo rje dra ba dang ra ba la sogs pas thab khung gi thon khor bgegs par bya ste/ thab khung byin gyis brlabs par shes par bya'o/ /yi ge hUM dam rang gi lha'i tshogs kyi yi ge
341a5(rgyud 'grel): gang yang rung ba las dang rjes su mthun pa thab khung bskyed la/ de'i dbus su lte ba la yi ge re pha 'bar ba yongs su gyur pa las gru gsum par byas shing bsgoms la/ de'i grwa gsum la oM A:hUM yi ge gsum gyis 'dod pa dang/ gzugs dang/
341a6(rgyud 'grel): gzugs med pa'i khams gsum 'og dang sa bla mtho ris kyi gzugs pad+ma dang 'khor lo dang rdo rje gsum bskyed de/ dbus su re pha 'bar ba yongs su gyur pa mthong ba dang/ mtshan ma'i yi ge gsum dang/ re pha yongs su gyur pa las 'bar
341a7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dbus su chu'i dkyil 'khor gnas pa la khams gsum gyi bdag po dpal khrag ba? 'thung bar spros te/ zhi ba'i don du pA ba ka'i me bsgoms la zhi ba'i gzugs can dkar po zhal cig pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ spyan gsum pa/ /ral pa'i
341b1(rgyud 'grel): cod pan can/ phyag g.yas pa gnyis na dbyug to dang/ (mi 'jigs pa/ g.yon pa gnyis) na bgrang phreng dang/ spyi blugs 'dzin pa/ rgyan dang gos dkar po bsnan nas? pa/ mchod phyir thogs 'chang ba/ lus thams cad la bdud rtsi dkar po'i rgyun 'bab pa/
341b2(rgyud 'grel): ral pa la mkha' 'gro ma gnas par bsgom mo/ /de bzhin bu rgyas pa la ni khyad par du mdog ser po'i rgyan can/ dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ ye shes kyi sems can thams cad la mchog stsol ba/ stobs dang mdog dang
341b3(rgyud 'grel): dpal rdzogs par mdzad pa cod pan du bsgom mo/ /rim pa gzhan yang dbang dang dgug pa la 'dod pa'i me dmar po me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ gos dmar pos brgyan pa/ khaN+Da ro ha cod pan la gnas pa/ khyad par du g.yas g.yon
341b4(rgyud 'grel): na lcags kyu dang zhags pa 'dzin pa/ gzhan ni snga ma bzhin no/ /bsad pa la rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa mdog nag po 'jigs pa spyan zlum po hUM gi sa bon las skyes pa gos dang rgyan nag po mi rus kyis phreng bas brgyan pa/ zla phyed
341b5(rgyud 'grel): lta bur 'bar ba'i dbu skra gyen du brdzes pa/ gzugs can ma'i cod pan can/ /g.yas na ral gri 'dzin pa/ 'jigs byed chen po nag po 'bar ba las bya rgod dang khra la sogs pas/ nam mkha' khyab par bkug ste/ gang dang gang byas pa de
341b6(rgyud 'grel): zos par bsgom mo/ /rlung gi mes ni gsad pa la sogs pa las bya'o/ /me lha'i mtshan nyid do/ /de la zhib la ni 'o ma can gyi shing las byung ba'i me 'am/ rgyun bzhag gi me 'am/ bram ze tha ma'i mes bya'o/ /rgyas pa la ni rgyal po dang/
341b7(rgyud 'grel): blon po dang/ dgon pa dang/ rgyal rigs kyi khyim nas byung ba'i mes bya'o/ /dbang la ni smad 'tshor ma dang/ rje'u rigs kyi khyim nas byung ba'i mes bya'o/ /dgug pa ni gar mkhan dang/ rol mo pa dang/ lam du bus pa'i mes bya'o/ /gsod
342a1(rgyud 'grel): pa la ni rdo las byung ba'i me 'am/ gdol pa'i khyim nas byung ba'i mes bya'o/ /thams cad kyang dur khrod kyi me dang/ dur khrod kyi sol bar ldan par bya'o/ /me'i mtshan nyid do/ /de nas mchod yon snod gnyis ni/ /ma chag sdug
342a2(rgyud 'grel): cing mdzes pa la/ /chang ngam yang na sbyar ba'i chang/ /me tog ldan pas dgang bar bya/ /de la bdud rtsi lnga po yis/ /gnyis ka yang ni blugs par bya/ /yi ge bdun pa gcig pu dang/ /gnyis pa gnod mdzes rgyal po dag /gcig ni brgya rtsa brgyad
342a3(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ /gnyis pa dag ni bzhi cha yin/ /gnas la legs par bzhag nas su/ /gos kyis bkab ste mchod par bya/ /mchod yon gyi snod kyi cho ga'o/ /sbyin sreg yo byad thams cad kun/ /bdag gis g.yas su dgod par bya/ /rdo rje de bzhin dril
342a4(rgyud 'grel): bu dang/ /mchod yon snod ni g.yon du bzhag /dgang gzar dang ni blugs gzar dang/ /mar ni mdun du bzhag par bya/ /thams cad kyang ni bsangs nas bzhag /'di ni rdzas bzhag pa'o/ /de nas phyi rol gyi me blangs la/ gnod mdzes kyi
342a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po'i gsang sngags kyis ku sha blangs te/ de'i chus lan gsum bsangs la/ rtswa sgam po gtsang ma dang bcas pas dag par byas te/ bdud rtsi lngas bsreg te thab khung du bzhag ste/ oM sh+rI he ru ka mahA badzra dzwa la dzwa la hUM hUM/ gsang sngags
342a6(rgyud 'grel): 'di dang bcas par rlung g.yab kyis g.yabs te thab tu me sbar ro/ /de'i dbus su dam tshig sems dpa' i me sngar bshad pa'i rnam par bsams te/ ye shes sems dpa' i me sngags dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya 'dis spyan drangs te/ lag pa
342a7(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa mi 'jigs par byas la/ mthe bong srin lag gi tshig la bkug pa'i thabs kyis spyan drang ngo/ /e hye hi mahA b+hu tadya ba ri Shi dwi dza satwa ma gri hi twa yu d+haM mahA ra smi a smri na si nan ni hi to b+ha ba/ oM he ru ka mahA badzra pA ba ka/ agna ye
342b1(rgyud 'grel): ma ma shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ zhi pa'i'o/ /oM he ru ka mahA badzra ma he n+d+ra/ agna ye ma ma puSh+TiM ku ru pau ShaT rgyas? pa'i'o/ /oM he ru ku mahA badzra kA ma a ka na ye ma ma a mu kaM ba sh+riM ku ru ho/ /dbang gi'o/ /oM he ru ka mahA badzra kro d+ha a ka na ye dza hi kro d+harma
342b2(rgyud 'grel): hUM a mu ka mA ya hUM phaT/ mngon sbyad? kyi'o/ /ma ?? pa dang 'thor 'thung dang nye reg byas te bkug la dam tshig gi me lha la gzhug go /de nas mchod yon gyi snod blangs la/ bdud rtsi lnga dang bsres te thugs ka nas zhabs bsil dbul lo//
342b3(rgyud 'grel): oM sh+rI he ru ka mahA badzra pu ba ra ??tkA ra pra tI hUM? swAhA/ de nas lag pa gnyis kyis lan gsum arg+ha 'di dbul te/ i mahA ma ma ya tat+ma grih+na sid+himme pra yats+tsha swAhA/ spyan drang ba'i cho ga'o/ /de nas 'khor lo gsum byin gyis brlab par bya ste/
342b4(rgyud 'grel): oM A:hUM mgo bo dang mgrin pa snying ka rnams su'o/ /de nas yan lag drug tu dgod par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje sems ma la sogs pas yid kyis dbang bskur/ /lA sya sogs pa brgyad kyis yang dag par mchod de/ dar dpyangs dang phreng ba la
342b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa bcings te go bskon no/ /de nas me long dang sman la sogs pa khrus kyi yo byad dang/ dril bu dkrol zhing spos dang rdzas snga ma dang bcas pa la yi ge brgya pa bzlas te khrus bya'o/ /yi ge brgya pa ni 'di dag ste/ oM he ru ka badzra sa ma
342b6(rgyud 'grel): ya ma nu pA la ya zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/ /de nas mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhi'i gsang sngags dang/ yi ge nyi shu rtsa gnyis kyi gsang sngags kyis btab pa'i bum pa lngas dbang bskur ro/ /zhi ba la ni mkha' 'gro ma'i gzugs
342b7(rgyud 'grel): can rnam par snang mdzad dbu rgyan du bsam mo/ /rgyas pa la ni lA ma'i tshul can rin chen 'byung ldan dbu rgyan du bsam mo/ /dbang la ni dum skyes ma'i tshul can snang ba mdza' yas dbu rgyan du bsam mo/ /gsad pa la ni gzugs can
343a1(rgyud 'grel): ma'i tshul can don yong thub pa dbu rgyan du bsam mo/ /ma lha'i zhal dang dgang gzar gyi kha la rang gi bdag po'i sa bon gyi yi ge dgod do/ /de nas oM DA ki ni dzi ni dzi ka swAhA/ 'dis mar la mngon par bsngags te/
343a2(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du rgyas pa la yang lA ma dang rin chen 'byung ldan la sogs pa'i sngags kyis gdab bo/ /de ltar me 'bar bar shes nas thog mar blugs gzar gyi dgang blugs gsum/ oM sh+rI he ru ka dzwa la dzwa la hUM sngags 'di dang bcas par
343a3(rgyud 'grel): dbul lo/ /de nas me 'bar ba dang mdog dang sgra la sogs pa las bgegs med par shes nas/ bgegs thams cad bcing bar bya ba'i phyir phyogs bzhi nas ku sha dgram mo/ /oM a'i me ku sha shu b+ha dib bya/ su ra brahma pa bi ta tri
343a4(rgyud 'grel): na ratna tra ya ra ta hi b+hi pri thi bi dza garb+ha a big+h+naM ma ma shAn+ti dku? rban+tu swAhA/ 'di lta bu'i rim pas rtsa ba dang bcas par phyung ste/ mdog ljang gu'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa zhi ba dang rgyas pa la sbyor ro/ /gzhan rnams la ni mnyam por bcad
343a5(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /me'i rim pa ni shar ni shar gyi mdun nas/ lho ni lho'i mdun nas so/ /nub ni nub kyi mdun nas so/ /byang ni byang gi mdun nas so/ /me thab kyi sa phyogs kun tu zhal bzhi pa'i sngags kyis mchod yon gyi snod la
343a6(rgyud 'grel): bsngags te bsang ngo/ /de nas zhal bzhi pa'i sngags sam/ /baN+Da ro ha'i gsang sngags gang yang rung bas mda' dang tshon skud la btab ste/ mda' bzhi phyogs mtshams su btsugs la sna lnga'i skud pas yongs su bskor na rdo rje'i
343a7(rgyud 'grel): bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /ku sha la sogs pa dgram pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas me'i las dang/ rjes su mthun par dngul gyi snod dang/ pad+ma'i snod gang yang rung ba mdun du bsams te/ yang mchod yon dang zhabs bsil dang/
343b1(rgyud 'grel): 'thor 'thung byin la dgang blugs dbul lo/ /de la rim pa ni 'di yin te/ pus mo gnyis kyi nang du lag pa bzhag ste/ lag pa g.yas pa rdo rje/ bu tshur gyis dgang gzar blangs la/ mthe bong dang mthe chung brtan par gzung ste/ sor mo lhag ma
343b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams su yu ba'i steng du bzhag la mar gyis yongs su bkang ba'i dgang blugs mdun nam gsum mam gcig me lha'i sngags kyis me lha'i zhal du dbul lo/ /oM he ru ka agna ye a mu ka sya shAn+ti ku ru swAhA/ de bzhin du thams cad la yang sbyar ro/
343b3(rgyud 'grel): de nas bsreg pa'i rim pa blta bar bya ste/ dang por dgang blugs dbul/ de nas yam shing ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor du'o/ /mar ni zhal du'o/ /de nas til dang 'bras can dang/ zho phyag du'o/ /de nas ku sha dang rU rba'i myu gu ni spyi gtsug la'o/ /
343b4(rgyud 'grel): de nas nas dang gro dang 'bras dang mon sran gre'u rnams ni zhal lo/ /de bzhin du zhi ba'i rdzas la sogs pa rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /dri ni thugs kar ro/ /me tog ni dbu la'o/ /bdug spos ni 'od 'bar ba la'o/ /zhabs bsil ni zhabs la'o/ /
343b5(rgyud 'grel): mchod yon dang 'thor 'thung ni phyag la'o/ /mar me ni mdun du ste/ de dag ni rim pa'o/ /de nas sdig pa bsreg pa'i phyir dang por til gyi sbyin sreg bya ste/ oM sarba pA baM da ha na badzrA ya swAhA/ de nas rdzas thams cad gsang sngags gcig gis
343b6(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /oM badzra a na la mahA b+hu ta dzwa la ya sarbba b+hasmiM ku ru sarbba big+h+naM hUM phaT/ a mo ka sya shAn+ti dku ru swAhA/ yang na oM he ru kA ya bidma he baM dya rA dzA ya d+hi ma he tan+no bI ra pa ra dza ta ya ya hUM/ a mo ka sya shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ yang na rgyud gzhan las
343b7(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa so so'i spyi'i gsang sngags kyang rung ngo/ /oM badzra yadz+nyA ya swAhA/ yam shing gi'o/ /oM agna ye swAhA/ mar gyi'o/ /oM sarba pA paM da ha na badzrA ya 'di zhes bya ba/ pA baM da ha swAhA/ til dang yungs kar rnams kyi'o/ /oM
344a1(rgyud 'grel): satwa saM pa de swAhA/ zho dang zan gyi'o/ /oM a pra ti? ha ta? badzra ya swAhA/ ku ?ba'i'o/ /oM badzra A yu(rgyud 'grel): She swAhA/ dUrba'i myu gu'i'o/ /oM ma hA be gA ya swAhA nas kyi'o/ /oM badzra g+hasma re swAhA/ gro yi'o/ /oM badzra bi dza lA ya
344a2(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ 'bru'i'o/ /oM mahA bo lA ya swAhA/ ma sha'i'o/ /oM badzra puSh+Ta yo swAhA/ 'bras ma drug pa'i'o/ /oM mahA b+hi ba ya ba ye swAhA/ star ka dang/ gla gor zho sha dang/ dzA ti pha la rnams kyi'o/ /zhu ba'i rdzas lhag ma rnams kyi ni me'i rang gi
344a3(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags rnams kyis sbyin sreg bya'o/ /u dum+ba ra'i shing gi yal ga la sogs lhag ma rnams la ni/ oM la sogs pa nas rang gi ming dang mthar swAhA bcas pa'i rim pas sbyin sreg bya'o/ /rdzas thams cad la bdud rtsi lnga dang bsres
344a4(rgyud 'grel): te sbyin sreg bya'o/ /thams cad de nas me la 'thor 'thung dang/ bsang gtor la sogs pa bya ba ste/ ye shes kyi me lha spyan drangs la/ snying ga nas yi ge hUM gis 'od zer gyis bskul nas nam mkha' las bkug ste/ las ma lus pa'i gzhi 'jig
344a5(rgyud 'grel): rten 'das pa'i ye shes kyi me lha ji skad bshad pa'i las kyi rgyan dang/ na bza' dang/ ji skad bshad pa'i mdog dang/ phyag ji ltar gnas pa'i dpal khrag 'thung gi gzugs byon pa dang/ de'i thugs kar ye shes sems dpa' i sa bon gyi
344a6(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer rnams dang/ rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas ye shes sems dpa' spyan drang ngo/ /khyud pa'i phyag rgya bcings la/ oM sh+rI badzra he ru ka e hye hi b+ha ga ban/ i ha bkya sa ma ye ma tsa pany+dza a mri ta arg+haM saM pra tits+tsha swa bu tsam bi
344a7(rgyud 'grel): tra si ta me/ 'dis thab khung g.yas kyi drung du bltas te/ oM sh+rI badzra he he ru ru kaM hUM hUM phaT DA ki nI dzA la saM ba raM swAhA/ zhabs bsil dang mchod yon dang/ 'thor 'thung dang/ lha bshos dang/ lA sya la sogs pas yang dag par mchod
344b1(rgyud 'grel): de/ rtsa ba'i sngags brgyad gyis bstod do/ /rdo rje bcings la lcags bya dang/ /zhags pa dang/ lcags sgrog dang/ dril bu rnams kyis dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang/ dbang du bya'o/ /dri sh+ya dza:dza hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya stwaM sa ma
344b2(rgyud 'grel): ya ho 'dis me'i dam tshig sems dpa' i zhal du thams cad kyi bdag nyid rab tu gzhug go /de ltar snga ma bzhin du me long gi thog tu khrus byas la dbang lnga gsol te/ dar dpyangs dang/ phreng ba bcings te/ ye shes sems dpa' 
344b3(rgyud 'grel): rang gi thugs khar mtshan ma'i dbus su rang gi zla chos kyi yi ge la dkyil 'khor ma lus pa drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi lha'i rang bzhin mthong ba la yang mchod yon phul te/ snga ma bzhin du sbyin sreg gi yo byad thams cad bsangs te/ de nas dgang
344b4(rgyud 'grel): gzar blangs la ji tsam nus pa'i dgang blugs me lha'i zhal du dbul lo/ /de bzhin du blugs gzar gyis stong ngam/ brgya rtsa brgyad dam/ phyed dam/ bzhi cha yang rung bsreg go /de nas yang dgang blugs gsum dbul te/ 'di ltar dkyil
344b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ma lus pa kun la bcu cha'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /thams cad la dgang blugs dang spos dang/ dril bu'i sgra dang yi ge brgya pa gsum mam gcig bzlas te/ me tog la sogs pa dag pa dbul lo/ /sbyin sreg gi yo byad thams cad kyis snga ma
344b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du sbyin sreg bya'o/ /dbyangs skyong gi sngags sam yi ge bdun pa 'am/ /rdo rje phag mo'i nye ba'i snying po'i gsang sngags gang yang rung ba las 'di zhes bya ba shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ zhes bya ba mthar gdags so/ /rgyas pa'i mthar ni puSh+Ti dku ru bau ShaT/
344b7(rgyud 'grel): dbang gi mthar ro/ /bsang pa'i mthar phaT/ yang dri zhim po las byung ba ci yang rung ste/ thams cad bdag gis kha zas la sogs pa 'byor pa'i don du sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i sbyin sreg byas la dngos grub kyi phyir/ rgyud las 
345a1(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa'i rdzas? rnams kyis sbyin sreg bya'o/ /ba lang dang rta sha dang/ /shwa na'i shA dang khyim bya dag /dkyil 'khor gru gsum byas na ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang nges par 'jig /phyir bzlog phreng ba'i gsang sngags kyis/ /
345a2(rgyud 'grel): zhi ba la sogs las rnams bya/ /rdo rje phag mo'i sngags gnyis kyis/ /dgug pa la sogs bya ba min/ /de nas ji ltar 'dod pa'i sbyin sreg byas pa'i mthar oM h+rI:ha ha huM hUM phaT/ nye ba'i snying po 'di gsum mam bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig mar
345a3(rgyud 'grel): gyi sreg blugs kyis spang la/ mchod yon dang zhabs bsil dang/ 'thor 'thung dang/ dril bu'i rol mo sda ma? bzhin du dbul lo/ /dgang blugs kyi mthar bde legs su dang rol mo dang/ bkra shis pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dbul lo/ /de nas
345a4(rgyud 'grel): bstod pa bya ste/ /mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub gsal la/ bzod par gsol lo/ /rdo rje bcing ba'i phyag rgya bcings la/ oM he ru ka mu:'dis steng du dgrol te/ oM khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad/ ces pa la sogs pa brjod do/ /
345a5(rgyud 'grel): de nas oM kha kha khA hi zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis nya dang sha dang/ chang dang/ zan dron la sogs pas yongs su gang ba'i gtor ma byin no/ /me'i dbus nas ye shes sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su gyur te gshegs su gsol lo/ /de nas
345a6(rgyud 'grel): me la mchod yon la sogs pa phul te/ sbyin sreg gi yo byad lhag ma rnams kyang sbyin sreg bya'o/ /sreg blugs kyi mthar bsgrub bya bzung la dgang blugs dbul lo/ /mchod yon dang zhabs bsil dang bsang gtor yang bya/ sgrub pa po
345a7(rgyud 'grel): mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyang gsol te/ oM agna ye ya hi ya hi/ sarbbaM rtse kha ba ra a thaM tsa sa ti d+ha ma ga tsa ha phyag byug ces bya'o/ /spyan drang pa'i phyag rgya las mthe bong phyir bskyed pa'i me 'bar ba'i gzugs can du blta ba de
345b1(rgyud 'grel): gshegs su gsol te/ rang gi lha'i nga rgyal dang/ ldan pas phyogs skyod rnams la gtor ma sbyin no/ /rje btsun gyi yi ge brgya pa yang la ni bdun gyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o// //oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ zhes bya bas phyogs kyi phur bu dang/ mnga' 
345b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams phyur la/ las thams cad pa'i chu'o me dang bcas pa/ khaN+Da ro ha'i drig? sngags kyis btab ste/ mthus byas la gzhag go /de nas lan gsum bsgong ba byas te/ glu der gang la sogs pa mdun du bya zhing ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya'o/ /
345b3(rgyud 'grel): dpal sdom rnal 'byor ma rgyud las/ /sbyin sreg rim pa byung ba 'dis/ /rnal 'byor pa ni rtag dga' ba'i/ /dngos grub myur du par shog/ /dpal he ru ka'i ming gi rgyud las/ dpal bde mchog 'khor lo'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga/ grub pa'i slob
345b4(rgyud 'grel): dpon tshin po nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harmma b+ha dra dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba dge slong rig pa gzhon nus bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //
345b5(rgyud 'grel): */ (/dpyid kyi thig le bzhugs/) /rgya gar skad du/ bA san+ta ti la ga nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpyid kyi thig ler zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das bde mchog 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mnyam dang mi mnyam bde chen sum cu rtsa bdun byang chub
345b6(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i phyogs bzhugs phung po chos kyi rang bzhin gnas pa rang lus rtsa yi 'khor lo gtso bo bzhi/ /dbyangs yig lngar bcas bcu gnyis dbyangs yig don gyi phyi mo gsal byed sum cu rtsa bzhis brgyan cing sku gsung thugs kyi dbye bas gnas
345b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gnas la sogs/ /sa bcu'i dbang phyug kun 'gro 'gro kun dang snying dbus gnas nam mkha' i ngo bo mchog zhi he ru ka dpal dam pa'i de nyid mya ngan 'das rang bzhin/ /rab gsal dpyid kyi thig le 'od 'phros 'bar ba sku gsum rgyas pa legs
346a1(rgyud 'grel): rtogs 'gro ba'i rang bzhin don bde rtsol ba rtsa'i 'khor lo'i mgon la rab btud nas/ /sbyor ba'i gdan las rnam phyur ba/ /phyi dang bcas pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /'khor lo bde mchog dpal rim las/ /dpyid kyi thig le
346a2(rgyud 'grel): bshad bya ste/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dpal grub/ /rang gi lus la rnam gnas pa/ /shin tu nyung bar 'dod rnams la/ /gsal bar bya yi phyir ro/ /bcos ma'i dkyil 'khor spang bya nas/ /bcos ma'i sbyin sreg las dag dang/ /bcos
346a3(rgyud 'grel): ma'i bsgom pa'i las dag dang/ /bcos ma'i bzlas pa nyid du ni/ /de la sogs pa'i bcos ma kun/ /rang bzhin rnal 'byor tshul gyis spang/ /phyi rol bcos ma rab bya ba/ /rang bzhin rtogs par bya phyir te/ /rang bzhin rtogs
346a4(rgyud 'grel): par gyur pa na/ /rab tu bya ba byed min nyid/ /ji ltar pha rol don gnyer 'gas/ /gzings la legs par sbyor 'gyur ba/ /pha rol son nas 'dor bar 'gyur/ /rab tu bya ba'ang de bzhin no/ /dkyil 'khor la sogs pas gang zhig /
346a5(rgyud 'grel): bcos ma'i bsam pas byed pa dang/ /thams cad legs te mi legs min/ /de rab sbyar ba gsal ba yin/ /de ru las ni rab 'bad de/ /dngos mchog rig pa'i rgyal ba yis/ /sgra shes bya phyir bstan bcos gang/ /drang srong gi byed
346a6(rgyud 'grel): ji lta ba'o/ /de ltar las kyi rjes 'brangs pas/ /mi rnams rab bya byed pa ni/ /'bad pas nyon mongs blang ba yis/ /rang gi sems ni rnam par 'joms/ /de nas dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i/ /cho ga'i bya ba'i yan lag la/ /'bad
346a7(rgyud 'grel): kun rnam par 'dren min nyid/ /ngal bar byed pa 'ba' zhig yin/ /rnam min rtog la sangs rgyas min/ /rnam rtog bcas pas min de bzhin/ /shin tu rnam dag yongs shes pas/ /mkhas pa rnams ni 'gyur ba nyid/ /bya ba rang
346b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin nyid du yod/ /byed pa po yang rang bzhin nyid/ /bya dang byang pa'i dngos po yis/ /rang bzhin nyid kyi dngos po spangs/ /dbye ba kun gyi rang bzhin ni/ /a yig yang dag rnams par gnas/ /thog mdza' med pa'i ngo bo yis/ /rin chen rnams kyi
346b2(rgyud 'grel): rgya mtsho bzhin/ /rtag tu 'jig rten tha snyad nyid/ /de 'gal 'jig rten pa min pa/ /yod pa'am ni med nyid gyi/ /rang bzhin las ni rtogs min nyid/ /'di nyid kyis ni sangs rgyas nyid/ /'di nyid kyis ni grol bar 'gyur/ /rang bzhin lam
346b3(rgyud 'grel): la brten nas ni/ /thams cad byed cing rnam par grol/ /dpyid kyi thig ler bcos ma'i dkyil 'khor dang sbyin sreg dang mchod sbyin dang bzlas pa dang bsgom pa la sogs pa'i cho ga'i bya ba gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po rnam par gcod pa tshon
346b4(rgyud 'grel): pa sngon du 'gro ba'i rang bzhin bshad pa rgyas par bstan pa ste dang po'o// //de nas mdor bstan pa dang rgyas par bstan pa'i ngo bo la sogs rgyud kyi bdag nyid kyi phung po dang skye mched kyi rang bzhin lus can gang yang rung ba rnams kyis
346b5(rgyud 'grel): lus kyi rang gi lha'i ngo bo ji lta bar brjod par bya'o/ /gzugs ni sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad/ /rdo rje nyi ma tshor ba ste/ /'du shes pad+ma gar dbang phyug /de bzhin 'du byed rdo rje rgyal/ /rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /kun gyi ngo bo he ru ka /mig
346b6(rgyud 'grel): ni gti mug rdo rjer brjod/ /zhe sdang rdo rje mthong thos pa/ /de bzhin phrag dog rdo rje sna/ /kha ni 'dod chags rdo rjer brjod/ /reg la ser sna rdo rje ste/ /lnga po de dag sbom po'i lha/ /skye mched khams rnams thams cad ni/ /dam pa'i dbang phyug he ru ka /
346b7(rgyud 'grel): ltung byed ma ni sa yi khams/ /chu khams gsod par byed par brjod/ /'gugs byed ma ni me yi khams/ /rlung ni gar dbang phyug mar brjod/ /nam mkha' khams zhes brjod pa ni/ /pad+ma'i dra ba ma 'khrugs ma/ /de ltar lus can rnams
347a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi lus/ /phung po la sogs lha bdag nyid/ /bde dang sdug bsngal de bzhin las/ /nyon mongs la sogs nyer ldan pa/ /skye dang 'jig pa la gnas te/ /srid dang mya ngan 'das pa thob/ /dpyid kyi thig ler phung po
347a2(rgyud 'grel): dang khams dang skye mched kyi rang bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ji lta bar gnas pa rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa lha'i ngo bor bshad pa rgyas par bstan pa ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gang yang rung
347a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sku'i sku dang gsung dang thugs su son pa thams cad 'bring dang mcho gi dbye bas sgo'i dbye ba brjod par bya'o/ /ka ba gcig pa sgo dgu pa/ /sbom po lnga yi lhag pa'i lha/ /bu gu dgu ru gyur pa'i sgo/ /rnam pa dgu ru yongs su grags/ /tha ma
347a4(rgyud 'grel): sku dang ldan pa'i sgo/ /sbom po lha yi sprul pa'o/ /gzhan pa'i sgo ni rnam pa bzhi/ /gsung dang ldan pa 'bring du brjod/ /me nyid dang ni rlung nyid dang/ /dbang chen dang ni de bzhin chu/ /'khor lo sems kyi kun spyod las/ /steng logs thad ka
347a5(rgyud 'grel): 'og tu gnas/ /gsum pa'i sgo ni yid dang bcas/ /zla ba nyi ma rab dbye bas/ /gzhug dang 'byung ba nyid la ni/ /sgo ni dam pa nyid yin te/ /gtso bo'i mchog gi sgo mo ni/ /'og dang steng du rab tu grags/ /'og gi sgo nas rnam par shes//
347a6(rgyud 'grel): steng gi sgo nas khams yin te/ /rnam snang la sogs sangs rgyas rnams/ /steng gi sgo ni g.yo zhing gnas/ /de rnams 'og tu rnam par gnas/ /steng gi sgo nas gshegs su gsol/ /spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol tshul dang/ /'gro 'ong rab
347a7(rgyud 'grel): tu gnas rnams kyis/ /dus gsum rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang/ /mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma mo rnams/ /'jug pa dang ni ldog pa dang/ /yon tan skyon gyi rang bzhin dang/ /bde dang sdug bsngal rang bzhin gyi/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i
347b1(rgyud 'grel): tshul las grub/ /dbyid kyi thig le phung po dang/ /khams dang skye mched kyi bdag nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i dbye bas bshad pa rgyas par bstan pa ste gsum pa'o// //de bzhin gshegs pa yang rung ba'i sku'i gnas la sogs
347b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sa bcu'i gnas bstan par bya'o/ /rtsa rnams gang zhig bu ga dgu'i/ /sgo rnams dgu la yang dag gnas/ /b+ha ga'i nang gi bcu pa ni/ /de dag rnams kyi che mchog gzhan/ /dpral ba'i gnas nas brtsams nas ni/ /haM yig 'khor lo gtan
347b3(rgyud 'grel): pa dbab/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis nyin mtshan du/ /byang chub sems rnams 'jig pa'o/ /gnas la sogs pa'i ngo bor brjod/ /phyi dang mthun par nang na gnas/ /mkha' spyod rnal 'byor ma rnams brgyad/ /sa spyod ma yang de bzhin gzhan/ /gang
347b4(rgyud 'grel): zhig sa 'og gnas ma skye/ /de dag thams cad legs par ni/ /gnas gzhan rab tu dbye ba yis/ /sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo gnas/ /gnas la sogs pa'i sa bcu dag /nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i dbye ba yis/ /ji ltar gnas pa'i rang bzhin gyis//
347b5(rgyud 'grel): lhan cig skyes la gnas pa dbye/ /dga' ba la sogs sa rnams su/ /'di dag nyid las yang dag bshad/ /dbang po la sogs gzugs can gyi/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnas/ /phung po la sogs khyad par gyi/ /sangs
347b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas thams cad kyi ni gnas/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni rab tu 'ba' / /sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyi/ /byang sems sum cu gnyis rnams kyi/ /gang tshe 'di la gang gyur pa/ /de tshe sangs rgyas sras bcas pa'i/ /sangs rgyas
347b7(rgyud 'grel): nyid ni nges par thob/ /rang lus nyid las sangs rgyas gnas/ /gzhan ni gang yang yod ma yin/ /lus las gzhan du sangs rgyas nyid/ /mi shes pa yis g.yogs pa'i lus/ /gnas dang de'i gnas dang ni/ /zhing dang de'i zhing
348a1(rgyud 'grel): nyid dang/ /tshand+ho dang ni de bzhin gzhan/ /de yang nye ba'i tshand+ho ha/ /de bzhin 'du ba can nyid dang/ /nye ba'i 'dug can de bzhin/ /dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod de/ /gnas la sogs ni bcu rnams so/ /dpyid kyi thig ler de bzhin
348a2(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa'i sku'i bu ga dgu dang/ b+ha ga'i dbus su son pa'i rtsa ba'i gnas bcu la sogs pa'i sa bcu'i dbang phyug gi bshad pa yul gyi dbye ba rgyas par bstan pa ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gang ba'i
348a3(rgyud 'grel): sku'i bu ga dgu'i nang du son pa'i rtsa'i rang bzhin gnas la sogs pas bcu dang/ sku dang gsung dang thugs su 'byon pa gnas gzhan gyi dbye bas bshad par bya'o/ /spyi bo mA la ya yi yul/ /de bzhin spyi gtsug dzA land+har/ /de bzhin
348a4(rgyud 'grel): o Ta ya na nyid/ /rna ba g.yas pa nyid du brjod/ /rgyab kyi logs ni arbu da/ /bzhi po gnas kyi ming yin no/ /rna ba yon pa'i rang bzhin can/ /de bzhin go dA ba zhes bya/ /rA me shwa ri zhes grags pas/ /smin dbus de dag mig dag la/ /de
348a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin de bi ko Ta gzhan/ /lag pa'i rtsa ba mA la wa/ /de ltar nye ba'i gnas nyid ni/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo rnam par gnas/ /gnas kyi khyad par ngo bo yis/ /mkha' spyod rnams kyi yang dag bshad/ /mchan khung kA ma rU pa brjod/ /nu
348a6(rgyud 'grel): ma o drer rab tu grags/ /'di dag zhing du yang dag brjod/ /lte ba tri sha ku ner 'dod/ /sna yi rtse mo ko sa lar/ /de dag nye ba'i zhing du brjod/ /kha ni ka ling+ga ru smras/ /laM pA ka ni mgrin pa'i dbus/ /tsando ha zhes rnam par bshad/ /
348a7(rgyud 'grel): snying gar kAny+tsir brjod pa ste/ /chu so hi ma la ya nyid/ /de yang nye ba'i tshando ha'o/ /de ltar lus gnas thams cad ni/ /gsung gi 'khor lo rnam par gnas/ /gnas kyi khyad par ngo bo yis/ /sa spyod rnams kyi yang dag bshad/ /yi
348b1(rgyud 'grel): dags lha gnas rtags la ste/ /bshang lam gri ha de ba hA/ /'di dag 'du bar brjod pa'o/ /brla ni sau rASh+Ta ru brjod/ /gser gyi gling ni ming can du/ /rje bar gnyis ni rnam par bshad/ /nye pa yang ni 'du ba nyis/ /sen mo na ga pa ru dran/ /sind+hu
348b2(rgyud 'grel): nges pa rkang pa'i rgyab/ /dur khrod du ni yang dag brjod/ /mthe bo mya ngam du rab smras/ /pus mo ku lu tA ru brjod/ /de dag nye ba'i dur khrod nyid/ /gnas la sogs pa sa bcu rnams/ /'di rnams rang lus skyes pa kun/ /gnas kyi dbye bas 'byed
348b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /phyi rol dang mthun nang nas ni/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sa bcu rnams/ /sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo la/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi dbye ba yis/ /rtsa rnams kun gyi gnas dag ni/ /kun nas yang dag bshad pa yi/ /gnas 'di rnams su mkha' 'gro
348b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams/ /rtsa'i gzugs su yang dag gnas/ /dpyid kyi thig ler gnas pa la sogs pa sa bcu rgyas par bstan pa'i dbye ba ste lnga pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gang yang rung ba'i sku'i gnas ji ltar son pa rtsa'i 'khor lo mdor bstan
348b5(rgyud 'grel): pa mtshon par bya'o/ /snying gi nang son pad+ma ni/ /'dab ma brgyad pa snying por bcas/ /de yi nang du son pa'i rtsa/ /rang gi ngo bo 'bar ba'i me/ /chu shing gi ni me tog bzhin/ /'phyang bzhin pa ni kha 'og tu'o/ /de yi nad gnas dpa' bo ni/ /yungs
348b6(rgyud 'grel): gar gyi ni sbom phra tsam/ /gzhom med hUM yig sa bon ni/ /ba mo tsam du 'dzag pa nyid/ /lus can rnams kyi snying dga' ba/ /'di ni dpyid ces bya bar bshad/ /rgod dang mar me'i ngo bo ni/ /phag mo thig ler brjod pa ste/ /las kyi rlung gis
348b7(rgyud 'grel): bskul ba yis/ /lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du ni 'bar/ /dpyid thob pas ni chog shes pa/ /snyoms par 'jug par rnam par gnas/ /'di ni he ru ka dpal dpa' / /dpyid kyi thig ler brjod pa ste/ /rnal 'byor ma yi gzugs blangs nas/ /rgyu dang
349a1(rgyud 'grel): mi rgyu yang dag gnas/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis/ /sgo ni rnam pa gsum byung ba/ /de ni 'gro dang 'ong byed pa/ /'di ni kun gyi lus la gnas/ /lte bar a yig gzugs kyis te/ /thung ngu ru ni yongs su grags/ /
349a2(rgyud 'grel): snying la yang ni yi ge hUM/ /ring po cha ni gnyis dang bcas/ /mgrin par a yig gzugs kyi ni/ /cha gsum spor pa zhes su brjod/ /'phrol ba ru ni haM yig 'di/ /sgra dang thig le mi shigs pa'o/ /'khor lo bzhi yis rab dbye bas/ /sa
349a3(rgyud 'grel): sogs 'byung ba chen po dang/ /thun bzhir byin gyis brlabs nas ni/ /skad cig bzhir ni yang dag 'byung/ /dga' ba bzhi yi ngo bo dang/ /rnal 'byor bzhi ru gzhol ba'o/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i ngo bo yis/ /bya dang byed pa'i dngos po
349a4(rgyud 'grel): las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i gzugs kyis ni/ /'di ni ji ltar bde bar rol/ /'dab ma rnams ni bzhi po yang/ /phyogs bzhir rnam pas gnas pa ste/ /'byung ba bzhi yis rtsa rnams ni/ /thugs kyi rdo rje'i gnas su gnas/ /mkha' 'gro
349a5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin lA ma dang/ /dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma/ /mtshams na gnas byis pa'i snabs ni 'bab pa'o/ /mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma mo dag /nye ba'i dur khrod yang dag gnas/ /sku'i 'khor lor mkha' 'gro ma/ /phyi rol sa 'og
349a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'o/ /gong gi ngag ldan sgo la ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni rnam pa bzhi/ /de yi grwa yi char gnas pa/ /gzhan ma de bzhin rnam par gnas/ /rtsa yi sgo ru bya gdong ma/ /gnyis pa la ni 'ug gdong ma/ /gsum pa la ni khyi gdong
349a7(rgyud 'grel): ma/ bzhi pa la ni phag gdong ma/ /grwa ru gshin rje brtan ma dang/ /de bzhin gshin rje pho nya ma/ /de ma thag tu 'jigs chen ma/ /gshin rje mche ba gtsigs mar bshad/ /gshin rje 'joms ma 'jigs byed ma/ /bzhi par yang ni
349b1(rgyud 'grel): yang dag bshad/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma 'di rnams/ /rtsa yi gzugs kyis yang dag bshad/ /thugs kyi rdo rje rnal 'byor ma/ /sum cu rtsa bdun du ni brjod/ /'di rnams shes rab pha rol phyin/ /lus la yang dag rnam par gnas/ /dpyid kyi thig
349b2(rgyud 'grel): ler de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur son pa'i rtsa sum cu rtsa bdun gyi 'khor lo rnam par bzhag pa rgyas par bstan pa ste drug pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gang yang rung ba'i rtsa'i 'khor lo/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa
349b3(rgyud 'grel): bdun rnam pa bshad par bya'o/ /lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mkha' 'gro ma'o/ /tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa lA ma'o/ /chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa du ma skyes ma'o/ /sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gzugs can ma'o/ /'dun pa'i
349b4(rgyud 'grel): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba rab gtum ma'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa gtum mig ma'o/ /spyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa 'od ldan ma'o/ /sems kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa sna chen ma'o/ /dad pa'i dbang po dpa' bo'i blo gros ma'o/ /brtson
349b5(rgyud 'grel): 'grus kyi dbang po ni mi'u thung ma'o/ /dran pa'i dbang po lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'o/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po shing grib ma'o/ /shes rab kyi dbang po sa srung ma'o/ /dad pa'i stobs ni 'jigs byed chen mo'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi stobs mi rlung ?
349b6(rgyud 'grel): ma'o/ /dran pa'i stobs ni chang 'thung ma'o/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs ni ljang lha ma'o/ /shes rab kyi stobs ni shin tu bzang mo'o/ /ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rta rna ma'o/ /brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni mkha' 
349b7(rgyud 'grel): 'gro gdong ma'o/ /dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni 'khor lo sgyur ma'o/ /shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni dum skyes ma'o/ /chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chang 'tshong ma'o/ /dran pa
350a1(rgyud 'grel): yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni 'khor lo go cha'o/ /btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni shin tu dpa' mo'o/ /yang dag pa'i lta ba stobs chen ma'o/ /yang dag pa'i rtog pa 'khor lo rgyar ba'o/ /yang
350a2(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i dag brtson chen ma'o/ /yang dag pa'i las kyi mdza' bya gdong ma'o/ /yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba 'ug gdong ma'o/ /yang dag pa'i rtsol ba khyi gdong ma'o/ /yang dag pa'i dran pa phag gdong ma'o/ /yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dpal he
350a3(rgyud 'grel): ru ka'o/ /dge ba'i chos ma skyes ma bskyed pa ya ma dA d+hi'o/ /dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams yang dag par bsrung ba ni ya ma dU tI'o/ /mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa ni ya ma daMSh+Ta ni'o/ /mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams
